<source>README.md</source>
<document_content>
# wiktra-update

Tool to update https://github.com/twardoch/wiktra/

Python code license: [MIT](./LICENSE)
Lua (Wiktionary) code license: [CC BY-SA 3.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/)
</document_content>
</document>

<document index="4">

<document_content>
pywikiapi
</document_content>
</document>

# File: /Users/adam/Developer/vcs/github.twardoch/pub/wiktra-update/_previous/update_wiktra.py
# Language: python

import pywikiapi
from pathlib import Path
import argparse
import logging
import re

class WiktionaryModuleDownload(o, b, j, e, c, t):
    def __init__((self, output_folder, force=False)):
    def check_write((self, path)):
    def get_module_code((self, page="Goth-translit")):
    def write_modules_category((self, cat="Transliteration_modules")):
    def write_module((self, page="Goth-translit", parent=None)):

def __init__((self, output_folder, force=False)):

def check_write((self, path)):

def get_module_code((self, page="Goth-translit")):

def write_modules_category((self, cat="Transliteration_modules")):

def write_module((self, page="Goth-translit", parent=None)):

def cli(()):

def main((output, page=None, force=False)):


# File: /Users/adam/Developer/vcs/github.twardoch/pub/wiktra-update/langdata.py

<source>wikt/translit/Aghb-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {["ğ”°"] = "a", ["ğ”±"] = "b", ["ğ”²"] = "g", ["ğ”³"] = "d", ["ğ”´"] = "e", ["ğ”µ"] = "z", ["ğ”¶"] = "Ä“", ["ğ”·"] = "Å¾", ["ğ”¸"] = "t", ["ğ”¹"] = "Ä‡Ì£", ["ğ”º"] = "y", ["ğ”»"] = "Åº", ["ğ”¼"] = "i", ["ğ”½"] = "Ê•", ["ğ”¾"] = "l", ["ğ”¿"] = "n'", ["ğ•€"] = "x", ["ğ•"] = "d'", ["ğ•‚"] = "cÌ£", ["ğ•ƒ"] = "Ê’Ì", ["ğ•„"] = "á¸³", ["ğ•…"] = "l'", ["ğ•†"] = "h", ["ğ•‡"] = "xÌ£", ["ğ•ˆ"] = "Ã¥", ["ğ•‰"] = "Ä‡", ["ğ•Š"] = "ÄÌ£", ["ğ•‹"] = "c'", ["ğ•Œ"] = "m", ["ğ•"] = "qÌ‡", ["ğ•"] = "n", ["ğ•"] = "Ê’Ëˆ", ["ğ•"] = "Å¡", ["ğ•‘"] = "Ç¯", ["ğ•’"] = "o", ["ğ•“"] = "á¹­'", ["ğ•”"] = "f", ["ğ••"] = "Ê’", ["ğ•–"] = "Ä", ["ğ•—"] = "á¹—", ["ğ•˜"] = "Ä¡", ["ğ•™"] = "r", ["ğ•š"] = "s", ["ğ•›"] = "v", ["ğ•œ"] = "á¹­", ["ğ•"] = "Å›", ["ğ•"] = "Ã¼", ["ğ•Ÿ"] = "cÌ£'", ["ğ• "] = "c", ["ğ•¡"] = "w", ["ğ•¢"] = "p", ["ğ•£"] = "k", ["ğ•¯"] = "Â»"};

function export.tr(text)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ğ•’ğ•¡", "u")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="7">
<source>wikt/translit/Ahom-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local u = mw.ustring.char
local con_cls = "([" .. u(0x11700) .. "-" .. u(0x1171A) .. "][" .. u(0x1171D) .. u(0x1171E) .. u(0x1171F) .. "]?)"

local tt = {
    -- consonants
    [u(0x11700)] = "k",
    [u(0x11701)] = "kh",
    [u(0x11702)] = "ng",
    [u(0x11703)] = "n",
    [u(0x11704)] = "t",
    [u(0x11705)] = "t",
    [u(0x11706)] = "p",
    [u(0x11707)] = "ph",
    [u(0x11708)] = "b",
    [u(0x11709)] = "m",
    [u(0x1170A)] = "y",
    [u(0x1170B)] = "ch",
    [u(0x1170C)] = "th",
    [u(0x1170D)] = "r",
    [u(0x1170E)] = "l",
    [u(0x1170F)] = "s",
    [u(0x11710)] = "ny",
    [u(0x11711)] = "h",
    [u(0x11712)] = "Ê¼",
    [u(0x11713)] = "d",
    [u(0x11714)] = "dh",
    [u(0x11715)] = "g",
    [u(0x11716)] = "g",
    [u(0x11717)] = "gh",
    [u(0x11718)] = "bh",
    [u(0x11719)] = "jh",
    [u(0x1171A)] = "b",
    -- medials
    [u(0x1171D)] = "l",
    [u(0x1171E)] = "r",
    [u(0x1171F)] = "r",
    -- vowels (excluding composition)
    [u(0x11720)] = "a",
    [u(0x11721)] = "aa",
    [u(0x11722)] = "i",
    [u(0x11723)] = "ii",
    [u(0x11724)] = "u",
    [u(0x11725)] = "uu",
    [u(0x11727)] = "w",
    [u(0x11729)] = "y",
    [u(0x11726)] = "e",
    [u(0x11728)] = "o",
    [u(0x1172A)] = "m",
    [u(0x1172B)] = "",
    -- numerals
    [u(0x11730)] = "0",
    [u(0x11731)] = "1",
    [u(0x11732)] = "2",
    [u(0x11733)] = "3",
    [u(0x11734)] = "4",
    [u(0x11735)] = "5",
    [u(0x11736)] = "6",
    [u(0x11737)] = "7",
    [u(0x11738)] = "8",
    [u(0x11739)] = "9",
    [u(0x1173A)] = "[10]",
    [u(0x1173B)] = "[20]",
    -- punctuations and symbols
    [u(0x1173C)] = ",",
    [u(0x1173D)] = ".",
    [u(0x1173E)] = "@",
    [u(0x1173F)] = "wi",
    -- zero-width space (display it if it hides in a word)
    [u(0x200B)] = "â€¼"
}

local adjust0 = {
    -- vowels (composition)
    [u(0x11722) .. u(0x11724)] = "ue",
    [u(0x11726) .. u(0x11721)] = "oo",
    [u(0x11728) .. u(0x11726) .. u(0x11721)] = "woo",
    [u(0x11726) .. u(0x11727)] = "ee",
    [u(0x11729) .. u(0x11724)] = "aay"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc, debug_mode)

    if type(text) == "table" then -- called directly from a template
        text = text.args[1]
    end

    text = gsub(text, u(0x11708) .. "(" .. u(0x1172B) .. ")", "w%1") -- final -b becomes -w
    text = gsub(text, con_cls .. "([" .. u(0x11700) .. "-" .. u(0x11719) .. "w]" .. ")" .. u(0x1172B), "%1a%2")
    text = gsub(text, con_cls .. "([" .. u(0x11727) .. u(0x11729) .. u(0x1172A) .. "])", "%1a%2")

    for k, v in pairs(adjust0) do text = gsub(text, con_cls .. k, "%1" .. v) end

    text = gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text

end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="8">
<source>wikt/translit/Altai-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğ"] = "Yo",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ™"] = "Y",
    ["Ğˆ"] = "JÌŒ",
    ["J"] = "JÌŒ[[Category:Altai text with misused characters|J]]",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ò¤"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ó¦"] = "Ã–",
    ["Ã–"] = "Ã–[[Category:Altai text with misused characters|Ã–]]",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ó°"] = "Ãœ",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "H",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Å Ä",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Ã",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Yu",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ya",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "yo",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "y",
    ["Ñ˜"] = "Ç°",
    ["j"] = "Ç°[[Category:Altai text with misused characters|j]]",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ò¥"] = "Å‹",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ó§"] = "Ã¶",
    ["Ã¶"] = "Ã¶[[Category:Altai text with misused characters|Ã¶]]",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ó±"] = "Ã¼",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ñ…"] = "h",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "Ã¯",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",
    ["Ñ"] = "yu",
    ["Ñ"] = "ya"
}

local iotated = {["Ğ•"] = "Ye", ["Ğµ"] = "ye"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local ugsub = mw.ustring.gsub

    -- Ğ needs to be composed if is decomposed (e + combining diaeresis).
    -- However, this cannot happen in wikitext, only in Lua modules.
    text = mw.ustring.toNFC(text)

    -- Ğµ after a vowel or at the beginning of a word becomes ye
    -- Note that according to modern Altai orthography ĞµĞµ (instead of ÑÑ) is occationally used for long r
    text = ugsub(text, "([ĞĞÓ¨Ğ£Ò®Ğ«Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ğ¾Ó©ÑƒÒ¯Ñ‹ÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ÑŠÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?)Ğµ", "%1ye")
    -- text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ĞĞÓ¨Ğ£Ò®Ğ«Ğ•Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜Ğ•ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ğ¾Ó©ÑƒÒ¯Ñ‹ÑÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ĞµÑŠÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?)Ğµ", "%1ye")
    text = ugsub(text, "^[Ğ•Ğµ]", iotated)
    text = ugsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])([Ğ•Ğµ])", function(a, b) return a .. iotated[b] end)

    return (ugsub(text, ".", tab))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="9">
<source>wikt/translit/Armi-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["ğ¡€"] = "Ê¾", -- aleph
    ["ğ¡"] = "b", -- beth
    ["ğ¡‚"] = "g", -- gimel
    ["ğ¡ƒ"] = "d", -- daleth
    ["ğ¡„"] = "h", -- he
    ["ğ¡…"] = "w", -- waw
    ["ğ¡†"] = "z", -- zayin
    ["ğ¡‡"] = "á¸¥", -- heth
    ["ğ¡ˆ"] = "á¹­", -- teth
    ["ğ¡‰"] = "y", -- yodh
    ["ğ¡Š"] = "k", -- khaph
    ["ğ¡‹"] = "l", -- lamedh
    ["ğ¡Œ"] = "m", -- mem
    ["ğ¡"] = "n", -- nun
    ["ğ¡"] = "s", -- samekh
    ["ğ¡"] = "Ê¿", -- ayin
    ["ğ¡"] = "p", -- pe
    ["ğ¡‘"] = "á¹£", -- sadhe
    ["ğ¡’"] = "q", -- qoph
    ["ğ¡“"] = "r", -- resh
    ["ğ¡”"] = "Å¡", -- shin
    ["ğ¡•"] = "t", -- taw
    ["ğ¡—"] = "|", -- section sign
    ["ğ¡˜"] = "1", -- one
    ["ğ¡™"] = "2", -- two
    ["ğ¡š"] = "3", -- three
    ["ğ¡›"] = "10", -- ten
    ["ğ¡œ"] = "20", -- twenty
    ["ğ¡"] = "100", -- one hundred
    ["ğ¡"] = "1000", -- one thousand
    ["ğ¡Ÿ"] = "10000" -- ten thousand
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)

    if sc ~= "Armi" then return end

    -- Transliterate characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document_content>
local export = {}

local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local mapping = {
    ["Õ¡"] = "a",
    ["Õ¢"] = "b",
    ["Õ£"] = "g",
    ["Õ¤"] = "d",
    ["Õ¥"] = "e",
    ["Õ¦"] = "z",
    ["Õ§"] = "Ä“",
    ["Õ¨"] = "É™",
    ["Õ©"] = "tÊ¿",
    ["Õª"] = "Å¾",
    ["Õ«"] = "i",
    ["Õ¬"] = "l",
    ["Õ­"] = "x",
    ["Õ®"] = "c",
    ["Õ¯"] = "k",
    ["Õ°"] = "h",
    ["Õ±"] = "j",
    ["Õ²"] = "Å‚",
    ["Õ³"] = "Ä",
    ["Õ´"] = "m",
    ["Õµ"] = "y",
    ["Õ¶"] = "n",
    ["Õ·"] = "Å¡",
    ["Õ¸"] = "o",
    ["Õ¹"] = "ÄÊ¿",
    ["Õº"] = "p",
    ["Õ»"] = "Ç°",
    ["Õ¼"] = "á¹™",
    ["Õ½"] = "s",
    ["Õ¾"] = "v",
    ["Õ¿"] = "t",
    ["Ö€"] = "r",
    ["Ö"] = "cÊ¿",
    ["Ö‚"] = "w",
    ["Öƒ"] = "pÊ¿",
    ["Ö„"] = "kÊ¿",
    ["Ö‡"] = "ew",
    ["Ö…"] = "Å",
    ["Ö†"] = "f",
    ["Ô±"] = "A",
    ["Ô²"] = "B",
    ["Ô³"] = "G",
    ["Ô´"] = "D",
    ["Ôµ"] = "E",
    ["Ô¶"] = "Z",
    ["Ô·"] = "Ä’",
    ["Ô¸"] = "Æ",
    ["Ô¹"] = "TÊ¿",
    ["Ôº"] = "Å½",
    ["Ô»"] = "I",
    ["Ô¼"] = "L",
    ["Ô½"] = "X",
    ["Ô¾"] = "C",
    ["Ô¿"] = "K",
    ["Õ€"] = "H",
    ["Õ"] = "J",
    ["Õ‚"] = "Å",
    ["Õƒ"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Õ„"] = "M",
    ["Õ…"] = "Y",
    ["Õ†"] = "N",
    ["Õ‡"] = "Å ",
    ["Õˆ"] = "O",
    ["Õ‰"] = "ÄŒÊ¿",
    ["ÕŠ"] = "P",
    ["Õ‹"] = "JÌŒ",
    ["ÕŒ"] = "á¹˜",
    ["Õ"] = "S",
    ["Õ"] = "V",
    ["Õ"] = "T",
    ["Õ"] = "R",
    ["Õ‘"] = "CÊ¿",
    ["Õ’"] = "W",
    ["Õ“"] = "PÊ¿",
    ["Õ”"] = "KÊ¿",
    ["Õ•"] = "ÅŒ",
    ["Õ–"] = "F",
    ["ï¬“â€ˆ"] = "mn",
    ["ï¬”"] = "me",
    ["ï¬•"] = "mi",
    ["ï¬–"] = "vn",
    ["ï¬—"] = "mx",
    -- punctuation
    ["Õ"] = ",",
    ["Ö‰"] = ".",
    ["â€¤"] = ";",
    ["Õ›"] = "Ì",
    ["Õœ"] = "<sup>!</sup>",
    ["Õ"] = "<sup>?</sup>",
    ["ÕŸ"] = ".",
    ["ÖŠ"] = "-",
    ["Õš"] = "â€™",
    ["Â«"] = "â€œ",
    ["Â»"] = "â€",
    ["Õ™"] = "Ê¿"
}

local replacements = {["ÕµÌµ"] = "É¦", ["Õˆ[Ö‚Õ’]"] = "U", ["Õ¸Ö‚"] = "u", ["ÕˆÕ›[Ö‚Õ’]"] = "Ãš", ["Õ¸Õ›Ö‚"] = "Ãº", ["ÕˆÕœ[Ö‚Õ’]"] = "U<sup>!</sup>", ["Õ¸ÕœÖ‚"] = "u<sup>!</sup>", ["ÕˆÕ[Ö‚Õ’]"] = "U<sup>?</sup>", ["Õ¸ÕÖ‚"] = "u<sup>?</sup>", ["Õ¸ÌˆÖ‚"] = "Ã¼", ["ÕˆÌˆ[Ö‚Õ’]"] = "Ãœ", ["Ö…Ìˆ"] = "Ã¶", ["Õ•Ìˆ"] = "Ã–"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    if sc and sc ~= "Armn" then return nil end

    for regex, replacement in pairs(replacements) do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, regex, replacement) end

    text = gsub(text, ".", mapping)
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="11">
<source>wikt/translit/Avst-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local mapping = {
    ["ğ¬€"] = "a", -- AVESTAN LETTER A 
    ["ğ¬"] = "Ä", -- AVESTAN LETTER AA 
    ["ğ¬‚"] = "Ã¥", -- AVESTAN LETTER AO 
    ["ğ¬ƒ"] = "ÄÌŠ", -- AVESTAN LETTER AAO 
    ["ğ¬„"] = "Ä…", -- AVESTAN LETTER AN 
    ["ğ¬…"] = "Ä…Ì‡Ì‡", -- AVESTAN LETTER AAN 
    ["ğ¬†"] = "É™", -- AVESTAN LETTER AE 
    ["ğ¬‡"] = "É™Ì„", -- AVESTAN LETTER AEE 
    ["ğ¬ˆ"] = "e", -- AVESTAN LETTER E 
    ["ğ¬‰"] = "Ä“", -- AVESTAN LETTER EE 
    ["ğ¬Š"] = "o", -- AVESTAN LETTER O 
    ["ğ¬‹"] = "Å", -- AVESTAN LETTER OO 
    ["ğ¬Œ"] = "i", -- AVESTAN LETTER I 
    ["ğ¬"] = "Ä«", -- AVESTAN LETTER II 
    ["ğ¬"] = "u", -- AVESTAN LETTER U 
    ["ğ¬"] = "Å«", -- AVESTAN LETTER UU 

    ["ğ¬"] = "k", -- AVESTAN LETTER KE 
    ["ğ¬‘"] = "x", -- AVESTAN LETTER XE 
    ["ğ¬’"] = "xÌ", -- AVESTAN LETTER XYE 
    ["ğ¬“"] = "xáµ›", -- AVESTAN LETTER XVE
    ["ğ¬”"] = "g", -- AVESTAN LETTER GE 
    ["ğ¬•"] = "Ä¡", -- AVESTAN LETTER GGE 
    ["ğ¬–"] = "Î³", -- AVESTAN LETTER GHE 
    ["ğ¬—"] = "c", -- AVESTAN LETTER CE 
    ["ğ¬˜"] = "j", -- AVESTAN LETTER JE 
    ["ğ¬™"] = "t", -- AVESTAN LETTER TE 
    ["ğ¬š"] = "Î¸", -- AVESTAN LETTER THE 
    ["ğ¬›"] = "d", -- AVESTAN LETTER DE 
    ["ğ¬œ"] = "Î´", -- AVESTAN LETTER DHE 
    ["ğ¬"] = "tÌ°", -- AVESTAN LETTER TTE 
    ["ğ¬"] = "p", -- AVESTAN LETTER PE 
    ["ğ¬Ÿ"] = "f", -- AVESTAN LETTER FE 
    ["ğ¬ "] = "b", -- AVESTAN LETTER BE 
    ["ğ¬¡"] = "Î²", -- AVESTAN LETTER BHE 
    ["ğ¬¢"] = "Å‹", -- AVESTAN LETTER NGE 
    ["ğ¬£"] = "Å‹Ì", -- AVESTAN LETTER NGYE 
    ["ğ¬¤"] = "Å‹áµ›", -- AVESTAN LETTER NGVE
    ["ğ¬¥"] = "n", -- AVESTAN LETTER NE 
    ["ğ¬¦"] = "Å„", -- AVESTAN LETTER NYE 
    ["ğ¬§"] = "á¹‡", -- AVESTAN LETTER NNE 
    ["ğ¬¨"] = "m", -- AVESTAN LETTER ME 
    ["ğ¬©"] = "mÌ¨", -- AVESTAN LETTER HME 
    ["ğ¬ª"] = "áº", -- AVESTAN LETTER YYE 
    ["ğ¬«"] = "y", -- AVESTAN LETTER YE 
    ["ğ¬¬"] = "v", -- AVESTAN LETTER VE 
    ["ğ¬­"] = "r", -- AVESTAN LETTER RE 
    ["ğ¬®"] = "l", -- AVESTAN LETTER LE 
    ["ğ¬¯"] = "s", -- AVESTAN LETTER SE 
    ["ğ¬°"] = "z", -- AVESTAN LETTER ZE 
    ["ğ¬±"] = "Å¡", -- AVESTAN LETTER SHE 
    ["ğ¬²"] = "Å¾", -- AVESTAN LETTER ZHE 
    ["ğ¬³"] = "Å¡Ì", -- AVESTAN LETTER SHYE 
    ["ğ¬´"] = "á¹£ÌŒ", -- AVESTAN LETTER SSHE 
    ["ğ¬µ"] = "h", -- AVESTAN LETTER HE 
    ["ğ¬¹"] = " ", -- AVESTAN ABBREVIATION MARK
    ["â¸±"] = "." -- WORD SEPARATOR MIDDLE DOT
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "[â¸±ğ¬¹]?[ğ¬ºğ¬»ğ¬¼ğ¬½ğ¬¾ğ¬¿]", ".") -- punctuation
    text = string.gsub(text, "[\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*", mapping) -- transliterate letters
    -- text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ii", "y")
    -- text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "uu", "v")

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aÄÉ™Å])rÉ™([kxgÎ³cjtÎ¸Î´pfbÎ²nmrlszÅ¡Å¾])", "%1r<sup><small>É™</small></sup>%2") -- r > rÉ™ /V_C
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aÄÉ™Å])rÉ™$", "%1r<sup><small>É™</small></sup>") -- r > rÉ™ /V_#

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aÄeÄ“É™oÅuÅ«])i(rm[eiÄ«])", "%1<sup><small>i</small></sup>%2") -- i-epenthesis
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aÄeÄ“É™oÅuÅ«])i(á¹‡t[eiÄ«])", "%1<sup><small>i</small></sup>%2") -- i-epenthesis
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aÄeÄ“É™oÅuÅ«])i([kxgÎ³tÎ¸Î´pfbÎ²nrl][eiÄ«])", "%1<sup><small>i</small></sup>%2") -- i-epenthesis
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(%.%s)i([Î¸r][iÄ«])", "%1<sup><small>i</small></sup>%2") -- i-epenthesis
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "^i([Î¸r][iÄ«])", "<sup><small>i</small></sup>%1") -- i-epenthesis

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aÄeÄ“É™iÄ«oÅ])u(r[ouÅ«])", "%1<sup><small>u</small></sup>%2") -- u-epenthesis

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

local export = {}
local U = mw.ustring.char
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match
local sub = mw.ustring.sub

local conv = {
    ["à¦•"] = "à¤•",
    ["à¦–"] = "à¤–",
    ["à¦—"] = "à¤—",
    ["à¦˜"] = "à¤˜",
    ["à¦™"] = "à¤™",
    ["à¦š"] = "à¤š",
    ["à¦›"] = "à¤›",
    ["à¦œ"] = "à¤œ",
    ["à¦"] = "à¤",
    ["à¦"] = "à¤",
    ["à¦Ÿ"] = "à¤Ÿ",
    ["à¦ "] = "à¤ ",
    ["à¦¡"] = "à¤¡",
    ["à¦¢"] = "à¤¢",
    ["à¦£"] = "à¤£",
    ["à¦¤"] = "à¤¤",
    ["à¦¥"] = "à¤¥",
    ["à¦¦"] = "à¤¦",
    ["à¦§"] = "à¤§",
    ["à¦¨"] = "à¤¨",
    ["à¦ª"] = "à¤ª",
    ["à¦«"] = "à¤«",
    ["à¦¬"] = "à¤¬",
    ["à¦­"] = "à¤­",
    ["à¦®"] = "à¤®",
    ["à¦¯"] = "à¤¯",
    ["à¦°"] = "à¤°",
    ["à¦²"] = "à¤²",
    ["à¦¶"] = "à¤¶",
    ["à¦·"] = "à¤·",
    ["à¦¸"] = "à¤¸",
    ["à¦¹"] = "à¤¹",

    ["à¦¾"] = "à¤¾",

    ["à§„"] = "à¥„",
    ["à§¢"] = "à¥¢",
    ["à§£"] = "à¥£",
    ["à§‡"] = "à¥‡",
    ["à§ˆ"] = "à¥ˆ",
    ["à§‹"] = "à¥‹",
    ["à§Œ"] = "à¥Œ",
    ["à§"] = "à¥",
    ["à¦¼"] = "à¤¼",

    -- vowels
    ["à¦…"] = "à¤…",
    ["à¦†"] = "à¤†",
    ["à¦‡"] = "à¤‡",
    ["à¦ˆ"] = "à¤ˆ",
    ["à¦‰"] = "à¤‰",
    ["à¦Š"] = "à¤Š",
    ["à¦‹"] = "à¤‹",
    ["à§ "] = "à¥ ",
    ["à¦Œ"] = "à¤Œ",
    ["à§¡"] = "à¥¡",
    ["à¦"] = "à¤",
    ["à¦"] = "à¤",
    ["à¦“"] = "à¤“",
    ["à¦”"] = "à¤”",
    -- chandrabindu    
    ["à¦"] = "à¤",
    -- anusvara    
    ["à¦‚"] = "à¤‚",
    -- visarga    
    ["à¦ƒ"] = "à¤ƒ",
    -- avagraha
    ["à¦½"] = "à¤½",
    -- punctuation
    ["à¥¥"] = "à¥¥",
    ["à¥¤"] = "à¥¤",
    ["à¦“à¦"] = "à¥",
    -- Vedic extensions
    ["á³µ"] = "á³µ",
    ["á³¶"] = "á³¶",

    ["à§¦"] = "à¥¦",
    ["à§§"] = "à¥§",
    ["à§¨"] = "à¥¨",
    ["à§©"] = "à¥©",
    ["à§ª"] = "à¥ª",
    ["à§«"] = "à¥«",
    ["à§¬"] = "à¥¬",
    ["à§­"] = "à¥­",
    ["à§®"] = "à¥®",
    ["à§¯"] = "à¥¯"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", function(c) return conv[c] end)
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>

<document index="13">
<source>wikt/translit/Brah-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local consonants = {
    -- consonants
    ["ğ‘€“"] = "k",
    ["ğ‘€”"] = "kh",
    ["ğ‘€•"] = "g",
    ["ğ‘€–"] = "gh",
    ["ğ‘€—"] = "á¹…",
    ["ğ‘€˜"] = "c",
    ["ğ‘€™"] = "ch",
    ["ğ‘€š"] = "j",
    ["ğ‘€›"] = "jh",
    ["ğ‘€œ"] = "Ã±",
    ["ğ‘€"] = "á¹­",
    ["ğ‘€"] = "á¹­h",
    ["ğ‘€Ÿ"] = "á¸",
    ["ğ‘€ "] = "á¸h",
    ["ğ‘€¡"] = "á¹‡",
    ["ğ‘€¢"] = "t",
    ["ğ‘€£"] = "th",
    ["ğ‘€¤"] = "d",
    ["ğ‘€¥"] = "dh",
    ["ğ‘€¦"] = "n",
    ["ğ‘€§"] = "p",
    ["ğ‘€¨"] = "ph",
    ["ğ‘€©"] = "b",
    ["ğ‘€ª"] = "bh",
    ["ğ‘€«"] = "m",
    ["ğ‘€¬"] = "y",
    ["ğ‘€­"] = "r",
    ["ğ‘€®"] = "l",
    ["ğ‘€¯"] = "v",
    ["ğ‘€´"] = "á¸·",
    ["ğ‘€°"] = "Å›",
    ["ğ‘€±"] = "á¹£",
    ["ğ‘€²"] = "s",
    ["ğ‘€³"] = "h"
}

local diacritics = {
    -- matras
    ["ğ‘€¸"] = "Ä",
    ["ğ‘€º"] = "i",
    ["ğ‘€»"] = "Ä«",
    ["ğ‘€¼"] = "u",
    ["ğ‘€½"] = "Å«",
    ["ğ‘€¾"] = "á¹›",
    ["ğ‘€¿"] = "á¹",
    ["ğ‘€"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["ğ‘"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["ğ‘‚"] = "e",
    ["ğ‘ƒ"] = "ai",
    ["ğ‘„"] = "o",
    ["ğ‘…"] = "au",
    ["ğ‘†"] = "",
    -- bhattiprolu aa
    ["ğ‘€¹"] = "Ä"
}

local tt = {

    -- vowels
    ["ğ‘€…"] = "a",
    ["ğ‘€†"] = "Ä",
    ["ğ‘€‡"] = "i",
    ["ğ‘€ˆ"] = "Ä«",
    ["ğ‘€‰"] = "u",
    ["ğ‘€Š"] = "Å«",
    ["ğ‘€‹"] = "á¹›",
    ["ğ‘€Œ"] = "á¹",
    ["ğ‘€"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["ğ‘€"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["ğ‘€"] = "e",
    ["ğ‘€"] = "ai",
    ["ğ‘€‘"] = "o",
    ["ğ‘€’"] = "au",
    -- chandrabindu    
    ["ğ‘€€"] = "mÌ", -- until a better method is found
    -- anusvara    
    ["ğ‘€"] = "á¹ƒ", -- until a better method is found
    -- visarga    
    ["ğ‘€‚"] = "á¸¥",
    -- numerals
    ["ğ‘¦"] = "0",
    ["ğ‘§"] = "1",
    ["ğ‘¨"] = "2",
    ["ğ‘©"] = "3",
    ["ğ‘ª"] = "4",
    ["ğ‘«"] = "5",
    ["ğ‘¬"] = "6",
    ["ğ‘­"] = "7",
    ["ğ‘®"] = "8",
    ["ğ‘¯"] = "9",
    -- punctuation        
    ["ğ‘‡"] = ".", -- danda
    ["ğ‘ˆ"] = "." -- double danda
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    if sc ~= "Brah" then return nil end

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ğ‘€“-ğ‘€´])" .. "([ğ‘€¸ğ‘€ºğ‘€ºğ‘€»ğ‘€¼ğ‘€½ğ‘€¾ğ‘€¿ğ‘€ğ‘ğ‘‚ğ‘ƒğ‘„ğ‘…ğ‘†ğ‘€¹]?)" .. "([ğ‘€…-ğ‘€’]?)", function(c, d, e)
        if d == "" and e ~= "" then
            if tt[e] == "i" or tt[e] == "u" then
                return consonants[c] .. "a" .. tt[e] .. "Ìˆ"
            else
                return consonants[c] .. "a" .. tt[e]
            end
        elseif e ~= "" then
            return consonants[c] .. diacritics[d] .. tt[e]
        elseif d == "" then
            return consonants[c] .. "a"
        else
            return consonants[c] .. diacritics[d]
        end
    end)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)
    if (lang == "sa" or lang == "pi") and mw.ustring.match(text, "lÌ¥") then
        text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "lÌ¥", "á¸·")
        text = mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
    end

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="14">
<source>wikt/translit/Cans-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
-- to be discussed: not to create this module, but create individual modules instead?

local UTF8_char = "[%z\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*"

local function iter_char(str) return string.gmatch(str, UTF8_char) end

local function len(str)
    local _, length = string.gsub(str, UTF8_char, "")
    return length
end

local function fetch(str, index)
    local i = 0
    for char in iter_char(str) do
        i = i + 1
        if i == index then return char end
    end
    return ""
end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local data = {
        { -- short-vowel
            "ááƒá…áŠá¯á±á³á¸á‘Œá‘á‘á‘•á‘«á‘­á‘¯á‘²á’‰á’‹á’á’á’£á’¥á’§á’ªá“€á“‚á“„á“‡á“­á“¯á“±á“´á”¦á”¨á”ªá”­á–Šá–‹á–Œá–á•ƒá•†á•ˆá•á•‚á•„á•Šá•‹á”á”‘á”“á”•á•“á••á•—á•™á•á• á•¤á•¦á˜šá˜›á˜•á˜”á““á“•á“—á“šá™¯á•¿á–á–ƒá™°á–á–‘á–“ á™±á™³á™µá•´á•µá•·á•¹", "1ptkcmnsyrrrÅ¡fÃ°zlq23h", {"", "ng", "nng"}, "eioa", function(a, b) return a .. b end
        }, { -- w
            "áŒáááá’á“á—á˜áºá»á¼á½á‘€á‘á‘„á‘…á‘—á‘˜á‘™á‘šá‘á‘á‘¡á‘¢á‘´á‘µá‘¶á‘·á‘ºá‘»á‘¾á‘¿á’’á’“á’”á’•á’˜á’™á’œá’á’¬á’­á’®á’¯á’²á’³á’¶á’·" .. "á“‰á“Š  á“‹á“Œ  á“¶á“·á“¸á“¹á“¼á“½á”€á”á”¯á”°á”±á”²á”µá”¶á”¹á”ºá”—á”˜á”™á”šá”á”á”¡á”¢á“œá“á“á“Ÿá“¢á“£á“¦á“§", "1ptkcmnsyrz", {""}, "eeiiooaa", function(a, b) return a .. "w" .. b end
        }, { -- long-vowel
            "á„á†á‹á²á´á¹á‘á‘‘á‘–á‘®á‘°á‘³á’Œá’á’‘á’¦á’¨á’«á“ƒá“…á“ˆá“°á“²á“µá”©á”«á”®á•‡á•‰á•Œá”’á””á”–á•–á•˜á•šá•¢á•¥á•§á“–á“˜á“›áá”á™á–€á–‚á–„á•¶á•¸á•º", "1ptkcmnsyrÅ¡fÃ°lwqh", {""}, "Ä«ÅÄ", function(a, b) return a .. b end
        }, { -- w-long
            "áá‘á”á•á–á™ášá›á¾á¿á‘‚á‘ƒ á‘†á‘‡á‘ˆá‘›á‘œá‘Ÿá‘  á‘£á‘¤á‘¥á‘¸á‘¹á‘¼á‘½ á’€á’á’‚á’–á’—á’šá’› á’á’Ÿá’ á’°á’±á’´á’µ á’¸á’¹á’º     á“á“á“" .. "á“ á“¡á“¤á“¥ á“¨á“© á“ºá“»á“¾á“¿ á”‚á”ƒá”„á”›á”œá”Ÿá”  á”£á”¤ á”³á”´á”·á”¸ á”»á”¼á”½     á•á•      á•›á•œ      á•¨á•© ", "1ptkcmnlsÅ¡yrfÃ°", {""}, "Ä«Ä«ÅÅÅÄÄÄ", function(a, b) return a .. "w" .. b end
        }, { -- individual
            "á‘ŠáŸá á¨á’¼á£á¢á§á¤á¦á•á•½á“«á•‘á‘‰á‘¦á’¡á’ƒá’»á“á”…á”¥á”¾á“ªá•á•ªâ€¡á’„á”‰á–…á–•á––á•á–¦á•€á•»á•¼", "ptkcmnsywh11lrptckmnsÅ¡ylrÃ°Ã°23q45vlyhh", {"hk", "kw", "sk", "ng", "nng"}
        }
    }

    for i, item in pairs(data) do
        if item[4] then
            local length = len(item[4])
            local c = 0
            for s in iter_char(item[1]) do
                c = c + 1
                local index = math.ceil(c / length)
                local a = fetch(item[2], index)
                if tonumber(a) then a = item[3][tonumber(a)] end
                index = (c - 1) % length + 1
                local b = fetch(item[4], index)
                if s ~= " " then text = string.gsub(text, s, item[5](a, b)) end
            end
        else
            local iter1, iter2 = iter_char(item[1]), iter_char(item[2])
            while true do
                local s, a = iter1(), iter2()
                if not (s and a) then break end
                if tonumber(a) then a = item[3][tonumber(a)] end
                text = string.gsub(text, s, a)
            end
        end
    end
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

    return text

<document index="16">
<source>wikt/translit/Chrs-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["ğ¾°"] = "Ê¾", -- aleph
    ["ğ¾±"] = "Ê¾", -- small aleph
    ["ğ¾²"] = "Î²", -- beth
    ["ğ¾³"] = "É£", -- gimel
    ["ğ¾´"] = "d", -- daleth
    ["ğ¾µ"] = "h", -- he
    ["ğ¾¶"] = "w", -- waw
    ["ğ¾·"] = "w", -- curled waw
    ["ğ¾¸"] = "z", -- zayin
    ["ğ¾¹"] = "x", -- heth
    ["ğ¾º"] = "y", -- yodh
    ["ğ¾»"] = "k", -- kaph
    ["ğ¾¼"] = "Î´", -- lamedh
    ["ğ¾½"] = "m", -- mem
    ["ğ¾¾"] = "n", -- nun
    ["ğ¾¿"] = "s", -- samekh
    ["ğ¿€"] = "Ê¿", -- ayin
    ["ğ¿"] = "p", -- pe
    ["ğ¿‚"] = "r", -- resh
    ["ğ¿ƒ"] = "Å¡", -- shin
    ["ğ¿„"] = "t", -- taw
    ["ğ¿…"] = "1", -- one
    ["ğ¿†"] = "2", -- two
    ["ğ¿‡"] = "3", -- three
    ["ğ¿ˆ"] = "4", -- four
    ["ğ¿‰"] = "10", -- ten
    ["ğ¿Š"] = "20", -- twenty
    ["ğ¿‹"] = "100" -- one hundred
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- If the script is not Chrs, do not transliterate
    if sc ~= "Chrs" then return end

    -- Transliterate characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="18">
<source>wikt/translit/Cprt-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local chars = {
    ["ğ €"] = "a",
    ["ğ "] = "e",
    ["ğ ‚"] = "i",
    ["ğ ƒ"] = "o",
    ["ğ „"] = "u",

    ["ğ …"] = "ja",
    -- je not in Unicode
    -- ji not in Unicode
    ["ğ ˆ"] = "jo",
    -- ju not in Unicode

    ["ğ Š"] = "ka",
    ["ğ ‹"] = "ke",
    ["ğ Œ"] = "ki",
    ["ğ "] = "ko",
    ["ğ "] = "ku",

    ["ğ "] = "la",
    ["ğ "] = "le",
    ["ğ ‘"] = "li",
    ["ğ ’"] = "lo",
    ["ğ “"] = "lu",

    ["ğ ”"] = "ma",
    ["ğ •"] = "me",
    ["ğ –"] = "mi",
    ["ğ —"] = "mo",
    ["ğ ˜"] = "mu",

    ["ğ ™"] = "na",
    ["ğ š"] = "ne",
    ["ğ ›"] = "ni",
    ["ğ œ"] = "no",
    ["ğ "] = "nu",

    ["ğ "] = "pa",
    ["ğ Ÿ"] = "pe",
    ["ğ  "] = "pi",
    ["ğ ¡"] = "po",
    ["ğ ¢"] = "pu",

    ["ğ £"] = "ra",
    ["ğ ¤"] = "re",
    ["ğ ¥"] = "ri",
    ["ğ ¦"] = "ro",
    ["ğ §"] = "ru",

    ["ğ ¨"] = "sa",
    ["ğ ©"] = "se",
    ["ğ ª"] = "si",
    ["ğ «"] = "so",
    ["ğ ¬"] = "su",

    ["ğ ­"] = "ta",
    ["ğ ®"] = "te",
    ["ğ ¯"] = "ti",
    ["ğ °"] = "to",
    ["ğ ±"] = "tu",

    ["ğ ²"] = "wa",
    ["ğ ³"] = "we",
    ["ğ ´"] = "wi",
    ["ğ µ"] = "wo",
    -- wu not in Unicode

    ["ğ ·"] = "ksa",
    ["ğ ¸"] = "kse",
    -- ksi not in Unicode
    ["ğ ¿"] = "kso",
    -- ksu not in Unicode

    ["ğ ¼"] = "za"
    -- ze not in Unicode
    -- zi not in Unicode
    -- zo not in Unicode
    -- zu not in Unicode
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local ret = {}

    for c in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, ".") do table.insert(ret, chars[c] or c) end

    return table.concat(ret, "-")
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="19">

local export = {}

local letters = {}
local digraphs = {}

local double_grave = mw.ustring.char(0x30F)

letters["Cyrs"] = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",

    ["Ñ—"] = "i",

    ["ê™ˆ"] = "Ä",
    ["ê™‰"] = "Ä‘",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",

    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ñ "] = "O",
    ["Ñ¡"] = "o",
    ["Ñ¾"] = "OtÅ­",
    ["Ñ¿"] = "otÅ­",
    ["ê™¨"] = "O",

    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",

    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ñ¸"] = "U",
    ["Ñ¹"] = "u",
    ["ê™Š"] = "U",
    ["ê™‹"] = "u",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "X",
    ["Ñ…"] = "x",

    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    -- For Ğ© see below
    ["Ğª"] = "Å¬",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Å­",
    ["ê™"] = "Y",
    ["ê™‘"] = "y",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Y",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "y",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ä¬",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ä­",
    ["Ñ¢"] = "Äš",
    ["Ñ£"] = "Ä›",

    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["ê™–"] = "Ja",
    ["ê™—"] = "ja",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja",
    ["Ñ¤"] = "Je",
    ["Ñ¥"] = "je",
    ["Ñ¦"] = "Ä˜",
    ["Ñ§"] = "Ä™",
    ["Ñ¨"] = "JÄ™",
    ["Ñ©"] = "jÄ™",
    ["Ñª"] = "Çª",
    ["Ñ«"] = "Ç«",
    ["Ñ¬"] = "JÇ«",
    ["Ñ­"] = "jÇ«",
    ["ê™’"] = "JÄ›",
    ["ê™“"] = "jÄ›",

    ["Ñ®"] = "Ks",
    ["Ñ¯"] = "ks",
    ["Ñ°"] = "Ps",
    ["Ñ±"] = "ps",
    ["Ñ²"] = "Î˜",
    ["Ñ³"] = "Î¸",
    ["Ñ´"] = "Ãœ",
    ["Ñµ"] = "Ã¼",
    ["Ñ¶"] = "Ãœ" .. double_grave,
    ["Ñ·"] = "Ã¼" .. double_grave,
    -- newer letters
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j" -- starting from 15th century
}

digraphs["Cyrs"] = {["Ğ[Ğ£Ñ´ÑƒÑµ]"] = "U", ["Ğ¾[ÑƒÑµ]"] = "u", ["Ğª[Ğ˜Ğ¸]"] = "Y", ["ÑŠĞ¸"] = "y"}

letters["Glag"] = {
    ["â°€"] = "A",
    ["â°°"] = "a",
    ["â°­"] = "A",
    ["â±"] = "a",
    ["â°"] = "B",
    ["â°±"] = "b",
    ["â°‚"] = "V",
    ["â°²"] = "v",
    ["â°ƒ"] = "G",
    ["â°³"] = "g",
    ["â°„"] = "D",
    ["â°´"] = "d",
    ["â°…"] = "E",
    ["â°µ"] = "e",
    ["â°†"] = "Å½",
    ["â°¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["â°‡"] = "Dz",
    ["â°·"] = "dz",
    ["â°ˆ"] = "Z",
    ["â°¸"] = "z",
    ["â°‰"] = "I",
    ["â°¹"] = "i",
    ["â°Š"] = "I",
    ["â°º"] = "i",
    ["â°‹"] = "I",
    ["â°»"] = "i",
    ["â°Œ"] = "Ä",
    ["â°¼"] = "Ä‘",
    ["â°"] = "K",
    ["â°½"] = "k",
    ["â°"] = "L",
    ["â°¾"] = "l",
    ["â°"] = "M",
    ["â°¿"] = "m",
    ["â°®"] = "M",
    ["â±"] = "m",
    ["â°"] = "N",
    ["â±€"] = "n",
    ["â°‘"] = "O",
    ["â±"] = "o",
    ["â°™"] = "O",
    ["â±‰"] = "o",
    ["â°’"] = "P",
    ["â±‚"] = "p",
    ["â°“"] = "R",
    ["â±ƒ"] = "r",
    ["â°”"] = "S",
    ["â±„"] = "s",
    ["â°•"] = "T",
    ["â±…"] = "t",
    ["â°–"] = "U",
    ["â±†"] = "u",
    ["â°—"] = "F",
    ["â±‡"] = "f",
    ["â°˜"] = "X",
    ["â±ˆ"] = "x",
    ["â°¢"] = "X",
    ["â±’"] = "x",

    ["â°œ"] = "C",
    ["â±Œ"] = "c",
    ["â°"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["â±"] = "Ä",
    ["â°"] = "Å ",
    ["â±"] = "Å¡",
    -- For â°› see below
    ["â°Ÿ"] = "Å¬",
    ["â±"] = "Å­",
    ["â° "] = "Ä¬",
    ["â±"] = "Ä­",
    ["â°¬"] = "Ä¬",
    ["â±œ"] = "Ä­",
    ["â°¡"] = "Äš",
    ["â±‘"] = "Ä›",

    ["â°£"] = "Ju",
    ["â±“"] = "ju",
    ["â°¤"] = "Ä˜",
    ["â±”"] = "Ä™",
    ["â°¥"] = "YÌ¨",
    ["â±•"] = "yÌ¨",
    ["â°§"] = "JÄ™",
    ["â±—"] = "jÄ™",
    ["â°¨"] = "Çª",
    ["â±˜"] = "Ç«",
    ["â°¦"] = "Çª",
    ["â±–"] = "Ç«",
    ["â°©"] = "JÇ«",
    ["â±™"] = "jÇ«",

    ["â°ª"] = "Î˜",
    ["â±š"] = "Î¸",
    ["â°«"] = "Ãœ",
    ["â±›"] = "Ã¼"
}

digraphs["Glag"] = {["â°Ÿ[â°‰â°Šâ°‹â°¹â°ºâ°»]"] = "Y", ["â±[â°¹â°ºâ°»]"] = "y"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    if not sc then sc = require("scripts").findBestScript(text, require("languages").getByCode(lang)):getCode() end

    -- Ğ© was pronounced differently in Old East Slavic
    if lang == "orv" then
        letters["Cyrs"]["Ğ©"] = "Å Ä"
        letters["Cyrs"]["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä"
        letters["Glag"]["â°›"] = "Å Ä"
        letters["Glag"]["â±‹"] = "Å¡Ä"
    else
        letters["Cyrs"]["Ğ©"] = "Å t"
        letters["Cyrs"]["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡t"
        letters["Glag"]["â°›"] = "Å t"
        letters["Glag"]["â±‹"] = "Å¡t"
    end

    -- Transliterate the kamora as prime
    text = string.gsub(text, "\210\132", "Ê¹")

    if sc == "Cyrs" or sc == "Glag" then
        for key, repl in pairs(digraphs[sc]) do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, key, repl) end

        -- pattern for one non-ASCII character
        text = string.gsub(text, "[\194-\244][\128-\191]+", letters[sc])
    else
        -- error("This module can only transliterate Old Cyrillic (Cyrs) and Glagolitic (Glag).")
    end

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document_content>
local export = {}
local U = mw.ustring.char
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match
local sub = mw.ustring.sub

local conv = {
    ["à¤•"] = "à¦•",
    ["à¤–"] = "à¦–",
    ["à¤—"] = "à¦—",
    ["à¤˜"] = "à¦˜",
    ["à¤™"] = "à¦™",
    ["à¤š"] = "à¦š",
    ["à¤›"] = "à¦›",
    ["à¤œ"] = "à¦œ",
    ["à¤"] = "à¦",
    ["à¤"] = "à¦",
    ["à¤Ÿ"] = "à¦Ÿ",
    ["à¤ "] = "à¦ ",
    ["à¤¡"] = "à¦¡",
    ["à¤¢"] = "à¦¢",
    ["à¤£"] = "à¦£",
    ["à¤¤"] = "à¦¤",
    ["à¤¥"] = "à¦¥",
    ["à¤¦"] = "à¦¦",
    ["à¤§"] = "à¦§",
    ["à¤¨"] = "à¦¨",
    ["à¤ª"] = "à¦ª",
    ["à¤«"] = "à¦«",
    ["à¤¬"] = "à¦¬",
    ["à¤­"] = "à¦­",
    ["à¤®"] = "à¦®",
    ["à¤¯"] = "à¦¯",
    ["à¤°"] = "à¦°",
    ["à¤²"] = "à¦²",
    ["à¤µ"] = "à¦¬", -- ["à¤³"] = "à¤³", 
    ["à¤¶"] = "à¦¶",
    ["à¤·"] = "à¦·",
    ["à¤¸"] = "à¦¸",
    ["à¤¹"] = "à¦¹",

    ["à¤…"] = "à¦…",
    ["à¤†"] = "à¦†",
    ["à¤‡"] = "à¦‡",
    ["à¤ˆ"] = "à¦ˆ",
    ["à¤‰"] = "à¦‰",
    ["à¤Š"] = "à¦Š",
    ["à¤‹"] = "à¦‹",
    ["à¥ "] = "à§ ",
    ["à¤Œ"] = "à¦Œ",
    ["à¥¡"] = "à§¡",
    ["à¤"] = "à¦",
    ["à¤"] = "à¦",
    ["à¤“"] = "à¦“",
    ["à¤”"] = "à¦”",

    ["à¤¾"] = "à¦¾",
    ["à¤¿"] = "à¦¿",
    ["à¥€"] = "à§€",
    ["à¥"] = "à§",
    ["à¥‚"] = "à§‚",
    ["à¥ƒ"] = "à§ƒ",
    ["à¥„"] = "à§„",
    ["à¥¢"] = "à§¢",
    ["à¥£"] = "à§£",
    ["à¥‡"] = "à§‡",
    ["à¥ˆ"] = "à§ˆ",
    ["à¥‹"] = "à§‹",
    ["à¥Œ"] = "à§Œ",
    ["à¥"] = "à§",

    ["à¤"] = "à¦",
    ["à¤‚"] = "à¦‚",
    ["à¤ƒ"] = "à¦ƒ",
    ["à¤½"] = "à¦½",

    ["à¥¦"] = "à§¦",
    ["à¥§"] = "à§§",
    ["à¥¨"] = "à§¨",
    ["à¥©"] = "à§©",
    ["à¥ª"] = "à§ª",
    ["à¥«"] = "à§«",
    ["à¥¬"] = "à§¬",
    ["à¥­"] = "à§­",
    ["à¥®"] = "à§®",
    ["à¥¯"] = "à§¯",

    ["à¥¥"] = "à¥¥",
    ["à¥¤"] = "à¥¤",

    -- ["á³µ"] = "á³µ", ["á³¶"] = "á³¶",

    ["à¥"] = "à¦“à¦",

    ["*"] = "*"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", function(c) return conv[c] end)
    -- text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, 'ğ‘‘„$', "ğ‘‘ˆ")
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

local export = {}

local conv = {
    ["à¤•"] = "ğ‘‚",
    ["à¤–"] = "ğ‘‚",
    ["à¤—"] = "ğ‘‚",
    ["à¤˜"] = "ğ‘‚",
    ["à¤™"] = "ğ‘‚‘",
    ["à¤š"] = "ğ‘‚’",
    ["à¤›"] = "ğ‘‚“",
    ["à¤œ"] = "ğ‘‚”",
    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘‚•",
    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘‚–",
    ["à¤Ÿ"] = "ğ‘‚—",
    ["à¤ "] = "ğ‘‚˜",
    ["à¤¡"] = "ğ‘‚™",
    ["à¤¢"] = "ğ‘‚›",
    ["à¤£"] = "ğ‘‚",
    ["à¤¤"] = "ğ‘‚",
    ["à¤¥"] = "ğ‘‚Ÿ",
    ["à¤¦"] = "ğ‘‚ ",
    ["à¤§"] = "ğ‘‚¡",
    ["à¤¨"] = "ğ‘‚¢",
    ["à¤ª"] = "ğ‘‚£",
    ["à¤«"] = "ğ‘‚¤",
    ["à¤¬"] = "ğ‘‚¥",
    ["à¤­"] = "ğ‘‚¦",
    ["à¤®"] = "ğ‘‚§",
    ["à¤¯"] = "ğ‘‚¨",
    ["à¤°"] = "ğ‘‚©",
    ["à¤²"] = "ğ‘‚ª",
    ["à¤µ"] = "ğ‘‚«",
    ["à¤¶"] = "ğ‘‚¬",
    ["à¤·"] = "ğ‘‚­",
    ["à¤¸"] = "ğ‘‚®",
    ["à¤¹"] = "ğ‘‚¯",

    ["à¤¾"] = "ğ‘‚°",
    ["à¤¿"] = "ğ‘‚±",
    ["à¥€"] = "ğ‘‚²",
    ["à¥"] = "ğ‘‚³",
    ["à¥‚"] = "ğ‘‚´",
    ["à¥‡"] = "ğ‘‚µ",
    ["à¥ˆ"] = "ğ‘‚¶",
    ["à¥‹"] = "ğ‘‚·",
    ["à¥Œ"] = "ğ‘‚¸",
    ["à¥"] = "ğ‘‚¹",
    ["à¤¼"] = "ğ‘‚º",

    -- vowels
    ["à¤…"] = "ğ‘‚ƒ",
    ["à¤†"] = "ğ‘‚„",
    ["à¤‡"] = "ğ‘‚…",
    ["à¤ˆ"] = "ğ‘‚†",
    ["à¤‰"] = "ğ‘‚‡",
    ["à¤Š"] = "ğ‘‚ˆ",
    ["à¤‹"] = "ğ‘‚©ğ‘‚²",
    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘‚‰",
    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘‚Š",
    ["à¤“"] = "ğ‘‚‹",
    ["à¤”"] = "ğ‘‚Œ",
    -- chandrabindu    
    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘‚€",
    -- anusvara    
    ["à¤‚"] = "ğ‘‚",
    -- visarga    
    ["à¤ƒ"] = "ğ‘‚‚",
    -- punctuation        
    ["à¥¥"] = "ğ‘ƒ",
    ["à¥¤"] = "ğ‘ƒ€"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", function(c) return conv[c] end)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>

<document_content>
local export = {}
local U = mw.ustring.char
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match
local sub = mw.ustring.sub
local conv = {
    ["à¤•"] = "á¤",
    ["à¤–"] = "á¤‚",
    ["à¤—"] = "á¤ƒ",
    ["à¤˜"] = "á¤„",
    ["à¤™"] = "á¤…",
    ["à¤š"] = "á¤†",
    ["à¤›"] = "á¤‡",
    ["à¤œ"] = "á¤ˆ",
    ["à¤"] = "á¤‹",
    ["à¤"] = "á¤Š",
    ["à¤Ÿ"] = "á¤‹",
    ["à¤ "] = "á¤Œ",
    ["à¤¡"] = "á¤",
    ["à¤¢"] = "á¤",
    ["à¤£"] = "á¤",
    ["à¤¤"] = "á¤‹",
    ["à¤¥"] = "á¤Œ",
    ["à¤¦"] = "á¤",
    ["à¤§"] = "á¤",
    ["à¤¨"] = "á¤",
    ["à¤ª"] = "á¤",
    ["à¤«"] = "á¤‘",
    ["à¤¬"] = "á¤’",
    ["à¤­"] = "á¤“",
    ["à¤®"] = "á¤”",
    ["à¤¯"] = "á¤•",
    ["à¤°"] = "á¤–",
    ["à¤²"] = "á¤—",
    ["à¤µ"] = "á¤˜",
    ["à¤³"] = "á¤—",
    ["à¤¶"] = "á¤™",
    ["à¤·"] = "á¤š",
    ["à¤¸"] = "á¤›",
    ["à¤¹"] = "á¤œ",
    ["à¥½"] = "á¤¹",

    ["à¤¾"] = "á¤ ",
    ["à¤¿"] = "á¤¡",
    ["à¥€"] = "á¤¡á¤º",
    ["à¥"] = "á¤¢",
    ["à¥‚"] = "á¤¢á¤º",
    ["à¥ƒ"] = "á¤ªá¤¡",
    ["à¥„"] = "á¤ªá¤¡á¤º",
    ["à¥¢"] = "á¤¡",
    ["à¥£"] = "á¤¡á¤º",
    ["à¥‡"] = "á¤£",
    ["à¥ˆ"] = "á¤¤",
    ["à¥‹"] = "á¤¥",
    ["à¥Œ"] = "á¤¦",
    ["à¥…"] = "á¤§",
    ["à¥‰"] = "á¤¨",
    ["à¥†"] = "á¤§",
    ["à¥Š"] = "á¤¨",

    -- vowels
    ["à¤…"] = "á¤€",
    ["à¤†"] = "á¤€á¤ ",
    ["à¤‡"] = "á¤€á¤¡",
    ["à¤ˆ"] = "á¤€á¤¡á¤º",
    ["à¤‰"] = "á¤€á¤¢",
    ["à¤Š"] = "á¤€á¤¢á¤º",
    ["à¤‹"] = "á¤–á¤¡",
    ["à¥ "] = "á¤–á¤¡á¤º",
    ["à¤Œ"] = "á¤—á¤ªá¤¡",
    ["à¥¡"] = "á¤—á¤ªá¤¡á¤º",
    ["à¤"] = "á¤€á¤£",
    ["à¤"] = "á¤€á¤¤",
    ["à¤“"] = "á¤€á¤¥",
    ["à¤”"] = "á¤€á¤¦",
    ["à¤"] = "á¤€á¤§",
    ["à¤‘"] = "á¤€á¤¨",
    ["à¤"] = "á¤€á¤§",
    ["à¤’"] = "á¤€á¤¨",
    -- chandrabindu    
    ["à¤"] = "á¤²",
    -- anusvara    
    ["à¤‚"] = "á¤²",
    -- visarga    
    ["à¤ƒ"] = "á¤º",
    -- avagraha
    ["à¤½"] = "",
    -- punctuation
    ["à¥°"] = ".",
    ["à¥¥"] = "à¥¥",
    ["à¥¤"] = "à¥¥",
    ["à¥"] = "á¤€á¤¥á¤¶",
    ["!"] = "á¥„",
    ["?"] = "á¥…",

    -- Vedic extensions
    ["á³µ"] = "",
    ["á³¶"] = "",

    ["à¥¦"] = "á¥†",
    ["à¥§"] = "á¥‡",
    ["à¥¨"] = "á¥ˆ",
    ["à¥©"] = "á¥‰",
    ["à¥ª"] = "á¥Š",
    ["à¥«"] = "á¥‹",
    ["à¥¬"] = "á¥Œ",
    ["à¥­"] = "á¥",
    ["à¥®"] = "á¥",
    ["à¥¯"] = "á¥"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", function(c) return conv[c] end)
    text = gsub(text, "([á¤á¤‚á¤ƒá¤„á¤…á¤†á¤‡á¤ˆá¤‰á¤Šá¤‹á¤Œá¤á¤á¤á¤á¤‘á¤’á¤“á¤”á¤•á¤–á¤—á¤˜á¤™á¤šá¤›á¤œá¤á¤á¤€])([á¤º]?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)(à¤¼?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)([á¤º]?)á¤à¥", "%1%2%3%4%5%6á¤°")
    text = gsub(text, "([á¤á¤‚á¤ƒá¤„á¤…á¤†á¤‡á¤ˆá¤‰á¤Šá¤‹á¤Œá¤á¤á¤á¤á¤‘á¤’á¤“á¤”á¤•á¤–á¤—á¤˜á¤™á¤šá¤›á¤œá¤á¤á¤€])([á¤º]?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)(à¤¼?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)([á¤º]?)á¤…à¥", "%1%2%3%4%5%6á¤±")
    text = gsub(text, "([á¤á¤‚á¤ƒá¤„á¤…á¤†á¤‡á¤ˆá¤‰á¤Šá¤‹á¤Œá¤á¤á¤á¤á¤‘á¤’á¤“á¤”á¤•á¤–á¤—á¤˜á¤™á¤šá¤›á¤œá¤á¤á¤€])([á¤º]?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)(à¤¼?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)([á¤º]?)á¤‹à¥", "%1%2%3%4%5%6á¤³")
    text = gsub(text, "([á¤á¤‚á¤ƒá¤„á¤…á¤†á¤‡á¤ˆá¤‰á¤Šá¤‹á¤Œá¤á¤á¤á¤á¤‘á¤’á¤“á¤”á¤•á¤–á¤—á¤˜á¤™á¤šá¤›á¤œá¤á¤á¤€])([á¤º]?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)(à¤¼?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)([á¤º]?)á¤à¥", "%1%2%3%4%5%6á¤´")
    text = gsub(text, "([á¤á¤‚á¤ƒá¤„á¤…á¤†á¤‡á¤ˆá¤‰á¤Šá¤‹á¤Œá¤á¤á¤á¤á¤‘á¤’á¤“á¤”á¤•á¤–á¤—á¤˜á¤™á¤šá¤›á¤œá¤á¤á¤€])([á¤º]?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)(à¤¼?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)([á¤º]?)á¤à¥", "%1%2%3%4%5%6á¤µ")
    text = gsub(text, "([á¤á¤‚á¤ƒá¤„á¤…á¤†á¤‡á¤ˆá¤‰á¤Šá¤‹á¤Œá¤á¤á¤á¤á¤‘á¤’á¤“á¤”á¤•á¤–á¤—á¤˜á¤™á¤šá¤›á¤œá¤á¤á¤€])([á¤º]?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)(à¤¼?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)([á¤º]?)á¤”à¥", "%1%2%3%4%5%6á¤¶")
    text = gsub(text, "([á¤á¤‚á¤ƒá¤„á¤…á¤†á¤‡á¤ˆá¤‰á¤Šá¤‹á¤Œá¤á¤á¤á¤á¤‘á¤’á¤“á¤”á¤•á¤–á¤—á¤˜á¤™á¤šá¤›á¤œá¤á¤á¤€])([á¤º]?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)(à¤¼?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)([á¤º]?)á¤–à¥", "%1%2%3%4%5%6á¤·")
    text = gsub(text, "([á¤á¤‚á¤ƒá¤„á¤…á¤†á¤‡á¤ˆá¤‰á¤Šá¤‹á¤Œá¤á¤á¤á¤á¤‘á¤’á¤“á¤”á¤•á¤–á¤—á¤˜á¤™á¤šá¤›á¤œá¤á¤á¤€])([á¤º]?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)(à¤¼?)([á¤ 	á¤¡	á¤¢	á¤£	á¤¤	á¤¥	á¤¦	á¤§	á¤¨	á¤©	á¤ª]?)([á¤º]?)á¤—à¥", "%1%2%3%4%5%6á¤¸")
    text = gsub(text, "à¥á¤–", "á¤ª")
    text = gsub(text, "à¥á¤•", "á¤©")
    text = gsub(text, "à¥á¤˜", "á¤«")
    text = gsub(text, "à¤œà¥à¤", "á¤")
    text = gsub(text, "à¤¤à¥à¤°", "á¤")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤€á¤£à¤¼", "á¤€á¤§")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤€á¤¥à¤¼", "á¤€á¤¨")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤£à¤¼", "á¤§")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤¥à¤¼", "á¤¨")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤¼", "")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¥", "")
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="23">
<source>wikt/translit/Deva-Newa-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local U = mw.ustring.char
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match
local sub = mw.ustring.sub

local conv = {
    ["à¤•"] = "ğ‘",
    ["à¤–"] = "ğ‘",
    ["à¤—"] = "ğ‘",
    ["à¤˜"] = "ğ‘‘",
    ["à¤™"] = "ğ‘’",
    ["à¤š"] = "ğ‘”",
    ["à¤›"] = "ğ‘•",
    ["à¤œ"] = "ğ‘–",
    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘—",
    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘˜",
    ["à¤Ÿ"] = "ğ‘š",
    ["à¤ "] = "ğ‘›",
    ["à¤¡"] = "ğ‘œ",
    ["à¤¢"] = "ğ‘",
    ["à¤£"] = "ğ‘",
    ["à¤¤"] = "ğ‘Ÿ",
    ["à¤¥"] = "ğ‘ ",
    ["à¤¦"] = "ğ‘¡",
    ["à¤§"] = "ğ‘¢",
    ["à¤¨"] = "ğ‘£",
    ["à¤ª"] = "ğ‘¥",
    ["à¤«"] = "ğ‘¦",
    ["à¤¬"] = "ğ‘§",
    ["à¤­"] = "ğ‘¨",
    ["à¤®"] = "ğ‘©",
    ["à¤¯"] = "ğ‘«",
    ["à¤°"] = "ğ‘¬",
    ["à¤²"] = "ğ‘®",
    ["à¤µ"] = "ğ‘°",
    ["à¤³"] = "ğ‘®",
    ["à¤¶"] = "ğ‘±",
    ["à¤·"] = "ğ‘²",
    ["à¤¸"] = "ğ‘³",
    ["à¤¹"] = "ğ‘´",

    ["à¤¾"] = "ğ‘µ",
    ["à¤¿"] = "ğ‘¶",
    ["à¥€"] = "ğ‘·",
    ["à¥"] = "ğ‘¸",
    ["à¥‚"] = "ğ‘¹",
    ["à¥ƒ"] = "ğ‘º",
    ["à¥„"] = "ğ‘»",
    ["à¥¢"] = "ğ‘¼",
    ["à¥£"] = "ğ‘½",
    ["à¥‡"] = "ğ‘¾",
    ["à¥ˆ"] = "ğ‘¿",
    ["à¥‹"] = "ğ‘‘€",
    ["à¥Œ"] = "ğ‘‘",
    ["à¥"] = "ğ‘‘‚",
    ["à¤¼"] = "ğ‘‘†",

    -- vowels
    ["à¤…"] = "ğ‘€",
    ["à¤†"] = "ğ‘",
    ["à¤‡"] = "ğ‘‚",
    ["à¤ˆ"] = "ğ‘ƒ",
    ["à¤‰"] = "ğ‘„",
    ["à¤Š"] = "ğ‘…",
    ["à¤‹"] = "ğ‘†",
    ["à¥ "] = "ğ‘‡",
    ["à¤Œ"] = "ğ‘ˆ",
    ["à¥¡"] = "ğ‘‰",
    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘Š",
    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘‹",
    ["à¤“"] = "ğ‘Œ",
    ["à¤”"] = "ğ‘",
    -- chandrabindu    
    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘‘ƒ",
    -- anusvara    
    ["à¤‚"] = "ğ‘‘„",
    -- visarga    
    ["à¤ƒ"] = "ğ‘‘…",
    -- avagraha
    ["à¤½"] = "ğ‘‘‡",
    -- punctuation
    ["à¥°"] = "ğ‘‘",
    ["à¥¥"] = "ğ‘‘Œ",
    ["à¥¤"] = "ğ‘‘‹",
    ["à¥"] = "ğ‘‘‰",
    -- Vedic extensions
    ["á³µ"] = "ğ‘‘ ",
    ["á³¶"] = "ğ‘‘¡",

    ["à¥¦"] = "ğ‘‘",
    ["à¥§"] = "ğ‘‘‘",
    ["à¥¨"] = "ğ‘‘’",
    ["à¥©"] = "ğ‘‘“",
    ["à¥ª"] = "ğ‘‘”",
    ["à¥«"] = "ğ‘‘•",
    ["à¥¬"] = "ğ‘‘–",
    ["à¥­"] = "ğ‘‘—",
    ["à¥®"] = "ğ‘‘˜",
    ["à¥¯"] = "ğ‘‘™"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", function(c) return conv[c] end)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ğ‘£ğ‘‘‚ğ‘´", "ğ‘¤")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ğ‘’ğ‘‘‚ğ‘´", "ğ‘“")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ğ‘¬ğ‘‘‚ğ‘´", "ğ‘­")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ğ‘®ğ‘‘‚ğ‘´", "ğ‘¯")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ğ‘©ğ‘‘‚ğ‘´", "ğ‘ª")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ğ‘˜ğ‘‘‚ğ‘´", "ğ‘™")
    -- text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, 'ğ‘‘„$', "ğ‘‘ˆ")
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

local conv = {
    ["à¤•"] = "ğ‘Šº",
    ["à¤–"] = "ğ‘Š»",
    ["à¤—"] = "ğ‘Š¼",
    ["à¥»"] = "ğ‘Š½",
    ["à¤˜"] = "ğ‘Š¾",
    ["à¤™"] = "ğ‘Š¿",
    ["à¤š"] = "ğ‘‹€",
    ["à¤›"] = "ğ‘‹",
    ["à¤œ"] = "ğ‘‹‚",

    ["à¥¿"] = "ğ‘‹•",
    ["à¤­"] = "ğ‘‹–",
    ["à¤®"] = "ğ‘‹—",
    ["à¤¯"] = "ğ‘‹˜",
    ["à¤°"] = "ğ‘‹™",
    ["à¤²"] = "ğ‘‹š",
    ["à¤µ"] = "ğ‘‹›",
    ["à¤¶"] = "ğ‘‹œ",
    ["à¤¸"] = "ğ‘‹",

    ["à¤¡à¤¼"] = "ğ‘‹Š",
    ["à¤–à¤¼"] = "ğ‘Š»ğ‘‹©",
    ["à¤—à¤¼"] = "ğ‘Š¼ğ‘‹©",
    ["à¤•à¤¼"] = "ğ‘Šºğ‘‹©",
    ["à¤œ"] = "ğ‘‹‚ğ‘‹©",

    ["à¤¾"] = "ğ‘‹ ",
    ["à¤¿"] = "ğ‘‹¡",
    ["à¥€"] = "ğ‘‹¢",
    ["à¥"] = "ğ‘‹£",
    ["à¥‚"] = "ğ‘‹¤",
    ["à¥‡"] = "ğ‘‹¥",
    ["à¥ˆ"] = "ğ‘‹¦",
    ["à¥‹"] = "ğ‘‹§",
    ["à¥Œ"] = "ğ‘‹¨",
    ["à¥"] = "ğ‘‹ª",
    ["à¤¼"] = "ğ‘‹©",
    ["ğ‘‹ˆğ‘‹©"] = "ğ‘‹Š",

    -- vowels
    ["à¤…"] = "ğ‘Š°",
    ["à¤†"] = "ğ‘Š±",
    ["à¤‡"] = "ğ‘Š²",
    ["à¤ˆ"] = "ğ‘Š³",
    ["à¤‰"] = "ğ‘Š´",

    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘Š¶",
    ["à¤"] = "ğ‘Š·",
    ["à¤“"] = "ğ‘Š¸",
    ["à¤”"] = "ğ‘Š¹",

    -- anusvara    
    ["à¤‚"] = "ğ‘‹Ÿ"
}
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".à¤¼?", function(c) return conv[c] end)

    return text
end

return export

    ["áŒ£"] = "á¹­a",
    ["áŒ¤"] = "á¹­e",
    ["áŒ¥"] = "á¹­É™",
    ["áŒ¦"] = "á¹­o",
    ["áŒ§"] = "á¹­Ê·a",
    ["áŒ¨"] = "ÄÌ£Ã¤",
    ["áŒ©"] = "ÄÌ£u",
    ["áŒª"] = "ÄÌ£i",
    ["áŒ«"] = "ÄÌ£a",
    ["áŒ¬"] = "ÄÌ£e",
    ["áŒ­"] = "ÄÌ£É™",
    ["áŒ®"] = "ÄÌ£o",
    ["áŒ¯"] = "ÄÌ£Ê·a",
    ["áŒ°"] = "pÌ£Ã¤",
    ["áŒ±"] = "pÌ£u",
    ["áŒ²"] = "pÌ£i",
    ["áŒ³"] = "pÌ£a",
    ["áŒ´"] = "pÌ£e",
    ["áŒµ"] = "pÌ£É™",
    ["áŒ¶"] = "pÌ£o",
    ["áŒ·"] = "pÌ£Ê·a",
    ["áŒ¸"] = "á¹£Ã¤",
    ["áŒ¹"] = "á¹£u",
    ["áŒº"] = "á¹£i",
    ["áŒ»"] = "á¹£a",
    ["áŒ¼"] = "á¹£e",
    ["áŒ½"] = "á¹£É™",
    ["áŒ¾"] = "á¹£o",
    ["áŒ¿"] = "á¹£Ê·a",
    ["á€"] = "á¹£ÌÃ¤",
    ["á"] = "á¹£Ìu",
    ["á‚"] = "á¹£Ìi",
    ["áƒ"] = "á¹£Ìa",
    ["á„"] = "á¹£Ìe",
    ["á…"] = "á¹£ÌÉ™",
    ["á†"] = "á¹£Ìo",
    ["áˆ"] = "fÃ¤",
    ["á‰"] = "fu",
    ["áŠ"] = "fi",
    ["á‹"] = "fa",
    ["áŒ"] = "fe",
    ["á"] = "fÉ™",
    ["á"] = "fo",
    ["á"] = "fÊ·a",
    ["áš"] = "fÊ²Ã¤",
    ["á"] = "pÃ¤",
    ["á‘"] = "pu",
    ["á’"] = "pi",
    ["á“"] = "pa",
    ["á”"] = "pe",
    ["á•"] = "pÉ™",
    ["á–"] = "po",
    ["á—"] = "pÊ·a",
    -- punctuation
    ["á "] = "Â§",
    ["á¡"] = "-",
    ["á¢"] = ".",
    ["á£"] = ",",
    ["á¤"] = ";",
    ["á¥"] = ":",
    ["á¦"] = ":-",
    ["á§"] = "?",
    ["á¨"] = "Â¶"
}

local number = {["á©"] = 1, ["áª"] = 2, ["á«"] = 3, ["á¬"] = 4, ["á­"] = 5, ["á®"] = 6, ["á¯"] = 7, ["á°"] = 8, ["á±"] = 9, ["á²"] = 10, ["á³"] = 20, ["á´"] = 30, ["áµ"] = 40, ["á¶"] = 50, ["á·"] = 60, ["á¸"] = 70, ["á¹"] = 80, ["áº"] = 90}

-- This works on small numbers. Please improve if you find any problems.
function export.number(geez)

    local val = 0
    if mw.ustring.find(geez, "^[á»á¼]") then
        geez = "á©" .. geez -- prepend 1
    end
    local func = mw.text.gsplit(geez, "")

    while true do
        local digit = func()
        if (not digit) then break end
        if mw.ustring.find(digit, "[á©-áº]") then
            val = val + number[digit]
        elseif digit == "á»" then
            val = val * 100
        elseif digit == "á¼" then
            val = val * 10000
        end
    end

    return val

end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)

    text = (mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt))

    -- remove É™ that is not in the first syllable
    -- [bdfghklmnprstvwxyzÃ±ÄÅ‹Å›Å¡Å¾Ç§Ê¾Ê¿á¸¥á¸«á¸³á¹£á¹­][Ê°Ê²Ê·Ì£Ì]*
    -- matches one transliterated consonant
    local prev_end_pos
    local prev_schwa_removed = false
    local text_len = mw.ustring.len(text)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "()(([bdfghklmnprstvwxyzÃ±ÄÅ‹Å›Å¡Å¾Ç§Ê¾Ê¿á¸¥á¸«á¸³á¹£á¹­][Ê°Ê²Ê·Ì£Ì]*)É™)()", function(start_pos, syllable, consonant, end_pos)
        local ret
        if (start_pos == 1 or mw.ustring.find(text, "^[%s%p]", start_pos - 1)) or (prev_end_pos == start_pos and prev_schwa_removed and not (end_pos == text_len + 1 or mw.ustring.find(text, "^[%s%p]", end_pos))) then
            ret = syllable
        else
            ret = consonant
        end
        prev_schwa_removed = ret == consonant
        prev_end_pos = end_pos
        return ret
    end)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "[á©-á¼]+", export.number)

    return text

end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="27">
<source>wikt/translit/Geor-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
-- Keep synchronized with [[Module:sva-translit]]
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local tt = {["áƒ"] = "a", ["áƒ‘"] = "b", ["áƒ’"] = "g", ["áƒ“"] = "d", ["áƒ”"] = "e", ["áƒ•"] = "v", ["áƒ–"] = "z", ["áƒ±"] = "Ä“", ["áƒ—"] = "t", ["áƒ˜"] = "i", ["áƒ™"] = "á¸³", ["áƒš"] = "l", ["áƒ›"] = "m", ["áƒœ"] = "n", ["áƒ²"] = "y", ["áƒ"] = "o", ["áƒ"] = "á¹—", ["áƒŸ"] = "Å¾", ["áƒ "] = "r", ["áƒ¡"] = "s", ["áƒ¢"] = "á¹­", ["áƒ³"] = "wi", ["áƒ£"] = "u", ["áƒ¤"] = "p", ["áƒ¥"] = "k", ["áƒ¦"] = "É£", ["áƒ§"] = "qÌ‡", ["áƒ¨"] = "Å¡", ["áƒ©"] = "Ä", ["áƒª"] = "c", ["áƒ«"] = "Ê’", ["áƒ¬"] = "cÌ£", ["áƒ­"] = "ÄÌ£", ["áƒ®"] = "x", ["áƒ´"] = "q", ["áƒ¯"] = "Ç¯", ["áƒ°"] = "h", ["áƒµ"] = "Å", ["áƒ¶"] = "f", ["áƒ·"] = "É™", ["áƒ¸"] = "Ê¾", ["áƒº"] = "Ê¿"};

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- Transliterating vowel nasalization in Bats
    text = gsub(text, "áƒ¼", "Ìƒ")
    text = gsub(text, "<sup>áƒœ</sup>", "Ìƒ")

    -- Transliterate uppercase characters from the Georgian Extended block as
    -- the uppercase version of the transliteration of the lowercase  characters
    -- from the Georgian block.
    -- U+10D0: start of Georgian block
    -- U+1C90: start of Georgian Extended block
    text = gsub(text, "[" .. mw.ustring.char(0x1C90) .. "-" .. mw.ustring.char(0x1CBF) .. "]", function(char)
        local translit = tt[mw.ustring.char(mw.ustring.codepoint(char) - 0x1C90 + 0x10D0)]
        return translit and mw.ustring.upper(translit)
    end)
    text = gsub(text, ".", tt)
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="28">
<source>wikt/translit/Goth-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local Goth_Latn = {["ğŒ°"] = "a", ["ğŒ±"] = "b", ["ğŒ²"] = "g", ["ğŒ³"] = "d", ["ğŒ´"] = "Ä“", ["ğŒµ"] = "q", ["ğŒ¶"] = "z", ["ğŒ·"] = "h", ["ğŒ¸"] = "Ã¾", ["ğŒ¹"] = "i", ["ğŒº"] = "k", ["ğŒ»"] = "l", ["ğŒ¼"] = "m", ["ğŒ½"] = "n", ["ğŒ¾"] = "j", ["ğŒ¿"] = "u", ["ğ€"] = "p", ["ğ"] = "?", ["ğ‚"] = "r", ["ğƒ"] = "s", ["ğ„"] = "t", ["ğ…"] = "w", ["ğ†"] = "f", ["ğ‡"] = "x", ["ğˆ"] = "Æ•", ["ğ‰"] = "Å", ["ğŠ"] = "?"}

local Latn_Goth = {["Ä"] = "ğŒ°", ["e"] = "ğŒ´", ["Ä«"] = "ğŒ¹", ["o"] = "ğ‰", ["Å«"] = "ğŒ¿", ["y"] = "ğ…"}

for g, l in pairs(Goth_Latn) do if l ~= "?" then Latn_Goth[l] = g end end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ğŒ´ğŒ¹", "ei")

    return (mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", Goth_Latn))
end

function export.tr_reverse(text)
    text = mw.ustring.lower(text)
    return (mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", Latn_Goth))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="29">
<source>wikt/translit/Guru-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local conv = {
    -- consonants without nukta
    ["à¨¸"] = "s",
    ["à¨¹"] = "h",
    ["à¨•"] = "k",
    ["à¨–"] = "kh",
    ["à¨—"] = "g",
    ["à¨˜"] = "gh",
    ["à¨™"] = "á¹…",
    ["à¨š"] = "c",
    ["à¨›"] = "ch",
    ["à¨œ"] = "j",
    ["à¨"] = "jh",
    ["à¨"] = "Ã±",
    ["à¨Ÿ"] = "á¹­",
    ["à¨ "] = "á¹­h",
    ["à¨¡"] = "á¸",
    ["à¨¢"] = "á¸h",
    ["à¨£"] = "á¹‡",
    ["à¨¤"] = "t",
    ["à¨¥"] = "th",
    ["à¨¦"] = "d",
    ["à¨§"] = "dh",
    ["à¨¨"] = "n",
    ["à¨ª"] = "p",
    ["à¨«"] = "ph",
    ["à¨¬"] = "b",
    ["à¨­"] = "bh",
    ["à¨®"] = "m",
    ["à¨¯"] = "y",
    ["à¨°"] = "r",
    ["à¨²"] = "l",
    ["à¨µ"] = "v",
    ["à©œ"] = "á¹›",

    -- consonants with nukta
    ["à¨¸à¨¼"] = "Å›",
    ["à¨–à¨¼"] = "x",
    ["à¨—à¨¼"] = "Ä¡",
    ["à¨œà¨¼"] = "z",
    ["à¨«à¨¼"] = "f",
    ["à¨²à¨¼"] = "á¸·",
    ["à¨•à¨¼"] = "q",
    ["à¨¡à¨¼"] = "á¹›",

    -- vowels
    ["à¨¾"] = "Ä",
    ["à¨¿"] = "i",
    ["à©€"] = "Ä«",
    ["à©"] = "u",
    ["à©‚"] = "Å«",
    ["à©‡"] = "Ä“",
    ["à©ˆ"] = "ai",
    ["à©‹"] = "o",
    ["à©Œ"] = "au",

    -- other diacritics
    ["à©°"] = "N", -- á¹­ippi: nasalize
    ["à¨‚"] = "N", -- bindi: nasalize
    ["à©±"] = "Ë", -- addak: geminate
    ["à©"] = "", -- halant, supresses the inherent vowel "a"
    ["à¨ƒ"] = "h", -- voiceless "h" sound (tone raiser)

    -- independent vowels
    ["à¨…"] = "a",
    ["à¨†"] = "Ä",
    ["à¨‡"] = "i",
    ["à¨ˆ"] = "Ä«",
    ["à¨‰"] = "u",
    ["à¨Š"] = "Å«",
    ["à¨"] = "Ä“",
    ["à¨"] = "ai",
    ["à¨“"] = "o",
    ["à¨”"] = "Å",

    -- digits
    ["à©¦"] = "0",
    ["à©§"] = "1",
    ["à©¨"] = "2",
    ["à©©"] = "3",
    ["à©ª"] = "4",
    ["à©«"] = "5",
    ["à©¬"] = "6",
    ["à©­"] = "7",
    ["à©®"] = "8",
    ["à©¯"] = "9"
}

local nasal_assim = {["[kg]h?"] = "á¹…", ["[cj]h?"] = "Ã±", ["[á¹­á¸]h?"] = "á¹‡", ["[td]h?"] = "n", ["[pb]h?"] = "m", ["n"] = "n", ["m"] = "m", ["s"] = "n"}

-- translit any words or phrases
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local c = "([à¨¸à¨¹à¨•à¨–à¨—à¨˜à¨™à¨šà¨›à¨œà¨à¨à¨Ÿà¨ à¨¡à¨¢à¨£à¨¤à¨¥à¨¦à¨§à¨¨à¨ªà¨«à¨¬à¨­à¨®à¨¯à¨°à¨²à¨µà©œË]à¨¼?)"
    local y = "à¨¯"
    local v = "([aà¨¾à¨¿à©€à©à©‚à©‡à©ˆà©‹à©Œà©])"
    local virama = "à©"
    local n = "([à©°à¨‚]?)"
    local nukta = "([à¨¸à¨–à¨—à¨œà¨«à¨²à¨•à¨¡]à¨¼)"

    local can_drop = mw.ustring.gsub(c, y, "")
    local no_virama = mw.ustring.gsub(v, virama, "")

    text = text .. " "

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, c, "%1a")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "a" .. v, "%1")
    -- mw.log(text)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, v .. n .. can_drop .. "a ", "%1%2%3 ") -- ending
    -- mw.log(text)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, v .. n .. can_drop .. "a" .. c .. v, "%1%2%3%4%5")
    -- mw.log(text)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, nukta, conv)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", conv)

    for key, val in pairs(nasal_assim) do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "N(" .. key .. ")", val .. "%1") end
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aiuÄ“aioÄÄ«Å«])N ", "%1Ìƒ ")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.?)N", "%1Ìƒ")

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ë(.)", "%1%1")

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, " ?à¥¤", ".")

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, " $", "")

    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="30">
<source>wikt/translit/Ital-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

-- Standard transcription
local common_rules = {
    ["ğŒ€"] = "a",
    ["ğŒ"] = "b",
    ["ğŒ‚"] = "c",
    ["ğŒƒ"] = "d",
    ["ğŒ„"] = "e",
    ["ğŒ…"] = "v",
    ["ğŒ†"] = "z",
    ["ğŒ‡"] = "h",
    ["ğŒˆ"] = "Î¸",
    ["ğŒ‰"] = "i",
    ["ğŒŠ"] = "k",
    ["ğŒ‹"] = "l",
    ["ğŒŒ"] = "m",
    ["ğŒ"] = "n",
    ["ğŒ"] = "Å¡",
    ["ğŒ"] = "o",
    ["ğŒ"] = "p",
    ["ğŒ‘"] = "Å›",
    ["ğŒ’"] = "q",
    ["ğŒ“"] = "r",
    ["ğŒ”"] = "s",
    ["ğŒ•"] = "t",
    ["ğŒ–"] = "u",
    ["ğŒ—"] = "x",
    ["ğŒ˜"] = "Ï†",
    ["ğŒ™"] = "Ï‡",
    ["ğŒš"] = "f",
    ["ğŒ›"] = "Å™",
    ["ğŒœ"] = "Ã§",
    ["ğŒ"] = "Ã­",
    ["ğŒ"] = "Ãº",
    ["ğŒŸ"] = "k",
    -- Numerals
    ["ğŒ "] = "â… ",
    ["ğŒ¡"] = "â…¤",
    ["ğŒ¢"] = "â…©",
    ["ğŒ£"] = "â…¬",
    -- Punctuation
    ["Â·"] = " ",
    ["âš"] = " ",
    ["â"] = " "
}

local lang_rules = {
    ["ett"] = { -- Etruscan
        ["ğŒŸ"] = "â…­"
    },

    ["itc-ola"] = { -- Old Latin
        ["ğŒ…"] = "f"
    },

    ["nrc"] = { -- Noric
        ["ğŒ‚"] = "g",
        ["ğŒˆ"] = "d",
        ["ğŒ™"] = "g"
    },

    ["nrp"] = { -- North Picene
        ["ğŒ‚"] = "g"
    },

    ["osc"] = { -- Oscan
        ["ğŒ‚"] = "g"
    },

    ["spx"] = { -- South Picene
        ["ğŒ‚"] = "g",
        ["ğŒ‘"] = "Ã­",
        ["Â·"] = "o",
        ["âš"] = "f"
    },

    ["xcc"] = { -- Camunic
        ["ğŒ"] = "Å›",
        ["ğŒ‚"] = "g",
        ["ğŒ‘"] = "b",
        ["ğŒ™"] = "s",
        ["ğŒŸ"] = "Ã¾Ã¾",
        ["ğŒ£"] = "Ã¾"
    },

    ["xrr"] = { -- Raetic
        ["ğŒ"] = "Ã¾",
        ["ğŒ‚"] = "?"
    },

    ["xum"] = { -- Umbrian
        ["ğŒˆ"] = "t"
    },

    ["xve"] = { -- Venetic
        ["ğŒ‚"] = "j",
        ["ğŒ†"] = "d",
        ["ğŒ‡ğŒ…"] = "f",
        ["ğŒ˜"] = "b",
        ["ğŒ™"] = "g"
    }
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- If the script is not Ital, do not transliterate
    if sc ~= "Ital" then return end

    -- Transliterate language-specific exceptions
    if lang == "xve" then text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ğŒ‡ğŒ…", "f") end

    if lang_rules[lang] then text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", lang_rules[lang]) end

    -- Transliterate remaining characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", common_rules)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="31">
<source>wikt/translit/JSON.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

-- Given a finite real number x, returns a string containing its JSON
-- representation, with enough precision that it *should* round-trip correctly
-- (depending on the well-behavedness of the system on the other end).
function export.json_fromNumber(x)
    if type(x) ~= "number" then error("Not of type \"number\": " .. x .. " (" .. type(x) .. ")") end
    if x ~= x or x == math.huge or x == -math.huge then error("Not a finite real number: " .. x) end
    return string.format("%.17g", x)
end

-- This function makes an effort to convert an arbitrary Lua value to a string
-- containing a JSON representation of it. It's not intended to be very robust,
-- but may be useful for prototyping.
function export.toJSON(val, opts)
    opts = opts or {}

    local function converter(val)
        if type(val) == "nil" then
            return "null"
        elseif type(val) == "boolean" then
            return val and "true" or "false"
        elseif type(val) == "number" then
            return export.json_fromNumber(val)
        elseif type(val) == "string" then
            return export.json_fromString(val)
        elseif type(val) == "table" then
            -- If the table has a toJSON member function, call that.
            if val.toJSON then
                return val:toJSON()
            else
                return export.json_fromTable(val, converter)
            end
        else
            error("Unsupported type: " .. type(val))
        end
    end

    return converter(val)
end

local escape_char_map = {["\\"] = "\\\\", ["\""] = "\\\"", ["\b"] = "\\b", ["\f"] = "\\f", ["\n"] = "\\n", ["\r"] = "\\r", ["\t"] = "\\t"}

local function escape_char(c) return escape_char_map[c] or string.format("\\u%04X", mw.ustring.codepoint(c)) end

-- Given a string, escapes any illegal characters and wraps it in double-quotes.
-- Raises an error if the string is not valid UTF-8.
function export.json_fromString(s)
    if type(s) ~= "string" or not mw.ustring.isutf8(s) then error("Not a valid UTF-8 string: " .. s) end

    -- U+2029 (LINE SEPARATOR, \226\128\168 in UTF-8)
    -- and U+2028 (PARAGRAPH SEPARATOR, \226\128\169 in UTF-8) are allowed
    -- in JSON, but must be escaped for compatibility with JavaScript.
    s = mw.ustring.gsub(s, "[\\\"%c\226\128\168\226\128\169]", escape_char)

    return "\"" .. s .. "\""
end

-- Given a table, treats it as an array and assembles its values in the form
-- '[ v1, v2, v3 ]'. Optionally takes a function to JSONify the values before
-- assembly; if that function is omitted, then the values should already be
-- strings containing valid JSON data.
function export.json_arrayFromTable(t, f)
    f = f or function(x) return x end

    local ret = {}

    for _, elem in ipairs(t) do
        elem = f(elem)
        if elem ~= nil then
            table.insert(ret, ", ")
            table.insert(ret, elem)
        end
    end

    if #ret == 0 then return "[]" end

    ret[1] = "[ "
    table.insert(ret, " ]")

    return table.concat(ret)
end

-- Given a table whose keys are all strings, assembles its keys and values in
-- the form '{ "k1": v1, "k2": v2, "k3": v3 }'. Optionally takes a function to
-- JSONify the values before assembly; if that function is omitted, then the
-- values should already be strings containing valid JSON data. (The keys, by
-- contrast, should just be regular Lua strings; they will be passed to this
-- module's jsonStringFromString.)
function export.json_fromTable(val, converter)
    converter = converter or function(x) return x end

    local as_array = {}
    local as_object = {}
    local string_key = false

    for key, value in pairs(val) do
        value = converter(value)

        if type(key) ~= "number" then string_key = true end

        if value ~= nil then
            key = export.json_fromString(tostring(key))
            table.insert(as_array, value)
            table.insert(as_object, key .. " : " .. value)
        end
    end

    if string_key then
        return "{" .. table.concat(as_object, ", ") .. "}"
    else
        return "[" .. table.concat(as_array, ", ") .. "]"
    end
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="32">
<source>wikt/translit/Kali-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local u = mw.ustring.char

local tt1 = {
    -- consonants
    ["ê¤Š"] = "k",
    ["ê¤‹"] = "hk",
    ["ê¤Œ"] = "g",
    ["ê¤"] = "ng",
    ["ê¤"] = "s",
    ["ê¤"] = "hs",
    ["ê¤"] = "z",
    ["ê¤‘"] = "ny",
    ["ê¤’"] = "t",
    ["ê¤“"] = "ht",
    ["ê¤”"] = "n",
    ["ê¤•"] = "p",
    ["ê¤–"] = "hp",
    ["ê¤—"] = "m",
    ["ê¤˜"] = "d",
    ["ê¤™"] = "b",
    ["ê¤š"] = "r",
    ["ê¤›"] = "y",
    ["ê¤œ"] = "l",
    ["ê¤"] = "w",
    ["ê¤"] = "th",
    ["ê¤Ÿ"] = "h",
    ["ê¤ "] = "v",
    ["ê¤¡"] = "c",
    -- vowels
    ["ê¤¢"] = "a",
    ["ê¤£"] = "oe",
    ["ê¤¤"] = "i",
    ["ê¤¥"] = "o",
    -- tones
    ["ê¤«"] = u(0x0301),
    ["ê¤¬"] = u(0x0300),
    ["ê¤­"] = u(0x0304),
    -- marks
    ["ê¤®"] = "-",
    ["ê¤¯"] = ".",
    -- numerals
    ["ê¤€"] = "0",
    ["ê¤"] = "1",
    ["ê¤‚"] = "2",
    ["ê¤ƒ"] = "3",
    ["ê¤„"] = "4",
    ["ê¤…"] = "5",
    ["ê¤†"] = "6",
    ["ê¤‡"] = "7",
    ["ê¤ˆ"] = "8",
    ["ê¤‰"] = "9",
    -- zero-width space (display it if it hides in a word)
    [u(0x200B)] = "â€¼"
}

local tt2 = {
    -- vowels
    ["ê¤¢ê¤¦"] = "ue",
    ["ê¤¢ê¤§"] = "ae",
    ["ê¤¢ê¤¨"] = "u",
    ["ê¤¢ê¤©"] = "e",
    ["ê¤¢ê¤ª"] = "oa",
    ["ê¤£ê¤¦"] = "oeue",
    ["ê¤£ê¤§"] = "ueae",
    ["ê¤£ê¤¨"] = "oeu",
    ["ê¤£ê¤©"] = "oee",
    ["ê¤£ê¤ª"] = "oeoa"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc, debug_mode)

    if type(text) == "table" then -- called directly from a template
        text = text.args[1]
    end

    text = gsub(text, "([ê¤¢-ê¤¥][ê¤¦-ê¤­]*)([ê¤¢-ê¤¥])", "%1â€™%2") -- add apostrophe between adjacent two vowels
    text = gsub(text, "([ê¤Š-ê¤¡])ê¤Ÿ([ê¤¢-ê¤¥][ê¤¦-ê¤ª]?)", "%1%2Ì¤") -- change h between initial and vowel into subcolon

    text = gsub(text, "ê¤Ÿê¤Œê¤£", "u" .. u(0x0324) .. "eoe") -- use u() to break Unicode normalization
    text = gsub(text, "ê¤›ê¤£", "ueoe")
    text = gsub(text, "[ê¤¢ê¤£][ê¤¦-ê¤ª]", tt2)
    text = gsub(text, ".", tt1)

    text = gsub(text, "([aeiou])([aeiou]*)Ì¤", "%1Ì¤%2") -- move subcolon to first aeiou
    text = gsub(text, "([aeiou]Ì¤?)([aeiou]*)([" .. u(0x0301) .. u(0x0300) .. u(0x0304) .. "])", "%1%3%2") -- add tone mark on first aeiou

    return text

end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="33">
<source>wikt/translit/Khar-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local u = mw.ustring.char
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub

local consonants = {
    -- defer transliteration of null consonant.
    ["ğ¨€"] = "ğ¨€",
    -- consonants
    ["ğ¨"] = "k",
    ["ğ¨‘"] = "kh",
    ["ğ¨’"] = "g",
    ["ğ¨“"] = "gh",
    ["ğ¨•"] = "c",
    ["ğ¨–"] = "ch",
    ["ğ¨—"] = "j",
    ["ğ¨™"] = "Ã±",
    ["ğ¨š"] = "á¹­",
    ["ğ¨›"] = "á¹­h",
    ["ğ¨œ"] = "á¸",
    ["ğ¨"] = "á¸h",
    ["ğ¨"] = "á¹‡",
    ["ğ¨Ÿ"] = "t",
    ["ğ¨ "] = "th",
    ["ğ¨¡"] = "d",
    ["ğ¨¢"] = "dh",
    ["ğ¨£"] = "n",
    ["ğ¨¤"] = "p",
    ["ğ¨¥"] = "ph",
    ["ğ¨¦"] = "b",
    ["ğ¨§"] = "bh",
    ["ğ¨¨"] = "m",
    ["ğ¨©"] = "y",
    ["ğ¨ª"] = "r",
    ["ğ¨«"] = "l",
    ["ğ¨¬"] = "v",
    ["ğ¨­"] = "Å›",
    ["ğ¨®"] = "á¹£",
    ["ğ¨¯"] = "s",
    ["ğ¨°"] = "z",
    ["ğ¨±"] = "h",
    ["ğ¨²"] = "á¸±",
    ["ğ¨³"] = "á¹­Ìh",
    ["ğ¨´"] = "á¹­Ì",
    ["ğ¨µ"] = "vh"
}

local diacritics = {
    -- matras
    ["ğ¨"] = "i",
    ["ğ¨‚"] = "u",
    ["ğ¨ƒ"] = "á¹›",
    ["ğ¨…"] = "e",
    ["ğ¨†"] = "o",
    ["ğ¨Œ"] = "Ä",
    ["ğ¨ğ¨Œ"] = "Ä«",
    ["ğ¨‚ğ¨Œ"] = "Å«",
    ["ğ¨ƒğ¨Œ"] = "á¹",
    ["ğ¨…ğ¨Œ"] = "ai",
    ["ğ¨†ğ¨Œ"] = "au",
    ["ğ¨¿"] = "",
    ["â€ğ¨¿"] = "â’¿",
    ["ğ¨"] = "aÍš",
    ["ğ¨‚ğ¨"] = "uÍš"
}

local tt = {

    -- vowels
    ["ğ¨€"] = "",
    -- anusvara    
    ["ğ¨"] = "á¹ƒ", -- until a better method is found
    -- visarga    
    ["ğ¨"] = "á¸¥",
    -- numerals
    ["ğ©€"] = "1",
    ["ğ©"] = "2",
    ["ğ©‚"] = "3",
    ["ğ©ƒ"] = "4",
    ["ğ©„"] = "10",
    ["ğ©…"] = "20",
    ["ğ©†"] = "100",
    ["ğ©‡"] = "1000",
    -- punctuation        
    ["ğ©–"] = ".", -- danda
    ["ğ©—"] = "." -- double danda
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local failed = nil
    if sc ~= "Khar" then return nil end
    -- Consonants appear as part of sequences canonically equivalent to consonant+nukta+vowel, so
    -- allowing for multiplicity and the string being normalised (by Wikimedia policy), the matching
    -- RE is:
    local form = "([ğ¨€ğ¨-ğ¨µ])(ğ¨¹?)(â€?ğ¨¿?)(ğ¨º?)(ğ¨?)(ğ¨¸?)([ğ¨-ğ¨†]?[ğ¨-ğ¨†]?ğ¨Œ?ğ¨?)"
    text = gsub(text, form, function(c, n1, h, n2, vi, n3, vm)
        local d = h .. vi .. vm -- Expect at most one catenand to be non-empty.
        local cdia = ""
        local cons = consonants[c]
        local retval
        if n1 ~= "" then -- Cauda
            if cons == "s" or cons == "Å›" then
                cdia = cdia .. u(0x0331) -- Combining macron below
            else
                cdia = cdia .. u(0x0301) -- Combining acute
            end
        end
        if n2 ~= "" then cdia = cdia .. u(0x0323) end -- Combining dot below
        if n3 ~= "" then cdia = cdia .. u(0x0304) end -- Combining macron
        if d == "" then
            retval = cons .. cdia .. "a"
        else
            local dia = diacritics[d]
            if not dia then
                mw.addWarning("Failed to transliterate ğ¨€" .. d .. " in " .. text)
                failed = true
                dia = "D"
            end
            retval = cons .. cdia .. dia
        end
        return mw.ustring.toNFD(retval)
    end)

    text = gsub(text, "(a)ğ¨€([iu])", "%1%2" .. u(0x308)) -- Apply diaeresis
    text = gsub(text, ".", tt)
    text = gsub(text, "lâ’¿y", "lÃ½")
    text = gsub(text, "â’¿", "")
    text = gsub(text, u(0x301, 0x304), u(0x304, 0x301))

    if failed then return nil end
    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="34">
<source>wikt/translit/Limb-Deva-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local consonants = {["á¤"] = "à¤•", ["á¤‚"] = "à¤–", ["á¤ƒ"] = "à¤—", ["á¤„"] = "à¤˜", ["á¤…"] = "à¤™", ["á¤†"] = "à¤š", ["á¤‡"] = "à¤›", ["á¤ˆ"] = "à¤œ", ["á¤‰"] = "à¤", ["á¤Š"] = "à¤", ["á¤‹"] = "à¤¤", ["á¤Œ"] = "à¤¥", ["á¤"] = "à¤¦", ["á¤"] = "à¤§", ["á¤"] = "à¤¨", ["á¤"] = "à¤ª", ["á¤‘"] = "à¤«", ["á¤’"] = "à¤¬", ["á¤“"] = "à¤­", ["á¤”"] = "à¤®", ["á¤•"] = "à¤¯", ["á¤–"] = "à¤°", ["á¤—"] = "à¤²", ["á¤˜"] = "à¤µ", ["á¤™"] = "à¤¶", ["á¤š"] = "à¤·", ["á¤›"] = "à¤¸", ["á¤œ"] = "à¤¹", ["á¤"] = "à¤œà¥à¤", ["á¤"] = "à¤¤à¥à¤°", ["á¤€"] = "à¤…"}
local diacritics = {["á¤ "] = "à¤¾", ["á¤¡"] = "à¤¿", ["á¤¢"] = "à¥", ["á¤£"] = "à¥‡", ["á¤¤"] = "à¥ˆ", ["á¤¥"] = "à¥‹", ["á¤¦"] = "à¥Œ", ["á¤§"] = "à¥‡à¤¼", ["á¤¨"] = "à¥‹à¤¼"}

-- ['á¤§']='à¥…' , --['á¤¨']='',

local special = {
    ["á¤¹"] = "à¥½", -- mukphreng (glottalizer)
    ["á¤²"] = "à¤‚" -- anusvara (now obsolete)
}

local subjoined = {["á¤ª"] = "à¥à¤°", ["á¤«"] = "à¥à¤µ", ["á¤©"] = "à¥à¤¯"}

local finals = {["á¤°"] = "à¤•à¥", ["á¤±"] = "à¤™à¥", ["á¤³"] = "à¤¤à¥", ["á¤´"] = "à¤¨à¥", ["á¤µ"] = "à¤ªà¥", ["á¤¶"] = "à¤®à¥", ["á¤·"] = "à¤°à¥", ["á¤¸"] = "à¤²à¥"}

local nonconsonants = {

    -- digits
    ["á¥†"] = "à¥¦",
    ["á¥‡"] = "à¥§",
    ["á¥ˆ"] = "à¥¨",
    ["á¥‰"] = "à¥©",
    ["á¥Š"] = "à¥ª",
    ["á¥‹"] = "à¥«",
    ["á¥Œ"] = "à¥¬",
    ["á¥"] = "à¥­",
    ["á¥"] = "à¥®",
    ["á¥"] = "à¥¯",
    ["à¥¥"] = "à¥¥",
    ["á¥„"] = "!",
    ["á¥…"] = "?",
    ["."] = ",",
    ["á¥€"] = "à¤²à¥‹"
}

-- translit any words or phrases
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([á¤á¤‚á¤ƒá¤„á¤…á¤†á¤‡á¤ˆá¤‰á¤Šá¤‹á¤Œá¤á¤á¤á¤á¤‘á¤’á¤“á¤”á¤•á¤–á¤—á¤˜á¤™á¤šá¤›á¤œá¤á¤á¤€])á¤»", "á¤º%1") -- treat underscore as kemphreng
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([á¤á¤‚á¤ƒá¤„á¤…á¤†á¤‡á¤ˆá¤‰á¤Šá¤‹á¤Œá¤á¤á¤á¤á¤‘á¤’á¤“á¤”á¤•á¤–á¤—á¤˜á¤™á¤šá¤›á¤œá¤á¤á¤€])" .. "([á¤ªá¤«á¤©]?)" .. "([á¤ á¤¡á¤¢á¤£á¤¤á¤¥á¤¦á¤§	á¤¨]?)" .. "([á¤¹á¤ºá¤²]?)" .. "([á¤°á¤±á¤³á¤´á¤µá¤¶á¤·á¤¸]?)", function(c, d, e, f, g)
        -- mw.log('match', c, d)
        return (consonants[c] or c) .. (subjoined[d] or d) .. (diacritics[e] or (e ~= "") and e or "") .. (special[f] or f) .. (finals[g] or g)
    end)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", nonconsonants)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.)âŒ«", "")
    text = gsub(text, "à¤¾á¤£", "à¥‹")
    text = gsub(text, "á¤£á¤£", "à¥ˆ")
    text = gsub(text, "à¤¾á¤£á¤£", "à¥Œ")
    text = gsub(text, "à¤¾à¤ƒá¤£", "à¤“à¤ƒ")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤º", "à¤ƒ")
    -- text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, 'à¤¿à¤ƒ', 'à¥€')
    -- text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, 'à¥à¤ƒ', 'à¥‚')
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤°", "à¤•à¥")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤±", "à¤™à¥")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤³", "à¤¤à¥")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤´", "à¤¨à¥")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤µ", "à¤ªà¥")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤¶", "à¤®à¥")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤·", "à¤°à¥")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¤¸", "à¤²à¥")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¤¾", "à¤†")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¤¿", "à¤‡")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¥€", "à¤ˆ")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¥", "à¤‰")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¥‚", "à¤Š")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¥‡", "à¤")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¥ˆ", "à¤")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¥‹", "à¤“")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¥Œ", "à¤”")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¥…", "à¤")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¥‡à¤¼", "à¤à¤¼")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤…à¥‹à¤¼", "à¤“à¤¼")
    text = gsub(text, "à¤¾à¤ƒá¤£", "à¥‹à¤ƒ")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "à¤¾à¤ƒá¤£", "à¥‹à¤ƒ")
    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="35">
<source>wikt/translit/Linb-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local chars = {
    ["ğ€€"] = "a",
    ["ğ€"] = "e",
    ["ğ€‚"] = "i",
    ["ğ€ƒ"] = "o",
    ["ğ€„"] = "u",

    ["ğ€…"] = "da",
    ["ğ€†"] = "de",
    ["ğ€‡"] = "di",
    ["ğ€ˆ"] = "do",
    ["ğ€‰"] = "du",

    ["ğ€Š"] = "ja",
    ["ğ€‹"] = "je",
    -- ji not in Unicode
    ["ğ€"] = "jo",
    ["ğ€"] = "ju",

    ["ğ€"] = "ka",
    ["ğ€"] = "ke",
    ["ğ€‘"] = "ki",
    ["ğ€’"] = "ko",
    ["ğ€“"] = "ku",

    ["ğ€”"] = "ma",
    ["ğ€•"] = "me",
    ["ğ€–"] = "mi",
    ["ğ€—"] = "mo",
    ["ğ€˜"] = "mu",

    ["ğ€™"] = "na",
    ["ğ€š"] = "ne",
    ["ğ€›"] = "ni",
    ["ğ€œ"] = "no",
    ["ğ€"] = "nu",

    ["ğ€"] = "pa",
    ["ğ€Ÿ"] = "pe",
    ["ğ€ "] = "pi",
    ["ğ€¡"] = "po",
    ["ğ€¢"] = "pu",

    ["ğ€£"] = "qa",
    ["ğ€¤"] = "qe",
    ["ğ€¥"] = "qi",
    ["ğ€¦"] = "qo",
    -- qu not in Unicode

    ["ğ€¨"] = "ra",
    ["ğ€©"] = "re",
    ["ğ€ª"] = "ri",
    ["ğ€«"] = "ro",
    ["ğ€¬"] = "ru",

    ["ğ€­"] = "sa",
    ["ğ€®"] = "se",
    ["ğ€¯"] = "si",
    ["ğ€°"] = "so",
    ["ğ€±"] = "su",

    ["ğ€²"] = "ta",
    ["ğ€³"] = "te",
    ["ğ€´"] = "ti",
    ["ğ€µ"] = "to",
    ["ğ€¶"] = "tu",

    ["ğ€·"] = "wa",
    ["ğ€¸"] = "we",
    ["ğ€¹"] = "wi",
    ["ğ€º"] = "wo",
    -- wu not in Unicode

    ["ğ€¼"] = "za",
    ["ğ€½"] = "ze",
    -- zi not in Unicode
    ["ğ€¿"] = "zo",
    -- zu not in Unicode

    ["ğ€"] = "ha",
    ["ğ"] = "ai",
    ["ğ‚"] = "au",
    ["ğƒ"] = "dwe",
    ["ğ„"] = "dwo",
    ["ğ…"] = "nwo",
    ["ğ†"] = "phu",
    ["ğ‡"] = "pte",
    ["ğˆ"] = "rya",
    ["ğ‰"] = "rai",
    ["ğŠ"] = "ryo",
    ["ğ‹"] = "tya",
    ["ğŒ"] = "twe",
    ["ğ"] = "two",

    ["ğ"] = "*18",
    ["ğ‘"] = "*19",
    ["ğ’"] = "*22",
    ["ğ“"] = "*34",
    ["ğ”"] = "*47",
    ["ğ•"] = "*49",
    ["ğ–"] = "*56",
    ["ğ—"] = "*63",
    ["ğ˜"] = "*64",
    ["ğ™"] = "*79",
    ["ğš"] = "*82",
    ["ğ›"] = "*83",
    ["ğœ"] = "*86",
    ["ğ"] = "*89",

    -- explicit morpheme boundary
    ["-"] = "`"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local ret = {}
    local i = 1

    for c in string.gmatch(text, "[%z\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*") do -- UTF-8 character pattern
        ret[i] = chars[c] or c
        i = i + 1
    end

    text = string.gsub(table.concat(ret, "-"), "%- %-", " ")
    text = string.gsub(text, "%-?`%-?", "-")

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

local export = {}

local chars = {["ğŠ€"] = "a", ["ğŠ‚"] = "b", ["ğŠ„"] = "g", ["ğŠ…"] = "d", ["ğŠ†"] = "i", ["ğŠ‡"] = "w", ["ğŠˆ"] = "z", ["ğŠ›"] = "h", ["ğŠ‰"] = "Î¸", ["ğŠŠ"] = "j", ["ğŠ‹"] = "k", ["ğŠ"] = "l", ["ğŠ"] = "m", ["ğŠ"] = "n", ["ğŠ’"] = "u", ["ğŠ“"] = "p", ["ğŠ”"] = "k", ["ğŠ•"] = "r", ["ğŠ–"] = "s", ["ğŠ—"] = "t", ["ğŠ"] = "e", ["ğŠ™"] = "Ã£", ["ğŠš"] = "áº½", ["ğŠ"] = "mÌƒ", ["ğŠ‘"] = "Ã±", ["ğŠ˜"] = "Ï„", ["ğŠŒ"] = "q", ["ğŠƒ"] = "Î²", ["ğŠœ"] = "Ï‡"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc) return (mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", chars)) end

<source>wikt/translit/Lydi-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local chars = {["ğ¤ "] = "a", ["ğ¤µ"] = "Ã£", ["ğ¤¡"] = "b", ["ğ¤¹"] = "c", ["ğ¤£"] = "d", ["ğ¤¤"] = "e", ["ğ¤¶"] = "áº½", ["ğ¤±"] = "f", ["ğ¤¢"] = "g", ["ğ¤¦"] = "i", ["ğ¤§"] = "y", ["ğ¤¨"] = "k", ["ğ¤©"] = "l", ["ğ¤·"] = "Î»", ["ğ¤ª"] = "m", ["ğ¤«"] = "n", ["ğ¤¸"] = "Î½", ["ğ¤¬"] = "o", ["ğ¤²"] = "q", ["ğ¤­"] = "r", ["ğ¤³"] = "s", ["ğ¤®"] = "Å›", ["ğ¤¯"] = "t", ["ğ¤´"] = "Ï„", ["ğ¤°"] = "u", ["ğ¤¥"] = "w"}

<document index="38">
<source>wikt/translit/Mani-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["ğ«€"] = "Ê¾", -- aleph
    ["ğ«"] = "b", -- beth
    ["ğ«‚"] = "Î²", -- bheth
    ["ğ«ƒ"] = "g", -- gimel
    ["ğ«„"] = "É£", -- ghimel
    ["ğ«…"] = "d", -- daleth
    ["ğ«†"] = "áº–", -- he
    ["ğ«‡"] = "w", -- waw
    ["ğ«ˆ"] = "áº‰Ì‡", -- ud (conjunction)
    ["ğ«‰"] = "z", -- zayin
    ["ğ«Š"] = "Å¾", -- zhayin
    ["ğ«‹"] = "j", -- jayin
    ["ğ«Œ"] = "Ç°", -- jhayin
    ["ğ«"] = "h", -- heth
    ["ğ«"] = "á¹¯", -- teth
    ["ğ«"] = "y", -- yodh
    ["ğ«"] = "k", -- kaph
    ["ğ«‘"] = "kÌ‡", -- xaph
    ["ğ«’"] = "kÌˆ", -- khaph
    ["ğ«“"] = "l", -- lamedh
    ["ğ«”"] = "Î´", -- dhamedh
    ["ğ«•"] = "Î¸", -- thamedh
    ["ğ«–"] = "m", -- mem
    ["ğ«—"] = "n", -- nun
    ["ğ«˜"] = "s", -- samekh
    ["ğ«™"] = "Ê¿", -- ayin
    ["ğ«š"] = "Ê¿Ìˆ ", -- aayin
    ["ğ«›"] = "p", -- pe
    ["ğ«œ"] = "f", -- fe
    ["ğ«"] = "c", -- sadhe
    ["ğ«"] = "q", -- qoph
    ["ğ«Ÿ"] = "x", -- xoph
    ["ğ« "] = "qÌˆ", -- qhoph
    ["ğ«¡"] = "r", -- resh
    ["ğ«¢"] = "Å¡", -- shin
    ["ğ«£"] = "Å›", -- sshin
    ["ğ«¤"] = "t", -- taw
    ["â—Œğ«¥"] = "Ìƒ", -- abbreviation mark above
    ["â—Œğ«¦"] = "Ìƒ", -- abbreviation mark below
    ["ğ««"] = "1", -- one
    ["ğ«¬"] = "5", -- five
    ["ğ«­"] = "10", -- ten
    ["ğ«®"] = "20", -- twenty
    ["ğ«¯"] = "100" -- one hundred
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- If the script is not Mani, do not transliterate
    if sc ~= "Mani" then return end

    -- Transliterate characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="39">
<source>wikt/translit/Modi-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local consonants = {["ğ‘˜"] = "k", ["ğ‘˜"] = "kh", ["ğ‘˜"] = "g", ["ğ‘˜‘"] = "gh", ["ğ‘˜’"] = "á¹…", ["ğ‘˜“"] = "c", ["ğ‘˜”"] = "ch", ["ğ‘˜•"] = "j", ["ğ‘˜–"] = "jh", ["ğ‘˜—"] = "Ã±", ["ğ‘˜˜"] = "á¹­", ["ğ‘˜™"] = "á¹­h", ["ğ‘˜š"] = "á¸", ["ğ‘˜›"] = "á¸h", ["ğ‘˜œ"] = "á¹‡", ["ğ‘˜"] = "t", ["ğ‘˜"] = "th", ["ğ‘˜Ÿ"] = "d", ["ğ‘˜ "] = "dh", ["ğ‘˜¡"] = "n", ["ğ‘˜¢"] = "p", ["ğ‘˜£"] = "ph", ["ğ‘˜¤"] = "b", ["ğ‘˜¥"] = "bh", ["ğ‘˜¦"] = "m", ["ğ‘˜§"] = "y", ["ğ‘˜¨"] = "r", ["ğ‘˜©"] = "l", ["ğ‘˜ª"] = "v", ["ğ‘˜¯"] = "á¸·", ["ğ‘˜«"] = "Å›", ["ğ‘˜¬"] = "á¹£", ["ğ‘˜­"] = "s", ["ğ‘˜®"] = "h"}

local diacritics = {
    ["ğ‘˜°"] = "Ä",
    ["ğ‘˜±"] = "i",
    ["ğ‘˜²"] = "Ä«",
    ["ğ‘˜³"] = "u",
    ["ğ‘˜´"] = "Å«",
    ["ğ‘˜µ"] = "á¹›",
    ["ğ‘˜¶"] = "á¹",
    ["ğ‘˜·"] = "á¸·",
    ["ğ‘˜¸"] = "á¸¹",
    ["ğ‘˜¹"] = "e",
    ["ğ‘˜º"] = "ai",
    ["ğ‘˜»"] = "o",
    ["ğ‘˜¼"] = "au",
    -- virama
    ["ğ‘˜¿"] = ""
}

local tt = {
    -- vowel signs
    ["ğ‘˜€"] = "a",
    ["ğ‘˜‚"] = "i",
    ["ğ‘˜„"] = "u",
    ["ğ‘˜Š"] = "e",
    ["ğ‘˜Œ"] = "o",
    ["ğ‘˜"] = "Ä",
    ["ğ‘˜ƒ"] = "Ä«",
    ["ğ‘˜…"] = "Å«",
    ["ğ‘˜†"] = "Å•",
    ["ğ‘˜‹"] = "ai",
    ["ğ‘˜"] = "au",
    ["ğ‘˜ğ‘™€"] = "Å",
    ["ğ‘˜€ğ‘™€"] = "Ä•",
    ["ğ‘˜Šğ‘™€"] = "Ä•",
    -- anusvara
    ["ğ‘˜½"] = "á¹ƒ",
    -- visarga
    ["ğ‘˜¾"] = "á¸¥",
    -- numerals
    ["ğ‘™"] = "0",
    ["ğ‘™‘"] = "1",
    ["ğ‘™’"] = "2",
    ["ğ‘™“"] = "3",
    ["ğ‘™”"] = "4",
    ["ğ‘™•"] = "5",
    ["ğ‘™–"] = "6",
    ["ğ‘™—"] = "7",
    ["ğ‘™˜"] = "8",
    ["ğ‘™™"] = "9",
    -- punctuation        
    ["ğ‘™"] = ".", -- danda
    ["ğ‘™‚"] = ".", -- double danda
    ["+"] = "", -- compound separator

    -- abbreviation sign
    ["ğ‘™ƒ"] = ".",
    -- Om
    ["à¥"] = "oá¹ƒ"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ğ‘˜ğ‘˜ğ‘˜ğ‘˜‘ğ‘˜’ğ‘˜“ğ‘˜”ğ‘˜•ğ‘˜–ğ‘˜—ğ‘˜˜ğ‘˜™ğ‘˜šğ‘˜›ğ‘˜œğ‘˜ğ‘˜ğ‘˜Ÿğ‘˜ ğ‘˜¡ğ‘˜¢ğ‘˜£ğ‘˜¤ğ‘˜¥ğ‘˜¦ğ‘˜§ğ‘˜¨ğ‘˜©ğ‘˜ªğ‘˜¯ğ‘˜«ğ‘˜¬ğ‘˜­ğ‘˜®])" .. "([ğ‘˜°ğ‘˜±ğ‘˜²ğ‘˜³ğ‘˜´ğ‘˜µğ‘˜¶ğ‘˜·ğ‘˜¸ğ‘˜¹ğ‘˜ºğ‘˜»ğ‘˜¼ğ‘˜¿]?)", function(c, d)
        if d == "" then
            return consonants[c] .. "a"
        else
            return consonants[c] .. diacritics[d]
        end
    end)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".[ğ‘™€]?", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="40">
<source>wikt/translit/Narb-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local chars = {["ğª"] = "sÂ³", ["ğª™"] = "á¸", ["ğª"] = "áº–", ["ğªŠ"] = "sÂ¹", ["ğª†"] = "sÂ²", ["ğª›"] = "á¹¯", ["ğª‘"] = "Ê¾", ["ğª’"] = "Ê¿", ["ğªˆ"] = "b", ["ğª•"] = "d", ["ğª“"] = "á¸", ["ğª"] = "f", ["ğª”"] = "g", ["ğª–"] = "Ä¡", ["ğª€"] = "h", ["ğª‚"] = "á¸¥", ["ğª‹"] = "k", ["ğª"] = "l", ["ğªƒ"] = "m", ["ğªŒ"] = "n", ["ğª„"] = "q", ["ğª‡"] = "r", ["ğª"] = "á¹£", ["ğª‰"] = "t", ["ğª—"] = "á¹­", ["ğª…"] = "w", ["ğªš"] = "y", ["ğª˜"] = "z", ["ğªœ"] = "áº“"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc) return (mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", chars)) end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

local export = {}
local U = mw.ustring.char
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match
local sub = mw.ustring.sub

local conv = {
    ["ğ‘"] = "à¤•",
    ["ğ‘"] = "à¤–",
    ["ğ‘"] = "à¤—",
    ["ğ‘‘"] = "à¤˜",
    ["ğ‘’"] = "à¤™",
    ["ğ‘”"] = "à¤š",

    ["ğ‘‘"] = "à¥Œ",

    -- chandrabindu

    -- anusvara

    ["ğ‘‘ˆ"] = "à¤‚",

    -- avagraha
    ["ğ‘‘‡"] = "à¤½",
    -- punctuation
    ["ğ‘‘"] = "à¥°",
    ["ğ‘‘Œ"] = "à¥¥",
    ["ğ‘‘‹"] = "à¥¤",

    -- Vedic extensions
    ["ğ‘‘ "] = "á³µ",

    ["ğ‘‘˜"] = "à¥®",
    ["ğ‘‘™"] = "à¥¯"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", function(c) return conv[c] end)
    return text
end

return export
