<document index="42">
<source>wikt/translit/Olck-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local conv = {
    ["á±š"] = "Ã´",
    ["á±›"] = "t",
    ["á±œ"] = "g",
    ["á±"] = "á¹…",
    ["á±"] = "l",
    ["á±Ÿ"] = "a",
    ["á± "] = "k",
    ["á±¡"] = "j",
    ["á±¢"] = "m",
    ["á±£"] = "v",
    ["á±¤"] = "i",
    ["á±¥"] = "s",
    ["á±¦"] = "h",
    ["á±§"] = "Ã±",
    ["á±¨"] = "r",
    ["á±©"] = "u",
    ["á±ª"] = "c",
    ["á±«"] = "d",
    ["á±¬"] = "á¹‡",
    ["á±­"] = "y",
    ["á±®"] = "e",
    ["á±¯"] = "p",
    ["á±°"] = "á¸",
    ["á±±"] = "n",
    ["á±²"] = "á¹›",
    ["á±³"] = "o",
    ["á±´"] = "á¹­",
    ["á±µ"] = "b",
    ["á±¶"] = "wÌƒ",
    ["á±·"] = "h", -- aspiration

    -- numerals
    ["á±"] = "0",
    ["á±‘"] = "1",
    ["á±’"] = "2",
    ["á±“"] = "3",
    ["á±”"] = "4",
    ["á±•"] = "5",
    ["á±–"] = "6",
    ["á±—"] = "7",
    ["á±˜"] = "8",
    ["á±™"] = "9",

    -- punctuation        
    ["á±¿"] = ".",
    ["á±¾"] = ".",

    -- special chars
    ["á±¸"] = "Ìƒ", -- mu tudag: nasalization
    ["á±º"] = "á±¹Ìƒ", -- mu gahla tudag: nasalization
    ["á±»"] = "Ë" -- rela: gemination
}

local gahla_tudag = {["Ã´"] = "Å", ["a"] = "Äƒ", ["e"] = "Ä•"}

local ahad = {["kâ€™"] = "g", ["câ€™"] = "j", ["tâ€™"] = "d", ["pâ€™"] = "b", ["hâ€™"] = "h"}

local pharka = {["g"] = "kâ€™", ["j"] = "câ€™", ["d"] = "tâ€™", ["b"] = "pâ€™", ["h"] = "hâ€™"}

local punctuation = "([ á±¾á±¿,!?\"'])"

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", function(c) return conv[c] end)

    -- word-final glottalization
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "[gjdb]$", pharka)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([gjdb])" .. punctuation, function(c, d) return pharka[c] .. d end)

    -- gahla tudag
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.)á±¹", function(c) return gahla_tudag[c] end)

    -- ahad
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.â€™)á±½", function(c) return ahad[c] end)

    -- parkha
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.)á±¼", function(c) return pharka[c] end)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "hâ€™", "Ê”")

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="43">
<source>wikt/translit/Orkh-Bitig-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["ğ°€"] = "a", -- ORKHON A
    ["ğ°ƒ"] = "i", -- ORKHON I
    ["ğ°†"] = "U", -- ORKHON O
    ["ğ°‡"] = "u", -- ORKHON OE
    ["ğ°‰"] = "B", -- ORKHON AB
    ["ğ°‹"] = "b", -- ORKHON AEB
    ["ğ°"] = "G", -- ORKHON AG
    ["ğ°"] = "g", -- ORKHON AEG
    ["ğ°‘"] = "D", -- ORKHON AD
    ["ğ°“"] = "d", -- ORKHON AED
    ["ğ°”"] = "z", -- ORKHON EZ
    ["ğ°–"] = "J", -- ORKHON AY
    ["ğ°˜"] = "j", -- ORKHON AEY
    ["ğ°š"] = "K", -- ORKHON AEK
    ["ğ°œ"] = "q", -- ORKHON OEK
    ["ğ°"] = "L", -- ORKHON AL
    ["ğ° "] = "l", -- ORKHON AEL
    ["ğ°¡"] = "w", -- ORKHON ELT
    ["ğ°¢"] = "m", -- ORKHON EM
    ["ğ°£"] = "N", -- ORKHON AN
    ["ğ°¤"] = "n", -- ORKHON AEN
    ["ğ°¦"] = "O", -- ORKHON ENT
    ["ğ°¨"] = "W", -- ORKHON ENC
    ["ğ°ª"] = "F", -- ORKHON ENY
    ["ğ°­"] = "y", -- ORKHON ENG
    ["ğ°¯"] = "p", -- ORKHON EP
    ["ğ°²"] = "C", -- ORKHON EC
    ["ğ°´"] = "Q", -- ORKHON AQ
    ["ğ°¶"] = "k", -- ORKHON IQ
    ["ğ°¸"] = "x", -- ORKHON OQ
    ["ğ°º"] = "R", -- ORKHON AR
    ["ğ°¼"] = "r", -- ORKHON AER
    ["ğ°½"] = "S", -- ORKHON AS
    ["ğ°¾"] = "s", -- ORKHON AES
    ["ğ°¿"] = "c", -- ORKHON ASH
    ["ğ±"] = "Y", -- ORKHON ESH
    ["ğ±ƒ"] = "T", -- ORKHON AT
    ["ğ±…"] = "t", -- ORKHON AET
    ["ğ±ˆ"] = "V" -- ORKHON BASH
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- If the script is not Orkh, do not transliterate
    if sc ~= "Orkh" then return end

    -- Transliterate characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["ğ°€"] = "a", -- ORKHON A
    ["ğ°ƒ"] = "i", -- ORKHON I
    ["ğ°†"] = "u", -- ORKHON O
    ["ğ°‡"] = "Ã¼", -- ORKHON OE
    ["ğ°‰"] = "bÂ¹", -- ORKHON AB
    ["ğ°‹"] = "bÂ²", -- ORKHON AEB
    ["ğ°"] = "Ç§", -- ORKHON AG
    ["ğ°"] = "g", -- ORKHON AEG
    ["ğ°‘"] = "dÂ¹", -- ORKHON AD
    ["ğ°“"] = "dÂ²", -- ORKHON AED
    ["ğ°•"] = "z", -- ORKHON EZ
    ["ğ°–"] = "yÂ¹", -- ORKHON AY
    ["ğ°˜"] = "yÂ²", -- ORKHON AEY
    ["ğ°š"] = "k", -- ORKHON AEK
    ["ğ°œ"] = "kÌ¥", -- ORKHON OEK
    ["ğ°"] = "lÂ¹", -- ORKHON AL
    ["ğ° "] = "lÂ²", -- ORKHON AEL
    ["ğ°¡"] = "lt", -- ORKHON ELT
    ["ğ°¢"] = "m", -- ORKHON EM
    ["ğ°£"] = "nÂ¹", -- ORKHON AN
    ["ğ°¤"] = "nÂ²", -- ORKHON AEN
    ["ğ°¦"] = "nt", -- ORKHON ENT
    ["ğ°¨"] = "nÄ", -- ORKHON ENC
    ["ğ°ª"] = "Å„", -- ORKHON ENY
    ["ğ°­"] = "Å‹", -- ORKHON ENG
    ["ğ°¯"] = "p", -- ORKHON EP
    ["ğ°°"] = "pÌŠ", -- ORKHON OP
    ["ğ°±"] = "ÄÌ¥", -- ORKHO IC
    ["ğ°²"] = "Ä", -- ORKHON EC
    ["ğ°´"] = "q", -- ORKHON AQ
    ["ğ°¶"] = "qÌŠÂ²", -- ORKHON IQ
    ["ğ°¸"] = "qÌŠÂ¹", -- ORKHON OQ
    ["ğ°º"] = "rÂ¹", -- ORKHON AR
    ["ğ°¼"] = "rÂ²", -- ORKHON AER

    ["ğ°¾"] = "sÂ²", -- ORKHON AES

    -- Transliterate characters

    return text

<source>wikt/translit/Palm-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["ğ¡ "] = "Ê¾", -- aleph
    ["ğ¡¡"] = "b", -- beth
    ["ğ¡¢"] = "g", -- gimel
    ["ğ¡£"] = "d", -- daleth
    ["ğ¡¤"] = "h", -- he
    ["ğ¡¥"] = "w", -- waw
    ["ğ¡¦"] = "z", -- zayin
    ["ğ¡§"] = "á¸¥", -- heth
    ["ğ¡¨"] = "á¹­", -- teth
    ["ğ¡©"] = "y", -- yodh
    ["ğ¡ª"] = "k", -- kaph
    ["ğ¡«"] = "l", -- lamedh
    ["ğ¡¬"] = "m", -- mem
    ["ğ¡­"] = "n", -- final nun
    ["ğ¡®"] = "n", -- nun
    ["ğ¡¯"] = "s", -- samekh
    ["ğ¡°"] = "Ê¿", -- ayin
    ["ğ¡±"] = "p", -- pe
    ["ğ¡²"] = "á¹£", -- sadhe
    ["ğ¡³"] = "q", -- qoph
    ["ğ¡´"] = "r", -- resh
    ["ğ¡µ"] = "Å¡", -- shin
    ["ğ¡¶"] = "t", -- taw
    ["ğ¡·"] = "â˜™", -- left-pointing fleuron
    ["ğ¡¸"] = "â§", -- right-pointing fleuron
    ["ğ¡¹"] = "1", -- one
    ["ğ¡º"] = "2", -- two
    ["ğ¡»"] = "3", -- three
    ["ğ¡¼"] = "4", -- four
    ["ğ¡½"] = "5", -- five
    ["ğ¡¾"] = "10", -- ten
    ["ğ¡¿"] = "20" -- twenty
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)

    if sc ~= "Palm" then return end

    -- Transliterate characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>

<document index="46">
<source>wikt/translit/Phli-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["ğ­ "] = "Ê¾", -- aleph
    ["ğ­¡"] = "b", -- beth
    ["ğ­¢"] = "g", -- gimil
    ["ğ­£"] = "d", -- daleth
    ["ğ­¤"] = "h", -- he
    ["ğ­¥"] = "Ê¿", -- waw-ayin-resh
    ["ğ­¦"] = "z", -- zayin
    ["ğ­§"] = "á¸¥", -- heth
    ["ğ­¨"] = "á¹­", -- teth
    ["ğ­©"] = "y", -- yodh
    ["ğ­ª"] = "k", -- kaph
    ["ğ­«"] = "l", -- lamedh
    ["ğ­¬"] = "m", -- mem-qoph
    ["ğ­­"] = "n", -- nun
    ["ğ­®"] = "s", -- samekh
    ["ğ­¯"] = "p", -- pe
    ["ğ­°"] = "c", -- sadhe
    ["ğ­±"] = "Å¡", -- shin
    ["ğ­²"] = "t" -- taw
}

local numbers = {["ğ­¸"] = 1, ["ğ­¹"] = 2, ["ğ­º"] = 3, ["ğ­»"] = 4, ["ğ­¼"] = 10, ["ğ­½"] = 20, ["ğ­¾"] = 100, ["ğ­¿"] = 1000}

function export.convert_numbers(numeric_str)
    local total = 0
    for c in mw.ustring.gmatch(numeric_str, ".") do total = total + numbers[c] end
    return total
end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- If the script is not Phli, do not transliterate
    if sc ~= "Phli" then return end

    -- Category to catch automatic transcriptions of waw-ayin-resh and mem-qoph
    -- [[Category:Automatic Inscriptional Pahlavi transliterations containing ambiguous characters]]
    local ambig_note = ""
    if mw.ustring.match(text, "[ğ­¬ğ­¥]") then ambig_note = "[[Category:Automatic Inscriptional Pahlavi transliterations containing ambiguous characters]]" end

    if mw.ustring.match(text, "[ğ­ -ğ­¿]") then text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "[ğ­¸-ğ­¿]+", export.convert_numbers) end

    -- Transliterate characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text .. ambig_note
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="47">
<source>wikt/translit/Phlv-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local U = mw.ustring.char

local gdy_pattern = "[" .. U(0x10BCB, 0x10BCD, 0x10BCC, 0x10BCE) .. "]" .. U(0x10BB2)

local gdy_map = {
    ["ğ¯‹ğ®²"] = "g", -- gimel-daleth-yodh with two dots above
    ["ğ¯Œğ®²"] = "d", -- gimel-daleth-yodh with hat above
    ["ğ¯ğ®²"] = "y", -- gimel-daleth-yodh with two dots below
    ["ğ¯ğ®²"] = "j" -- gimel-daleth-yodh with dot below
}

local tt = {
    ["ğ®°"] = "Ê¾", -- aleph-het
    ["ğ®±"] = "b", -- beth
    ["ğ®²"] = "?", -- gimel-daleth-yodh (Should have been transliterated)
    ["ğ®³"] = "á¸", -- old daleth
    ["ğ®´"] = "h", -- he
    ["ğ®µ"] = "'", -- waw-nun-ayin-resh
    ["ğ®¶"] = "z", -- zayin
    ["ğ®·"] = "k", -- kaph
    ["ğ®¸"] = "k", -- old kaph
    ["ğ®¹"] = "l", -- lamedh
    ["ğ®º"] = "Æš", -- old lamedh
    ["ğ®»"] = "á¸·", -- l-lamedh
    ["ğ®¼"] = "m", -- mem-qoph
    ["ğ®½"] = "s", -- samekh
    ["ğ®¾"] = "p", -- pe
    ["ğ®¿"] = "c", -- sadhe
    ["ğ¯€"] = "Å¡", -- shin
    ["ğ¯"] = "t", -- taw
    ["ğ¯‚"] = "yt", -- x1
    ["ğ¯ƒ"] = "ty", -- x2
    ["ğ¯"] = "", -- I
    ["ğ¯‘"] = "" -- ahriman
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- If the script is not Phlv, do not transliterate
    if sc ~= "Phlv" then return end

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, gdy_pattern, gdy_map)

    -- Category to catch automatic transcriptions of waw-ayin-resh and mem-qoph
    -- [[Category:Automatic Book Pahlavi transliterations containing ambiguous characters]]
    local ambig_note = ""
    if mw.ustring.match(text, "[ğ®²ğ®µğ®¼]") then ambig_note = "[[Category:Automatic Book Pahlavi transliterations containing ambiguous characters]]" end

    -- Transliterate characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="48">
<source>wikt/translit/Phnx-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local u = mw.ustring.char

-- Beware! Phnx is rtl
local tt = {["ğ¤€"] = "Ê¾", ["ğ¤"] = "b", ["ğ¤‚"] = "g", ["ğ¤ƒ"] = "d", ["ğ¤„"] = "h", ["ğ¤…"] = "w", ["ğ¤†"] = "z", ["ğ¤‡"] = "á¸¥", ["ğ¤ˆ"] = "á¹­", ["ğ¤‰"] = "y", ["ğ¤Š"] = "k", ["ğ¤‹"] = "l", ["ğ¤Œ"] = "m", ["ğ¤"] = "n", ["ğ¤"] = "s", ["ğ¤"] = "Ê¿", ["ğ¤"] = "p", ["ğ¤‘"] = "á¹£", ["ğ¤’"] = "q", ["ğ¤“"] = "r", ["ğ¤”"] = "Å¡", ["ğ¤•"] = "t", ["ğ¤–"] = "[1]", ["ğ¤—"] = "[10]", ["ğ¤˜"] = "[20]", ["ğ¤™"] = "[100]", ["ğ¤š"] = "[2]", ["ğ¤›"] = "[3]", ["ğ¤Ÿ"] = " "}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc, debug_mode)

    if type(text) == "table" then -- called directly from a template
        text = text.args[1]
    end

    return (text:gsub("[%z\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*", tt)) -- UTF-8 character pattern
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="49">
<source>wikt/translit/Prti-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {["ğ­€"] = "Ê¾", ["ğ­"] = "b", ["ğ­‚"] = "g", ["ğ­ƒ"] = "d", ["ğ­„"] = "h", ["ğ­…"] = "w", ["ğ­†"] = "z", ["ğ­‡"] = "á¸¥", ["ğ­ˆ"] = "á¹­", ["ğ­‰"] = "y", ["ğ­Š"] = "k", ["ğ­‹"] = "l", ["ğ­Œ"] = "m", ["ğ­"] = "n", ["ğ­"] = "s", ["ğ­"] = "Ê¿", ["ğ­"] = "p", ["ğ­‘"] = "c", ["ğ­’"] = "q", ["ğ­“"] = "r", ["ğ­”"] = "Å¡", ["ğ­•"] = "t"}

local numbers = {["ğ­˜"] = 1, ["ğ­™"] = 2, ["ğ­š"] = 3, ["ğ­›"] = 4, ["ğ­œ"] = 10, ["ğ­"] = 20, ["ğ­"] = 100, ["ğ­Ÿ"] = 1000}

function export.convert_numbers(numeric_str)
    local total = 0
    for c in mw.ustring.gmatch(numeric_str, ".") do total = total + numbers[c] end
    return total
end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- If the script is not Prti, do not transliterate
    if sc ~= "Prti" then return end

    if mw.ustring.match(text, "[ğ­˜-ğ­Ÿ]") then text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "[ğ­˜-ğ­Ÿ]+", export.convert_numbers) end

    -- Transliterate characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="50">
<source>wikt/translit/Rohg-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    -- consonants
    ["ğ´€"] = "",
    ["ğ´"] = "b",
    ["ğ´ƒ"] = "t",
    ["ğ´„"] = "th",
    ["ğ´…"] = "j",
    ["ğ´†"] = "ch",
    ["ğ´‡"] = "h",
    ["ğ´ˆ"] = "kh",
    ["ğ´‰"] = "f",
    ["ğ´‚"] = "p",
    ["ğ´Š"] = "d",
    ["ğ´‹"] = "dh",
    ["ğ´Œ"] = "r",
    ["ğ´"] = "Ã§",
    ["ğ´"] = "z",
    ["ğ´"] = "s",
    ["ğ´"] = "c",
    ["ğ´‘"] = "k",
    ["ğ´’"] = "g",
    ["ğ´“"] = "l",
    ["ğ´”"] = "m",
    ["ğ´•"] = "n",
    ["ğ´–"] = "w",
    ["ğ´—"] = "uÌ¯",
    ["ğ´˜"] = "y",
    ["ğ´™"] = "iÌ¯",
    ["ğ´š"] = "ng",
    ["ğ´›"] = "ny",
    ["ğ´œ"] = "v",

    -- vowels
    ["ğ´"] = "a",
    ["ğ´"] = "i",
    ["ğ´Ÿ"] = "u",
    ["ğ´ "] = "e",
    ["ğ´¡"] = "o",
    ["ğ´¢"] = "",

    -- numerals
    ["ğ´°"] = "0",
    ["ğ´±"] = "1",
    ["ğ´²"] = "2",
    ["ğ´³"] = "3",
    ["ğ´´"] = "4",
    ["ğ´µ"] = "5",
    ["ğ´¶"] = "6",
    ["ğ´·"] = "7",
    ["ğ´¸"] = "8",
    ["ğ´¹"] = "9"
};

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.)ğ´¤", "%1Ì")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.)ğ´¥", "%1Ì%1")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.)ğ´¦", "%1%1Ì")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.)ğ´§", "%1%1")
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="51">
<source>wikt/translit/Runr-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local letters = {}

local export = {}

local letters = {}

-- Elder futhark
letters["gmq-pro"] = {
    ["áš "] = "f",
    ["áš¢"] = "u",
    ["áš¦"] = "Ã¾",
    ["áš¨"] = "a",
    ["áš¼"] = "A", -- transitional period
    ["áš±"] = "r",
    ["áš²"] = "k",
    ["áš³"] = "k",
    ["áš´"] = "k", -- transitional period
    ["áš·"] = "g",
    ["áš¹"] = "w",
    ["ášº"] = "h",
    ["áš»"] = "h",
    ["áš¾"] = "n",
    ["á›"] = "i",
    ["á›ƒ"] = "j",
    ["á›‡"] = "Ã¯",
    ["á›ˆ"] = "p",
    ["á›‰"] = "z",
    ["á›¦"] = "z", -- transitional period
    ["á›Š"] = "s",
    ["á›‹"] = "s",
    ["á›"] = "t",
    ["á›’"] = "b",
    ["á›–"] = "e",
    ["á›—"] = "m",
    ["á›š"] = "l",
    ["á›œ"] = "Å‹",
    ["á›"] = "Å‹",
    ["á›Ÿ"] = "o",
    ["á›"] = "d"
}

-- Anglo-Saxon futhorc
letters["ang"] = {["áš "] = "f", ["áš¢"] = "u", ["áš¦"] = "Ã¾", ["áš©"] = "Ã³", ["áš±"] = "r", ["áš³"] = "c", ["áš·"] = "È", ["áš¸"] = "g", ["áš¹"] = "w", ["ášº"] = "h", ["áš»"] = "h", ["áš¾"] = "n", ["á›"] = "i", ["á›„"] = "j", ["á›‡"] = "eo", ["á›ˆ"] = "p", ["á›‰"] = "x", ["á›‹"] = "s", ["á›"] = "t", ["á›’"] = "b", ["á›–"] = "e", ["á›—"] = "m", ["á›š"] = "l", ["á›œ"] = "Å‹", ["á›"] = "Å‹", ["á›Ÿ"] = "Å“", ["á›"] = "d", ["ášª"] = "a", ["áš«"] = "Ã¦", ["áš£"] = "y", ["á›¡"] = "io", ["á› "] = "ea"}

-- Younger futhark
letters["non"] = {["áš "] = "f", ["áš¢"] = "u", ["áš¦"] = "Ã¾", ["áš¬"] = "Ä…", ["áš±"] = "r", ["áš´"] = "k", ["áš¼"] = "h", ["áš½"] = "h", ["áš¾"] = "n", ["áš¿"] = "n", ["á›"] = "i", ["á›…"] = "a", ["á›†"] = "a", ["á›‹"] = "s", ["á›Œ"] = "s", ["á›"] = "t", ["á›"] = "t", ["á›’"] = "b", ["á›“"] = "b", ["á›˜"] = "m", ["á›™"] = "m", ["á›š"] = "l", ["á›¦"] = "Ê€", ["á›§"] = "Ê€", ["á›‚"] = "e", ["áš®"] = "o"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    if letters[lang] then return (mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", letters[lang])) end

    return nil
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="52">
<source>wikt/translit/Samr-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local U = mw.ustring.char
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub

local cons_list = "Ê¾bgdhwbzá¸¥á¹­yklmnsÊ¿fpá¹£qrÅ¡t"
local cons = "[" .. cons_list .. "]"

local tt = {
    [1] = {
        -- occlusion
        [U(0x0805, 0x0818)] = "b",
        [U(0x0805, 0x0810)] = "p"
    },
    [2] = {
        -- consonants
        [U(0x0800)] = "Ê¾", -- ALAF
        [U(0x0801)] = "b", -- BIT
        [U(0x0802)] = "g", -- GAMAN
        [U(0x0803)] = "d", -- DALAT
        [U(0x0804)] = "h", -- IY
        [U(0x0805)] = "w", -- BAA
        [U(0x0806)] = "z", -- ZEN
        [U(0x0807)] = "á¸¥", -- IT
        [U(0x0808)] = "á¹­", -- TIT
        [U(0x0809)] = "y", -- YUT
        [U(0x080A)] = "k", -- KAAF
        [U(0x080B)] = "l", -- LABAT
        [U(0x080C)] = "m", -- MIM
        [U(0x080D)] = "n", -- NUN
        [U(0x080E)] = "s", -- SINGAAT
        [U(0x080F)] = "Ê¿", -- IN
        [U(0x0810)] = "f", -- FI
        [U(0x0811)] = "á¹£", -- TSAADIY
        [U(0x0812)] = "q", -- QUF
        [U(0x0813)] = "r", -- RISH
        [U(0x0814)] = "Å¡", -- SHAN
        [U(0x0815)] = "t", -- TAAF
        -- consonant modifier
        [U(0x0816)] = "Ê¿", -- IN
        [U(0x0817)] = "Ê¿", -- IN-ALAF
        [U(0x081A)] = "á»¹", -- MODIFIER EPENTHETIC YUT
        [U(0x081B)] = "á»¹", -- EPENTHETIC YUT
        -- vowel signs
        [U(0x081C)] = "Ãª", -- LONG E
        [U(0x081D)] = "e", -- E
        [U(0x081E)] = "Ã¥Ì‚Ë", -- OVERLONG AA
        [U(0x081F)] = "Ã¥Ì‚", -- LONG AA
        [U(0x0820)] = "Ã¥", -- AA
        [U(0x0821)] = "Ã¢Ë", -- OVERLONG A
        [U(0x0822)] = "Ã¢", -- LONG A
        [U(0x0823)] = "a", -- A
        [U(0x0824)] = "Äƒ", -- MODIFIER SHORT A
        [U(0x0825)] = "Äƒ", -- SHORT A
        [U(0x0826)] = "u", -- U
        [U(0x0827)] = "Ã»", -- LONG U
        [U(0x0828)] = "i", -- MODIFIER LETTER I
        [U(0x0829)] = "Ã®", -- LONG I
        [U(0x082A)] = "i", -- I
        [U(0x082B)] = "o", -- O
        [U(0x082C)] = "", -- SUKUN
        -- punctuation
        [U(0x0830)] = " " -- PUNCTUATION NEQUDAA
    },
    [3] = {
        -- consonant with dagesh
        ["(" .. cons .. ")" .. U(0x0819)] = "%1%1"
    }
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    for _, replacements in ipairs(tt) do for regex, replacement in pairs(replacements) do text = gsub(text, regex, replacement) end end

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="53">
<source>wikt/translit/Sarb-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local correspondences = {["ğ© "] = "h", ["ğ©¡"] = "l", ["ğ©¢"] = "á¸¥", ["ğ©£"] = "m", ["ğ©¤"] = "q", ["ğ©¥"] = "w", ["ğ©¦"] = "sÂ²", ["ğ©§"] = "r", ["ğ©¨"] = "b", ["ğ©©"] = "t", ["ğ©ª"] = "sÂ¹", ["ğ©«"] = "k", ["ğ©¬"] = "n", ["ğ©­"] = "á¸«", ["ğ©®"] = "á¹£", ["ğ©¯"] = "sÂ³", ["ğ©°"] = "f", ["ğ©±"] = "Ê¾", ["ğ©²"] = "Ê¿", ["ğ©³"] = "á¸", ["ğ©´"] = "g", ["ğ©µ"] = "d", ["ğ©¶"] = "Ä¡", ["ğ©·"] = "á¹­", ["ğ©¸"] = "z", ["ğ©¹"] = "á¸", ["ğ©º"] = "y", ["ğ©»"] = "á¹¯", ["ğ©¼"] = "áº“", ["ğ©½"] = " "}

local numbers = {["ğ©½"] = "1", ["ğ©­"] = "5", ["ğ©²"] = "10", ["ğ©¾"] = "50", ["ğ©£"] = "100", ["ğ©±"] = "1000"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- Interpret numbers.
    -- Will not work for thousands!
    text = text:gsub("ğ©¿(..-)ğ©¿", function(number)
        local value = 0
        for digit in mw.ustring.gmatch(number, ".") do value = value + numbers[digit] or error("The character " .. digit .. " in " .. number .. " does not have a numeric value.") end
        return value
    end)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", correspondences)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="54">
<source>wikt/translit/Shah-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- TODO: long Ã­ support
-- TODO: sort out short e vs palatalisation
-- TODO: add rule for Cáº¹C = CyaC
local u = mw.ustring.char
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub

local export = {}

local vav = u(0x0648)
local ye = u(0x06CC)
local alif = u(0x0627)
local he = "Ù‡"

local vw_s_cfu = u(0x0650) -- pesh (i)
local vw_s_ccu = u(0x0655) -- hamza below
local vw_s_cbr = u(0x064F) -- zer (u)
local vw_s_mcu = u(0x0654) -- hamza above
local vw_s_ocu = u(0x064E) -- zabar (a)

local vw_l_cbr = u(0x0657) -- inverted zer
local vw_l_cfu = u(0x0656) -- subscript alif

local hat = u(0x065A)
local inverted_hat = u(0x065B)
local hats = hat .. inverted_hat

local short_vowels_list = vw_s_cfu .. vw_s_ccu .. vw_s_cbr .. vw_s_mcu .. vw_s_ocu

-- carrier + diacritic combos
local long_u = vav .. vw_l_cbr
local short_o = vav .. inverted_hat
local long_i = ye .. vw_l_cfu
local short_e = ye .. inverted_hat

local vocalised_carrier = short_a .. long_a .. short_i .. long_i .. short_e .. long_e .. short_o .. short_u .. "Ø§" .. "Ø¢" .. " Ùâ—Œ" .. "ÛŒ" .. " Ùâ—Œ" .. "Û’" .. "Ùˆ"

local consonants = "Ø¨Ù¾ØªØ«Ø¬Ú†Ø­Ø®Ø¯Ø°Ø±Ø²Ú˜Ø³Ø´ØµØ¶Ø·Ø¸Ø¹ØºÙÙ‚Ú©Ú¯Ù„Ù…Ù†Ú»ÙˆÙ‡Ù‰Ú¾Ù¹ÚˆÚ‘Ú¾ØªÚ¾ÚˆÚ¾Ø¬Ú¾Ø¯Ú¾Ù¹Ú¾Ú©Ú¾Ú‘Ú¾"

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["Ø¨"] = "b",
    ["Ù¾"] = "p",
    ["Øª"] = "t",
    ["Ø«"] = "s",
    ["Ø¬"] = "j",
    ["Ú†"] = "ch",
    ["Ø­"] = "h",
    ["Ø®"] = "ká¸¥",
    ["Ø¯"] = "d",
    ["Ø°"] = "z",
    ["Ø±"] = "r",
    ["Ø²"] = "z",
    ["Ú˜"] = "z",
    ["Ø³"] = "s",
    ["Ø´"] = "sh",
    ["Øµ"] = "s",
    ["Ø¶"] = "z",
    ["Ø·"] = "t",
    ["Ø¸"] = "z",
    ["Ø¹"] = "a",
    ["Øº"] = "Ä¡",
    ["Ù"] = "f",
    ["Ù‚"] = "q",
    ["Ú©"] = "k",
    ["Ú¯"] = "g",
    ["Ù„"] = "l",
    ["Ù…"] = "m",
    ["Ù†"] = "n",
    ["Ú»"] = "á¹…",
    ["Ùˆ"] = "v",
    ["Ù‡"] = "h",
    ["Ù‰"] = "y",
    ["Ú¾"] = "h",
    ["Ù¹"] = "á¹­",
    ["Úˆ"] = "á¸",
    ["Ú‘"] = "á¹›",
    ["Ú¾"] = "bh",
    ["ØªÚ¾"] = "th",
    ["ÚˆÚ¾"] = "á¸h",
    ["Ø¬Ú¾"] = "jh",
    ["Ø¯Ú¾"] = "dh",
    ["Ù¹Ú¾"] = "á¹­h",
    ["Ú©Ú¾"] = "kh",
    ["Ú‘Ú¾"] = "á¹›h",
    ["ÙˆØ§"] = "wÄ",

    -- vowels
    [u(0x0627)] = "Ä", -- alif
    [" Ùâ—Œ"] = "i",
    ["ÛŒ"] = "Ä«",
    [" Ùâ—Œ"] = "u",
    ["Û’"] = "e",
    ["Û’"] = "Ä“",

    -- other diacritics
    ["Úº"] = "N", -- noon ghunna: nasalize
    ["Ø¡"] = "Ê”", -- hamza:glottal t
    [" Ù‘â—Œ"] = "Ë", -- shad: emphasise
    [u(0x0670)] = "Ä", -- khari zabar
    [u(0x064B)] = "N", -- do zabar
    [" Ùâ—Œ"] = "in", -- do zer

    -- digits
    ["Û°"] = "0",
    ["Û±"] = "1",
    ["Û²"] = "2",
    ["Û³"] = "3",
    ["Û´"] = "4",
    ["Ûµ"] = "5",
    ["Û¶"] = "6",
    ["Û·"] = "7",
    ["Û¸"] = "8",
    ["Û¹"] = "9"
}

local nasal_assim = {["[kg]h?"] = "á¹…", ["[cj]h?"] = "Ã±", ["[á¹­á¸]h?"] = "á¹‡", ["[td]h?"] = "n", ["[pb]h?"] = "m", ["n"] = "n", ["m"] = "m", ["s"] = "n"}

local short_vowels = {
    -- high vowels
    [u(0x0627)] = "Ä",
    [u(0x0650)] = "i",
    [u(0x0655)] = "á»¥",
    [u(0x064F)] = "u",
    [u(0x065F)] = "á»¥Ì„",
    [u(0x0648)] = "Å«",
    -- central vowels
    [u(0x0654)] = "áº¡",

    -- low vowels
    [u(0x064E)] = "a"

}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local waw = "Ùˆ"
    local ye = "ÛŒ"
    local noon = "[Ù‹Úº]?"
    local shadda = " Ù‘"

    text = text .. " "

    -- two consonants

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. consonants, "%1a%2") -- example à¨•à¨°

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants, "%1%2%3") -- example à¨¸à¨¼à©‡à¨°

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1a%2%3") -- example à¨¦à¨°à©€

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4") -- example à¨–à©€à¨°à¨¾ 

    -- shadda
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. shadda .. consonants, "%1a%2%3") -- example à¨°à©±à¨¬

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. shadda .. consonants, "%1%2%3%4") -- example à¨¸à¨¿à©±à¨– 

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. shadda .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1a%2%3%4") -- example à¨—à©±à¨¡à©€ 

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. shadda .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4%5") -- example à¨¤à¨¿à©±à¨–à¨¾ 

    -- noon
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. noon .. consonants, "%1a%2%3") -- example à¨¬à©°à¨¦

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. noon .. consonants, "%1%2%3%4") -- example à¨œà¨¿à©°à¨¦ 

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. noon .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1a%2%3%4") -- example à¨¬à©°à¨¦à©€

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. noon .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4%5") -- example à¨œà¨¼à¨¿à©°à¨¦à¨¾

    -- three consonants

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. consonants, "%1a%2a%3") -- example à¨•à¨¦à¨° 

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. consonants, "%1%2%3a%4") -- example à¨œà¨¿à¨¸à¨®

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants, "%1a%2%3%4") -- example à¨¤à¨¸à©€à¨°

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. consonants .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1a%2%3%4") -- example à¨¤à¨¸à¨¬à©€

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4%5") -- example à¨–à¨¼à¨¾à¨²à¨¸à¨¾ 

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4%5%6") -- example à¨–à¨¼à©à¨²à¨¾à¨¸à¨¾

    -- shadda

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. shadda .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4%5%6") -- example à¨¨à©±à¨ à¨£à¨¾

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. shadda .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4%5%6") -- example à¨¸à¨¿à©±à¨–à¨£à¨¾

    -- noon

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. noon .. consonants .. consonants, "%1a%2%3a%4") -- example à¨œà©°à¨—à¨²

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. noon .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1a%2%3%4") -- example à¨°à©°à¨—à¨²à¨¾

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. noon .. consonants .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4a%5%6") -- example à¨œà¨¼à¨¿à©°à¨¦à¨—à©€

    -- four consonants

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. consonants .. consonants .. consonants, "%1a%2%3a%4") -- example à¨¸à¨°à¨¬à¨¤

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. consonants .. consonants, "%1%2%3%4a%5") -- example à¨•à©à¨¦à¨°à¨¤

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. consonants, "%1a%2%3%4a%5") -- example à¨•à¨¬à©‚à¨¤à¨°

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. consonants .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants, "%1a%2%3%4%5") -- example 

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. consonants .. consonants .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1a%2%3%4%5") -- example 

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. consonants .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1a%2%3%4%5%6") -- example à¨¦à¨°à¨µà¨¾à¨œà¨¼à¨¾

    -- noon

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. "a" .. noon .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants, "%1a%2%3%4%5%6") -- example à¨§à©°à¨¨à¨µà¨¾à¨¦ 

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. noon .. consonants .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants, "%1a%2%3%4%5") -- example à¨«à¨¼à¨°à¨œà¨¼à©°à¨¦

    -- shadda

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. "a" .. shadda .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. consonants, "%1a%2%3%4a%5") -- example à¨¯à©±à¨•à¨¦à¨®

    -- five consonants

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants, "%1%2%3a%4%5%6%7") -- example à¨µà©‡à¨ªà¨°à¨µà¨¾à¨¹

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4a%5%6%7") -- example à¨ªà¨¾à¨°à¨¦à¨°à¨¸à¨¼à©€

    -- shadda

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. shadda .. consonants .. consonants .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants, "%1%2%3%4a%5%6%7%8") -- example à¨¸à¨¼à©à©±à¨•à¨°à¨µà¨¾à¨°

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. "a" .. shadda .. consonants, "%1a%2a%3%4a%5%6") -- example à¨®à¨—à¨°à¨®à©±à¨›

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4%5a%6a%7%8%9") -- example à¨¯à©‚à¨¨à©€à¨µà¨°à¨¸à¨Ÿà©€

    -- vocalised_carrier

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, vocalised_carrier .. consonants .. consonants, "%1%2a%3") -- example à¨…à¨¦à¨¬

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, vocalised_carrier .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4") -- example à¨†à¨–à¨£à¨¾

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, vocalised_carrier .. noon .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4%5") -- example à¨…à©°à¨¤à©œà©€

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, vocalised_carrier .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. consonants, "%1%2%3a%4") -- example à¨…à¨«à¨¼à¨¸à¨°

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, vocalised_carrier .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4%5%6") -- example à¨…à¨²à¨®à¨¾à¨°à©€

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, vocalised_carrier .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants, "%1%2%3%4%5") -- example à¨‡à¨•à¨°à¨¾à¨°

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, vocalised_carrier .. " Øµ" .. " Øª" .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1st%2%3") -- example à¨‰à¨¸à¨¤à¨°à¨¾

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. vocalised_carrier .. consonants .. consonants, "%1%2%3%4a%5") -- example à¨¸à¨¾à¨ˆà¨•à¨²

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, consonants .. short_vowel .. consonants .. short_vowel .. vocalised_carrier .. consonants .. "a" .. consonants .. short_vowel, "%1%2%3%4%5%6%7%8") -- example à¨µà¨¿à¨¦à¨¿à¨†à¨°à¨¥à©€

    for key, val in pairs(nasal_assim) do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "N(" .. key .. ")", val .. "%1") end
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aiueÄ“oÄÄ«Å«])N ", "%1Ìƒ ")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.?)N", "%1Ìƒ")

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ë(.)", "%1%1")

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, " ?à¥¤", ".")

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, " $", "")

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="55">
<source>wikt/translit/Shrd-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local consonants = {["ğ‘†‘"] = "k", ["ğ‘†’"] = "kh", ["ğ‘†“"] = "g", ["ğ‘†”"] = "gh", ["ğ‘†•"] = "á¹…", ["ğ‘†–"] = "c", ["ğ‘†—"] = "ch", ["ğ‘†˜"] = "j", ["ğ‘†™"] = "jh", ["ğ‘†š"] = "Ã±", ["ğ‘†›"] = "á¹­", ["ğ‘†œ"] = "á¹­h", ["ğ‘†"] = "á¸", ["ğ‘†"] = "á¸h", ["ğ‘†Ÿ"] = "á¹‡", ["ğ‘† "] = "t", ["ğ‘†¡"] = "th", ["ğ‘†¢"] = "d", ["ğ‘†£"] = "dh", ["ğ‘†¤"] = "n", ["ğ‘†¥"] = "p", ["ğ‘†¦"] = "ph", ["ğ‘†§"] = "b", ["ğ‘†¨"] = "bh", ["ğ‘†©"] = "m", ["ğ‘†ª"] = "y", ["ğ‘†«"] = "r", ["ğ‘†¬"] = "l", ["ğ‘†®"] = "v", ["ğ‘†­"] = "á¸·", ["ğ‘†¯"] = "Å›", ["ğ‘†°"] = "á¹£", ["ğ‘†±"] = "s", ["ğ‘†²"] = "h"}

local diacritics = {["ğ‘†³"] = "Ä", ["ğ‘†´"] = "i", ["ğ‘†µ"] = "Ä«", ["ğ‘†¶"] = "u", ["ğ‘†·"] = "Å«", ["ğ‘†¸"] = "á¹›", ["ğ‘†¹"] = "á¹", ["ğ‘†º"] = "á¸·", ["ğ‘†»"] = "á¸¹", ["ğ‘†»"] = "e", ["ğ‘†½"] = "ai", ["ğ‘†¾"] = "o", ["ğ‘†¿"] = "au", ["ğ‘‡€"] = ""}

local tt = {
    -- vowels
    ["ğ‘†ƒ"] = "a",
    ["ğ‘†„"] = "Ä",
    ["ğ‘†…"] = "i",
    ["ğ‘††"] = "Ä«",
    ["ğ‘†‡"] = "u",
    ["ğ‘†ˆ"] = "Å«",
    ["ğ‘†‰"] = "á¹›",
    ["ğ‘†Š"] = "á¹",
    ["ğ‘†‹"] = "á¸·",
    ["ğ‘†Œ"] = "á¸¹",
    ["ğ‘†"] = "e",
    ["ğ‘†"] = "ai",
    ["ğ‘†"] = "o",
    ["ğ‘†"] = "au",
    -- chandrabindu    
    ["ğ‘†€"] = "mÌ", -- until a better method is found
    -- anusvara    
    ["ğ‘†"] = "á¹ƒ", -- until a better method is found
    -- visarga    
    ["ğ‘†‚"] = "á¸¥",
    -- avagraha
    ["ğ‘‡"] = "â€™",
    -- numerals
    ["ğ‘‡"] = "0",
    ["ğ‘‡‘"] = "1",
    ["ğ‘‡’"] = "2",
    ["ğ‘‡“"] = "3",
    ["ğ‘‡”"] = "4",
    ["ğ‘‡•"] = "5",
    ["ğ‘‡–"] = "6",
    ["ğ‘‡—"] = "7",
    ["ğ‘‡˜"] = "8",
    ["ğ‘‡™"] = "9",
    -- punctuation        
    ["ğ‘‡†"] = ".", -- double danda
    ["ğ‘‡…"] = ".", -- danda
    -- Vedic extensions
    ["ğ‘‡‚"] = "x",
    ["ğ‘‡ƒ"] = "f",
    -- Om
    ["ğ‘‡„"] = "oá¹ƒ",
    -- reconstructed
    ["*"] = ""
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ğ‘†‘ğ‘†’ğ‘†“ğ‘†”ğ‘†•ğ‘†–ğ‘†—ğ‘†˜ğ‘†™ğ‘†šğ‘†›ğ‘†œğ‘†ğ‘†ğ‘†Ÿğ‘† ğ‘†¡ğ‘†¢ğ‘†£ğ‘†¤ğ‘†¥ğ‘†¦ğ‘†§ğ‘†¨ğ‘†©ğ‘†ªğ‘†«ğ‘†¬ğ‘†®ğ‘†­ğ‘†¯ğ‘†°ğ‘†±ğ‘†²])" .. "([ğ‘†³ğ‘†´ğ‘†µğ‘†¶ğ‘†·ğ‘†¸ğ‘†¹ğ‘†ºğ‘†»ğ‘†¼ğ‘†½ğ‘†¾ğ‘†¿ğ‘‡€]?)", function(c, d)
        if d == "" then
            return consonants[c] .. "a"
        else
            return consonants[c] .. diacritics[d]
        end
    end)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="56">
<source>wikt/translit/Sind-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local consonants = {
    ["ğ‘Šº"] = "k",
    ["ğ‘Š»"] = "kh",
    ["ğ‘Š¼"] = "g",
    ["ğ‘Š½"] = "gÌˆ",
    ["ğ‘Š¾"] = "gh",
    ["ğ‘Š¿"] = "á¹…",
    ["ğ‘‹€"] = "c",
    ["ğ‘‹"] = "ch",
    ["ğ‘‹‚"] = "j",
    ["ğ‘‹ƒ"] = "jÌˆ",
    ["ğ‘‹„"] = "jh",
    ["ğ‘‹…"] = "Ã±",
    ["ğ‘‹†"] = "á¹­",
    ["ğ‘‹‡"] = "á¹­h",
    ["ğ‘‹ˆ"] = "á¸",
    ["ğ‘‹‰"] = "dÌ¤",
    ["ğ‘‹Š"] = "á¹›",
    ["ğ‘‹‹"] = "á¸h",
    ["ğ‘‹Œ"] = "á¹‡",
    ["ğ‘‹"] = "t",
    ["ğ‘‹"] = "th",
    ["ğ‘‹"] = "d",
    ["ğ‘‹"] = "dh",
    ["ğ‘‹‘"] = "n",
    ["ğ‘‹’"] = "p",
    ["ğ‘‹“"] = "ph",
    ["ğ‘‹”"] = "b",
    ["ğ‘‹•"] = "bÌ¤",
    ["ğ‘‹–"] = "bh",
    ["ğ‘‹—"] = "m",
    ["ğ‘‹˜"] = "y",
    ["ğ‘‹™"] = "r",
    ["ğ‘‹š"] = "l",
    ["ğ‘‹›"] = "v",
    ["ğ‘‹œ"] = "Å›",
    ["ğ‘‹"] = "s",
    ["ğ‘‹"] = "h",

    -- consonants with nukta
    ["ğ‘Š»ğ‘‹©"] = "x",
    ["ğ‘Š¼ğ‘‹©"] = "Ä¡",
    ["ğ‘‹‚ğ‘‹©"] = "z",
    ["ğ‘‹“ğ‘‹©"] = "f"
}

local diacritics = {["ğ‘‹ "] = "Ä", ["ğ‘‹¡"] = "i", ["ğ‘‹¢"] = "Ä«", ["ğ‘‹£"] = "u", ["ğ‘‹¤"] = "Å«", ["ğ‘‹¥"] = "e", ["ğ‘‹¦"] = "ai", ["ğ‘‹§"] = "o", ["ğ‘‹¨"] = "au", ["ğ‘‹ª"] = ""}

local nonconsonants = {
    -- vowels
    ["ğ‘Š°"] = "a",
    ["ğ‘Š±"] = "Ä",
    ["ğ‘Š²"] = "i",
    ["ğ‘Š³"] = "Ä«",
    ["ğ‘Š´"] = "u",
    ["ğ‘Šµ"] = "Å«",
    ["ğ‘Š¶"] = "e",
    ["ğ‘Š·"] = "ai",
    ["ğ‘Š¸"] = "o",
    ["ğ‘Š¹"] = "au",
    -- other symbols
    ["ğ‘‹Ÿ"] = "á¹", -- anusvara
    ["ğ‘‹©"] = ".", -- nukta
    -- digits
    ["ğ‘‹°"] = "0",
    ["ğ‘‹±"] = "1",
    ["ğ‘‹²"] = "2",
    ["ğ‘‹³"] = "3",
    ["ğ‘‹´"] = "4",
    ["ğ‘‹µ"] = "5",
    ["ğ‘‹¶"] = "6",
    ["ğ‘‹·"] = "7",
    ["ğ‘‹¸"] = "8",
    ["ğ‘‹¹"] = "9"
}

local nasal_assim = {["[kg]h?"] = "á¹…", ["[cj]h?"] = "Ã±", ["[á¹­á¸]h?"] = "á¹‡", ["[td]h?"] = "n", ["[pb]h?"] = "m", ["n"] = "n", ["m"] = "m", ["s"] = "n"}

-- translit any words or phrases
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local nukta = "([ğ‘Š»ğ‘Š¼ğ‘‹‚ğ‘‹“]ğ‘‹©)"
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ğ‘Šºğ‘Š»ğ‘Š¼ğ‘Š½ğ‘Š¾ğ‘Š¿ğ‘‹€ğ‘‹ğ‘‹‚ğ‘‹ƒğ‘‹„ğ‘‹…ğ‘‹†ğ‘‹‡ğ‘‹ˆğ‘‹‰ğ‘‹Šğ‘‹‹ğ‘‹Œğ‘‹ğ‘‹ğ‘‹ğ‘‹ğ‘‹‘ğ‘‹’ğ‘‹“ğ‘‹”ğ‘‹•ğ‘‹–ğ‘‹—ğ‘‹˜ğ‘‹™ğ‘‹šğ‘‹›ğ‘‹œğ‘‹ğ‘‹][ğ‘‹©]?)" .. "([ğ‘‹ ğ‘‹¡ğ‘‹¢ğ‘‹£ğ‘‹¤ğ‘‹¥ğ‘‹¦ğ‘‹§ğ‘‹¨]?)", function(c, d)
        -- mw.log('match', c, d)
        c = consonants[c] or c
        if d == "" then
            return c .. "a"
        else
            return c .. (diacritics[d] or d)
        end
    end)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, nukta, consonants)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", nonconsonants)
    for key, val in pairs(nasal_assim) do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¹(" .. key .. ")", val .. "%1") end
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aiueÄ“oÄÄ«Å«])á¹ ", "%1Ìƒ ")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.?)á¹", "%1Ìƒ")
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="57">
<source>wikt/translit/Sogd-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["ğ¼°"] = "Ê¾", -- aleph
    ["ğ¼±"] = "Î²", -- beth
    ["ğ¼²"] = "É£", -- gimel
    ["ğ¼³"] = "h", -- he
    ["ğ¼´"] = "w", -- waw
    ["ğ¼µ"] = "z", -- zayin
    ["ğ¼¶"] = "x", -- heth
    ["ğ¼·"] = "y", -- yodh
    ["ğ¼¸"] = "k", -- kaph
    ["ğ¼¹"] = "Î´", -- lamedh
    ["ğ¼º"] = "m", -- mem
    ["ğ¼»"] = "n", -- nun
    ["ğ¼¼"] = "s", -- samekh
    ["ğ¼½"] = "Ê¿", -- ayin
    ["ğ¼¾"] = "p", -- pe
    ["ğ¼¿"] = "c", -- sadhe
    ["ğ½€"] = "r", -- resh-ayin
    ["ğ½"] = "Å¡", -- shin
    ["ğ½‚"] = "t", -- taw
    ["ğ½ƒ"] = "f", -- fesh
    ["ğ½„"] = "l", -- lesh
    ["ğ½…"] = "Å¡", -- phonogram shin
    ["ğ½†"] = "", -- dot above
    ["ğ½‡"] = "", -- dot above
    ["ğ½ˆ"] = "", -- two dots above
    ["ğ½‰"] = "", -- two dots below
    ["ğ½Š"] = "", -- curve above
    ["ğ½‹"] = "", -- curve below
    ["ğ½Œ"] = "", -- hook above
    ["ğ½"] = "", -- hook below
    ["ğ½"] = "", -- long hook below
    ["ğ½"] = "", -- resh below
    ["ğ½"] = "", -- stroke below
    ["ğ½‘"] = "1", -- one
    ["ğ½’"] = "10", -- ten
    ["ğ½“"] = "20", -- twenty
    ["ğ½”"] = "100" -- one hundred
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- If the script is not Sogd, do not transliterate
    if sc ~= "Sogd" then return end

    -- Transliterate characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="58">
<source>wikt/translit/Sogo-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["ğ¼€"] = "Ê¾", -- aleph
    ["ğ¼"] = "Ê¾", -- final aleph
    ["ğ¼‚"] = "Î²", -- beth
    ["ğ¼ƒ"] = "Î²", -- final beth
    ["ğ¼„"] = "É£", -- gimel
    ["ğ¼…"] = "h", -- he
    ["ğ¼†"] = "h", -- final he
    ["ğ¼‡"] = "w", -- waw
    ["ğ¼ˆ"] = "z", -- zayin
    ["ğ¼‰"] = "x", -- heth
    ["ğ¼Š"] = "y", -- yodh
    ["ğ¼‹"] = "k", -- kaph
    ["ğ¼Œ"] = "Î´", -- lamedh
    ["ğ¼"] = "m", -- mem
    ["ğ¼"] = "n", -- nun
    ["ğ¼"] = "n", -- final nun
    ["ğ¼"] = "n", -- final nun with vertical tail
    ["ğ¼‘"] = "s", -- samekh
    ["ğ¼’"] = "Ê¿", -- ayin
    ["ğ¼“"] = "Ê¿D", -- alternative ayin
    ["ğ¼”"] = "p", -- pe
    ["ğ¼•"] = "c", -- sadhe
    ["ğ¼–"] = "c", -- final sadhe
    ["ğ¼—"] = "c", -- final sadhe with vertical tail
    ["ğ¼˜"] = "r", -- resh-ayin-deleth
    ["ğ¼™"] = "Å¡", -- shin
    ["ğ¼š"] = "t", -- taw
    ["ğ¼›"] = "t", -- final taw
    ["ğ¼œ"] = "t" -- final taw with vertical tail
}, {
    ["ğ¼"] = "1", -- one
    ["ğ¼"] = "2", -- two
    ["ğ¼Ÿ"] = "3", -- three
    ["ğ¼ "] = "4", -- four
    ["ğ¼¡"] = "5", -- five
    ["ğ¼¢"] = "10", -- ten
    ["ğ¼£"] = "20", -- twenty
    ["ğ¼¤"] = "30", -- thirty
    ["ğ¼¥"] = "100", -- one hundred
    ["ğ¼¦"] = "Â½" -- one half
}, {
    ["ğ¼§"] = "r" -- ayin-daleth ligature
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- If the script is not Sogd, do not transliterate
    if sc ~= "Sogo" then return end

    -- Transliterate characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="59">
<source>wikt/translit/Tale-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local u = mw.ustring.char
-- pattern ([á¥-á¥¢])([á¥£-á¥¬]?)([á¥á¥’á¥–á¥™á¥›á¥á¥¢á¥­]?)([á¥°-á¥´{dia-tones}]?)

local tt = {
    -- consonants
    ["á¥"] = "k",
    ["á¥‘"] = "x",
    ["á¥’"] = "ng",
    ["á¥“"] = "ts",
    ["á¥”"] = "s",
    ["á¥•"] = "y",
    ["á¥–"] = "t",
    ["á¥—"] = "th",
    ["á¥˜"] = "l",
    ["á¥™"] = "p",
    ["á¥š"] = "ph",
    ["á¥›"] = "m",
    ["á¥œ"] = "f",
    ["á¥"] = "w",
    ["á¥"] = "h",
    ["á¥Ÿ"] = "Ê¼",
    ["á¥ "] = "kh",
    ["á¥¡"] = "tsh",
    ["á¥¢"] = "n",
    -- vowels
    ["á¥£"] = "aa",
    ["á¥¤"] = "i",
    ["á¥¥"] = "e",
    ["á¥¦"] = "ae",
    ["á¥§"] = "u",
    ["á¥¨"] = "o",
    ["á¥©"] = "oa",
    ["á¥ª"] = "ue",
    ["á¥«"] = "oe",
    ["á¥¬"] = "aue",
    ["á¥­"] = "y"
}

local tone_table = {
    -- different ordering from Unicode: http://www.seasite.niu.edu/tai/TaiDehong/index.htm
    -- also supports old orthography
    ["á¥°"] = u(0x0308),
    [u(0x0308)] = u(0x0308),
    [u(0x00A8)] = u(0x0308), -- 2 Ã¤
    ["á¥±"] = u(0x030C),
    [u(0x030C)] = u(0x030C),
    [u(0x02C7)] = u(0x030C), -- 3 Ç
    ["á¥²"] = u(0x0300),
    [u(0x0300)] = u(0x0300),
    [u(0x0060)] = u(0x0300),
    [u(0x02CB)] = u(0x0300), -- 4 Ã 
    ["á¥³"] = u(0x0307),
    [u(0x0307)] = u(0x0307),
    [u(0x02D9)] = u(0x0307), -- 5 È§
    ["á¥´"] = u(0x0301),
    [u(0x0301)] = u(0x0301),
    [u(0x00B4)] = u(0x0301),
    [u(0x02CA)] = u(0x0301), -- 1 Ã¡
    [""] = "" -- 6 a
}

local tone_key = "([á¥°-á¥´" .. u(0x0308) .. u(0x00A8) .. u(0x030C) .. u(0x02C7) .. u(0x0300) .. u(0x0060) .. u(0x02CB) .. u(0x0307) .. u(0x02D9) .. u(0x0301) .. u(0x00B4) .. u(0x02CA) .. "]?)"

function export.tr(text, lang, sc, debug_mode)

    if type(text) == "table" then -- called directly from a template
        text = text.args[1]
    end

    text = gsub(text, "([á¥-á¥¢])([á¥á¥’á¥–á¥™á¥›á¥á¥¢á¥­])", "%1a%2")
    text = gsub(text, ".", tt)

    -- adds tone diacritic
    for old in mw.text.gsplit(text, " ") do
        new = gsub(old, "([aeiou])([a-z]*)" .. tone_key, function(v, x, t) return v .. tone_table[t] .. x end)
        text = gsub(text, old, new, 1)
    end

    return text

end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="60">
<source>wikt/translit/Talu-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub

local tt = {
    -- consonants
    ["á¦€"] = "Ë™Ê¼",
    ["á¦"] = "Ê¼",
    ["á¦‚"] = "k\204\135",
    ["á¦ƒ"] = "x\204\135",
    ["á¦„"] = "n\204\135g",
    ["á¦…"] = "k",
    ["á¦†"] = "x",
    ["á¦‡"] = "ng",
    ["á¦ˆ"] = "t\204\135s",
    ["á¦‰"] = "s\204\135",
    ["á¦Š"] = "y\204\135",
    ["á¦‹"] = "ts",
    ["á¦Œ"] = "s",
    ["á¦"] = "y",
    ["á¦"] = "t\204\135",
    ["á¦"] = "t\204\135h",
    ["á¦"] = "n\204\135",
    ["á¦‘"] = "t",
    ["á¦’"] = "th",
    ["á¦“"] = "n",
    ["á¦”"] = "p\204\135",
    ["á¦•"] = "p\204\135h",
    ["á¦–"] = "m\204\135",
    ["á¦—"] = "p",
    ["á¦˜"] = "ph",
    ["á¦™"] = "m",
    ["á¦š"] = "f\204\135",
    ["á¦›"] = "v\204\135",
    ["á¦œ"] = "l\204\135",
    ["á¦"] = "f",
    ["á¦"] = "v",
    ["á¦Ÿ"] = "l",
    ["á¦ "] = "h\204\135",
    ["á¦¡"] = "d\204\135",
    ["á¦¢"] = "b\204\135",
    ["á¦£"] = "h",
    ["á¦¤"] = "d",
    ["á¦¥"] = "b",
    ["á¦¦"] = "k\204\135w",
    ["á¦§"] = "x\204\135w",
    ["á¦¨"] = "kw",
    ["á¦©"] = "xw",
    ["á¦ª"] = "s\204\135w",
    ["á¦«"] = "sw",
    -- vowels and finals (visual ordering by Unicode 8)
    ["á¦°"] = "!",
    ["á¦±"] = "aa",
    ["á¦²"] = "ii",
    ["á¦³"] = "u",
    ["á¦´"] = "uu",
    ["á¦¸"] = "oa",
    ["á¦¹"] = "ue",
    ["á¦µ"] = "e",
    ["á¦¶"] = "ae",
    ["á¦·"] = "o",
    ["á¦º"] = "ay", -- this line to be swapped
    ["á¦»"] = "aay",
    ["á¦¼"] = "uy",
    ["á¦½"] = "oy",
    ["á¦¾"] = "oay",
    ["á¦¿"] = "uey",
    ["á§€"] = "iiy",
    ["á§"] = "w",
    ["á§‚"] = "ng",
    ["á§ƒ"] = "n",
    ["á§„"] = "m",
    ["á§…"] = "k",
    ["á§†"] = "d",
    ["á§‡"] = "b",
    -- tones
    ["á§ˆ"] = "<sup>1</sup>",
    ["á§‰"] = "<sup>2</sup>",
    -- numerals
    ["á§"] = "0",
    ["á§‘"] = "1",
    ["á§’"] = "2",
    ["á§“"] = "3",
    ["á§”"] = "4",
    ["á§•"] = "5",
    ["á§–"] = "6",
    ["á§—"] = "7",
    ["á§˜"] = "8",
    ["á§™"] = "9",
    ["á§š"] = "1",
    -- ligatures á§ á§Ÿ sorted after á¦¶á¦œ
    ["á§"] = "l\204\135ae",
    ["á§Ÿ"] = "l\204\135aew"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc, debug_mode)

    if type(text) == "table" then -- called directly from a template
        text = text.args[1]
    end

    text = gsub(text, "([á¦µá¦¶á¦·á¦º])([á¦€-á¦«])", "%2%1") -- swapped
    text = gsub(text, "([á¦€-á¦«])([á§-á§‡])", "%1a%2")

    text = gsub(text, ".", tt)

    text = gsub(text, "aa!", "a")
    text = gsub(text, "ii!", "i")
    text = gsub(text, "uu!", "u")
    text = gsub(text, "eii", "oe")

    return text

end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub

local tt = {
    -- consonants
    ["êª€"] = "k",
    ["êª"] = "á¸µ",
    ["êª‚"] = "kÌ„h",
    ["êªƒ"] = "kh",
    ["êª„"] = "á¸³Ì„h",
    ["êª…"] = "kÊ¹h",
    ["êª†"] = "?",
    ["êª‡"] = "?",
    ["êªˆ"] = "hÌ„ng",
    ["êª‰"] = "ng",
    ["êªŠ"] = "c",
    ["êª‹"] = "cÌ±",
    ["êªŒ"] = "cÌ„h",
    ["êª"] = "ch",
    ["êª"] = "sÌ„",
    ["êª"] = "s",
    ["êª"] = "hÌ„á»µ",
    ["êª‘"] = "á»µ",
    ["êª’"] = "d",
    ["êª“"] = "á¸",
    ["êª”"] = "t",
    ["êª•"] = "á¹¯",
    ["êª–"] = "tÌ„h",
    ["êª—"] = "th",
    ["êª˜"] = "hÌ„n",
    ["êª™"] = "n",
    ["êªš"] = "b",
    ["êª›"] = "á¸‡",
    ["êªœ"] = "p",
    ["êª"] = "pÌ±",
    ["êª"] = "pÌ„h",
    ["êªŸ"] = "ph",
    ["êª "] = "fÌ„",
    ["êª¡"] = "f",
    ["êª¢"] = "hÌ„m",
    ["êª£"] = "m",
    ["êª¤"] = "hÌ„y",
    ["êª¥"] = "y",
    ["êª¦"] = "hÌ„r",
    ["êª§"] = "r",
    ["êª¨"] = "hÌ„l",
    ["êª©"] = "l",
    ["êªª"] = "hÌ„w",
    ["êª«"] = "w",
    ["êª¬"] = "hÌ„",
    ["êª­"] = "á¸¥",
    ["êª®"] = "x",
    ["êª¯"] = "xÌ±",
    -- vowels and finals (visual ordering)
    ["êª°"] = "'",
    ["êª±"] = "Ä",
    ["êª²"] = "l",
    ["êª³"] = "á»¥",
    ["êª´"] = "à¸¸",
    ["êªµ"] = "Ã¦",
    ["êª¶"] = "o",
    ["êª·"] = "'",
    ["êª¸"] = "y",
    ["êª¹"] = "e",
    ["êªº"] = "à¸±w",
    ["êª»"] = "i",
    ["êª¼"] = "á»‹",
    ["êª½"] = "à¸±n",
    ["êª¾"] = "áº£",
    -- tones
    ["êª¿"] = "'",
    ["ê«€"] = "<sup>1</sup>",
    ["ê«"] = "'",
    ["ê«‚"] = "<sup>2</sup>",
    -- symbols
    ["ê«›"] = "koÌ±n",
    ["ê«œ"] = "ná»¥Ì€ng",
    ["ê«"] = "Â«",
    ["ê«"] = "Â§",
    ["ê«Ÿ"] = "Â»"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc, debug_mode)

    if type(text) == "table" then -- called directly from a template
        text = text.args[1]
    end

    text = gsub(text, ".", tt)

    text = gsub(text, "([à¹ˆà¹‰à¹‹Ì±])([à¸±à¸´à¸µà¸¶à¸·à¸¸à¸¹])", "%2%1")
    text = gsub(text, "([^%s%p%z])báº£", "%1à¸±b")
    text = gsub(text, "(áº£)([à¹ˆà¹‰à¹‹Ì±])", "%2%1")

    return text

end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

local export = {}

local tt = {}

tt["Tfng"] = {
    ["common"] = {
        ["â´°"] = "a",
        ["â´±"] = "b",
        ["â´²"] = "b",
        ["â´³"] = "g",

        ["â´¶"] = "Ç§",
        ["â´·"] = "d",
        ["â´¸"] = "d",
        ["â´¹"] = "á¸",

        ["â´¼"] = "f",
        ["â´½"] = "k",

        ["â´¿"] = "k",

        ["âµ"] = "ny",
        ["âµ‘"] = "ng",
        ["âµ’"] = "p",
        ["âµ“"] = "u", -- tmh, thv, taq, ttq, thz: "w"
        ["âµ”"] = "r",
        ["âµ•"] = "á¹›",
        ["âµ–"] = "É£",
        ["âµ—"] = "É£",
        ["âµ˜"] = "j", -- thz: "É£"
        ["âµ™"] = "s",
        ["âµš"] = "á¹£",
        ["âµ›"] = "Å¡",
        ["âµœ"] = "t",
        ["âµ"] = "t",
        ["âµ"] = "Ä",
        ["âµŸ"] = "á¹­",
        ["âµ "] = "v",
        ["âµ¡"] = "w",
        ["âµ¢"] = "y",
        ["âµ£"] = "z",
        ["âµ¤"] = "z",
        ["âµ¥"] = "áº“",
        ["âµ¦"] = "e",
        ["âµ§"] = "o",
        ["âµ¯"] = "Ê·",
        ["âµ°"] = ".",
        ["âµ¿"] = ""
    },
    ["tmh"] = {["âµ€"] = "b", ["âµ“"] = "w"},
    ["thv"] = {["âµ€"] = "b", ["âµ“"] = "w"},
    ["taq"] = {["âµ€"] = "b", ["âµ“"] = "w"},
    ["ttq"] = {["âµ€"] = "b", ["âµ“"] = "w"},
    ["thz"] = {["âµ€"] = "b", ["âµ“"] = "w", ["âµ˜"] = "É£"}
}

tt["Latn"] = {["common"] = {["a"] = "â´°", ["Ä"] = "â´°", ["b"] = "â´±", ["g"] = "â´³", ["d"] = "â´·", ["á¸"] = "â´·", ["á¸"] = "â´¹", ["e"] = "â´»", ["f"] = "â´¼", ["Ç§"] = "â´µ", ["k"] = "â´½", ["h"] = "âµ€", ["á¸¥"] = "âµƒ", ["É›"] = "âµ„", ["x"] = "âµ…", ["q"] = "âµ‡", ["i"] = "âµ‰", ["j"] = "âµŠ", ["l"] = "âµ", ["m"] = "âµ", ["n"] = "âµ", ["p"] = "âµ’", ["u"] = "âµ“", ["r"] = "âµ”", ["á¹›"] = "âµ•", ["É£"] = "âµ–", ["s"] = "âµ™", ["á¹£"] = "âµš", ["Å¡"] = "âµ›", ["t"] = "âµœ", ["á¹¯"] = "âµœ", ["Ä"] = "âµ", ["á¹­"] = "âµŸ", ["v"] = "âµ ", ["w"] = "âµ¡", ["y"] = "âµ¢", ["z"] = "âµ£", ["áº“"] = "âµ¥", ["o"] = "âµ§", ["Ê·"] = "âµ¯", ["."] = "âµ°"}, ["tmh"] = {["b"] = "âµ€", ["w"] = "âµ“"}, ["thv"] = {["b"] = "âµ€", ["w"] = "âµ“"}, ["taq"] = {["b"] = "âµ€", ["w"] = "âµ“"}, ["ttq"] = {["b"] = "âµ€", ["w"] = "âµ“"}, ["thz"] = {["b"] = "âµ€", ["w"] = "wâµ“", ["É£"] = "âµ˜"}}

function export.tr_alt(text, lang, sc)
    if not sc then sc = require("scripts").findBestScript(text, require("languages").getByCode(lang or "ber")):getCode() end

    if sc == "Latn" then
        if tt[sc][lang] then text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt[sc][lang]) end
        text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt[sc]["common"])
    elseif sc == "Arab" then
        text = nil
    elseif sc == "Tfng" then
        text = nil
    end

    return text
end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    if not sc then sc = require("scripts").findBestScript(text, require("languages").getByCode(lang or "ber")):getCode() end

    if sc == "Arab" then
        -- perhaps will be implemented in the future
        text = nil
    elseif sc == "Latn" then
        -- no need to transliterate
        text = nil
    elseif sc == "Tfng" then
        if tt[sc][lang] then text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt[sc][lang]) end
        text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt[sc]["common"])
    end

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="64">
<source>wikt/translit/Tirh-Deva-translit.lua</source>

local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {

    -- consonants
    ["ğ‘’"] = "à¤•",
    ["ğ‘’"] = "à¤–",
    ["ğ‘’‘"] = "à¤—",
    ["ğ‘’’"] = "à¤˜",
    ["ğ‘’“"] = "à¤™",
    ["ğ‘’”"] = "à¤š",

    ["ğ‘’–"] = "à¤œ",
    ["ğ‘’—"] = "à¤",
    ["ğ‘’˜"] = "à¤",
    ["ğ‘’™"] = "à¤Ÿ",

    ["ğ‘’›"] = "à¤¡",
    ["ğ‘’œ"] = "à¤¢",
    ["ğ‘’"] = "à¤£",
    ["ğ‘’"] = "à¤¤",
    ["ğ‘’Ÿ"] = "à¤¥",
    ["ğ‘’ "] = "à¤¦",

    ["ğ‘’¯"] = "à¤¹",

    ["ğ‘’¹"] = "à¥‡",
    ["ğ‘’º"] = "à¥†",
    ["ğ‘’¼"] = "à¥‹",
    ["ğ‘’½"] = "à¥Š",
    ["ğ‘’°"] = "à¤¾",
    ["ğ‘’²"] = "à¥€",
    ["ğ‘’´"] = "à¥‚",
    ["ğ‘’µ"] = "à¥ƒ",

    ["ğ‘’‚"] = "à¤†",
    ["ğ‘’ƒ"] = "à¤‡",

    ["ğ‘’…"] = "à¤‰",
    ["ğ‘’†"] = "à¤Š",
    ["ğ‘’‡"] = "à¤‹",
    ["ğ‘’ˆ"] = "à¥ ",
    ["ğ‘’‰"] = "à¤Œ",
    ["ğ‘’Š"] = "à¥¡",
    ["ğ‘’‹"] = "à¤",
    ["ğ‘’Œ"] = "à¤",
    ["ğ‘’"] = "à¤“",
    ["ğ‘’"] = "à¤”",

    ["à¤"] = "à¤",
    ["à¤’"] = "à¤’",
    ["à¤µà¤¼"] = "à¤µà¤¼",
    ["à¤¯à¤¼"] = "à¤¯à¤¼",
    ["à¥µ"] = "à¥µ",
    ["à¥´"] = "à¥´",
    ["à¤"] = "à¤",
    ["à¤‡à¤º"] = "à¤‡à¤º",
    ["à¤‰à¤º"] = "à¤‰à¤º",
    ["à¥¨"] = "â€™",
    ["à¤½"] = "à¤½",
    -- chandrabindu 
    ["ğ‘’¿"] = "à¤",
    -- anusvara
    ["ğ‘“€"] = "à¤‚",
    -- gvang
    ["ğ‘“…"] = "à¤",
    -- visarga
    ["ğ‘“"] = "à¤ƒ",
    -- virama
    ["ğ‘“‚"] = "à¥",
    -- om
    ["ğ‘“‡"] = "à¥",
    -- numerals
    ["ğ‘“"] = "à¥¦",
    ["ğ‘“‘"] = "à¥§",
    ["ğ‘“’"] = "à¥¨",
    ["ğ‘““"] = "à¥©",
    ["ğ‘“”"] = "à¥ª",
    ["ğ‘“•"] = "à¥«",
    ["ğ‘“–"] = "à¥¬",
    ["ğ‘“—"] = "à¥­",
    ["ğ‘“˜"] = "à¥®",
    ["ğ‘“™"] = "à¥¯",
    -- punctuation
    ["à¥¤"] = "à¥¤", -- danda
    ["à¥¥"] = "à¥¥", -- double danda
    ["+"] = "+", -- compound separator
    -- abbreviation sign
    ["à¥°"] = "à¥°"
}
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", function(c) return conv[c] end)
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
