local triQuadrigraphs = {["ĞºÑ…ÑŠÑƒ"] = "qÂ°", ["ĞšÑ…ÑŠÑƒ"] = "QÂ°", ["Ğ³ÑŠÑƒ"] = "Ä¡Â°", ["Ğ´Ğ·Ñƒ"] = "Ê’Â°", ["Ğ¶ÑŠÑƒ"] = "áº‘Â°", ["ĞšÑ…ÑŠ"] = "Q", ["ĞºÑ…ÑŠ"] = "q", ["ĞºÑŠÑƒ"] = "qÂ°", ["ĞºÓÑƒ"] = "á¸³Â°", ["Ğ¿ÓÑƒ"] = "á¹—Â°", ["Ñ‚ÓÑƒ"] = "á¹­Â°", ["Ñ…ÑŠÑƒ"] = "Ï‡Â°", ["ÑˆÑŠÑƒ"] = "ÅÂ°", ["ÑˆÓÑƒ"] = "á¹£Ì‚Â°", ["Ğ³Ñƒ"] = "gÂ°", ["Ğ“ÑŠÑƒ"] = "Ä Â°", ["Ğ”Ğ·Ñƒ"] = "Æ·Â°", ["Ğ–ÑŠÑƒ"] = "áºÂ°", ["ĞšÑŠÑƒ"] = "QÂ°", ["ĞšÓÑƒ"] = "á¸²Â°", ["ĞŸÓÑƒ"] = "á¹–Â°", ["Ğ¢ÓÑƒ"] = "á¹¬Â°", ["Ğ¥ÑŠÑƒ"] = "Î§Â°", ["Ğ¨ÑŠÑƒ"] = "ÅœÂ°", ["Ğ¨ÓÑƒ"] = "á¹¢Ì‚Â°"}

local digraphs = {["Ğ³ÑŒ"] = "É¡â€™", ["Ğ³ÑŠ"] = "Ä¡", ["Ğ´Ğ¶"] = "Ç¯Ì", ["Ğ´Ğ·"] = "Ê’", ["Ğ¶ÑŠ"] = "áº‘", ["Ğ¶ÑŒ"] = "Å¾Ì", ["ĞºÑƒ"] = "kÂ°", ["ĞºÑŠ"] = "q", ["ĞºÓ"] = "ÄÌ£Ì", ["Ğ»ÑŠ"] = "Å‚", ["Ğ»Ó"] = "á¸·", ["Ğ¿Ó"] = "á¹—", ["ÑÓ"] = "á¹£Ì£", ["Ñ‚Ó"] = "á¹­", ["Ñ„Ó"] = "fÌ£", ["Ñ…Ñƒ"] = "xÂ°", ["Ñ…ÑŠ"] = "Ï‡", ["Ñ…ÑŒ"] = "á¸¥", ["Ñ†Ñƒ"] = "cÂ°", ["Ñ†Ó"] = "cÌ£", ["Ñ‡Ó"] = "ÄÌ£", ["Ñ‡Ñƒ"] = "ÄÌÂ°", ["Ñ‡ÑŠ"] = "Ä", ["ÑˆÑŠ"] = "Å", ["ÑˆÓ"] = "á¹£Ì‚", ["ÓÑƒ"] = "Ê¾Â°", ["ÓÑŒ"] = "ÕšÌ", ["Ğ“Ñƒ"] = "GÂ°", ["Ğ“ÑŒ"] = "É¡â€™", ["Ğ“ÑŠ"] = "Ä ", ["Ğ”Ğ¶"] = "Ç®Ì", ["Ğ”Ğ·"] = "Æ·", ["Ğ–ÑŠ"] = "áº", ["Ğ–ÑŒ"] = "Å½Ì", ["ĞšÑƒ"] = "KÂ°", ["ĞšÑŠ"] = "Q", ["ĞšÓ"] = "ÄŒÌ£Ì", ["Ğ›ÑŠ"] = "Å", ["Ğ›Ó"] = "á¸¶", ["ĞŸÓ"] = "á¹–", ["Ğ¡Ó"] = "á¹¢Ì£", ["Ğ¢Ó"] = "á¹¬", ["Ğ¤Ó"] = "FÌ£", ["Ğ¥Ñƒ"] = "XÂ°", ["Ğ¥ÑŠ"] = "Î§", ["Ğ¥ÑŒ"] = "á¸¤", ["Ğ¦Ñƒ"] = "CÂ°", ["Ğ¦Ó"] = "CÌ£", ["Ğ§Ó"] = "ÄŒÌ£", ["Ğ§Ñƒ"] = "ÄŒÌÂ°", ["Ğ§ÑŠ"] = "ÄŒ", ["Ğ¨ÑŠ"] = "Åœ", ["Ğ¨Ó"] = "á¹¢Ì‚"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local str_gsub = string.gsub
    local UTF8char = "[%z\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*"

    -- Convert capital to lowercase palochka. Lowercase is found in tables
    -- above.
    text = str_gsub(text, mw.ustring.char(0x4C0), mw.ustring.char(0x4CF))

    for comb, repl in pairs(triQuadrigraphs) do text = str_gsub(text, comb, repl) end
    for comb, repl in pairs(digraphs) do text = str_gsub(text, comb, repl) end

    return (str_gsub(text, UTF8char, tt))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="73">
<source>wikt/translit/ain-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gmatch = mw.ustring.gmatch
local find = mw.ustring.find
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub

local corresp = {
    -- main
    ["ã‚¢"] = "Â¤a",
    ["ã‚¤"] = "Â¤i",
    ["ã‚¦"] = "Â¤u",
    ["ã‚¨"] = "Â¤e",
    ["ã‚ª"] = "Â¤o",
    ["ã‚«"] = "ka",
    ["ã‚­"] = "ki",
    ["ã‚¯"] = "ku",
    ["ã‚±"] = "ke",
    ["ã‚³"] = "ko",
    ["ã‚·ãƒ£"] = "sa",
    ["ã‚·"] = "si",
    ["ã‚·ãƒ¥"] = "su",
    ["ã‚·ã‚§"] = "se",
    ["ã‚·ãƒ§"] = "so",
    ["ã‚¿"] = "ta",
    ["ãƒ"] = "ci",
    ["ãƒˆã‚š"] = "tu",
    ["ãƒ†"] = "te",
    ["ãƒˆ"] = "to",
    ["ãƒãƒ£"] = "ca",
    ["ãƒ„"] = "cu",
    ["ã‚»ã‚š"] = "ce",
    ["ãƒãƒ§"] = "co",
    ["ãƒŠ"] = "na",
    ["ãƒ‹"] = "ni",
    ["ãƒŒ"] = "nu",
    ["ãƒ"] = "ne",
    ["ãƒ"] = "no",
    ["ãƒ"] = "ha",
    ["ãƒ’"] = "hi",
    ["ãƒ•"] = "hu",
    ["ãƒ˜"] = "he",
    ["ãƒ›"] = "ho",
    ["ãƒ"] = "ba",
    ["ãƒ“"] = "bi",
    ["ãƒ–"] = "bu",
    ["ãƒ™"] = "be",
    ["ãƒœ"] = "bo",
    ["ãƒ‘"] = "pa",
    ["ãƒ”"] = "pi",
    ["ãƒ—"] = "pu",
    ["ãƒš"] = "pe",
    ["ãƒ"] = "po",
    ["ãƒ"] = "ma",
    ["ãƒŸ"] = "mi",
    ["ãƒ "] = "mu",
    ["ãƒ¡"] = "me",
    ["ãƒ¢"] = "mo",
    ["ãƒ¤"] = "ya",
    ["ãƒ¦"] = "yu",
    ["ã‚¤ã‚§"] = "ye",
    ["ãƒ¨"] = "yo",
    ["ãƒ©"] = "ra",
    ["ãƒª"] = "ri",
    ["ãƒ«"] = "ru",
    ["ãƒ¬"] = "re",
    ["ãƒ­"] = "ro",
    ["ãƒ¯"] = "wa",
    ["ã‚¦ã‚£"] = "wi",
    ["ã‚¦ã‚§"] = "we",
    ["ã‚¦ã‚©"] = "wo",

    -- finals
    ["ã‡µ"] = "hÂ¤",
    ["ã‡¶"] = "hÂ¤",
    ["ã‡·"] = "hÂ¤",
    ["ã‡¸"] = "hÂ¤",
    ["ã‡¹"] = "hÂ¤",
    ["ã‡»"] = "rÂ¤",
    ["ã‡¼"] = "rÂ¤",
    ["ã‡½"] = "rÂ¤",
    ["ã‡¾"] = "rÂ¤",
    ["ã‡¿"] = "rÂ¤",
    ["ã‡°"] = "kÂ¤",
    ["ã‡±"] = "sÂ¤",
    ["ã‡³"] = "tÂ¤",
    ["ã‡´"] = "nÂ¤",
    ["ã‡º"] = "mÂ¤",
    ["ã‡·ã‚š"] = "pÂ¤",

    -- misc
    ["ã‚£"] = "yÂ¤",
    ["ã‚¥"] = "wÂ¤",
    ["ãƒ¼"] = "Ì„",
    ["ãƒ»"] = "=",

    -- alt spellings
    ["ã‚µ"] = "sa",
    ["ã‚¹"] = "su",
    ["ã‚»"] = "se",
    ["ã‚½"] = "so",
    ["ãƒ„ã‚š"] = "tu",
    ["ãƒãƒ¥"] = "cu",
    ["ãƒã‚§"] = "ce",
    ["ãƒ°"] = "wi",
    ["ãƒ±"] = "we",
    ["ãƒ²"] = "wo",
    ["ã‡²"] = "sÂ¤",
    ["ãƒƒ"] = "xÂ¤",
    ["ãƒ³"] = "nÂ¤",
    ["ãƒˆã‚¥"] = "tu",

    -- dialectal characters
    ["ãƒ‚ãƒ£"] = "zya",
    ["ãƒ‚"] = "zi",
    ["ãƒ‚ãƒ¥"] = "zyu",
    ["ãƒ‚ã‚§"] = "zye",
    ["ãƒ‚ãƒ§"] = "zyo",
    ["ãƒ€"] = "da",
    ["ãƒ‰ã‚¥"] = "du",
    ["ãƒ‡"] = "de",
    ["ãƒ‰"] = "do",
    ["ã‚¬"] = "ga",
    ["ã‚®"] = "gi",
    ["ã‚°"] = "gu",
    ["ã‚²"] = "ge",
    ["ã‚´"] = "go",

    -- loanword characters
    ["ã‚¸"] = "zi",
    ["ã‚¸ãƒ£"] = "zya",
    ["ã‚¸ãƒ¥"] = "zyu",
    ["ã‚¸ã‚§"] = "zye",
    ["ã‚¸ãƒ§"] = "zyo",
    ["ãƒ‡ã‚£"] = "di",
    ["ã‚¶"] = "za",
    ["ã‚º"] = "zu",
    ["ã‚¼"] = "ze",
    ["ã‚¾"] = "zo"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local result = {}
    for string in gmatch(text, ".[ã‚£ã‚¥ã‚§ã‚©ãƒ£ãƒ¥ãƒ§ã‚š]?") do
        if corresp[string] then -- try to convert character sequences
            string = corresp[string]
        else
            local str_result = {}
            for char in gmatch(string, ".") do -- try again over every individual character
                table.insert(str_result, corresp[char] or char)
            end
            string = table.concat(str_result)
        end
        table.insert(result, string)
    end
    text = table.concat(result)
    text = mw.ustring.toNFC(text)

    if find(text, "xÂ¤[kbp]") then -- 'ãƒƒ'
        text = gsub(text, "xÂ¤([kbp])", "%1Â¤%1")
    else
        text = gsub(text, "xÂ¤", "tÂ¤")
    end

    text = gsub(text, "Â¤", "")

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="74">
<source>wikt/translit/ar-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- Authors: Benwing, ZxxZxxZ, Atitarev
local export = {}

local U = mw.ustring.char
local rfind = mw.ustring.find
local rsubn = mw.ustring.gsub
local rmatch = mw.ustring.match
local rsplit = mw.text.split
local gcodepoint = mw.ustring.gcodepoint

-- assigned below
local has_diacritics

-- version of rsubn() that discards all but the first return value
local function rsub(term, foo, bar)
    local retval = rsubn(term, foo, bar)
    return retval
end

local zwnj = U(0x200c) -- zero-width non-joiner
local alif_madda = U(0x622)
local alif_hamza_below = U(0x625)
local alif = U(0x627)
local taa_marbuuTa = U(0x629)
local laam = U(0x644)
local waaw = U(0x648)
local alif_maqSuura = U(0x649)
local yaa = U(0x64A)
local fatHataan = U(0x64B)
local Dammataan = U(0x64C)
local kasrataan = U(0x64D)
local fatHa = U(0x64E)
local Damma = U(0x64F)
local kasra = U(0x650)
local shadda = U(0x651)
local sukuun = U(0x652)
local dagger_alif = U(0x670)
local alif_waSl = U(0x671)
-- local zwj = U(0x200d) -- zero-width joiner
local lrm = U(0x200e) -- left-to-right mark
local rlm = U(0x200f) -- right-to-left mark

local tt = {
    -- consonants
    ["Ø¨"] = "b",
    ["Øª"] = "t",
    ["Ø«"] = "á¹¯",
    ["Ø¬"] = "j",
    ["Ø­"] = "á¸¥",
    ["Ø®"] = "á¸µ",
    ["Ø¯"] = "d",
    ["Ø°"] = "á¸",
    ["Ø±"] = "r",
    ["Ø²"] = "z",
    ["Ø³"] = "s",
    ["Ø´"] = "Å¡",
    ["Øµ"] = "á¹£",
    ["Ø¶"] = "á¸",
    ["Ø·"] = "á¹­",
    ["Ø¸"] = "áº“",
    ["Ø¹"] = "Ê¿",
    ["Øº"] = "á¸¡",
    ["Ù"] = "f",
    ["Ù‚"] = "q",
    ["Ùƒ"] = "k",
    ["Úª"] = "k",
    ["Ù„"] = "l",
    ["Ù…"] = "m",
    ["Ù†"] = "n",
    ["Ù‡"] = "h",
    -- tÄÊ¾ marbÅ«á¹­a (special) - always after a fÃ¡tá¸¥a (a), silent at the end of
    -- an utterance, "t" in Ê¾iá¸Äfa or with pronounced tanwÄ«n. We catch
    -- most instances of tÄÊ¾ marbÅ«á¹­a before we get to this stage.
    [taa_marbuuTa] = "t", -- tÄÊ¾ marbÅ«á¹­a = Ø©
    -- control characters
    [zwnj] = "-", -- ZWNJ (zero-width non-joiner)
    -- [zwj]="", -- ZWJ (zero-width joiner)
    -- rare letters
    ["Ù¾"] = "p",
    ["Ú†"] = "Ä",
    ["Ú¤"] = "v",
    ["Ú¥"] = "v",
    ["Ú¯"] = "g",
    ["Ú¨"] = "g",
    ["Ú§"] = "q",
    ["Ú¢"] = "f",
    ["Úº"] = "n",
    ["Ú­"] = "g",
    -- semivowels or long vowels, alif, hamza, special letters
    ["Ø§"] = "Ä", -- Ê¾alif
    -- hamzated letters
    ["Ø£"] = "Ê¾", -- hamza over alif
    [alif_hamza_below] = "Ê¾", -- hamza under alif
    ["Ø¤"] = "Ê¾", -- hamza over wÄw
    ["Ø¦"] = "Ê¾", -- hamza over yÄ
    ["Ø¡"] = "Ê¾", -- hamza on the line
    -- long vowels
    [waaw] = "w", -- "Å«" after á¸amma (u) and not before diacritic
    [yaa] = "y", -- "Ä«" after kasra (i) and not before diacritic
    [alif_maqSuura] = "Ä", -- Ê¾alif maqá¹£Å«ra
    [alif_madda] = "Ê¾Ä", -- Ê¾alif madda
    [alif_waSl] = "", -- hamzatu l-waá¹£l
    [dagger_alif] = "Ä", -- Ê¾alif xanjariyya = dagger Ê¾alif (Koranic diacritic)
    -- short vowels, Å¡Ã¡dda and sukÅ«n
    [fatHataan] = "an", -- fatá¸¥atan
    [Dammataan] = "un", -- á¸ammatan
    [kasrataan] = "in", -- kasratan
    [fatHa] = "a", -- fatá¸¥a
    [Damma] = "u", -- á¸amma
    [kasra] = "i", -- kasra
    -- Å¡adda - doubled consonant
    [sukuun] = "", -- sukÅ«n - no vowel
    -- ligatures
    ["ï»»"] = "lÄ",
    ["ï·²"] = "llÄh",
    -- taá¹­wÄ«l
    ["Ù€"] = "", -- taá¹­wÄ«l, no sound
    -- numerals
    ["Ù¡"] = "1",
    ["Ù¢"] = "2",
    ["Ù£"] = "3",
    ["Ù¤"] = "4",
    ["Ù¥"] = "5",
    ["Ù¦"] = "6",
    ["Ù§"] = "7",
    ["Ù¨"] = "8",
    ["Ù©"] = "9",
    ["Ù "] = "0",
    -- punctuation (leave on separate lines)
    ["ØŸ"] = "?", -- question mark
    ["Â«"] = "â€œ", -- quotation mark
    ["Â»"] = "â€", -- quotation mark
    ["Ù«"] = ".", -- decimal point
    ["Ù¬"] = ",", -- thousands separator
    ["Ùª"] = "%", -- percent sign
    ["ØŒ"] = ",", -- comma
    ["Ø›"] = ";" -- semicolon
}

local sun_letters = "ØªØ«Ø¯Ø°Ø±Ø²Ø³Ø´ØµØ¶Ø·Ø¸Ù„Ù†"
-- For use in implementing sun-letter assimilation of Ø§Ù„ (al-)
local ttsun1 = {}
local ttsun2 = {}
local ttsun3 = {}
for cp in gcodepoint(sun_letters) do
    local ch = U(cp)
    ttsun1[ch] = tt[ch]
    ttsun2["l-" .. ch] = tt[ch] .. "-" .. ch
    table.insert(ttsun3, tt[ch])
end
-- For use in implementing elision of al-
local sun_letters_tr = table.concat(ttsun3, "")

local consonants_needing_vowels = "Ø¨ØªØ«Ø¬Ø­Ø®Ø¯Ø°Ø±Ø²Ø³Ø´ØµØ¶Ø·Ø¸Ø¹ØºÙÙ‚ÙƒÚªÙ„Ù…Ù†Ù‡Ù¾Ú†Ú¤Ú¯Ú¨Ú§Ú¢ÚºÚ­Ø£Ø¥Ø¤Ø¦Ø¡Ø©ï·²"
-- consonants on the right side; includes alif madda
local rconsonants = consonants_needing_vowels .. "ÙˆÙŠØ¢"
-- consonants on the left side; does not include alif madda
local lconsonants = consonants_needing_vowels .. "ÙˆÙŠ"
-- Arabic semicolon, comma, question mark; taá¹­wÄ«l; period, exclamation point,
-- single quote for bold/italic, double quotes for quoted material
local punctuation = "ØŸØŒØ›" .. "Ù€" .. ".!'" .. "\""
local space_like = "%s'" .. "\""
local space_like_class = "[" .. space_like .. "]"
local numbers = "Ù¡Ù¢Ù£Ù¤Ù¥Ù¦Ù§Ù¨Ù©Ù "

local before_diacritic_checking_subs = {
    ------------ transformations prior to checking for diacritics --------------
    -- convert llh for allÄh into ll+shadda+dagger-alif+h
    {"Ù„Ù„Ù‡", "Ù„Ù„Ù‘Ù°Ù‡"}, -- shadda+short-vowel (including tanwÄ«n vowels, i.e. -an -in -un) gets
    -- replaced with short-vowel+shadda during NFC normalisation, which
    -- MediaWiki does for all Unicode strings; however, it makes the
    -- transliteration process inconvenient, so undo it.
    {"([" .. fatHataan .. Dammataan .. kasrataan .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. dagger_alif .. "])" .. shadda, shadda .. "%1"}, -- ignore alif jamÄ«la (otiose alif in 3pl verb forms)
    --     #1: handle á¸amma + wÄw + alif (final -Å«)
    {Damma .. waaw .. alif, Damma .. waaw}, --     #2: handle wÄw + sukÅ«n + alif (final -w in -aw in defective verbs)
    --     this must go before the generation of w, which removes the waw here.
    {waaw .. sukuun .. alif, waaw .. sukuun}, -- ignore final alif or alif maqá¹£Å«ra following fatá¸¥atan (e.g. in accusative
    -- singular or words like Ø¹ÙØµÙ‹Ø§ "stick" or Ù‡ÙØ¯Ù‹Ù‰ "guidance"; this is called
    -- tanwin nasb)
    {fatHataan .. "[" .. alif .. alif_maqSuura .. "]", fatHataan}, -- same but with the fatá¸¥atan placed over the alif or alif maqá¹£Å«ra
    -- instead of over the previous letter (considered a misspelling but
    -- common)
    {"[" .. alif .. alif_maqSuura .. "]" .. fatHataan, fatHataan}, -- tÄÊ¾ marbÅ«á¹­a should always be preceded by fatá¸¥a, alif, alif madda or
    -- dagger alif; infer fatá¸¥a if not
    {"([^" .. fatHa .. alif .. alif_madda .. dagger_alif .. "])" .. taa_marbuuTa, "%1" .. fatHa .. taa_marbuuTa}, -- similarly for alif between consonants, possibly marked with shadda
    -- (does not apply to initial alif, which is silent when not marked with
    -- hamza, or final alif, which might be pronounced as -an)
    {"([" .. lconsonants .. "]" .. shadda .. "?)" .. alif .. "([" .. rconsonants .. "])", "%1" .. fatHa .. alif .. "%2"}, -- infer fatá¸¥a in case of non-fatá¸¥a + alif/alif-maqá¹£Å«ra + dagger alif
    {"([^" .. fatHa .. "])([" .. alif .. alif_maqSuura .. "]" .. dagger_alif .. ")", "%1" .. fatHa .. "%2"}, -- infer kasra in case of hamza-under-alif not + kasra
    {alif_hamza_below .. "([^" .. kasra .. kasrataan .. "])", alif_hamza_below .. kasra .. "%1"}, -- ignore dagger alif placed over regular alif or alif maqá¹£Å«ra
    {"([" .. alif .. alif_maqSuura .. "])" .. dagger_alif, "%1"}, ----------- rest of these concern definite article alif-lÄm ----------
    -- in kasra/á¸amma + alif + lam, make alif into hamzatu l-waá¹£l, so we
    -- handle cases like Ø¨ÙØ§Ù„ØªÙÙ‘ÙˆÙ’ÙÙÙŠÙ‚ (bi-t-tawfÄ«q) correctly
    {"([" .. Damma .. kasra .. "])" .. alif .. laam, "%1" .. alif_waSl .. laam}, -- al + consonant + shadda (only recognize word-initially if regular alif): remove shadda
    {"^(" .. alif .. fatHa .. "?" .. laam .. "[" .. lconsonants .. "])" .. shadda, "%1"}, {"(" .. space_like_class .. alif .. fatHa .. "?" .. laam .. "[" .. lconsonants .. "])" .. shadda, "%1"}, {"(" .. alif_waSl .. fatHa .. "?" .. laam .. "[" .. lconsonants .. "])" .. shadda, "%1"}, -- handle l- hamzatu l-waá¹£l or word-initial al-
    {"^" .. alif .. fatHa .. "?" .. laam, "al-"}, {"(" .. space_like_class .. ")" .. alif .. fatHa .. "?" .. laam, "%1al-"}, -- next one for bi-t-tawfÄ«q
    {"([" .. Damma .. kasra .. "])" .. alif_waSl .. fatHa .. "?" .. laam, "%1-l-"}, -- next one for remaining hamzatu l-waá¹£l (at beginning of word)
    {alif_waSl .. fatHa .. "?" .. laam, "l-"}, -- special casing if the l in al- has a shadda on it (as in Ø§Ù„ÙÙ‘Ø°ÙÙŠ "that"),
    -- so we don't mistakenly double the dash
    {"l%-" .. shadda, "ll"}, -- implement assimilation of sun letters
    {"l%-[" .. sun_letters .. "]", ttsun2}
}

-- Transliterate the word(s) in TEXT. LANG (the language) and SC (the script)
-- are ignored. OMIT_I3RAAB means leave out final short vowels (Ê¾iÊ¿rÄb).
-- GRAY_I3RAAB means render transliterate short vowels (Ê¾iÊ¿rÄb) in gray.
-- FORCE_TRANSLIT causes even non-vocalized text to be transliterated
-- (normally the function checks for non-vocalized text and returns nil,
-- since such text is ambiguous in transliteration).
function export.tr(text, lang, sc, omit_i3raab, gray_i3raab, force_translit)
    -- make it possible to call this function from a template
    if type(text) == "table" then
        local function f(x) return (x ~= "") and x or nil end
        text, lang, sc, omit_i3raab, force_translit = f(text.args[1]), f(text.args[2]), f(text.args[3]), f(text.args[4]), f(text.args[5])
    end

    for _, sub in ipairs(before_diacritic_checking_subs) do text = rsub(text, sub[1], sub[2]) end

    if not force_translit and not has_diacritics(text) then return nil end

    ------------ transformations after checking for diacritics --------------
    -- Replace plain alif with hamzatu l-waá¹£l when followed by fatá¸¥a/á¸amma/kasra.
    -- Must go after handling of initial al-, which distinguishes alif-fatá¸¥a
    -- from alif w/hamzatu l-waá¹£l. Must go before generation of Å« and Ä«, which
    -- eliminate the á¸amma/kasra.
    text = rsub(text, alif .. "([" .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. "])", alif_waSl .. "%1")
    -- á¸amma + waw not followed by a diacritic is Å«, otherwise w
    text = rsub(text, Damma .. waaw .. "([^" .. fatHataan .. Dammataan .. kasrataan .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. shadda .. sukuun .. dagger_alif .. "])", "Å«%1")
    text = rsub(text, Damma .. waaw .. "$", "Å«")
    -- kasra + yaa not followed by a diacritic (or Å« from prev step) is Ä«, otherwise y
    text = rsub(text, kasra .. yaa .. "([^" .. fatHataan .. Dammataan .. kasrataan .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. shadda .. sukuun .. dagger_alif .. "Å«])", "Ä«%1")
    text = rsub(text, kasra .. yaa .. "$", "Ä«")
    -- convert shadda to double letter.
    text = rsub(text, "(.)" .. shadda, "%1%1")
    if not omit_i3raab and gray_i3raab then -- show Ê¾iÊ¿rÄb grayed in transliteration
        -- decide whether to gray out the t in ïº“. If word begins with al- or l-, yes.
        -- Otherwise, no if word ends in a/i/u, yes if ends in an/in/un.
        text = rsub(text, "^(a?l%-[^%s]+)" .. taa_marbuuTa .. "([" .. fatHataan .. Dammataan .. kasrataan .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. "])", "%1<span style=\"color: #888888\">t</span>%2")
        text = rsub(text, "(" .. space_like_class .. "a?l%-[^%s]+)" .. taa_marbuuTa .. "([" .. fatHataan .. Dammataan .. kasrataan .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. "])", "%1<span style=\"color: #888888\">t</span>%2")
        text = rsub(text, taa_marbuuTa .. "([" .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. "])", "t%1")
        text = rsub(text, taa_marbuuTa .. "([" .. fatHataan .. Dammataan .. kasrataan .. "])", "<span style=\"color: #888888\">t</span>%1")
        text = rsub(text, ".", {[fatHataan] = "<span style=\"color: #888888\">an</span>", [kasrataan] = "<span style=\"color: #888888\">in</span>", [Dammataan] = "<span style=\"color: #888888\">un</span>"})
        text = rsub(text, "([" .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. "])(" .. space_like_class .. ")", function(vowel, space)
            vowel_repl = {[fatHa] = "<span style=\"color: #888888\">a</span> ", [kasra] = "<span style=\"color: #888888\">i</span> ", [Damma] = "<span style=\"color: #888888\">u</span> "}
            return vowel_repl[vowel] .. space
        end)
        text = rsub(text, "[" .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. "]$", {[fatHa] = "<span style=\"color: #888888\">a</span>", [kasra] = "<span style=\"color: #888888\">i</span>", [Damma] = "<span style=\"color: #888888\">u</span>"})
        text = rsub(text, "</span><span style=\"color: #888888\">", "")
    elseif omit_i3raab then -- omit Ê¾iÊ¿rÄb in transliteration
        text = rsub(text, "[" .. fatHataan .. Dammataan .. kasrataan .. "]", "")
        text = rsub(text, "[" .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. "](" .. space_like_class .. ")", "%1")
        text = rsub(text, "[" .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. "]$", "")
    end
    -- tÄÊ¾ marbÅ«á¹­a should not be rendered by -t if word-final even when
    -- Ê¾iÊ¿rÄb (desinential inflection) is shown; instead, use (t) before
    -- whitespace, nothing when final; but render final -ïºïº“ and -ïºïº“ as -Äh,
    -- consistent with Wehr's dictionary
    -- Left-to-right or right-to-left mark at end of text will prevent tÄÊ¾ marbÅ«á¹­a
    -- from being transliterated correctly.
    text = string.gsub(text, lrm, "")
    text = string.gsub(text, rlm, "")
    text = rsub(text, "([" .. alif .. alif_madda .. "])" .. taa_marbuuTa .. "$", "%1h")
    -- Ignore final tÄÊ¾ marbÅ«á¹­a (it appears as "a" due to the preceding
    -- short vowel). Need to do this after graying or omitting word-final
    -- Ê¾iÊ¿rÄb.
    text = rsub(text, taa_marbuuTa .. "$", "")
    text = rsub(text, taa_marbuuTa .. "(%p)", "%1")
    if not omit_i3raab then -- show Ê¾iÊ¿rÄb in transliteration
        text = rsub(text, taa_marbuuTa .. "(" .. space_like_class .. ")", "(t)%1")
    else
        -- When omitting Ê¾iÊ¿rÄb, show all non-absolutely-final instances of
        -- tÄÊ¾ marbÅ«á¹­a as (t), with trailing Ê¾iÊ¿rÄb omitted.
        text = rsub(text, taa_marbuuTa, "(t)")
    end
    -- tatwÄ«l should be rendered as - at beginning or end of word. It will
    -- be rendered as nothing in the middle of a word (FIXME, do we want
    -- this?)
    text = rsub(text, "^Ù€", "-")
    text = rsub(text, "(" .. space_like_class .. ")Ù€", "%1-")
    text = rsub(text, "Ù€$", "-")
    text = rsub(text, "Ù€(" .. space_like_class .. ")", "-%1")
    -- Now convert remaining Arabic chars according to table.
    text = rsub(text, ".", tt)
    text = rsub(text, "aÄ", "Ä")
    -- Implement elision of al- after a final vowel. We do this
    -- conservatively, only handling elision of the definite article rather
    -- than elision in other cases of hamzat al-waá¹£l (e.g. form-I imperatives
    -- or form-VII and above verbal nouns) partly because elision in
    -- these cases isn't so common in MSA and partly to avoid excessive
    -- elision in case of words written with initial bare alif instead of
    -- properly with hamzated alif. Possibly we should reconsider.
    -- At the very least we currently don't handle elision of Ø§Ù„ÙÙ‘Ø°ÙÙŠ (allaá¸i)
    -- correctly because we special-case it to appear without the hyphen;
    -- perhaps we should reconsider that.
    text = rsub(text, "([aiuÄÄ«Å«]'* +'*)a([" .. sun_letters_tr .. "]%-)", "%1%2")
    if gray_i3raab then text = rsub(text, "([aiuÄÄ«Å«]'*</span>'* +'*)a([" .. sun_letters_tr .. "]%-)", "%1%2") end
    -- Special-case the transliteration of allÄh, without the hyphen
    text = rsub(text, "^(a?)l%-lÄh", "%1llÄh")
    text = rsub(text, "(" .. space_like_class .. "a?)l%-lÄh", "%1llÄh")

    return text
end

local has_diacritics_subs = {
    -- FIXME! What about lam-alif ligature?
    -- remove punctuation and shadda
    -- must go before removing final consonants
    {"[" .. punctuation .. shadda .. "]", ""}, -- Remove consonants at end of word or utterance, so that we're OK with
    -- words lacking iÊ¿rÄb (must go before removing other consonants).
    -- If you want to catch places without iÊ¿rÄb, comment out the next two lines.
    {"[" .. lconsonants .. "]$", ""}, {"[" .. lconsonants .. "](" .. space_like_class .. ")", "%1"}, -- remove consonants (or alif) when followed by diacritics
    -- must go after removing shadda
    -- do not remove the diacritics yet because we need them to handle
    -- long-vowel sequences of diacritic + pseudo-consonant
    {"[" .. lconsonants .. alif .. "]([" .. fatHataan .. Dammataan .. kasrataan .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. sukuun .. dagger_alif .. "])", "%1"}, -- the following two must go after removing consonants w/diacritics because
    -- we only want to treat vocalic wÄw/yÄ' in them (we want to have removed
    -- wÄw/yÄ' followed by a diacritic)
    -- remove á¸amma + wÄw
    {Damma .. waaw, ""}, -- remove kasra + yÄ'
    {kasra .. yaa, ""}, -- remove fatá¸¥a/fatá¸¥atan + alif/alif-maqá¹£Å«ra
    {"[" .. fatHataan .. fatHa .. "][" .. alif .. alif_maqSuura .. "]", ""}, -- remove diacritics
    {"[" .. fatHataan .. Dammataan .. kasrataan .. fatHa .. Damma .. kasra .. sukuun .. dagger_alif .. "]", ""}, -- remove numbers, hamzatu l-waá¹£l, alif madda
    {"[" .. numbers .. "Ù±" .. "Ø¢" .. "]", ""}, -- remove non-Arabic characters
    {"[^" .. U(0x0600) .. "-" .. U(0x06FF) .. U(0x0750) .. "-" .. U(0x077F) .. U(0x08A0) .. "-" .. U(0x08FF) .. U(0xFB50) .. "-" .. U(0xFDFF) .. U(0xFE70) .. "-" .. U(0xFEFF) .. "]", ""}
}

-- declared as local above
function has_diacritics(text)
    local count
    text, count = rsubn(text, "[" .. lrm .. rlm .. "]", "")
    if count > 0 then require("debug").track("ar-translit/lrm or rlm") end
    for _, sub in ipairs(has_diacritics_subs) do text = rsub(text, unpack(sub)) end
    return #text == 0
end

-- Return true if transliteration TR is an irregular transliteration of
-- ARABIC. Return false if ARABIC can't be transliterated. For purposes of
-- establishing regularity, hyphens are ignored and word-final tÄÊ¾ marbÅ«á¹­a
-- can be transliterated as "(t)", "" or "t".
function export.irregular_translit(arabic, tr)
    if not arabic or arabic == "" or not tr or tr == "" then return false end
    local regtr = export.tr(arabic)
    if not regtr or regtr == tr then return false end
    local arwords = rsplit(arabic, " ")
    local regwords = rsplit(regtr, " ")
    local words = rsplit(tr, " ")
    if #regwords ~= #words or #regwords ~= #arwords then return true end
    for i = 1, #regwords do
        local regword = regwords[i]
        local word = words[i]
        local arword = arwords[i]
        -- Resolve final (t) in auto-translit to t, h or nothing
        if rfind(regword, "%(t%)$") then regword = rfind(word, "Äh$") and rsub(regword, "%(t%)$", "h") or rfind(word, "t$") and rsub(regword, "%(t%)$", "t") or rsub(regword, "%(t%)$", "") end
        -- Resolve clitics + short a + alif-lÄm, which may get auto-transliterated
        -- to contain long Ä, to short a if the manual translit has it; note
        -- that currently in cases with assimilated l, the auto-translit will
        -- fail, so we won't ever get here and don't have to worry about
        -- auto-translit l against manual-translit assimilated char.
        local clitic_chars = "^[ÙˆÙÙƒÙ„]" -- separate line to avoid L2R display weirdness
        if rfind(arword, clitic_chars .. fatHa .. "?[" .. alif .. alif_waSl .. "]" .. laam) and rfind(word, "^[wfkl]a%-") then regword = rsub(regword, "^([wfkl])Ä", "%1a") end
        -- Ignore hyphens when comparing
        if rsub(regword, "%-", "") ~= rsub(word, "%-", "") then return true end
    end
    return false
end

return export

-- For Vim, so we get 4-space tabs
-- vim: set ts=4 sw=4 noet:

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="75">
<source>wikt/translit/array.lua</source>
<document_content>
local Array = {}
local array_constructor

-- Copy table library so as not to unexpectedly change the behavior of code that
-- uses it.
local array_methods = mw.clone(table)

-- Create version of table.sort that returns the table.
array_methods.sort = function(t, comp)
    table.sort(t, comp)
    return t
end

-- ipairs and unpack operate on arrays.
array_methods.ipairs = ipairs
array_methods.unpack = unpack

function array_methods:type()
    local mt = getmetatable(self)
    return type(mt) == "table" and mt.__type or nil
end

function array_methods:adjustIndex(index)
    index = math.floor(index)
    if index < 0 then index = #self + index + 1 end
    return index
end

-- string.sub-style slicing.
function array_methods:slice(i, j)
    if i == nil then
        i = 1
    elseif type(i) == "number" then
        i = self:adjust_index(i)
    else
        error("Expected number, got " .. type(i))
    end

    if j == nil or type(j) == "number" then
        j = self:adjust_index(j or -1)
    else
        error("Expected number, got " .. type(j))
    end

    local new_arr = array_constructor()
    local k = 0
    for index = i, j do
        k = k + 1
        new_arr[k] = self[index]
    end
    return new_arr
end

-- A function to convert string key-table modules such
-- as [[Module:languages/data2]] into arrays.
-- "from" is a bad name.
-- field_for_key supplies the field name in which the
-- key will be stored.
local function to_array(map, field_for_key)
    m_table = m_table or require "table"

    local arr = {}
    local i = 0
    for key, val in pairs(map) do
        i = i + 1
        local new_val = m_table.shallowcopy(val)
        if field_for_key then new_val[field_for_key] = key end
        arr[i] = new_val
    end

    return array_constructor(arr)
end

-- Functions from [[Module:table]] that operate on arrays or sparse arrays.
-- List copied from [[Module:table/documentation]].
local operate_on_array = {
    -- non-sparse
    "removeDuplicates", "length", "contains", "serialCommaJoin", "reverseIpairs", "reverse", "invert", "listToSet", "isArray", -- sparse
    "numKeys", "maxIndex", "compressSparseArray", "sparseIpairs", -- tables in general
    "shallowcopy", "deepcopy"
}

-- Not all of these operate on arrays.
local create_new_array = {
    -- Functions from [[Module:table]] that create an array.
    -- List copied from [[Module:table/documentation]].
    "removeDuplicates", "numKeys", "affixNums", "compressSparseArray", "keysToList", "reverse", -- Functions from [[Module:table]] that create an table.
    "shallowcopy", "deepcopy", -- Functions from [[Module:fun]] that create an array.
    "map", "filter"
}

-- Functions from [[Module:fun]] that take an array in the second argument.
-- They just have to have the argument order reversed to work as methods of the
-- array object.
local second_argument_is_array = {"map", "some", "all", "filter"}

-- Add aliases for the functions from [[Module:table]] whose names
-- contain "array" or "list", which is redundant, and whose names don't conform
-- to the usual camel case.
-- The key redirects to the value.
local alias_of = {compress = "compressSparseArray", keys = "keysToList", toSet = "listToSet", deepCopy = "deepcopy", shallowCopy = "shallowcopy"}

local function get_module_function(key, module, module_name) return module[key] or error("No function named " .. tostring(key) .. " in Module:" .. module_name) end

local function wrap_in_array_constructor(func) return function(...) return array_constructor(func(...)) end end

local function create_array_generating_func(key, module, module_name) return wrap_in_array_constructor(get_module_function(key, module, module_name)) end

local function reverse_arguments(func) return function(a, b) return func(b, a, true) end end

local function underscore_to_camel_case(str)
    if type(str) ~= "string" then return str end
    str = str:gsub("_(.)", string.upper)
    return str
end

local m_table, m_fun
local Array = {}
Array.__type = "array"
function Array:__index(key)
    if type(key) ~= "string" then return nil end

    -- Convert underscores to camel case: num_keys -> numKeys.
    key = underscore_to_camel_case(key)

    local val = array_methods[key]
    if val then return val end

    key = alias_of[key] or key

    local func
    m_table = m_table or require "table"
    if m_table.contains(operate_on_array, key) then
        if m_table.contains(create_new_array, key) then
            func = create_array_generating_func(key, m_table, "table")
        else
            func = m_table[key]
        end
    elseif m_table.contains(second_argument_is_array, key) then
        m_fun = m_fun or require "fun"

        local raw_func = reverse_arguments(get_module_function(key, m_fun, "fun"))
        if m_table.contains(create_new_array, key) then
            func = wrap_in_array_constructor(raw_func)
        else
            func = raw_func
        end
    elseif key == "fold" then
        m_fun = m_fun or require "fun"

        local raw_func = get_module_function(key, m_fun, "fun")
        func = function(t, func, accum) return raw_func(func, t, accum) end
    end

    if func then
        array_methods[key] = func
        return func
    end
end

function Array.__add(a, b)
    if type(a) == "table" and type(b) == "table" then
        m_table = m_table or require "table"

        local new_arr = array_constructor(m_table.shallowcopy(a))

        for _, val in ipairs(b) do new_arr:insert(val) end

        return new_arr
    end
end

function Array:new(...)
    local arr
    if select("#", ...) == 1 and type((...)) == "table" then
        arr = ...

        local mt = getmetatable(arr)
        -- If table has been loaded with mw.loadData, copy it to avoid the
        -- limitations of it being a virtual table.
        if mt and mt.mw_loadData then
            m_table = m_table or require "table"
            arr = m_table.shallowcopy(arr)
        end
    else
        arr = {...}
    end
    return setmetatable(arr, self)
end

-- Declared as local above.
function array_constructor(...) return Array:new(...) end

local array_generating_funcs = {from = to_array}
local Array_library_mt = {__call = Array.new, __index = array_generating_funcs}
setmetatable(Array, Array_library_mt)

function Array_library_mt:__index(key)
    key = underscore_to_camel_case(key)
    key = alias_of[key] or key

    if array_generating_funcs[key] then return array_generating_funcs[key] end

    m_table = m_table or require "table"

    if m_table.contains(create_new_array, key) then
        local func = create_array_generating_func(key, m_table, "table")
        array_generating_funcs[key] = func
        return func
    end
end

return Array

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="76">
<source>wikt/translit/as-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- Transliteration for Assamese
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["à¦•à§à¦·"] = "kh",
    ["à¦•"] = "k",
    ["à¦–"] = "kh",
    ["à¦—"] = "g",
    ["à¦˜"] = "gh",
    ["à¦™"] = "á¹…",
    ["à¦š"] = "s",
    ["à¦›"] = "s",
    ["à¦œ"] = "z",
    ["à¦"] = "zh",
    ["à¦"] = "Ã±",
    ["à¦Ÿ"] = "t",
    ["à¦ "] = "th",
    ["à¦¡"] = "d",
    ["à¦¢"] = "dh",
    ["à¦£"] = "n",
    ["à¦¤"] = "t",
    ["à¦¥"] = "th",
    ["à¦¦"] = "d",
    ["à¦§"] = "dh",
    ["à¦¨"] = "n",
    ["à¦ª"] = "p",
    ["à¦«"] = "ph",
    ["à¦¬"] = "b",
    ["à¦­"] = "bh",
    ["à¦®"] = "m",
    ["à¦¯"] = "z",
    ["à§°"] = "r",
    ["à¦²"] = "l",
    ["à§±"] = "w",
    ["à¦¶"] = "x",
    ["à¦·"] = "x",
    ["à¦¸"] = "x",
    ["à¦¹"] = "h",
    ["à¦¯à¦¼"] = "y",
    ["à¦¡à¦¼"] = "r",
    ["à¦¢à¦¼"] = "rh",

    -- vowel diacritics
    ["â€™"] = "Ã¶",
    ["à¦¿"] = "i",
    ["à§"] = "u",
    ["à§ƒ"] = "ri",
    ["à§‡"] = "e",
    ["à§‡â€™"] = "Ã«",
    ["à§‹"] = "Ã¼",
    ["à¦¾"] = "a",
    ["à§€"] = "i",
    ["à§‚"] = "u",
    ["à§ˆ"] = "oi",
    ["à§Œ"] = "ou",

    -- visarga
    ["à¦ƒ"] = "o",

    -- vowel signs
    ["à¦…"] = "o",
    ["à¦…â€™"] = "Ã³",
    ["à¦‡"] = "i",
    ["à¦‰"] = "u",
    ["à¦‹"] = "ri",
    ["à¦"] = "e",
    ["à¦â€™"] = "Ã©",
    ["à¦“"] = "Ã¼",
    ["à¦†"] = "a",
    ["à¦ˆ"] = "i",
    ["à¦Š"] = "u",
    ["à¦"] = "oi",
    ["à¦”"] = "ou",

    -- hosonto
    ["à§"] = "",

    -- sondrobindu
    ["à¦"] = "Ìƒ",

    -- owogroho
    ["à¦½"] = "o",

    -- onusor
    ["à¦‚"] = "á¹…",

    -- hosonto to, 
    ["à§"] = "t",

    -- numerals
    ["à§¦"] = "0",
    ["à§§"] = "1",
    ["à§¨"] = "2",
    ["à§©"] = "3",
    ["à§ª"] = "4",
    ["à§«"] = "5",
    ["à§¬"] = "6",
    ["à§­"] = "7",
    ["à§®"] = "8",
    ["à§¯"] = "9",

    -- punctuation
    ["à¥¤"] = "." -- dari
}

local conv2 = {["à¦•à§à¦·"] = "á¸±", ["à¦–"] = "á¸±", ["à¦˜"] = "Çµ", ["à¦™"] = "Å‹", ["à¦‚"] = "Å‹", ["à¦"] = "Åº", ["à¦ "] = "á¹«", ["à¦¥"] = "á¹«", ["à¦¢"] = "á¸‹", ["à¦§"] = "á¸‹", ["à¦«"] = "á¹—", ["à¦­"] = "á¸ƒ", ["à¦¢à¦¼"] = "Å•", ["à§ƒ"] = "á¹™", ["à¦‹"] = "á¹™", ["à§ˆ"] = "Ê", ["à¦"] = "Ê", ["à§Œ"] = "Éµ", ["à¦”"] = "Éµ"}

local consonant, vowel, vowel_sign = "à¦•-à¦¹à¦¡à¦¼-à¦¯à¦¼à§°à§±", "oà¦¾-à§Œâ€™", "à¦…-à¦”"
local c = "[" .. consonant .. "]"
local cc = "à¦¼?" .. c
local v = "[" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "]"
local syncope_pattern = "(" .. v .. cc .. v .. cc .. ")o(" .. cc .. "à¦?" .. v .. ")"

local function rev_string(text)
    local result, length = "", mw.ustring.len(text)
    for i = 1, length do result = result .. mw.ustring.sub(text, length - i + 1, length - i + 1) end
    return result
end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc, mode)
    text = gsub(text, "([^à§°])à§à¦¯", "%1à§à¦¯à¦¼")
    text = gsub(text, "à§à¦¬", "à§à§±")
    text = gsub(text, "[à¦¶à¦·à¦¸]à§", "à¦šà§")
    text = gsub(text, "à§à¦¸", "à§à¦š")
    text = gsub(text, "[à§‹à¦“]à§±", "à§à¦“")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦•à§à¦·", "à¦–")
    text = gsub(text, "â€™à§±", "à§à¦…â€™")
    text = gsub(text, "[à§à§à¦‰]à§±(.)", "à§à¦‰%1")
    text = gsub(text, "[à§‹à¦“]à§±(.)", "à§à¦“%1")
    text = gsub(text, "à§‹à¦à§±(.)", "à§à¦“à¦%1")
    text = gsub(text, "[à§Œà¦”]à§±", "à§à¦”")
    text = gsub(text, "[à¦¿à¦‡]à¦¯à¦¼(.)", "à§à¦‡%1")
    text = gsub(text, "à§ƒà¦¯à¦¼", "à§à¦‹")
    text = gsub(text, "[à§‡à¦]à¦¯à¦¼(.)", "à§à¦%1")
    text = gsub(text, "[à§‡â€™à¦â€™]à¦¯à¦¼", "à§à¦â€™")
    text = gsub(text, "[à§ˆà¦]à¦¯à¦¼(.)", "à§à¦%1")
    text = gsub(text, "[à§€à¦ˆ]à¦¯à¦¼(.)", "à§à¦ˆ%1")
    text = gsub(text, "[à§€à¦ˆ]à¦¯à¦¼", "à§à¦ˆà¦…") -- end
    text = gsub(text, "[à§‚à§‚à¦Š]à§±", "à§à¦Š")
    text = gsub(text, "İ", "à§à¦…")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦ƒ", "à§à¦…")
    text = gsub(text, "[à£ªÜ¿]", "à§")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦¬à¦¾à§°", "à§à¦¬à¦¾à§°")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦¬à¦¿à¦²à¦¾à¦•", "à§à¦¬à¦¿à¦²à¦¾à¦•")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦Ÿà§‹", "à§à¦Ÿà§‹")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦–à¦¨", "à§à¦–à¦¨")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦¡à¦¾à¦²", "à§à¦¡à¦¾à¦²")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦–à¦¿à¦¨à¦¿", "à§à¦–à¦¿à¦¨à¦¿")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦œà¦¨", "à§à¦œà¦¨")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦œà¦¨à§€", "à§à¦œà¦¨à§€")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦—à§°à¦¾à¦•à§€", "à§à¦—à§°à¦¾à¦•à§€")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦¸à¦•à¦²", "à§à¦¸à¦•à¦²")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦•à§ˆ", "à§à¦•à§ˆ")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦•à§‡", "à§à¦•à§‡")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦«à¦¾à¦²", "à§à¦«à¦¾à¦²")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦•à§‡à¦‡", "à§à¦•à§‡à¦‡")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦®à¦¾à¦¨", "à§à¦®à¦¾à¦¨")
    text = gsub(text, "[à¦¿à§€à¦‡à¦ˆ]à¦", "à§à¦‡à¦…Í‚")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦à§", "à¦¨à§Ìƒ")

    text = gsub(text, "(" .. c .. "à¦¼?)([" .. vowel .. "â€™?à§]?)", function(a, b) return a .. (b == "" and "o" or b) end)

    for word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[à¦-à§½oâ€™]+") do
        local orig_word = word
        word = rev_string(word)
        word = gsub(word, "^o(à¦¼?" .. c .. ")(à¦?" .. v .. ")", "%1%2")
        while match(word, syncope_pattern) do word = gsub(word, syncope_pattern, "%1%2") end
        text = gsub(text, orig_word, rev_string(word))
    end

    if mode == "IPA" then
        text = gsub(text, ".[à¦¼â€™]?", conv2)
        text = gsub(text, ".", conv2)
    end

    text = gsub(text, ".[à¦¼â€™]?", conv)
    text = gsub(text, ".", conv)

    local consonants_Latn_no_h = "[b-df-gj-np-tv-z]"

    -- Cw
    text = gsub(text, "mw", "mb") -- special case
    text = gsub(text, "^(" .. consonants_Latn_no_h .. "h?)w", "%1") -- initial
    text = gsub(text, "hw", "hb")
    text = gsub(text, "(" .. consonants_Latn_no_h .. ")w", "%1%1") -- medial

    -- zÃ±
    text = gsub(text, "^zÃ±", "gy") -- initial
    text = gsub(text, "zÃ±", "gg") -- medial

    -- Cy
    text = gsub(text, "^khy", "kh")
    text = gsub(text, "([aÃ©eiÃ³oÃ¼u])(" .. consonants_Latn_no_h .. ")y", "%1i%2%2")

    -- final "b" has inherent vowel
    text = gsub(text, "b$", "bo")
    text = gsub(text, "b ", "bo ")

    -- final r conjuncts
    text = gsub(text, "r([kszt])o$", "r%1")
    text = gsub(text, "r([kszt])o ", "r%1 ")
    text = gsub(text, "rkho$", "rkh")
    text = gsub(text, "rkho ", "rkh ")

    if match(text, "[à¦-à§½]") and mode ~= "debug" then
        return nil
    else
        return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
    end
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="77">
<source>wikt/translit/av-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {["Ğ±"] = "b", ["Ğ¿"] = "p", ["Ñ„"] = "f", ["Ğ²"] = "w", ["Ğ¼"] = "m", ["Ğ´"] = "d", ["Ñ‚"] = "t", ["Ğ¹"] = "j", ["Ğ½"] = "n", ["Ğ·"] = "z", ["Ñ†"] = "c", ["Ñ"] = "s", ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾", ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡", ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ì„", ["Ğ»"] = "l", ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä", ["Ñ€"] = "r", ["Ğ³"] = "g", ["Ğº"] = "k", ["Ñ…"] = "Ï‡", ["ÑŠ"] = "Ê¾", ["Ğ°"] = "a", ["Ğµ"] = "e", ["Ñ‹"] = "É™", ["Ğ¸"] = "i", ["Ğ¾"] = "o", ["Ñƒ"] = "u", ["Ñ‘"] = "Ã«", ["ÑŒ"] = "â€™", ["Ñ"] = "Ã¨", ["Ñ"] = "ju", ["Ñ"] = "ja", ["Ğ‘"] = "B", ["ĞŸ"] = "P", ["Ğ¤"] = "F", ["Ğ’"] = "W", ["Ğœ"] = "M", ["Ğ”"] = "D", ["Ğ¢"] = "T", ["Ğ™"] = "J", ["Ğ"] = "N", ["Ğ—"] = "Z", ["Ğ¦"] = "C", ["Ğ¡"] = "S", ["Ğ–"] = "Å½", ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ", ["Ğ©"] = "Å Ì„", ["Ğ›"] = "L", ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ", ["Ğ "] = "R", ["Ğ“"] = "G", ["Ğš"] = "K", ["Ğ¥"] = "Î§", ["Ğª"] = "Ê¾", ["Ğ"] = "A", ["Ğ•"] = "E", ["Ğ«"] = "Æ", ["Ğ˜"] = "I", ["Ğ"] = "O", ["Ğ£"] = "U", ["Ğ"] = "Ã‹", ["Ğ¬"] = "â€™", ["Ğ­"] = "Ãˆ", ["Ğ®"] = "Ju", ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja"};

local tetragraphs = {["Ñ†ÓÑ†Ó"] = "cÌ£Ì„", ["Ñ‡ÓÑ‡Ó"] = "ÄÌ£Ì„", ["ĞºÓĞºÓ"] = "á¸³Ì„", ["Ğ»ÑŠĞ»ÑŠ"] = "Å‚Ì„", ["Ğ¦ÓÑ†Ó"] = "CÌ£Ì„", ["Ğ§ÓÑ‡Ó"] = "ÄŒÌ£Ì„", ["ĞšÓĞºÓ"] = "á¸²Ì„", ["Ğ›ÑŠĞ»ÑŠ"] = "ÅÌ„"}

local digraphs = {["Ñ†Ó"] = "cÌ£", ["Ñ†Ñ†"] = "cÌ„", ["Ñ‚Ó"] = "á¹­", ["Ğ»Ó"] = "kl", ["ÑÑ"] = "sÌ„", ["Ğ»ÑŠ"] = "Å‚", ["Ñ‡Ñ‡"] = "ÄÌ„", ["Ñ‡Ó"] = "ÄÌ£", ["ĞºÑŒ"] = "ká¸·", ["ĞºĞº"] = "kÌ„", ["ĞºÓ"] = "á¸³", ["Ñ…ÑŒ"] = "x", ["Ñ…ÑŠ"] = "qÌ„", ["ĞºÑŠ"] = "qÌ‡Ì„", ["Ğ³ÑŠ"] = "Ä¡", ["Ñ…Ñ…"] = "Ï‡Ì„", ["Ğ³Ó"] = "Ê¿", ["Ñ…Ó"] = "á¸¥", ["Ğ³ÑŒ"] = "h", ["Ğ¦Ó"] = "CÌ£", ["Ğ¦Ñ†"] = "CÌ„", ["Ğ¢Ó"] = "á¹¬", ["Ğ›Ó"] = "Kl", ["Ğ¡Ñ"] = "SÌ„", ["Ğ›ÑŠ"] = "Å", ["Ğ§Ñ‡"] = "ÄŒÌ„", ["Ğ§Ó"] = "ÄŒÌ£", ["ĞšÑŒ"] = "Ká¸·", ["ĞšĞº"] = "KÌ„", ["ĞšÓ"] = "á¸²", ["Ğ¥ÑŒ"] = "X", ["Ğ¥ÑŠ"] = "QÌ„", ["ĞšÑŠ"] = "QÌ‡Ì„", ["Ğ“ÑŠ"] = "Ä ", ["Ğ¥Ñ…"] = "Î§Ì„", ["Ğ“Ó"] = "Ê¿", ["Ğ¥Ó"] = "á¸¤", ["Ğ“ÑŒ"] = "H"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local str_gsub = string.gsub

    -- Convert uppercase palochka to lowercase. Lowercase is found in tables
    -- above.
    text = str_gsub(text, mw.ustring.char(0x4C0), mw.ustring.char(0x4CF))

    for grapheme, replacement in pairs(tetragraphs) do text = str_gsub(text, grapheme, replacement) end

    for grapheme, replacement in pairs(digraphs) do text = str_gsub(text, grapheme, replacement) end

    text = str_gsub(text, "[\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="78">
<source>wikt/translit/az-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local single_letters = {
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ³"] = "q",
    ["Ğ“"] = "Q",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "yo",
    ["Ğ"] = "Yo",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "j",
    ["Ğ–"] = "J",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "Ä°",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "y",
    ["Ğ™"] = "Y",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ…"] = "x",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "X",
    ["Ñ†"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "S",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ã§",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "ÅŸ",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "ÅŸÃ§",
    ["Ğ©"] = "ÅÃ§",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "",
    ["Ğª"] = "",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "Ä±",
    ["Ğ«"] = "I",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ñ"] = "yu",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Yu",
    ["Ñ"] = "ya",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ya",
    ["Ñ˜"] = "y",
    ["Ğˆ"] = "Y",
    ["Ò»"] = "h",
    ["Òº"] = "H",
    ["Ò“"] = "ÄŸ",
    ["Ò’"] = "Ä",
    ["Ó™"] = "É™",
    ["Ó˜"] = "Æ",
    ["Ó©"] = "Ã¶",
    ["Ó¨"] = "Ã–",
    ["Ò¯"] = "Ã¼",
    ["Ò®"] = "Ãœ",
    ["Ò¹"] = "Ã§",
    ["Ò¸"] = "Ã‡",
    ["Ò"] = "g",
    ["Òœ"] = "G"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)

    if not sc then sc = require("scripts").findBestScript(text, require("languages").getByCode("az")):getCode() end

    if sc == "Arab" then
        text = nil
    elseif sc == "Latn" then
        text = nil
    elseif sc == "Cyrl" then
        text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "()([Ğ•ĞµĞ®ÑĞÑ‘])", function(pos, iotated)
            -- modifier letter apostrophe or right single quotation mark
            local preceding = mw.ustring.sub(text, math.max(1, pos - 2), math.max(0, pos - 1))
            local capital = iotated == "Ğ•" or iotated == "Ğ®"
            local lower = mw.ustring.lower(iotated)

            local translit
            if preceding == "" or mw.ustring.match(preceding, "[ĞĞÓ¨Ó˜Ğ£Ğ«Ğ•Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜Ğ•Ğ°Ğ¾Ó©Ó™ÑƒÑ‹ÑÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ĞµÑŠÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?$") then
                if capital then
                    if lower == "Ñ" then
                        return "Yu"
                    elseif lower == "Ñ‘" then
                        return "Yo"
                    else
                        return "Ye"
                    end
                else
                    if lower == "Ñ" then
                        return "yu"
                    elseif lower == "Ñ‘" then
                        return "yo"
                    else
                        return "ye"
                    end
                end
            else
                if capital then
                    if lower == "Ñ" then
                        return "Ãœ"
                    elseif lower == "Ñ‘" then
                        return "Ã–"
                    else
                        return "E"
                    end
                else
                    if lower == "Ñ" then
                        return "Ã¼"
                    elseif lower == "Ñ‘" then
                        return "Ã¶"
                    else
                        return "e"
                    end
                end
            end
            return translit
        end)

        text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", single_letters)
    end

    return text
end
return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="79">
<source>wikt/translit/ba-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["Ò¯"] = "Ã¼",
    ["Ò®"] = "Ãœ",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ó©"] = "Ã¶",
    ["Ó¨"] = "Ã–",
    ["Ñ"] = "yu",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Yu",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "â€™",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "â€™",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "y",
    ["Ğ™"] = "Y",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ…"] = "x",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "X",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Å Ä",
    ["Ñ"] = "ya",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ya",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "Ã¯",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Ã",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "yo",
    ["Ğ"] = "Yo",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ñ†"] = "ts",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "Ts",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ò£"] = "Ã±",
    ["Ò¢"] = "Ã‘",
    ["Ò“"] = "ÄŸ",
    ["Ò’"] = "Ä",
    ["Ò™"] = "Ã°",
    ["Ò˜"] = "Ä",
    ["Ò¡"] = "q",
    ["Ò "] = "Q",
    ["Ò«"] = "Î¸",
    ["Òª"] = "Î˜",
    ["Ò»"] = "h",
    ["Òº"] = "H",
    ["Ó™"] = "Ã¤",
    ["Ó˜"] = "Ã„"
};

local iotated = {["Ğµ"] = "ye", ["Ğ•"] = "Ye"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local str_gsub = string.gsub
    local ugsub = mw.ustring.gsub
    -- Ò¯/Ñƒ should be transliterated as w after vowels
    text = ugsub(text, "([ĞĞ°Ğ•ĞµĞ­ÑĞ®ÑĞ¯ÑÓ˜Ó™Ğ˜Ğ¸Ò®Ò¯Ğ£ÑƒÓ¨Ó©Ğ«Ñ‹])[Ò¯Ñƒ]", "%1w")

    text = ugsub(text, "([ĞĞÓ¨Ó˜Ğ£Ğ«Ğ•Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜Ğ•Ğ°Ğ¾Ó©Ó™ÑƒÑ‹ÑÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ĞµÑŠÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?)([Ğ•Ğµ])", function(a, e) return a .. iotated[e] end)
    text = ugsub(text, "^[Ğ•Ğµ]", iotated)
    text = str_gsub(text, "[\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="80">
<source>wikt/translit/bdk-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {["Ğ±"] = "b", ["Ğ¿"] = "p", ["Ñ„"] = "f", ["Ğ²"] = "v", ["Ğ¼"] = "m", ["Ğ´"] = "d", ["Ñ‚"] = "t", ["Ğ¹"] = "j", ["Ğ½"] = "n", ["Ğ·"] = "z", ["Ñ†"] = "c", ["Ñ"] = "s", ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾", ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡", ["Ğ»"] = "l", ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä", ["Ñ€"] = "r", ["Ğ³"] = "g", ["Ğº"] = "k", ["Ñ…"] = "Ï‡", ["ÑŠ"] = "Ê”", ["Ğ°"] = "a", ["Ğµ"] = "e", ["Ñ‹"] = "É¨", ["Ğ¸"] = "i", ["Ğ¾"] = "o", ["Ñƒ"] = "u", ["Ñ"] = "e", ["Ğ‘"] = "B", ["ĞŸ"] = "P", ["Ğ¤"] = "F", ["Ğ’"] = "V", ["Ğœ"] = "M", ["Ğ”"] = "D", ["Ğ¢"] = "T", ["Ğ™"] = "J", ["Ğ"] = "N", ["Ğ—"] = "Z", ["Ğ¦"] = "C", ["Ğ¡"] = "S", ["Ğ–"] = "Å½", ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ", ["Ğ›"] = "L", ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ", ["Ğ "] = "R", ["Ğ“"] = "G", ["Ğš"] = "K", ["Ğ¥"] = "Î§", ["Ğª"] = "Ê”", ["Ğ"] = "A", ["Ğ•"] = "E", ["Ğ«"] = "Æ—", ["Ğ˜"] = "I", ["Ğ"] = "O", ["Ğ£"] = "U", ["Ğ­"] = "E"};

local digraphs = {["Ğ°ÑŒ"] = "Ã¤", ["ĞÑŒ"] = "Ã„", ["Ğ³Ó"] = "Ê•", ["Ğ“Ó"] = "Ê•", ["Ğ³ÑŠ"] = "Ä¡", ["Ğ“ÑŠ"] = "Ä ", ["Ğ³ÑŒ"] = "h", ["Ğ“ÑŒ"] = "H", ["Ğ´Ğ¶"] = "Ç¯", ["Ğ”Ğ¶"] = "Ç®", ["ĞºĞº"] = "kÌ„", ["ĞºÓ"] = "á¸³", ["ĞšÓ"] = "á¸²", ["ĞºÑŠ"] = "qÌ„", ["ĞšÑŠ"] = "QÌ„", ["ĞºÑŒ"] = "qÌ‡", ["ĞšÑŒ"] = "QÌ‡", ["Ğ¾ÑŒ"] = "Ã¶", ["ĞÑŒ"] = "Ã–", ["Ğ¿Ó"] = "á¹—", ["ĞŸÓ"] = "á¹–", ["Ñ‚Ó"] = "á¹­", ["Ğ¢Ó"] = "á¹¬", ["ÑƒÑŒ"] = "Ã¼", ["Ğ£ÑŒ"] = "Ãœ", ["Ñ…Ó"] = "Ä§", ["Ğ¥Ó"] = "Ä¦", ["Ñ…ÑŠ"] = "q", ["Ğ¥ÑŠ"] = "Q", ["Ñ…ÑŒ"] = "x", ["Ğ¥ÑŒ"] = "X", ["Ñ†Ó"] = "cÌ£", ["Ğ¦Ó"] = "CÌ£", ["Ñ‡Ó"] = "ÄÌ£", ["Ğ§Ó"] = "ÄŒÌ£"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local str_gsub = string.gsub
    local UTF8_char = "[%z\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*"

    -- Convert capital to lowercase palochka. Lowercase is found in tables
    -- above.
    text = str_gsub(text, mw.ustring.char(0x4C0), mw.ustring.char(0x4CF))

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "[ĞšĞº]ÑŠĞ³", "É¢")

    for letter, translit in pairs(digraphs) do text = str_gsub(text, letter, translit) end

    text = str_gsub(text, UTF8_char, tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="81">
<source>wikt/translit/be-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local AC = mw.ustring.char(0x0301) -- acute =  Ì

local rsubn = mw.ustring.gsub

-- version of rsubn() that discards all but the first return value
local function rsub(term, foo, bar)
    local retval = rsubn(term, foo, bar)
    return retval
end

local tt = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ“"] = "H",
    ["Ğ³"] = "h",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ•"] = "Je",
    ["Ğµ"] = "je",
    ["Ğ"] = "Jo",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "jo",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ†"] = "I",
    ["Ñ–"] = "i",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i", -- present for Old Belarusian; FIXME, remove when we have a separate language code for this lang
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ğ"] = "Å¬",
    ["Ñ"] = "Å­",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "X",
    ["Ñ…"] = "x",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Y",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "y",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja",
    ["â€™"] = "Êº",
    ["Ê¼"] = "Êº",
    -- currently non-standard, used in some older norms
    ["Ò"] = "G",
    ["Ò‘"] = "g",
    -- Belarusian style quotes
    ["Â«"] = "â€œ",
    ["Â»"] = "â€"
};

local unstressed_vowels = "aeiyuAEIYU"
local unstressed_vowel = "[" .. unstressed_vowels .. "]"

local acute_decomposer = {["Ã¡"] = "a" .. AC, ["Ã©"] = "e" .. AC, ["Ã­"] = "i" .. AC, ["Ã³"] = "o" .. AC, ["Ãº"] = "u" .. AC, ["Ã½"] = "y" .. AC, ["Ã"] = "A" .. AC, ["Ã‰"] = "E" .. AC, ["Ã"] = "I" .. AC, ["Ã“"] = "O" .. AC, ["Ãš"] = "U" .. AC, ["Ã"] = "Y" .. AC}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "'+", {["'"] = "Êº"}) -- neutral apostrophe
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    -- Mark word boundaries
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(%s+)", "#%1#")
    text = "#" .. text .. "#"

    -- Mark stress on <o>
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(#[^#Oo" .. AC .. "]*)([Oo])([^#Oo" .. AC .. "]*" .. unstressed_vowel .. "[^#Oo" .. AC .. "]*#)", "%1%2" .. AC .. "%3")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(#[^#Oo" .. AC .. "]*" .. unstressed_vowel .. "[^#Oo" .. AC .. "]*)([Oo])([^#Oo" .. AC .. "]*#)", "%1%2" .. AC .. "%3")

    -- Strip hashes
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "#", "")

    return text
end

function export.reverse_tr(text) -- reverse-translit any words or phrases
    local reverse_tt = {}
    for k, v in pairs(tt) do reverse_tt[v] = k end
    reverse_tt["Êº"] = "'"
    reverse_tt["Ê¹"] = "ÑŒ"
    reverse_tt["i"] = "Ñ–"
    reverse_tt["I"] = "Ğ†"
    text = rsub(text, ".", acute_decomposer)
    text = rsub(text, "[Jj][aeou]", reverse_tt)
    text = rsub(text, ".", reverse_tt)
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="82">
<source>wikt/translit/bg-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "H",
    ["Ñ…"] = "h",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Å t",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡t",
    ["Ğª"] = "Ç",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Ç",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja",
    ["Ğ€"] = "Ãˆ",
    ["Ñ"] = "Ã¨",
    ["Ğ"] = "ÃŒ",
    ["Ñ"] = "Ã¬",

    -- Pre-reform
    ["Ñª"] = "Çª",
    ["Ñ«"] = "Ç«",
    ["Ñ¢"] = "Äš",
    ["Ñ£"] = "Ä›",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    -- ?? used in old texts
    ["Ğ«"] = "Y",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "y",
    ["Ñ¦"] = "Ä˜",
    ["Ñ§"] = "Ä™",
    ["Ñ¨"] = "JÄ™",
    ["Ñ©"] = "jÄ™",
    ["Ñ¬"] = "JÇ«",
    ["Ñ­"] = "jÇ«",
    -- Quotes
    ["Â«"] = "â€œ",
    ["Â»"] = "â€"
};

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    if mw.ustring.find(text, "[Ì€Ğ€ÑĞÑ]") then require("debug").track("bg-translit/grave") end
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(%w)[ĞªÑŠ]$", "%1")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(%w)[ĞªÑŠ]%f[%c%p%s]", "%1")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "[Ğ¬ÑŒ]%f[Ğ•ĞµĞĞ¾ĞªÑŠ]", {["Ğ¬"] = "J", ["ÑŒ"] = "j"})
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="83">
<source>wikt/translit/bho-Kthi-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- Transliteration for Bhojpuri
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["ğ‘‚"] = "k",
    ["ğ‘‚"] = "kh",
    ["ğ‘‚"] = "g",
    ["ğ‘‚"] = "gh",
    ["ğ‘‚‘"] = "á¹…",
    ["ğ‘‚’"] = "c",
    ["ğ‘‚“"] = "ch",
    ["ğ‘‚”"] = "j",
    ["ğ‘‚•"] = "jh",
    ["ğ‘‚–"] = "Ã±",
    ["ğ‘‚—"] = "á¹­",
    ["ğ‘‚˜"] = "á¹­h",
    ["ğ‘‚™"] = "á¸",
    ["ğ‘‚›"] = "á¸h",
    ["ğ‘‚"] = "á¹‡",
    ["ğ‘‚"] = "t",
    ["ğ‘‚Ÿ"] = "th",
    ["ğ‘‚ "] = "d",
    ["ğ‘‚¡"] = "dh",
    ["ğ‘‚¢"] = "n",
    ["ğ‘‚£"] = "p",
    ["ğ‘‚¤"] = "ph",
    ["ğ‘‚¥"] = "b",
    ["ğ‘‚¦"] = "bh",
    ["ğ‘‚§"] = "m",
    ["ğ‘‚¨"] = "y",
    ["ğ‘‚©"] = "r",
    ["ğ‘‚ª"] = "l",
    ["ğ‘‚«"] = "v",
    ["ğ‘‚«"] = "v",
    ["à¤³"] = "á¸·",
    ["ğ‘‚¬"] = "Å›",
    ["ğ‘‚­"] = "á¹£",
    ["ğ‘‚®"] = "s",
    ["ğ‘‚¯"] = "h",
    ["ğ‘‚š"] = "á¹›",
    ["ğ‘‚š"] = "á¹›",
    ["ğ‘‚œ"] = "á¹›h",
    ["ğ‘‚œ"] = "á¹›h",
    -- ['ğ‘‚”ğ‘‚¹ğ‘‚–'] = 'gy',

    -- vowel diacritics
    ["ğ‘‚±"] = "i",
    ["ğ‘‚³"] = "u",
    ["ğ‘‚µ"] = "e",
    ["ğ‘‚·"] = "o",
    ["ğ‘‚°"] = "Ä",
    ["ğ‘‚²"] = "Ä«",
    ["ğ‘‚´"] = "Å«",
    ["ğ‘‚¶"] = "ai",
    ["ğ‘‚¸"] = "au",

    -- vowel signs
    ["ğ‘‚ƒ"] = "a",
    ["ğ‘‚…"] = "i",
    ["ğ‘‚‡"] = "u",
    ["ğ‘‚‰"] = "e",
    ["ğ‘‚‹"] = "o",
    ["ğ‘‚„"] = "Ä",
    ["ğ‘‚†"] = "Ä«",
    ["ğ‘‚ˆ"] = "Å«",
    ["ğ‘‚Š"] = "ai",
    ["ğ‘‚Œ"] = "au",

    ["à¥"] = "om",

    -- chandrabindu
    ["ğ‘‚€"] = "Ìƒ",

    -- anusvara
    ["ğ‘‚"] = "á¹",

    -- visarga
    ["ğ‘‚‚"] = "á¸¥",

    -- virama
    ["ğ‘‚¹"] = "",

    -- numerals
    ["à¥¦"] = "0",
    ["à¥§"] = "1",
    ["à¥¨"] = "2",
    ["à¥©"] = "3",
    ["à¥ª"] = "4",
    ["à¥«"] = "5",
    ["à¥¬"] = "6",
    ["à¥­"] = "7",
    ["à¥®"] = "8",
    ["à¥¯"] = "9",

    -- punctuation
    ["ğ‘ƒ€"] = ".", -- danda
    ["+"] = "", -- compound separator

    -- abbreviation sign
    ["ğ‘‚»"] = "."
}

local nasal_assim = {["ğ‘‚"] = "ğ‘‚‘", ["ğ‘‚"] = "ğ‘‚‘", ["ğ‘‚"] = "ğ‘‚‘", ["ğ‘‚"] = "ğ‘‚‘", ["ğ‘‚’"] = "ğ‘‚–", ["ğ‘‚“"] = "ğ‘‚–", ["ğ‘‚”"] = "ğ‘‚–", ["ğ‘‚•"] = "ğ‘‚–", ["ğ‘‚—"] = "ğ‘‚", ["ğ‘‚˜"] = "ğ‘‚", ["ğ‘‚™"] = "ğ‘‚", ["ğ‘‚›"] = "ğ‘‚", ["ğ‘‚£"] = "ğ‘‚§", ["ğ‘‚¤"] = "ğ‘‚§", ["ğ‘‚¥"] = "ğ‘‚§", ["ğ‘‚¦"] = "ğ‘‚§", ["ğ‘‚§"] = "ğ‘‚§"}

local perm_cl = {["ğ‘‚§ğ‘‚¹ğ‘‚ª"] = true, ["ğ‘‚«ğ‘‚¹ğ‘‚ª"] = true, ["ğ‘‚«ğ‘‚¹ğ‘‚ª"] = true, ["ğ‘‚¢ğ‘‚¹ğ‘‚ª"] = true}

local all_cons, special_cons = "ğ‘‚ğ‘‚ğ‘‚ğ‘‚ğ‘‚‘ğ‘‚’ğ‘‚“ğ‘‚”ğ‘‚•ğ‘‚–ğ‘‚—ğ‘‚˜ğ‘‚™ğ‘‚šğ‘‚›ğ‘‚œğ‘‚ğ‘‚Ÿğ‘‚ ğ‘‚¡ğ‘‚£ğ‘‚¤ğ‘‚¥ğ‘‚¦ğ‘‚¬ğ‘‚­ğ‘‚®ğ‘‚¨ğ‘‚©ğ‘‚ªğ‘‚«ğ‘‚¯ğ‘‚ğ‘‚¢ğ‘‚§", "ğ‘‚¨ğ‘‚©ğ‘‚ªğ‘‚¥ğ‘‚«ğ‘‚¯ğ‘‚¢ğ‘‚§"
local vowel, vowel_sign = "ağ‘‚°ğ‘‚±ğ‘‚²ğ‘‚³ğ‘‚´ğ‘‚µğ‘‚¶ğ‘‚·ğ‘‚¸", "ğ‘‚ƒğ‘‚„ğ‘‚…ğ‘‚†ğ‘‚‡ğ‘‚ˆğ‘‚‰ğ‘‚Šğ‘‚‹ğ‘‚Œ"
local syncope_pattern = "([" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "])(ğ‘‚º?[" .. all_cons .. "])a(ğ‘‚º?[" .. gsub(all_cons, "ğ‘‚¨", "") .. "])([ğ‘‚ğ‘‚€]?[" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "])"

local function rev_string(text)
    local result, length = {}, mw.ustring.len(text)
    for i = 1, length do table.insert(result, mw.ustring.sub(text, length - i + 1, length - i + 1)) end
    return table.concat(result)
end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. all_cons .. "]ğ‘‚º?)([" .. vowel .. "ğ‘‚¹]?)", function(c, d) return c .. (d == "" and "a" or d) end)

    for word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[ğ‘‚€-ğ‘ƒa]+") do
        local orig_word = word

        word = rev_string(word)

        word = gsub(word, "^a(ğ‘‚º?)([" .. all_cons .. "])(.)(.?)", function(opt, first, second, third)
            local a = ""
            if match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "ğ‘‚¹") and not perm_cl[first .. second .. third] or match(first .. second, "ğ‘‚¨[ğ‘‚²ğ‘‚µğ‘‚¶]") then a = "a" end

            return a .. opt .. first .. second .. third
        end)

        while match(word, syncope_pattern) do word = gsub(word, syncope_pattern, "%1%2%3%4") end

        word = gsub(word, "(.?)ğ‘‚(.)", function(succ, prev)
            local mid = nasal_assim[succ] or "n"
            if succ .. prev == "a" then
                mid = "ğ‘‚ºğ‘‚§"
            elseif succ == "" and match(prev, "[" .. vowel .. "]") then
                mid = "Ìƒ"
            end
            return succ .. mid .. prev
        end)

        text = gsub(text, orig_word, rev_string(word))
    end
    text = gsub(text, ".ğ‘‚º?", conv)
    text = gsub(text, "a([iu])Ìƒ", "aÍ %1")
    text = gsub(text, "ğ‘‚”ğ‘‚¹ğ‘‚–", conv)
    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="84">
<source>wikt/translit/bho-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- Transliteration for Bhojpuri
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["à¤•"] = "k",
    ["à¤–"] = "kh",
    ["à¤—"] = "g",
    ["à¤˜"] = "gh",
    ["à¤™"] = "á¹…",
    ["à¤š"] = "c",
    ["à¤›"] = "ch",
    ["à¤œ"] = "j",
    ["à¤"] = "jh",
    ["à¤"] = "Ã±",
    ["à¤Ÿ"] = "á¹­",
    ["à¤ "] = "á¹­h",
    ["à¤¡"] = "á¸",
    ["à¤¢"] = "á¸h",
    ["à¤£"] = "á¹‡",
    ["à¤¤"] = "t",
    ["à¤¥"] = "th",
    ["à¤¦"] = "d",
    ["à¤§"] = "dh",
    ["à¤¨"] = "n",
    ["à¤ª"] = "p",
    ["à¤«"] = "ph",
    ["à¤¬"] = "b",
    ["à¤­"] = "bh",
    ["à¤®"] = "m",
    ["à¤¯"] = "y",
    ["à¤°"] = "r",
    ["à¤²"] = "l",
    ["à¤µ"] = "v",
    ["à¤³"] = "á¸·",
    ["à¤¶"] = "Å›",
    ["à¤·"] = "á¹£",
    ["à¤¸"] = "s",
    ["à¤¹"] = "h",
    ["à¤¡à¤¼"] = "á¹›",
    ["à¤¢à¤¼"] = "á¹›h",
    -- ['à¤œà¥à¤'] = 'gy',

    -- vowel diacritics
    ["à¤¿"] = "i",
    ["à¥"] = "u",
    ["à¥‡"] = "e",
    ["à¥‹"] = "o",
    ["à¤¾"] = "Ä",
    ["à¥€"] = "Ä«",
    ["à¥‚"] = "Å«",
    ["à¥ƒ"] = "Å•",
    ["à¥ˆ"] = "ai",
    ["à¥Œ"] = "au",
    ["à¥‰"] = "Å",
    ["à¥…"] = "Ä•",
    ["à¤½"] = "Ë",

    -- vowel signs
    ["à¤…"] = "a",
    ["à¤‡"] = "i",
    ["à¤‰"] = "u",
    ["à¤"] = "e",
    ["à¤“"] = "o",
    ["à¤†"] = "Ä",
    ["à¤ˆ"] = "Ä«",
    ["à¤Š"] = "Å«",
    ["à¤‹"] = "Å•",
    ["à¤"] = "ai",
    ["à¤”"] = "au",
    ["à¤‘"] = "Å",
    ["à¤"] = "Ä•",

    ["à¥"] = "om",

    -- chandrabindu
    ["à¤"] = "Ìƒ",

    -- anusvara
    ["à¤‚"] = "á¹",

    -- visarga
    ["à¤ƒ"] = "á¸¥",

    -- virama
    ["à¥"] = "",

    -- numerals
    ["à¥¦"] = "0",
    ["à¥§"] = "1",
    ["à¥¨"] = "2",
    ["à¥©"] = "3",
    ["à¥ª"] = "4",
    ["à¥«"] = "5",
    ["à¥¬"] = "6",
    ["à¥­"] = "7",
    ["à¥®"] = "8",
    ["à¥¯"] = "9",

    -- punctuation
    ["à¥¤"] = ".", -- danda
    ["+"] = "", -- compound separator

    -- abbreviation sign
    ["à¥°"] = "."
}

local nasal_assim = {["à¤œà¤¼"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤•"] = "à¤™", ["à¤–"] = "à¤™", ["à¤—"] = "à¤™", ["à¤˜"] = "à¤™", ["à¤š"] = "à¤", ["à¤›"] = "à¤", ["à¤œ"] = "à¤", ["à¤"] = "à¤", ["à¤Ÿ"] = "à¤£", ["à¤ "] = "à¤£", ["à¤¡"] = "à¤£", ["à¤¢"] = "à¤£", ["à¤ª"] = "à¤®", ["à¤«"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¬"] = "à¤®", ["à¤­"] = "à¤®", ["à¤®"] = "à¤®"}

local perm_cl = {["à¤®à¥à¤²"] = true, ["à¤µà¥à¤²"] = true, ["à¤¨à¥à¤²"] = true}

local all_cons, special_cons = "à¤•à¤–à¤—à¤˜à¤™à¤šà¤›à¤œà¤à¤à¤Ÿà¤ à¤¡à¤¢à¤¤à¤¥à¤¦à¤§à¤ªà¤«à¤¬à¤­à¤¶à¤·à¤¸à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¹à¤£à¤¨à¤®", "à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¹à¤¨à¤®"
local vowel, vowel_sign = "aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…", "à¤…à¤‡à¤‰à¤à¤“à¤†à¤ˆà¤Šà¤‹à¤à¤”à¤‘à¤à¤½"
local syncope_pattern = "([" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "])(à¤¼?[" .. all_cons .. "])a(à¤¼?[" .. gsub(all_cons, "à¤¯", "") .. "])([à¤‚à¤]?[" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "])"

local function rev_string(text)
    local result, length = {}, mw.ustring.len(text)
    for i = 1, length do table.insert(result, mw.ustring.sub(text, length - i + 1, length - i + 1)) end
    return table.concat(result)
end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. all_cons .. "]à¤¼?)([" .. vowel .. "à¥]?)", function(c, d) return c .. (d == "" and "a" or d) end)

    for word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[à¤€-à¥¿a]+") do
        local orig_word = word

        word = rev_string(word)

        word = gsub(word, "^a(à¤¼?)([" .. all_cons .. "])(.)(.?)", function(opt, first, second, third)
            local a = ""
            if match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "à¥") and not perm_cl[first .. second .. third] or match(first .. second, "à¤¯[à¥€à¥‡à¥ˆ]") then a = "a" end

            return a .. opt .. first .. second .. third
        end)

        while match(word, syncope_pattern) do word = gsub(word, syncope_pattern, "%1%2%3%4") end

        word = gsub(word, "(.?)à¤‚(.)", function(succ, prev)
            local mid = nasal_assim[succ] or "n"
            if succ .. prev == "a" then
                mid = "à¥à¤®"
            elseif succ == "" and match(prev, "[" .. vowel .. "]") then
                mid = "Ìƒ"
            end
            return succ .. mid .. prev
        end)

        text = gsub(text, orig_word, rev_string(word))
    end
    text = gsub(text, ".à¤¼?", conv)
    text = gsub(text, "a([iu])Ìƒ", "aÍ %1")
    text = gsub(text, "à¤œà¥à¤", conv)
    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="85">
<source>wikt/translit/bn-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- Transliteration for Bengali
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["à¦•à§à¦·"] = "kkh",
    ["à¦œà§à¦"] = "gg",
    ["à¦•"] = "k",
    ["à¦–"] = "kh",
    ["à¦—"] = "g",
    ["à¦˜"] = "gh",
    ["à¦™"] = "á¹…",
    ["à¦š"] = "c",
    ["à¦›"] = "ch",
    ["à¦œ"] = "j",
    ["à¦"] = "jh",
    ["à¦"] = "Ã±",
    ["à¦Ÿ"] = "á¹­",
    ["à¦ "] = "á¹­h",
    ["à¦¡"] = "á¸",
    ["à¦¢"] = "á¸h",
    ["à¦£"] = "n",
    ["à¦¤"] = "t",
    ["à¦¥"] = "th",
    ["à¦¦"] = "d",
    ["à¦§"] = "dh",
    ["à¦¨"] = "n",
    ["à¦ª"] = "p",
    ["à¦«"] = "ph",
    ["à¦¬"] = "b",
    ["à¦­"] = "bh",
    ["à¦®"] = "m",
    ["à¦¯"] = "j",
    ["à¦°"] = "r",
    ["à¦²"] = "l",
    ["à¦¶"] = "Å›",
    ["à¦·"] = "Å›",
    ["à¦¸"] = "Å›",
    ["à¦¹"] = "h",
    ["à¦¯à¦¼"] = "áº",
    ["à¦¡à¦¼"] = "á¹›",
    ["à¦¢à¦¼"] = "á¹›h",

    -- biÅ›Ã´rgÃ´
    ["à¦ƒ"] = "á¸¥",

    -- vowel diacritics
    ["à¦¿"] = "i",
    ["à§"] = "u",
    ["à§ƒ"] = "ri",
    ["à§‡"] = "e",
    ["à§‹"] = "o",
    ["à¦¾"] = "a",
    ["à§€"] = "i",
    ["à§‚"] = "u",
    ["à§ˆ"] = "oi",
    ["à§Œ"] = "ou",

    -- vowel signs
    ["à¦…"] = "Ã´",
    ["à¦‡"] = "i",
    ["à¦‰"] = "u",
    ["à¦‹"] = "ri",
    ["à¦"] = "e",
    ["à¦“"] = "o",
    ["à¦†"] = "a",
    ["à¦ˆ"] = "i",
    ["à¦Š"] = "u",
    ["à¦"] = "oi",
    ["à¦”"] = "ou",

    -- hÃ´Å›Ã´ntÃ´
    ["à§"] = "",

    -- cÃ´ndrÃ´bindu
    ["à¦"] = "Ìƒ",

    -- Ã´nuÅ›Å›ar
    ["à¦‚"] = "á¹…",

    -- Ã´bÃ´grÃ´hÃ´
    ["à¦½"] = "â€™",

    -- khÃ´ndÃ´ tÃ´
    ["à§"] = "t",

    -- numerals
    ["à§¦"] = "0",
    ["à§§"] = "1",
    ["à§¨"] = "2",
    ["à§©"] = "3",
    ["à§ª"] = "4",
    ["à§«"] = "5",
    ["à§¬"] = "6",
    ["à§­"] = "7",
    ["à§®"] = "8",
    ["à§¯"] = "9",

    -- punctuations
    ["à¥¤"] = ".", -- dÃ£á¹›i
    ["à¥¥"] = "." -- double dÃ£á¹›i
}

local deaspirate = {["à¦–"] = "à¦•", ["à¦˜"] = "à¦—", ["à¦›"] = "à¦š", ["à¦"] = "à¦œ", ["à¦ "] = "à¦Ÿ", ["à¦¢"] = "à¦¡", ["à¦¥"] = "à¦¤", ["à¦§"] = "à¦¦", ["à¦«"] = "à¦ª", ["à¦­"] = "à¦¬", ["à¦¢à¦¼"] = "à¦¡à¦¼"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local c = "([à¦•à¦·à¦œà¦à¦•à¦–à¦—à¦˜à¦™à¦šà¦›à¦œà¦à¦à¦Ÿà¦ à¦¡à¦¢à¦£à¦¤à¦¥à¦¦à¦§à¦¨à¦ªà¦«à¦¬à¦­à¦®à¦¯à¦°à¦²à¦¶à¦·à¦¸à¦¹]à¦¼?)"
    local y = "à¦¯"
    local r = "à¦°"
    local v = "([Ã´à§à¦¿à§à§ƒà§‡à§‹à¦¾à§€à§‚à§ˆà§Œà¦…à¦‡à¦‰à¦‹à¦à¦“à¦†à¦ˆà¦Šà¦à¦”])"
    local virama = "à§"
    local n = "(à¦‚?)"

    local no_virama = gsub(v, virama, "")

    text = text .. " "

    text = gsub(text, c .. "à§à¦¯", function(f) if deaspirate[f] then return deaspirate[f] .. "à§" .. f end end)

    text = gsub(text, c, "%1Ã´")
    text = gsub(text, "Ã´" .. "([Ã´à§à¦¿à§à§ƒà§‡à§‹à¦¾à§€à§‚à§ˆà§Œ])", "%1")

    text = gsub(text, v .. n .. c .. "Ã´ ", function(j, k, l) -- ending
        return l == y and j .. k .. l .. "Ã´ " or j .. k .. l .. " "
    end)

    local pattern = v .. n .. c .. "Ã´" .. c .. no_virama
    local continue = true
    while continue do
        continue = false
        text = gsub(text, "(.*)" .. pattern, function(d, e, f, g, h, i)
            if g ~= y and g ~= r then continue = true end
            return (g == y or g == r) and d .. e .. f .. g .. "Ã´" .. h .. i or d .. e .. f .. g .. h .. i
        end)
    end

    text = gsub(text, "à¦“à¦¯à¦¼", "áº‡")
    text = gsub(text, "([à¦¯à¦¡à¦¢]à¦¼)", conv)
    text = gsub(text, "à¦•à§à¦·", "kkh")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦œà§à¦", "gg")
    text = gsub(text, ".", conv)

    text = gsub(text, "Ë(.)", "%1%1")

    text = gsub(text, " ?à¥¤", ".")

    -- vowel fix
    text = gsub(text, "([ÄÄ“eo]y)Ã´ ", "%1 ")

    -- nasalization fix
    text = gsub(text, "Ã´N ", "Ã´ng ")
    text = gsub(text, "N", "ng")

    -- tb / sb -> t / s
    text = gsub(text, "([tsÅ›])b", "%1")

    text = gsub(text, " $", "")

    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="86">
<source>wikt/translit/bo-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    ["à½€"] = "k",
    ["à½"] = "kh",
    ["à½‚"] = "g",
    ["à½„"] = "ng",
    ["à½…"] = "c",
    ["à½†"] = "ch",
    ["à½‡"] = "j",
    ["à½‰"] = "ny",
    ["à½"] = "t",
    ["à½"] = "th",
    ["à½‘"] = "d",
    ["à½“"] = "n",
    ["à½”"] = "p",
    ["à½•"] = "ph",
    ["à½–"] = "b",
    ["à½˜"] = "m",
    ["à½™"] = "ts",
    ["à½š"] = "tsh",
    ["à½›"] = "dz",
    ["à½"] = "w",
    ["à½"] = "zh",
    ["à½Ÿ"] = "z",
    ["à½ "] = "â€˜",
    ["à½¡"] = "y",
    ["à½¢"] = "r",
    ["à½£"] = "l",
    ["à½¤"] = "sh",
    ["à½¦"] = "s",
    ["à½§"] = "h",
    ["à½¨"] = "a",
    ["à½Š"] = "á¹­",
    ["à½‹"] = "á¹­h",
    ["à½Œ"] = "á¸",
    ["à½"] = "á¹‡",
    ["à½¥"] = "á¹£",

    ["à½²"] = "i",
    ["à½´"] = "u",
    ["à½º"] = "e",
    ["à½¼"] = "o",
    ["à½±"] = "Ä",
    ["à½±à½²"] = "Ä«",
    ["à½±à½´"] = "Å«",
    ["à½»"] = "ai",
    ["à½½"] = "au",
    ["à¾²à¾€"] = "á¹›",
    ["à½·"] = "á¹",
    ["à¾³à¾€"] = "á¸·",
    ["à½¹"] = "á¸¹",
    ["à½¾"] = "á¹ƒ",
    ["à¾ƒ"] = "á¹ƒ",
    ["à½¿"] = "aá¸¥",
    ["à¼€"] = "oá¹ƒ",

    ["à¾"] = "k",
    ["à¾‘"] = "kh",
    ["à¾’"] = "g",
    ["à¾”"] = "ng",
    ["à¾•"] = "c",
    ["à¾–"] = "ch",
    ["à¾—"] = "j",
    ["à¾™"] = "ny",
    ["à¾Ÿ"] = "t",
    ["à¾ "] = "th",
    ["à¾¡"] = "d",
    ["à¾£"] = "n",
    ["à¾¤"] = "p",
    ["à¾¥"] = "ph",
    ["à¾¦"] = "b",
    ["à¾¨"] = "m",
    ["à¾©"] = "ts",
    ["à¾ª"] = "tsh",
    ["à¾«"] = "dz",
    ["à¾­"] = "w",
    ["à¾®"] = "zh",
    ["à¾¯"] = "z",
    ["à¾°"] = "â€˜",
    ["à¾±"] = "y",
    ["à¾²"] = "r",
    ["à¾³"] = "l",
    ["à¾´"] = "sh",
    ["à¾¶"] = "s",
    ["à¾·"] = "h",
    ["à¾¸"] = "a",
    ["à¾š"] = "á¹­",
    ["à¾›"] = "á¹­h",
    ["à¾œ"] = "á¸",
    ["à¾"] = "á¹‡",
    ["à¾µ"] = "á¹£"
}

local symbol = {["à¼ "] = "0", ["à¼¡"] = "1", ["à¼¢"] = "2", ["à¼£"] = "3", ["à¼¤"] = "4", ["à¼¥"] = "5", ["à¼¦"] = "6", ["à¼§"] = "7", ["à¼¨"] = "8", ["à¼©"] = "9", ["à¼ª"] = "0.5", ["à¼«"] = "1.5", ["à¼¬"] = "2.5", ["à¼­"] = "3.5", ["à¼®"] = "4.5", ["à¼¯"] = "5.5", ["à¼°"] = "6.5", ["à¼±"] = "7.5", ["à¼²"] = "8.5", ["à¼³"] = "9.5", ["à¼‹"] = " ", ["à¼"] = "Â·", ["â€˜"] = "'"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc, debug_mode)
    text = gsub(text, "[à¼Œà¼‹]+ ?", "à¼‹")
    text = gsub(text, "[à¼‹à¼]+$", "")
    text = gsub(text, "([^à¼‹])(à½ [à½±à½²à½ºà½¼à½²à½´à¾²à½·à¾³à½¹à½¾à½¿])", "%1à¼‹â€˜à¼‹%2")

    for Tibetan_word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[à¼‹-à¼‘à½€-à¾¼]+") do
        Tibetan_word = gsub(Tibetan_word, "à¼‹$", "")

        for syllable in mw.ustring.gmatch(Tibetan_word, "[à½€-à¾¼]+") do
            local tr = {}

            local syl = gsub(syllable, "à½¨([à½±à½²à½ºà½¼à½²à½´à¾²à½·à¾³à½¹à½¾à½¿])", "%1")
            syl = gsub(syl, "([à¾à¾‘à¾’à¾”à¾•à¾–à¾—à¾™à¾Ÿà¾ à¾¡à¾£à¾¤à¾¥à¾¦à¾¨à¾©à¾ªà¾«à¾®à¾¯à¾­à¾°à¾±à¾²à¾³à¾´à¾¶à¾·à¾¸]+)([^à½±à½²à½ºà½¼à½²à½´à¾²à½·à¾³à½¹à½¾à½¿à¾à¾‘à¾’à¾”à¾•à¾–à¾—à¾™à¾Ÿà¾ à¾¡à¾£à¾¤à¾¥à¾¦à¾¨à¾©à¾ªà¾«à¾®à¾¯à¾­à¾°à¾±à¾²à¾³à¾´à¾¶à¾·à¾¸]*)$", "%1a%2")
            letter = mw.text.split(syl, "", true)

            for i = 1, #letter do tr[i] = conv[letter[i]] or letter[i] end

            if not match(syllable, "[à¾à¾‘à¾’à¾”à¾•à¾–à¾—à¾™à¾Ÿà¾ à¾¡à¾£à¾¤à¾¥à¾¦à¾¨à¾©à¾ªà¾«à¾®à¾¯à¾­à¾°à¾±à¾²à¾³à¾´à¾¶à¾·à¾¸à½²à½ºà½¼à½´à½¨à½±à½±à½±à½²à½»à½½à½´à¾²à¾€à½·à¾³à¾€à½¹à½¾à¾ƒà½¿]") then
                if #letter < 5 then
                    if #letter > 3 then
                        if letter[2] ~= "à½ " and letter[3] ~= "à½ " then table.insert(tr, 3, "a") end

                    elseif #letter > 2 then
                        if letter[3] == "à½ " then
                            if letter[1] == "à½ " then
                                tr = {"â€˜", tr[2], "a", "â€˜"}
                            else
                                tr = {tr[1], tr[2], "a", "â€˜"}
                            end

                        elseif not match(letter[1], "[à½‚à½‘à½–à½ à½˜]") or (match(letter[1] .. letter[2] .. letter[3], "[à½‚à½‘à½–à½ à½˜][à½‚à½„à½à½–à½˜à½ à½¢à½£]à½¦")) then
                            table.insert(tr, 2, "a")
                        else
                            table.insert(tr, 3, "a")
                        end

                    elseif match(letter[1], "[à½‚à½‘à½–à½ à½˜]") and not match(letter[2] or "", "[à½‚à½„à½‘à½à½–à½˜à½ à½¢à½£à½¦à½“]") then
                        table.insert(tr, "a")
                    else
                        table.insert(tr, 2, "a")
                    end
                end
            end

            tr = table.concat(tr)

            if match(syllable, "à½‚à½¡") then tr = gsub(tr, "gy", "g.y") end

            if syllable == "à½ à½‚à½¦" then tr = gsub(tr, "â€˜ags", "â€˜gas") end

            if syllable == "à½‘à½–à½¦" then tr = gsub(tr, "dabs", "dbas") end

            if syllable == "à½‘à½‚à½¦" then tr = gsub(tr, "dags", "dgas") end

            if syllable == "à½‘à½˜à½¦" then tr = gsub(tr, "dams", "dmas") end

            text = gsub(text, syllable, tr, 1)
        end
    end

    text = gsub(text, ".", symbol)
    text = gsub(text, " ' ", "")
    text = gsub(text, " *Â· *Â·? *", " Â· ")
    text = gsub(text, " *%.", ".")

    if match(text, "[à½€-à¾¼]") and not debug_mode then
        return nil
    else
        return text
    end
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>
