<source>wikt/translit/bpy-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["à¦•à§à¦·"] = "kkh",
    ["à¦œà§à¦"] = "gy",
    ["à¦•"] = "k",
    ["à¦–"] = "kh",
    ["à¦—"] = "g",
    ["à¦˜"] = "gh",
    ["à¦™"] = "ng",
    ["à¦š"] = "c",
    ["à¦›"] = "ch",
    ["à¦œ"] = "j",
    ["à¦"] = "jh",
    ["à¦"] = "n",
    ["à¦Ÿ"] = "Å£",
    ["à¦ "] = "Å£h",
    ["à¦¡"] = "Ä‘",
    ["à¦¢"] = "Å—h",
    ["à¦£"] = "n",
    ["à¦¤"] = "t",
    ["à¦¥"] = "th",
    ["à¦¦"] = "d",
    ["à¦§"] = "dh",
    ["à¦¨"] = "n",
    ["à¦ª"] = "p",
    ["à¦«"] = "ph",
    ["à¦¬"] = "b",
    ["à¦­"] = "bh",
    ["à¦®"] = "m",
    ["à¦¯"] = "j",
    ["à¦°"] = "r",
    ["à¦²"] = "l",
    ["à§±"] = "w",
    ["à¦¶"] = "ÅŸ",
    ["à¦·"] = "ÅŸÅŸ",
    ["à¦¸"] = "s",
    ["à¦¹"] = "h",
    ["à¦¯à¦¼"] = "y",
    ["à¦¡à¦¼"] = "Ä‘h",
    ["à¦¢à¦¼"] = "Å—h",

    -- visarga
    ["à¦ƒ"] = "á¸¥",

    -- vowel diacritics
    ["à¦¿"] = "i",
    ["à§"] = "u",
    ["à§ƒ"] = "ri",
    ["à§‡"] = "e",
    ["à§‹"] = "o",
    ["à¦¾"] = "a",
    ["à§€"] = "i",
    ["à§‚"] = "u",
    ["à§ˆ"] = "oi",
    ["à§Œ"] = "ou",

    -- vowel signs
    ["à¦…"] = "Ã´",
    ["à¦‡"] = "i",
    ["à¦‰"] = "u",
    ["à¦‹"] = "ri",
    ["à¦"] = "e",
    ["à¦“"] = "o",
    ["à¦†"] = "a",
    ["à¦ˆ"] = "i",
    ["à¦Š"] = "u",
    ["à¦"] = "oi",
    ["à¦”"] = "ou",

    -- hÃ´shÃ´ntÃ´
    ["à§"] = "",

    -- chÃ´ndrÃ´bindu
    ["à¦"] = "Ìƒ",

    -- Ã´nusbar
    ["à¦‚"] = "ng",

    -- khÃ´ndÃ´ tÃ´
    ["à§"] = "t",

    -- numerals
    ["à§¦"] = "0",
    ["à§§"] = "1",
    ["à§¨"] = "2",
    ["à§©"] = "3",
    ["à§ª"] = "4",
    ["à§«"] = "5",
    ["à§¬"] = "6",
    ["à§­"] = "7",
    ["à§®"] = "8",
    ["à§¯"] = "9",

    -- punctuation
    ["à¥¤"] = "." -- dari
}

local deaspirate = {["à¦–"] = "à¦•", ["à¦˜"] = "à¦—", ["à¦›"] = "à¦š", ["à¦"] = "à¦œ", ["à¦ "] = "à¦Ÿ", ["à¦¢"] = "à¦¡", ["à¦¥"] = "à¦¤", ["à¦§"] = "à¦¦", ["à¦«"] = "à¦ª", ["à¦­"] = "à¦¬", ["à¦¢à¦¼"] = "à¦¡à¦¼"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local c = "([à¦•à¦·à¦œà¦à¦•à¦–à¦—à¦˜à¦™à¦šà¦›à¦œà¦à¦à¦Ÿà¦ à¦¡à¦¢à¦£à¦¤à¦¥à¦¦à¦§à¦¨à¦ªà¦«à¦¬à¦­à¦®à¦¯à¦°à¦²à§±à¦¶à¦·à¦¸à¦¹]à¦¼?)"
    local y = "à¦¯à¦¼"
    local r = "à¦°"
    local v = "([Ã´à§à¦¿à§à§ƒà§‡à§‹à¦¾à§€à§‚à§ˆà§Œà¦…à¦‡à¦‰à¦‹à¦à¦“à¦†à¦ˆà¦Šà¦à¦”])"
    local virama = "à§"
    local n = "(à¦‚?)"

    local no_virama = gsub(v, virama, "")

    text = text .. " "

    text = gsub(text, c .. "à§à¦¯", function(f) if deaspirate[f] then return deaspirate[f] .. "à§" .. f end end)

    text = gsub(text, c, "%1Ã´")
    text = gsub(text, "Ã´" .. "([Ã´à§à¦¿à§à§ƒà§‡à§‹à¦¾à§€à§‚à§ˆà§Œ])", "%1")

    text = gsub(text, v .. n .. c .. "Ã´ ", function(j, k, l) -- ending
        return l == y and j .. k .. l .. "Ã´ " or j .. k .. l .. " "
    end)

    local pattern = v .. n .. c .. "Ã´" .. c .. no_virama
    local continue = true
    while continue do
        continue = false
        text = gsub(text, "(.*)" .. pattern, function(d, e, f, g, h, i)
            if g ~= y and g ~= r then continue = true end
            return (g == y or g == r) and d .. e .. f .. g .. "Ã´" .. h .. i or d .. e .. f .. g .. h .. i
        end)
    end

    text = gsub(text, "([à¦¯à¦¡à¦¢]à¦¼)", conv)
    text = gsub(text, "à¦•à§à¦·", "kkh")
    text = gsub(text, "à¦œà§à¦", "gg")
    text = gsub(text, ".", conv)

    text = gsub(text, "Ë(.)", "%1%1")

    text = gsub(text, " ?à¥¤", ".")

    -- vowel fix
    text = gsub(text, "([ÄÄ“eo]y)Ã´ ", "%1")

    -- nasalization fix
    text = gsub(text, "Ã´N ", "Ã´ng")
    text = gsub(text, "N", "ng")

    -- tb / sb -> t / s
    text = gsub(text, "([tsÅ›])b", "%1")

    text = gsub(text, " $", "")

    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="88">
<source>wikt/translit/brx-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- Transliteration for Hindi (possibly other languages using Devanagari script, except for Sanskrit)
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["à¤–"] = "k",
    ["à¤—"] = "g",
    ["à¤™"] = "á¹…",
    ["à¤œ"] = "j",
    ["à¤¥"] = "t",
    ["à¤¦"] = "d",
    ["à¤¨"] = "n",
    ["à¤«"] = "f",
    ["à¤¬"] = "b",
    ["à¤®"] = "m",
    ["à¤¯"] = "y",
    ["à¤°"] = "r",
    ["à¤²"] = "l",
    ["à¤µ"] = "o",
    ["à¤¸"] = "s",
    ["à¤¹"] = "h",

    -- vowel diacritics
    ["à¤¿"] = "i",
    ["à¥"] = "u",
    ["à¥‡"] = "e",
    ["à¥‹"] = "w",
    ["à¤¾"] = "a",
    ["à¥ˆ"] = "wi",
    ["à¥Œ"] = "wu",
    ["â€™"] = "o",

    -- vowel signs
    ["à¤…"] = "o",
    ["à¤‡"] = "i",
    ["à¤‰"] = "u",
    ["à¤"] = "e",
    ["à¤“"] = "w",
    ["à¤†"] = "a",
    ["à¤"] = "wi",
    ["à¤”"] = "wu",
    ["à¤…â€™"] = "o",

    ["à¥"] = "om",

    -- chandrabindu
    ["à¤"] = "á¹…",

    -- anusvara
    ["à¤‚"] = "á¹…",

    -- visarga
    ["à¤ƒ"] = "á¸¥",

    -- virama
    ["à¥"] = "",

    -- numerals
    ["à¥¦"] = "0",
    ["à¥§"] = "1",
    ["à¥¨"] = "2",
    ["à¥©"] = "3",
    ["à¥ª"] = "4",
    ["à¥«"] = "5",
    ["à¥¬"] = "6",
    ["à¥­"] = "7",
    ["à¥®"] = "8",
    ["à¥¯"] = "9",

    -- punctuation
    ["à¥¤"] = ".", -- danda
    ["à¥¥"] = ".", -- double danda
    ["+"] = "", -- compound separator

    -- abbreviation sign
    ["à¥°"] = "."
}

-- These clusters when occurring word-finally will not trigger a schwa added
-- after them even though the second consonant is in special_cons, which normally
-- causes the extra schwa to be added. NOTE: The clusters are reversed from their
-- ultimate effect, e.g. the first cluster is written 'ml' but actually applies
-- to words ending in 'lm'. The clusters below overall refer to the six clusters
-- describable by [rl][mnv], i.e. rm, rn, rv, lm, ln, lv.
local perm_cl = {["à¤®à¥à¤²"] = true, ["à¤µà¥à¤²"] = true, ["à¤¨à¥à¤²"] = true, ["à¤®à¥à¤°"] = true, ["à¤µà¥à¤°"] = true, ["à¤¨à¥à¤°"] = true}

local all_cons, special_cons = "à¤•à¤–à¤—à¤˜à¤™à¤šà¤›à¤œà¤à¤à¤Ÿà¤ à¤¡à¤¢à¤¤à¤¥à¤¦à¤§à¤ªà¤«à¤¬à¤­à¤¶à¤·à¤¸à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¹à¤£à¤¨à¤®", "à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¹à¤¨à¤®"
local vowel, vowel_sign = "*à¤¿à¥à¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥ˆà¥Œâ€™o'", "à¤…à¤‡à¤‰à¤à¤“à¤†à¤à¤”à¤…â€™'"
local long_vowel, short_vowel = "à¤¾à¥ˆà¥Œà¤†à¤à¤”", "*à¤¿à¥à¥‡à¥‹â€™à¤…à¤‡à¤‰à¤à¤“à¤…'"
local syncope_pattern = "([" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "])(à¤¼?[" .. all_cons .. "])o(à¤¼?[" .. all_cons .. "])([à¤‚à¤]?[" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "])"

local function rev_string(text)
    local result, length = {}, mw.ustring.len(text)
    for i = length, 1, -1 do table.insert(result, mw.ustring.sub(text, i, i)) end
    return table.concat(result)
end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- abbreviation dot
    text = gsub(text, "à¥°", ".")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. all_cons .. "]à¤¼?)([" .. vowel .. "à¥]?)", function(c, d) return c .. (d == "" and "o" or d) end)
    for word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[à¤€à¤€-à¥¿o']+") do
        local orig_word = word
        word = rev_string(word)
        word = gsub(word, "^o(à¤¼?)([" .. all_cons .. "])(.)(.?)", function(opt, first, second, third) return (((match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "à¥") and not perm_cl[first .. second .. third]) or match(first .. second, "à¤¯[à¥€]")) and "o" or "") .. opt .. first .. second .. third end)
        while match(word, syncope_pattern) do word = gsub(word, syncope_pattern, "%1%2%3%4") end
        word = rev_string(word)
        -- Convert * to %* so we can match it in a regex.
        local escaped_orig_word = gsub(orig_word, "%*", "%*")
        text = gsub(text, escaped_orig_word, word)
    end
    text = gsub(text, ".à¤¼?", conv)
    text = gsub(text, "%*", "o")
    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="89">
<source>wikt/translit/btx-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local consonants = {["á¯€"] = "(h)", ["á¯‚"] = "k", ["á¯…"] = "b", ["á¯‡"] = "p", ["á¯‰"] = "n", ["á¯‹"] = "w", ["á¯"] = "g", ["á¯"] = "j", ["á¯‘"] = "d", ["á¯’"] = "r", ["á¯”"] = "m", ["á¯—"] = "t", ["á¯˜"] = "s", ["á¯›"] = "y", ["á¯"] = "ng", ["á¯"] = "l", ["á¯ "] = "c", ["á¯¡"] = "c"}

local diacritics = {["á¯§"] = "e", ["á¯©"] = "e", ["á¯ª"] = "i", ["á¯«"] = "i", ["á¯¨"] = "o", ["á¯­"] = "o", ["á¯¬"] = "u", ["á¯³"] = ""}

local nonconsonants = {
    -- vowels
    ["á¯¤"] = "i",
    ["á¯¥"] = "u",
    -- aditional characters
    ["á¯°"] = "ng",
    ["á¯±"] = "h"
}

-- translit any words or phrases
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([á¯€á¯‚á¯…á¯‡á¯‰á¯‹á¯á¯á¯‘á¯’á¯”á¯—á¯˜á¯›á¯á¯á¯ á¯¡])" .. "([á¯§á¯©á¯ªá¯«á¯¨á¯­á¯¬á¯³]?)", function(c, d)
        if d == "" then
            return consonants[c] .. "a"
        else
            return consonants[c] .. diacritics[d]
        end
    end)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", nonconsonants)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="90">
<source>wikt/translit/bua-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ•"] = "Je",
    ["Ğ"] = "Jo",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ò¤"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ó¨"] = "Ã–",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ò®"] = "Ãœ",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "X",
    ["Òº"] = "H",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Å Ä",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Y",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğµ"] = "je",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "jo",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ò¥"] = "Å‹",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ó©"] = "Ã¶",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ò¯"] = "Ã¼",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ñ…"] = "x",
    ["Ò»"] = "h",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "y",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc) return (mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tab)) end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="91">
<source>wikt/translit/ce-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {["Ğ°"] = "a", ["Ğ±"] = "b", ["Ğ²"] = "w", ["Ğ³"] = "g", ["Ğ´"] = "d", ["Ğµ"] = "e", ["Ñ‘"] = "Ã«", ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾", ["Ğ·"] = "z", ["Ğ¸"] = "i", ["Ğ¹"] = "j", ["Ğº"] = "k", ["Ğ»"] = "l", ["Ğ¼"] = "m", ["Ğ½"] = "n", ["Ğ¾"] = "o", ["Ğ¿"] = "p", ["Ñ€"] = "r", ["Ñ"] = "s", ["Ñ‚"] = "t", ["Ñƒ"] = "u", ["Ñ„"] = "f", ["Ñ…"] = "Ï‡", ["Ñ†"] = "c", ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä", ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡", ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä", ["ÑŠ"] = "Ê¾", ["Ñ‹"] = "y", ["ÑŒ"] = "â€™", ["Ñ"] = "e", ["Ñ"] = "ju", ["Ñ"] = "ja", ["Ó"] = "Ê¿", ["Ğ"] = "A", ["Ğ‘"] = "B", ["Ğ’"] = "W", ["Ğ“"] = "G", ["Ğ”"] = "D", ["Ğ•"] = "E", ["Ğ"] = "Ã‹", ["Ğ–"] = "Å½", ["Ğ—"] = "Z", ["Ğ˜"] = "I", ["Ğ™"] = "J", ["Ğš"] = "K", ["Ğ›"] = "L", ["Ğœ"] = "M", ["Ğ"] = "N", ["Ğ"] = "O", ["ĞŸ"] = "P", ["Ğ "] = "R", ["Ğ¡"] = "S", ["Ğ¢"] = "T", ["Ğ£"] = "U", ["Ğ¤"] = "F", ["Ğ¥"] = "Î§", ["Ğ¦"] = "C", ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ", ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ", ["Ğ©"] = "Å Ä", ["Ğª"] = "Ê¾", ["Ğ«"] = "Y", ["Ğ¬"] = "â€™", ["Ğ­"] = "E", ["Ğ®"] = "Ju", ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja", ["Ó"] = "Ê¿"};

local digraphs = {["ĞÑŒ"] = "Ã„", ["Ğ°ÑŒ"] = "Ã¤", ["Ğ“Ó"] = "Ä ", ["Ğ³Ó"] = "Ä¡", ["Ğ”Ğ¶"] = "Ç®", ["Ğ´Ğ¶"] = "Ç¯", ["Ğ”Ğ·"] = "Æ·", ["Ğ´Ğ·"] = "Ê’", ["Ğ˜Ğ¹"] = "Äª", ["Ğ¸Ğ¹"] = "Ä«", ["ĞšÑ…"] = "Q", ["ĞºÑ…"] = "q", ["ĞšÓ"] = "á¸²", ["ĞºÓ"] = "á¸³", ["ĞšÑŠ"] = "QÌ‡", ["ĞºÑŠ"] = "qÌ‡", ["ĞÑŒ"] = "Ã–", ["Ğ¾ÑŒ"] = "Ã¶", ["ĞŸÓ"] = "á¹–", ["Ğ¿Ó"] = "á¹—", ["Ğ¢Ó"] = "á¹¬", ["Ñ‚Ó"] = "á¹­", ["Ğ£ÑŒ"] = "Ãœ", ["ÑƒÑŒ"] = "Ã¼", ["Ğ¥Ó"] = "H", ["Ñ…Ó"] = "h", ["Ğ¥ÑŒ"] = "á¸¤", ["Ñ…ÑŒ"] = "á¸¥", ["Ğ¦Ó"] = "CÌ£", ["Ñ†Ó"] = "cÌ£", ["Ğ§Ó"] = "ÄŒÌ£", ["Ñ‡Ó"] = "ÄÌ£", ["Ğ®ÑŒ"] = "JÃ¼", ["ÑÑŒ"] = "jÃ¼", ["Ğ¯ÑŒ"] = "JÃ¤", ["ÑÑŒ"] = "jÃ¤"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local str_gsub = string.gsub

    -- Convert capital to lowercase palochka. Lowercase is found in tables
    -- above.
    text = str_gsub(text, mw.ustring.char(0x4C0), mw.ustring.char(0x4CF))
    text = str_gsub(text, "ĞºĞºÑ…", "qË")
    text = str_gsub(text, "ĞšĞºÑ…", "QË")

    for digraph, translit in pairs(digraphs) do text = str_gsub(text, digraph, translit) end

    text = str_gsub(text, "[%z\1-127\194-\244][\128-\191]*", tt) -- UTF-8 character pattern

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="93">
<source>wikt/translit/chm-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğ"] = "Ã‹",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ò¤"] = "á¹„",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ó¦"] = "Ã–",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ó°"] = "Ãœ",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "H",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Åœ",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Y",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ­"] = "Ãˆ",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ã›",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ã‚",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "Ã«",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ò¥"] = "á¹…",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ó§"] = "Ã¶",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ó±"] = "Ã¼",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ñ…"] = "h",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "y",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ñ"] = "Ã¨",
    ["Ñ"] = "Ã»",
    ["Ñ"] = "Ã¢",
    -- Hill (Western) Mari only, doesn't use Ò¤, Ò¥
    ["Ó’"] = "Ã„",
    ["Ó¸"] = "Å¸",
    ["Ó“"] = "Ã¤",
    ["Ó¹"] = "Ã¿"
}

function export.tr(text)
    -- Ğ needs converting if is decomposed
    text = text:gsub("Ñ‘", "Ñ‘"):gsub("Ğ", "Ğ")

    -- Ğµ after a vowel or at the beginning of a word becomes je
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ĞÓ’ĞÓ¦Ğ£Ó°Ğ«Ó¸Ğ•Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜Ğ•ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ó“Ğ¾Ó§ÑƒÓ±Ñ‹Ó¹ÑÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ĞµÑŠÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?)Ğµ", "%1je")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "^Ğ•", "Je")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "^Ğµ", "je")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])Ğ•", "%1Je")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])Ğµ", "%1je")

    return (mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tab))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<source>wikt/translit/cjs-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ò’"] = "Äœ",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğ"] = "Yo",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ™"] = "Y",
    ["Ğˆ"] = "JÌŒ[[Category:Shor text with old orthography]]",
    ["J"] = "JÌŒ[[Category:Shor text with misused character(s)]][[Category:Shor text with old orthography]]",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Òš"] = "KÌ‚",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ò¢"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Ò¤"] = "ÅŠ[[Category:Shor text with old orthography]]",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ó¦"] = "Ã–",
    ["Ã–"] = "Ã–[[Category:Shor text with misused character(s)]]",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ó°"] = "Ãœ",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "H",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Å Ä",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Ã",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Yu",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ya",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ò“"] = "Ä",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "yo",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "y",
    ["Ñ˜"] = "Ç°[[Category:Shor text with old orthography]]",
    ["j"] = "Ç°[[Category:Shor text with misused character(s)]][[Category:Shor text with old orthography]]",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ò›"] = "kÌ‚",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ò£"] = "Å‹",
    ["Ò¥"] = "Å‹[[Category:Shor text with old orthography]]",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ó§"] = "Ã¶",
    ["Ã¶"] = "Ã¶[[Category:Shor text with misused character(s)]]",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ó±"] = "Ã¼",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ñ…"] = "h",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "Ä±",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",
    ["Ñ"] = "yu",
    ["Ñ"] = "ya"
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- Ğ needs converting if is decomposed
    text = text:gsub("Ñ‘", "Ñ‘"):gsub("Ğ", "Ğ")

    -- Ğµ after a vowel or at the beginning of a word becomes ye
    -- Note that according to modern Shor orthography ĞµĞµ (instead of ÑÑ) is occationally used for long e
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ĞĞÓ¨Ğ£Ò®Ğ«Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ğ¾Ó©ÑƒÒ¯Ñ‹ÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ÑŠÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?)Ğµ", "%1ye")
    -- text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ĞĞÓ¨Ğ£Ò®Ğ«Ğ•Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜Ğ•ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ğ¾Ó©ÑƒÒ¯Ñ‹ÑÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ĞµÑŠÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?)Ğµ","%1ye")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "^Ğ•", "Ye")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "^Ğµ", "ye")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])Ğ•", "%1Ye")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])Ğµ", "%1ye")

    return (mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tab))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="96">
<source>wikt/translit/ckb-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- Authors: JavaScript Ø¦Ø§Ø³Û†; Lua Ghybu, Calak
local export = {}

local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local U = mw.ustring.char

local mapping = {
    ["Ø§"] = "a",
    ["Ø¨"] = "b",
    ["Ú†"] = "Ã§",
    ["Ø¬"] = "c",
    ["Ø¯"] = "d",
    ["Û•"] = "e",
    ["Û"] = "Ãª",
    ["Ù"] = "f",
    ["Ú¯"] = "g",
    ["Ú¾"] = "h",
    ["Ù‡"] = "h",
    ["Ø­"] = "á¸§",
    ["Ú˜"] = "j",
    ["Ú©"] = "k",
    ["Úµ"] = "ll",
    ["Ù„"] = "l",
    ["Ù…"] = "m",
    ["Ù†"] = "n",
    ["Û†"] = "o",
    ["Ù¾"] = "p",
    ["Ù‚"] = "q",
    ["Ø±"] = "r",
    ["Ú•"] = "r",
    ["Ø³"] = "s",
    ["Ø´"] = "ÅŸ",
    ["Øª"] = "t",
    ["Ú¤"] = "v",
    ["Ø®"] = "x",
    ["Øº"] = "áº",
    ["Ø²"] = "z",
    ["Ø¦"] = "",
    ["Ø¹"] = "'",

    [U(0x200C)] = "", -- ZWNJ (zero-width non-joiner)
    ["Ù€"] = "", -- kashida, no sound

    -- numerals
    ["Ù¡"] = "1",
    ["Ù¢"] = "2",
    ["Ù£"] = "3",
    ["Ù¤"] = "4",
    ["Ù¥"] = "5",
    ["Ù¦"] = "6",
    ["Ù§"] = "7",
    ["Ù¨"] = "8",
    ["Ù©"] = "9",
    ["Ù "] = "0",
    -- persian variants to numerals
    ["Û±"] = "1",
    ["Û²"] = "2",
    ["Û³"] = "3",
    ["Û´"] = "4",
    ["Ûµ"] = "5",
    ["Û¶"] = "6",
    ["Û·"] = "7",
    ["Û¸"] = "8",
    ["Û¹"] = "9",
    ["Û°"] = "0"
}

-- punctuation (leave on separate lines)
local punctuation = {
    ["ØŸ"] = "?", -- question mark
    ["ØŒ"] = ",", -- comma
    ["Ø›"] = ";", -- semicolon
    ["Â«"] = "â€œ", -- quotation mark
    ["Â»"] = "â€", -- quotation mark
    ["Ùª"] = "%", -- percent
    ["Ø‰"] = "â€°", -- per mille
    ["Ù«"] = ".", -- decimals
    ["Ù¬"] = "," -- thousand
}

-- translit
local function tr_word(word)

    word = gsub(word, ".", punctuation)

    -- Remove punctuation at the end of the word.
    if mw.ustring.find(word, "[%.%!ØŒØ›Â»Â«ÙªØ‰Ù«Ù¬%p]$") then
        ponct = mw.ustring.sub(word, -1)
        word = gsub(word, "[%.%!ØŒØ›Â»Â«ÙªØ‰Ù«Ù¬%p]$", "")
    else
        word = word
        ponct = ""
    end

    word = gsub(word, "Ù‡â€Œ", "Û•") -- correct unicode for letter Û•
    -- U+0647 (Arabic letter heh) + U+200C (zero-width non-joiner)
    -- â†“
    -- U+06D5 (Arabic letter ae)

    -- diacritics
    word = gsub(word, "Ù’", "i") -- U+0652, Arabic sukun
    word = gsub(word, "Ù", "i") -- U+0650, Arabic kasra

    -- managing 'Ùˆ' and 'ÛŒ'
    word = gsub(word, "Ùˆ([iØ§ÛÛ†Û•])", "w%1") -- Ùˆ + vowel => w (e.g. wan)
    word = gsub(word, "ÛŒ([iØ§ÛÛ†Û•])", "y%1") -- ÛŒ + vowel => y (e.g. yas)
    word = gsub(word, "([iØ§ÛÛ†Û•])Ùˆ", "%1w") -- vowel + Ùˆ => w (e.g. kew)
    word = gsub(word, "([iØ§ÛÛ†Û•])ÛŒ", "%1y") -- vowel + ÛŒ => y (e.g. bey)
    word = gsub(word, "^Ùˆ$", "Ã»") -- non-letter + 'Ùˆ' + non-letter => Ã» (=and)
    word = gsub(word, "([^Ø¡-ÙŠÙ±-Û•iwy])Ùˆ", "%1w") -- non-letter + 'Ùˆ' => w (e.g. wtar)

    word = gsub(word, "^Ùˆ", "w") -- first 'Ùˆ' => w (e.g. wtar)
    word = gsub(word, "ÛŒÙˆ", "Ã®w") -- 'ÛŒ' + 'Ùˆ' => Ã®w (e.g. nÃ®w)
    word = gsub(word, "([^Ùˆ])ÛŒÛŒ", "%1Ã®y") -- 'ÛŒ' + 'ÛŒ' => Ã®y (e.g. kanÃ®y)
    word = gsub(word, "ÙˆÛŒ", "uy") -- 'Ùˆ' + 'ÛŒ' => uy (e.g. buyn)
    word = gsub(word, "ÙˆÙˆ", "Ã»") -- 'Ùˆ' + 'Ùˆ' => Ã» (e.g. bÃ»)
    word = gsub(word, "ÛŒ", "Ã®")
    word = gsub(word, "Ùˆ", "u")
    word = gsub(word, "uu", "Ã»") -- 'Ùˆ' + 'Ùˆ' => Ã» (e.g. bÃ»)
    word = gsub(word, "([Ø¡-ÙŠÙ±-Û•iÃ®uÃ»wy])Ú•", "%1rr") -- when 'Ú•' not at the beginning of a word => rr
    word = gsub(word, "([Ø¡-ÙŠÙ±-Û•iÃ®uÃ»wy])Ø¦", "%1'") -- when 'Ø¦' not at the beginning of a word => '

    word = gsub(word, ".", mapping)

    -- insert i where applicable
    word = gsub(word, "ll", "Ä½") -- temporary conversion to avoid seeing ll as 2 letters
    word = gsub(word, "rr", "Å”") -- temporary conversion to avoid seeing rr as 2 letters

    word = gsub(word, "([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([fjlÄ½mnrÅ”sÅŸvwxáºyz])([fjlÄ½mnrÅ”sÅŸvwxáºyz])([^aeÃªiÃ®ouÃ»y])", "%1%2i%3%4") -- e.g. grft -> grift
    word = gsub(word, "([aeÃªiÃ®ouÃ»])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])$", "%1%2%3i%4") -- e.g. cejnt -> cejnit
    word = gsub(word, "([fjlÄ½rÅ”sÅŸwyz])([fjlÄ½mnrÅ”sÅŸvwxáºyz])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])", "%1i%2%3") -- e.g. wrd -> wird

    word = gsub(word, "([bcÃ§dghá¸§kmnpqtvxáº])([fjlÄ½mnrÅ”sÅŸvwxáºyz])([^aeÃªiÃ®ouÃ»])", "%1i%2%3") -- e.g. prd -> pird
    word = gsub(word, "([bcÃ§dghá¸§kmnpqtvxáº])([fjlÄ½mnrÅ”sÅŸvwxáºyz])$", "%1i%2") -- like above

    word = gsub(word, "([^aeÃªiÃ®ouÃ»])([bcÃ§dghá¸§kmnpqtvxáº])([fjlÄ½mnrÅ”sÅŸvwxáºyz])([^aeÃªiÃ®ouÃ»])", "%1%2i%3%4") -- repeat the latter expression, in case skipped
    word = gsub(word, "([^aeÃªiÃ®ouÃ»])([bcÃ§dghá¸§kmnpqtvxáº])([fjlÄ½mnrÅ”sÅŸvwxáºyz])$", "%1%2i%3") -- repeat the latter expression, in case skipped

    word = gsub(word, "^([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([^aeÃªiÃ®ouÃ»])", "%1i%2%3") -- e.g. ktk -> kitk
    word = gsub(word, "^([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])$", "%1i%2") -- e.g. ktk -> kitk
    word = gsub(word, "([^aeÃªiÃ®ouy])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([^aeÃªiÃ®ouÃ»])", "%1%2i%3%4") -- e.g. ktk -> kitk
    word = gsub(word, "([^aeÃªiÃ®ouy])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])$", "%1%2i%3") -- e.g. ktk -> kitk

    word = gsub(word, "([^a-zÃ§ÅŸÃªÃ®Ã»Ä½Å”])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])$", "%1%2i") -- e.g. j -> ji
    word = gsub(word, "^([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])$", "%1i") -- e.g. j -> ji	

    -- word = gsub(word, '([^a-zÃªÃ®Ã»Ã§ÅŸ0-9\'â€™])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvxáºz])', "%1%2i%3") --e.g. bra -> bira
    -- word = gsub(word, '^([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvxáºz])', "%1i%2") --e.g. bra -> bira

    -- word = gsub(word, '([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklmnpqrsÅŸtvwxáºz][bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])([bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklÄ½mnpqrÅ”sÅŸtvwxáºz])', "%1i%2") --e.g. aÅŸkra -> aÅŸkira

    -- word = gsub(word, 'si([tp][aeÃªiÃ®ouÃ»])', "s%1") -- sp, st cluster

    word = gsub(word, "Ä½", "ll") -- revert the temporary conversion
    word = gsub(word, "Å”", "rr") -- revert the temporary conversion

    -- Add the punctuation who had previously deleted.
    word = word .. ponct

    return word
end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local textTab = {}

    -- Create a word table separated by a space (%s).
    for _, word in ipairs(mw.text.split(text, "%s+")) do table.insert(textTab, word) end

    -- Tablo of translit.
    for key, word in ipairs(textTab) do textTab[key] = tr_word(word) end

    return table.concat(textTab, " ")
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="97">

<document_content>
local export = {}

local letters = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ"] = "Jo",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "jo",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Óƒ"] = "Q",
    ["Ó„"] = "q",
    ["Ğ›"] = "l",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ô’"] = "á¸¶",
    ["Ô“"] = "á¸·",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ó‡"] = "á¹†",
    ["Óˆ"] = "á¹‡",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "H",
    ["Ñ…"] = "h",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Å Ä",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Y",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "y",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ­"] = "Ä–",
    ["Ñ"] = "Ä—",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja",
    ["Ê¼"] = "Ê¼" -- No change
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", letters)
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>

<document index="98">
<source>wikt/translit/clw-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğ"] = "Yo",
    ["Ğ–"] = "J",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "Ä°",
    ["Ğ™"] = "Y",
    ["Ğ†"] = "Ã",
    ["Ğˆ"] = "C",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Òš"] = "Q",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ò¤"] = "Ã‘",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ó¦"] = "Ã–",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ó°"] = "Ãœ",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "X",
    ["Òº"] = "h",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ğ§"] = "Ã‡",
    ["Ò¸"] = "Ä†",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Åš",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ«"] = "I",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ­"] = "Ã„",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Yu",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ya",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "yo",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "j",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "y",
    ["Ñ–"] = "Ã¯",
    ["j"] = "c",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ò›"] = "q",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ò¥"] = "Ã±",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ó§"] = "Ã¶",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ó±"] = "Ã¼",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ñ…"] = "x",
    ["Ò»"] = "h",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ã§",
    ["Ò¹"] = "Ä‡",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "ÅŸ",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å›",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "Ä±",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ñ"] = "Ã¤",
    ["Ñ"] = "yu",
    ["Ñ"] = "ya"
}

local iotated = {["Ğ•"] = "Ye", ["Ğµ"] = "ye"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local ugsub = mw.ustring.gsub

    -- Ğ needs to be composed if is decomposed (e + combining diaeresis).
    -- However, this cannot happen in wikitext, only in Lua modules.
    text = mw.ustring.toNFC(text)

    -- Ğµ after a vowel or at the beginning of a word becomes ye
    -- Note that according to modern Altai orthography ĞµĞµ (instead of ÑÑ) is occationally used for long r
    text = ugsub(text, "([ĞĞÓ¨Ğ£Ò®Ğ«Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ğ¾Ó©ÑƒÒ¯Ñ‹ÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ÑŠÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?)Ğµ", "%1ye")
    -- text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ĞĞÓ¨Ğ£Ò®Ğ«Ğ•Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜Ğ•ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ğ¾Ó©ÑƒÒ¯Ñ‹ÑÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ĞµÑŠÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?)Ğµ", "%1ye")
    text = ugsub(text, "^[Ğ•Ğµ]", iotated)
    text = ugsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])([Ğ•Ğµ])", function(a, b) return a .. iotated[b] end)

    return (ugsub(text, ".", tab))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="99">
<source>wikt/translit/cr-east-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = require("Cans-translit").tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "o", "u")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ä«", "ii")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Å", "uu")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ä", "aa")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Å¡", "sh")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ã°", "th")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "c", "ch")
    return text
end

function export.transcribe(text)
    local replace = {"ch", "sh", "th", "kw"}
    local s = "ááƒá…áŠá¯á±á³á¸á‘Œá‘á‘á‘•á‘«á‘­á‘¯á‘²á’‰á’‹á’á’á’£á’¥á’§á’ªá“€á“‚á“„á“‡á““á“•á“—á“šá“­á“¯á“±á“´á”á”‘á”“á”•á”¦á”¨á”ªá”­á•ƒá•†á•Šá•á•“á••á•—á•™á•á• á•¤á•¦"
    local s_tr1 = "0ptk1mnls2yrv3"
    local s_tr2 = "eiua"
    local w = "ááá“á˜á»  á‘…á‘˜  á‘¢á‘µ  á‘¿á’“  á’á’­  á’·á“Š  á“Œá“  á“§á“·  á”á”˜  á”¢á”°  á”ºá£  á•á§á•“  á•›á§á•  á•¨"
    local w_tr1 = "0ptk1mnls2yrv3"
    local w_tr2 = "eiua"
    local l = "á„á†á‹á²á´á¹á‘á‘‘á‘–á‘®á‘°á‘³á’Œá’á’‘á’¦á’¨á’«á“ƒá“…á“ˆá“–á“˜á“›á“°á“²á“µá”’á””á”–á”©á”«á”®á•‡á•‹á•á•–á•˜á•šá•¢á•¥á•§áá”á™"
    local l_tr1 = "0ptk1mnls2yr1v3w"
    local l_tr2 = "Ä«Å«Ä"
    local f = "á¤á¦á‘‰á‘¦á’ƒá’„á’¡á’»á“á“ªá”…á”¥á”¾á•á•á•ª"
    local f_tr = "uhptk41mnls2yrv3"
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ãª", "e")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "u", "u")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ii", "Ä«")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "uu", "Å«")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "aa", "Ä")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aeiuÄ«Å«Ä])(w?[aeiuÄ«Å«Ä])", "%1 0%2")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "^(w?[aeiuÄ«Å«Ä])", " 0%1")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, " 0", "0")
    mw.log(text)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([" .. w_tr1 .. "])w([" .. w_tr2 .. "])", function(a, b)
        a = w_tr1:find(a)
        b = w_tr2:find(b)
        local i = a * 4 + b - 4
        return mw.ustring.sub(w, i, i)
    end)
    for i = 1, 3 do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, replace[i], tostring(i)) end
    mw.log(text)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([" .. s_tr1 .. "])([" .. s_tr2 .. "])", function(a, b)
        a = s_tr1:find(a)
        b = s_tr2:find(b)
        local i = a * 4 + b - 4
        return mw.ustring.sub(s, i, i)
    end)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([" .. l_tr1 .. "])([" .. l_tr2 .. "])", function(a, b)
        a = l_tr1:find(a)
        b = l_tr2:find(b)
        local i = a * 3 + b - 3
        return mw.ustring.sub(l, i, i)
    end)
    for i = 4, 5 do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, replace[i], tostring(i)) end
    mw.log(text)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([" .. f_tr .. "])", function(a)
        a = f_tr:find(a)
        return mw.ustring.sub(f, a, a)
    end)
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="100">
<source>wikt/translit/cr-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = require("Cans-translit").tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ä«", "ii")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Å", "oo")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ä", "aa")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Å¡", "sh")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ã°", "th")
    return text
end

function export.transcribe(text)
    local replace = {"sh", "th", "hk", "kw", "sk"}
    local s = "ááƒá…áŠá¯á±á³á¸á‘Œá‘á‘á‘•á‘«á‘­á‘¯á‘²á’‰á’‹á’á’á’£á’¥á’§á’ªá“€á“‚á“„á“‡á“­á“¯á“±á“´á”¦á”¨á”ªá”­á–Šá–‹á–Œá–á•ƒá•†á•Šá•á”á”‘á”“á”•á•“á••á•—á•™á˜šá˜›á˜•á˜”á““á“•á“—á“š"
    local s_tr1 = "0ptkcmnsyrl1f2z"
    local s_tr2 = "eioa"
    local w = "ááá“á˜á»á½á‘á‘…á‘˜á‘šá‘á‘¢á‘µá‘·á‘»á‘¿á’“á’•á’™á’á’­á’¯á’³á’·á“Š á“Œ á“·á“¹á“½á”á”°á”²á”¶á”ºá”˜á”šá”á”¢á“á“Ÿá“£á“§"
    local w_tr1 = "0ptkcmnsyrz"
    local w_tr2 = "eioa"
    local l = "á„á†á‹á²á´á¹á‘á‘‘á‘–á‘®á‘°á‘³á’Œá’á’‘á’¦á’¨á’«á“ƒá“…á“ˆá“°á“²á“µá”©á”«á”®á•‡á•‹á•á”’á””á”–á•–á•˜á•šá“–á“˜á“›áá”á™"
    local l_tr1 = "0ptkcmnsyr1flw23"
    local l_tr2 = "Ä«ÅÄ"
    local f = "á¤á¦á•½á‘‰á‘¦á’¡á’ƒá’»á“á”…á”¥á”¾á“ªá•â€¡á’„á”‰"
    local f_tr = "wh3ptckmns1ylr45"
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ãª", "e")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "u", "o")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ii", "Ä«")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "oo", "Å")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "aa", "Ä")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aeioÄ«ÅÄ])(w?[aeioÄ«ÅÄ])", "%1 0%2")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "^(w?[aeioÄ«ÅÄ])", " 0%1")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, " 0", "0")
    mw.log(text)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([" .. w_tr1 .. "])w([" .. w_tr2 .. "])", function(a, b)
        a = w_tr1:find(a)
        b = w_tr2:find(b)
        local i = a * 4 + b - 4
        return mw.ustring.sub(w, i, i)
    end)
    for i = 1, 3 do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, replace[i], tostring(i)) end
    mw.log(text)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([" .. s_tr1 .. "])([" .. s_tr2 .. "])", function(a, b)
        a = s_tr1:find(a)
        b = s_tr2:find(b)
        local i = a * 4 + b - 4
        return mw.ustring.sub(s, i, i)
    end)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([" .. l_tr1 .. "])([" .. l_tr2 .. "])", function(a, b)
        a = l_tr1:find(a)
        b = l_tr2:find(b)
        local i = a * 3 + b - 3
        return mw.ustring.sub(l, i, i)
    end)
    for i = 4, 5 do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, replace[i], tostring(i)) end
    mw.log(text)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([" .. f_tr .. "])", function(a)
        a = f_tr:find(a)
        return mw.ustring.sub(f, a, a)
    end)
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="101">
<source>wikt/translit/cv-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local u = mw.ustring.char

local export = {}

local CARONBELOW = u(0x032c)

local rsub = mw.ustring.gsub

local tt = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ó"] = "Ä‚",
    ["Ó‘"] = "Äƒ",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ"] = "Jo",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "jo",
    ["Ó–"] = "Ä”",
    ["Ó—"] = "Ä•",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Òª"] = "Åš",
    ["Ò«"] = "Å›",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ó²"] = "Ãœ",
    ["Ó³"] = "Ã¼",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "H",
    ["Ñ…"] = "h",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "Ts",
    ["Ñ†"] = "ts",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Å Ä",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Y",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "y",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja"
};

local VOWEL1 = "[ĞÓĞ•ĞÓ–Ğ˜ĞĞ£Ó²Ğ«Ğ­Ğ®Ğ¯ĞœĞĞ›Ğ Ğ™Ğ°Ó‘ĞµÑ‘Ó—Ğ¸Ğ¾ÑƒÓ³Ñ‹ÑÑÑĞ¼Ğ½Ğ»Ñ€Ğ¹]"
local CONS = "[ĞšĞ¥ĞŸĞ¢Ğ¡Ğ¨ÒªĞ§ĞºÑ…Ğ¿Ñ‚ÑÑˆÒ«Ñ‡]"
local VOWEL2 = "[ĞÓĞ•ĞÓ–Ğ˜ĞĞ£Ó²Ğ«Ğ­Ğ®Ğ¯Ğ°Ó‘ĞµÑ‘Ó—Ğ¸Ğ¾ÑƒÓ³Ñ‹ÑÑÑ]"
local CHARC = "[ '-]"

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = rsub(text, "(" .. VOWEL1 .. CHARC .. "?" .. CONS .. ")(" .. CHARC .. "?)%f" .. VOWEL2, "%1" .. CARONBELOW .. "%2")
    text = rsub(text, ".", tt)
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="102">
<source>wikt/translit/dar-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local mapping1 = {["Ğ±"] = "b", ["Ğ¿"] = "p", ["Ñ„"] = "f", ["Ğ²"] = "v", ["Ğ¼"] = "m", ["Ğ´"] = "d", ["Ñ‚"] = "t", ["Ğ¹"] = "j", ["Ğ½"] = "n", ["Ğ·"] = "z", ["Ñ†"] = "c", ["Ñ"] = "s", ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾", ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡", ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä", ["Ğ»"] = "l", ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä", ["Ñ€"] = "r", ["Ğ³"] = "g", ["Ğº"] = "k", ["Ñ…"] = "Ï‡", ["ÑŠ"] = "Ê¾", ["Ğ°"] = "a", ["Ğµ"] = "e", ["Ñ‹"] = "y", ["Ğ¸"] = "i", ["Ğ¾"] = "o", ["Ñƒ"] = "u", ["Ñ‘"] = "Ã«", ["ÑŒ"] = "â€™", ["Ñ"] = "e", ["Ñ"] = "ju", ["Ñ"] = "É™", ["Ğ‘"] = "B", ["ĞŸ"] = "P", ["Ğ¤"] = "F", ["Ğ’"] = "V", ["Ğœ"] = "M", ["Ğ”"] = "D", ["Ğ¢"] = "T", ["Ğ™"] = "J", ["Ğ"] = "N", ["Ğ—"] = "Z", ["Ğ¦"] = "C", ["Ğ¡"] = "S", ["Ğ–"] = "Å½", ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ", ["Ğ©"] = "Å Ä", ["Ğ›"] = "L", ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ", ["Ğ "] = "R", ["Ğ“"] = "G", ["Ğš"] = "K", ["Ğ¥"] = "Î§", ["Ğª"] = "Ê¾", ["Ğ"] = "A", ["Ğ•"] = "E", ["Ğ«"] = "Y", ["Ğ˜"] = "I", ["Ğ"] = "O", ["Ğ£"] = "U", ["Ğ"] = "Ã‹", ["Ğ¬"] = "â€™", ["Ğ­"] = "E", ["Ğ®"] = "Ju", ["Ğ¯"] = "Æ"}

local mapping2 = {["Ğ´Ğ·"] = "Ê’", ["Ğ”Ğ·"] = "Æ·", ["Ğ´Ğ¶"] = "Ç¯", ["Ğ”Ğ¶"] = "Ç®", ["Ğ¿Ó"] = "á¹—", ["ĞŸÓ"] = "á¹–", ["Ñ†Ó"] = "cÌ£", ["Ñ‚Ó"] = "á¹­", ["Ñ‡Ó"] = "ÄÌ£", ["ĞºÑŒ"] = "qÌ‡", ["ĞºÓ"] = "á¸³", ["Ñ…ÑŒ"] = "x", ["Ñ…ÑŠ"] = "q", ["ĞºÑŠ"] = "É¢", ["Ğ³ÑŠ"] = "Î³", ["Ğ³Ó"] = "Ê¿", ["Ñ…Ó"] = "á¸¥", ["Ğ³ÑŒ"] = "h", ["Ğ¦Ó"] = "CÌ£", ["Ğ¢Ó"] = "á¹¬", ["Ğ¡Ñ"] = "SÌ„", ["Ğ§Ó"] = "ÄŒÌ£", ["ĞšÑŒ"] = "QÌ‡", ["ĞšÓ"] = "á¸²", ["Ğ¥ÑŒ"] = "X", ["Ğ¥ÑŠ"] = "Q", ["ĞšÑŠ"] = "É¢", ["Ğ“ÑŠ"] = "Î“", ["Ğ“Ó"] = "Ê¿", ["Ğ¥Ó"] = "á¸¤", ["Ğ“ÑŒ"] = "H"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local str_gsub = string.gsub

    -- Convert capital to lowercase palochka. Lowercase is found in tables
    -- above.
    text = str_gsub(text, mw.ustring.char(0x4C0), mw.ustring.char(0x4CF))

    for pat, repl in pairs(mapping2) do text = str_gsub(text, pat, repl) end

    -- pattern for non-ASCII UTF-8 characters
    text = str_gsub(text, "[\194-\244][\128-\191]+", mapping1)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="103">
<source>wikt/translit/ddo-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local mapping1 = {["Ğ¿"] = "p", ["Ğ±"] = "b", ["Ñ‚"] = "t", ["Ğ´"] = "d", ["Ğº"] = "k", ["Ğ³"] = "g", ["Ñ†"] = "c", ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä", ["Ñ"] = "s", ["Ğ·"] = "z", ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡", ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾", ["Ñ…"] = "x", ["Ğ¼"] = "m", ["Ğ½"] = "n", ["Ñ€"] = "r", ["Ğ»"] = "l", ["Ğ²"] = "v", ["Ğ¹"] = "y", ["Ğ¸"] = "i", ["Ğµ"] = "e", ["Ñ"] = "e", ["Ğ°"] = "a", ["Ğ¾"] = "o", ["Ñƒ"] = "u", ["ÑŠ"] = "Ê¾"}

local mapping2 = {["Ğ¿Ó"] = "pâ€™", ["Ñ‚Ó"] = "tâ€™", ["ĞºÓ"] = "kâ€™", ["ĞºÑŠ"] = "qâ€™", ["Ñ†Ó"] = "câ€™", ["Ğ»Ó"] = "Æ›", ["ĞºÑŒ"] = "Æ›â€™", ["Ñ‡Ó"] = "Äâ€™", ["Ñ…ÑŠ"] = "q", ["Ğ»ÑŠ"] = "Î»", ["Ğ³ÑŠ"] = "Ä¡", ["Ñ…Ó"] = "á¸¥", ["Ğ³Ó"] = "aÌ¯", ["Ğ³ÑŒ"] = "h", ["Ğ°ÑŒ"] = "Ã¤", ["Ğ°Ó"] = "aÊ¿", ["ĞµÓ"] = "eÊ¿", ["Ğ¸Ó"] = "iÊ¿", ["Ğ¾Ó"] = "oÊ¿", ["ÑƒÓ"] = "uÊ¿"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local str_gsub = string.gsub
    local UTF8_char = "[%z\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*"

    -- Convert capital to lowercase palochka.
    text = str_gsub(text, mw.ustring.char(0x4C0), mw.ustring.char(0x4CF))

    for pat, repl in pairs(mapping2) do text = str_gsub(text, pat, repl) end
    text = str_gsub(text, UTF8_char, mapping1)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="104">
<source>wikt/translit/debug.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local escape
do
    local escapes = {["\a"] = "a", ["\b"] = "b", ["\f"] = "f", ["\n"] = "n", ["\r"] = "r", ["\t"] = "t", ["\v"] = "v", ["\\"] = "\\", ["\""] = "\"", ["'"] = "'"}

    local function helper(char) return escapes[char] and "\\" .. escapes[char] or ("\\%03d"):format(char:byte()) end

    -- Escape control characters, backslash, double quote, and bytes that aren't
    -- used in UTF-8.
    -- Escape stuff that can't be saved in a MediaWiki page, like invalid UTF-8
    -- and NFD character sequences? Hard.
    -- Similar to string.format("%q", str), which does not use C-like simple
    -- escapes and does not escape bytes that are not used in UTF-8.
    escape = function(str) return (str:gsub("[%z\1-\31\\\"\127\192\193\245-\255]", helper)) end
end

export.escape = escape

-- Convert a value to a string
function export.dump(value, prefix, tsort)
    local t = type(value)

    prefix = prefix or ""

    if t == "string" then
        return "\"" .. escape(value) .. "\""
    elseif t == "table" then
        local str_table = {}

        table.insert(str_table, " {")

        for key, val in require("table").sortedPairs(value, tsort) do table.insert(str_table, " " .. prefix .. "\t[" .. export.dump(key, prefix .. "\t") .. "] = " .. export.dump(val, prefix .. "\t"):gsub("^ ", "") .. ",") end

        table.insert(str_table, " " .. prefix .. "}")

        return table.concat(str_table, "\n")
    else
        return tostring(value)
    end
end

function export.highlight_dump(value, prefix, tsort, options)
    options = options or {}

    local func = options.modified and "modified_dump" or "dump"

    local dump = export[func](value, prefix, tsort)

    -- Remove spaces at beginnings of lines (which are simply to force a <pre></pre> tag).
    dump = dump:gsub("^ ", "")
    dump = dump:gsub("\n ", "\n")

    return export.highlight(dump)
end

-- Returns true if table contains a table as one of its values
local function containsTable(t)
    for key, value in pairs(t) do if type(value) == "table" then return true end end
    return false
end

local function containsTablesWithSize(t, size)
    for key, value in pairs(t) do if type(value) == "table" and require("table").size(value) ~= size then return false end end
    return true
end

--[=[
	Convert a value to a string.
	Like dump below, but if a table has consecutive numbered keys and does not
	have a table as one of its values, it will be placed on a single line.
	Used by [[Module:User:Erutuon/script recognition]].
]=]
function export.modified_dump(value, prefix, tsort)
    local t = type(value)

    prefix = prefix or ""

    if t == "string" then
        return "\"" .. value .. "\""
    elseif t == "table" then
        local str_table = {}

        local containsTable = containsTable(value)
        local consecutive = require("table").isArray(value)
        if consecutive and not containsTable or containsTable and containsTablesWithSize(value, 3) then
            table.insert(str_table, "{")

            for key, val in require("table").sortedPairs(value, tsort) do
                if containsTable then
                    table.insert(str_table, "\n\t" .. prefix)
                else
                    table.insert(str_table, " ")
                end

                if type(key) == "string" then table.insert(str_table, "[" .. export.modified_dump(key) .. "] = ") end

                table.insert(str_table, type(key) == "number" and type(val) == "number" and string.format("0x%05X", val) or export.modified_dump(val))

                if not (consecutive and #value == 3) or type(key) == "number" and value[key + 1] then table.insert(str_table, ",") end
            end

            if containsTable then
                table.insert(str_table, "\n" .. prefix)
            else
                table.insert(str_table, " ")
            end

            table.insert(str_table, "}")
            return table.concat(str_table)
        end

        table.insert(str_table, " {")

        for key, val in require("table").sortedPairs(value, tsort) do table.insert(str_table, " " .. prefix .. "\t[" .. export.modified_dump(key, prefix .. "\t") .. "] = " .. export.modified_dump(val, prefix .. "\t"):gsub("^ ", "") .. ",") end

        table.insert(str_table, " " .. prefix .. "}")

        return table.concat(str_table, "\n")
    elseif t == "number" and value > 46 then
        return string.format("0x%05X", value)
    else
        return tostring(value)
    end
end

function export.track(key)
    local frame = mw.getCurrentFrame()
    if key then
        if type(key) ~= "table" then key = {key} end

        for i, value in pairs(key) do pcall(frame.expandTemplate, frame, {title = "tracking/" .. value}) end
    else
        error("No tracking key supplied to the function \"" .. track .. "\".")
    end
end

-- Trigger a script error from a template
function export.error(frame) error(frame.args[1] or "(no message specified)") end

--[[
	Convenience function for generating syntaxhighlight tags.
	Display defaults to block.
	Options is a table. To display inline text with HTML highlighting:
		{ inline = true, lang = "html" }
]]
function export.highlight(content, options)
    if type(content) == "table" then
        options = content
        options = {lang = options.lang or "lua", inline = options.inline and true}
        return function(content) return mw.getCurrentFrame():extensionTag{name = "syntaxhighlight", content = content, args = options} end
    else
        return mw.getCurrentFrame():extensionTag{name = "syntaxhighlight", content = content, args = {lang = options and options.lang or "lua", inline = options and options.inline and true or nil}}
    end
end

function export.track_unrecognized_args(args, template_name)
    local function track(code) export.track(template_name .. "/" .. code) end

    track("unrecognized arg")

    local arg_list = {}
    for arg, value in pairs(args) do
        track("unrecognized arg/" .. arg)
        table.insert(arg_list, ("|%s=%s"):format(arg, value))
    end

    mw.log(("Unrecognized parameter%s in {{%s}}: %s."):format(arg_list[2] and "s" or "", template_name, table.concat(arg_list, ", ")))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="105">
<source>wikt/translit/dlg-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ò”"] = "Ä",
    ["Ò•"] = "ÄŸ",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "Ä°",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ™"] = "Y",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "y",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ó‡"] = "Ã‘",
    ["Óˆ"] = "Ã±",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ó¨"] = "Ã–",
    ["Ó©"] = "Ã¶",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Òº"] = "H",
    ["Ò»"] = "h",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ò®"] = "Ãœ",
    ["Ò¯"] = "Ã¼",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "X",
    ["Ñ…"] = "x",
    ["Ğ§"] = "Ã‡",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ã§",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Åš",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å›",
    ["Ğ«"] = "I",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "Ä±",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",
    -- non-native letters
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ"] = "Yo",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "yo",
    ["Ğ–"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "j",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "Ts",
    ["Ñ†"] = "ts",
    ["Ğ©"] = "ÅÃ§",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "ÅŸÃ§",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "â€™",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "â€™",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Yu",
    ["Ñ"] = "yu",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ya",
    ["Ñ"] = "ya"
}

local digraphs = {["Ğ”ÑŒ"] = "C", ["Ğ´ÑŒ"] = "c", ["ĞÑŒ"] = "Åƒ", ["Ğ½ÑŒ"] = "Å„"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local str_gsub = string.gsub
    for digraph, repl in ipairs(digraphs) do text = str_gsub(text, digraph, repl) end

    -- Ğµ after a vowel or at the beginning of a word becomes ye
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ĞĞÓ¨Ğ£Ò®Ğ«Ğ•Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜Ğ•ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ğ¾Ó©ÑƒÒ¯Ñ‹ÑÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ĞµÑŠÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?)Ğµ", "%1je")
    text = str_gsub(text, "^Ğ•", "Ye")
    text = str_gsub(text, "^Ğµ", "ye")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])Ğ•", "%1Ye")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])Ğµ", "%1ye")

    -- pattern for non-ASCII UTF-8 characters
    return (str_gsub(text, "[\194-\244][\128-\191]+", tab))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="106">
<source>wikt/translit/dng-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ò–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å˜",
    --[[  â†‘  ]] --[[  â†‘  ]]
    ["Ğ©"] = "X",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ò¢"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "H",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",

    ["Ğ«"] = "Æ—",
    ["Ğ™"] = "Y",
    ["Ğ"] = "W",
    ["Ò®"] = "Ãœ",
    --[[  â†‘  ]]
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "IÍ¡a",
    ["Ó˜"] = "Æ",
    ["Ğ•"] = "IÍ¡É™",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ"] = "IÍ¡o",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ğ®"] = "IÍ¡u",

    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",

    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ò—"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å™",
    --[[  â†‘  ]] --[[  â†‘  ]]
    ["Ñ‰"] = "x",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ò£"] = "Å‹",
    ["Ñ…"] = "h",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",

    ["Ñ‹"] = "É¨",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "y",
    ["Ñ"] = "w",
    ["Ò¯"] = "Ã¼",
    --[[  â†‘  ]]
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ñ"] = "iÍ¡a",
    ["Ó™"] = "É™",
    ["Ğµ"] = "iÍ¡É™",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "iÍ¡o",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ñ"] = "iÍ¡u",

    ["Ğ¸"] = "i"
};

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    if (sc) and (sc ~= "Cyrl") then return nil end

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="107">
<source>wikt/translit/dv-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local u = mw.ustring.char

local consonants = {["Ş€"] = "h", ["Ş"] = "á¹£", ["Ş‚"] = "n", ["Şƒ"] = "r", ["Ş„"] = "b", ["Ş…"] = "á¸·", ["Ş†"] = "k", ["Ş‡"] = "", ["Şˆ"] = "v", ["Ş‰"] = "m", ["ŞŠ"] = "f", ["Ş‹"] = "d", ["ŞŒ"] = "t", ["Ş"] = "l", ["Ş"] = "g", ["Ş"] = "Ã±", ["Ş"] = "s", ["Ş‘"] = "á¸", ["Ş’"] = "z", ["Ş“"] = "á¹­", ["Ş”"] = "y", ["Ş•"] = "p", ["Ş–"] = "j", ["Ş—"] = "c", ["Ş±"] = "á¹‡", ["Ş˜"] = "á¹¯", ["Ş™"] = "á¸¥", ["Şš"] = "x", ["Ş›"] = "Åº", ["Şœ"] = "Å¾", ["Ş"] = "Å¡", ["Ş"] = "ÅŸ", ["ŞŸ"] = "á¸‹", ["Ş "] = "Å£", ["Ş¡"] = "áº“", ["Ş¢"] = "Ê¿", ["Ş£"] = "Ä¡", ["Ş¤"] = "q", ["Ş¥"] = "w"}

-- this controls prenasalized stop digraphs consisting of Ş‚ and a voiced stop
local prenasal = {["Ş„"] = "áµ", ["Ş‹"] = "â¿", ["Ş"] = "â¿", ["Ş‘"] = "â¿"}

local diacritics = {
    [u(0x07A6)] = "a",
    [u(0x07A7)] = "Ä",
    [u(0x07A8)] = "i",
    [u(0x07A9)] = "Ä«",
    [u(0x07AA)] = "u",
    [u(0x07AB)] = "Å«",
    [u(0x07AC)] = "e",
    [u(0x07AD)] = "Ä“",
    [u(0x07AE)] = "o",
    [u(0x07AF)] = "Å",
    [u(0x07B0)] = "",
    -- no diacritic
    [""] = ""
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- final k
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ş‡Ş°$", "Ş†Ş°")
    -- V + sukun + C -> CC
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ş‡" .. u(0x07B0) .. "([Ş€-Ş¥Ş±])", function(c) return c .. c end)
    -- prenasalized digraphs
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ş‚([Ş€-Ş¥Ş±])", function(c) return (prenasal[c] or "n") .. c end)

    -- handle all standard akuru (C+V or C+virama) units
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([Ş€-Ş¥Ş±])([" .. u(0x07A6) .. "-" .. u(0x07B0) .. "]?)", function(c, d)
        if mw.ustring.match(c, "[ŞŞ‚ŞŒŞ†Ş‰]") and d == u(0x07B0) then
            return consonants[c] .. "ÌŠ"
        else
            return consonants[c] .. diacritics[d]
        end
    end)
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="108">
<source>wikt/translit/el-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {["Î±"] = "a", ["Î¬"] = "Ã¡", ["Î²"] = "v", ["Î³"] = "g", ["Î´"] = "d", ["Îµ"] = "e", ["Î­"] = "Ã©", ["Î¶"] = "z", ["Î·"] = "i", ["Î®"] = "Ã­", ["Î¸"] = "th", ["Î¹"] = "i", ["Î¯"] = "Ã­", ["ÏŠ"] = "Ã¯", ["Î"] = "á¸¯", ["Îº"] = "k", ["Î»"] = "l", ["Î¼"] = "m", ["Î½"] = "n", ["Î¾"] = "x", ["Î¿"] = "o", ["ÏŒ"] = "Ã³", ["Ï€"] = "p", ["Ï"] = "r", ["Ïƒ"] = "s", ["Ï‚"] = "s", ["Ï„"] = "t", ["Ï…"] = "y", ["Ï"] = "Ã½", ["Ï‹"] = "Ã¿", ["Î°"] = "Ã¿Ì", ["Ï†"] = "f", ["Ï‡"] = "ch", ["Ïˆ"] = "ps", ["Ï‰"] = "o", ["Ï"] = "Ã³", ["Î‘"] = "A", ["Î†"] = "Ã", ["Î’"] = "V", ["Î“"] = "G", ["Î”"] = "D", ["Î•"] = "E", ["Îˆ"] = "Ã‰", ["Î–"] = "Z", ["Î—"] = "I", ["Î‰"] = "Ã", ["Î˜"] = "Th", ["Î™"] = "I", ["ÎŠ"] = "Ã", ["Îš"] = "K", ["Î›"] = "L", ["Îœ"] = "M", ["Î"] = "N", ["Î"] = "X", ["ÎŸ"] = "O", ["ÎŒ"] = "Ã“", ["Î "] = "P", ["Î¡"] = "R", ["Î£"] = "S", ["Î¤"] = "T", ["Î¥"] = "Y", ["Î"] = "Ã", ["Î¦"] = "F", ["Î§"] = "Ch", ["Î¨"] = "Ps", ["Î©"] = "O", ["Î"] = "Ã“", ["Â·"] = ";"}

-- transliterates any words or phrases
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
    local U = mw.ustring.char
    local acute = mw.ustring.char(0x301)
    local diaeresis = mw.ustring.char(0x308)

    text = gsub(text, "([^A-Za-z0-9])[;" .. U(0x37E) .. "]", "%1?")

    text = gsub(text, "([Î±ÎµÎ·Î‘Î•Î—])([Ï…Ï])(.?)", function(vowel, upsilon, following) return tt[vowel] .. (upsilon == "Ï" and acute or "") .. (("Î¸ÎºÎ¾Ï€ÏƒÏ‚Ï„Ï†Ï‡Ïˆ"):find(following) and "f" or "v") .. following end)

    text = gsub(text, "([Î±ÎµÎ¿Ï‰Î‘Î•ÎŸÎ©])([Î·Î®])", function(vowel, ita)
        if ita == "Î®" then
            return tt[vowel] .. "i" .. diaeresis .. acute
        else
            return tt[vowel] .. "i" .. diaeresis
        end
    end)

    text = gsub(text, "[Ï‰Î©][Î¹Î¯]", {["Ï‰Î¹"] = "oÃ¯", ["Ï‰Î¯"] = "oá¸¯", ["Î©Î¹"] = "OÃ¯", ["Î©Î¯"] = "Oá¸¯"})

    text = gsub(text, "[Î¿ÎŸ][Ï…Ï]", {["Î¿Ï…"] = "ou", ["Î¿Ï"] = "oÃº", ["ÎŸÏ…"] = "Ou", ["ÎŸÏ"] = "OÃº"})

    text = gsub(text, "(.?)([Î¼Îœ])Ï€", function(before, mi)
        if before == "" or before == " " or before == "-" then
            if mi == "Îœ" then
                return before .. "B"
            else
                return before .. "b"
            end
        end
    end)

    text = gsub(text, "(.?)([Î½Î])Ï„", function(before, ni)
        if before == "" or before == " " or before == "-" then
            if ni == "Î" then
                return before .. "D"
            else
                return before .. "d"
            end
        end
    end)

    text = gsub(text, "Î³([Î³Î¾Ï‡])", "n%1")

    text = gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="109">
<source>wikt/translit/en-ta-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local consonants = {["k"] = "à®•", ["g"] = "à®•", ["á¹…"] = "à®™", ["c"] = "à®š", ["Ã±"] = "à®", ["á¹­"] = "à®Ÿ", ["á¸"] = "à®Ÿ", ["á¹›"] = "à®Ÿ", ["á¹‡"] = "à®£", ["t"] = "à®¤", ["d"] = "à®¤", ["n"] = "à®¨", ["p"] = "à®ª", ["b"] = "à®ª", ["m"] = "à®®", ["y"] = "à®¯", ["r"] = "à®°", ["l"] = "à®²", ["v"] = "à®µ", ["á¸»"] = "à®´", ["á¸·"] = "à®³", ["á¹Ÿ"] = "à®±", ["á¹‰"] = "à®©", ["Å›"] = "à®¶", ["j"] = "à®œ", ["á¹£"] = "à®·", ["s"] = "à®¸", ["h"] = "à®¹", ["f"] = "à®ƒà®ª", ["z"] = "à®ƒà®œ", ["x"] = "à®ƒà®¸"}

local diacritics = {["ai"] = "à¯ˆ", ["au"] = "à¯Œ", ["a"] = "", ["Ä"] = "à®¾", ["i"] = "à®¿", ["Ä«"] = "à¯€", ["u"] = "à¯", ["Å«"] = "à¯‚", ["e"] = "à¯†", ["Ä“"] = "à¯‡", ["o"] = "à¯Š", ["Å"] = "à¯‹"}

local nonconsonants = {["au"] = "à®”", ["ai"] = "à®", ["a"] = "à®…", ["0"] = "à¯¦", ["Ä"] = "à®†", ["i"] = "à®‡", ["Ä«"] = "à®ˆ", ["u"] = "à®‰", ["Å«"] = "à®Š", ["e"] = "à®", ["Ä“"] = "à®", ["o"] = "à®’", ["Å"] = "à®“", ["á¸¥"] = "à®ƒ", ["1"] = "à¯§", ["2"] = "à¯¨", ["3"] = "à¯©", ["4"] = "à¯ª", ["5"] = "à¯«", ["6"] = "à¯¬", ["7"] = "à¯­", ["8"] = "à¯®", ["9"] = "à¯¯"}

-- translit any words or phrases
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([kgá¹…cÃ±á¹­á¸á¹›á¹‡tdnpbmyrlvá¸»á¸·á¹Ÿá¹‰Å›já¹£shfzx])" .. "(a[iu]?)", function(c, d) if d ~= "" then return consonants[c] .. diacritics[d] end end)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([kgá¹…cÃ±á¹­á¸á¹›á¹‡tdnpbmyrlvá¸»á¸·á¹Ÿá¹‰Å›já¹£shfzx])" .. "([aÄiÄ«uÅ«eÄ“oÅ]?)", function(c, d)
        if d ~= "" then
            return consonants[c] .. diacritics[d]
        else
            return consonants[c] .. "à¯"
        end
    end)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(a[iu]?)", function(a) if a ~= "" then return nonconsonants[a] end end)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", nonconsonants)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="110">
<source>wikt/translit/etymology languages/by_name.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

for code, data in pairs(mw.loadData("etymology languages/data")) do export[data.canonicalName] = code end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="112">
<source>wikt/translit/etymology_languages.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local EtymologyLanguage = {}

function EtymologyLanguage:getCode() return self._code end

function EtymologyLanguage:getCanonicalName() return self._rawData.canonicalName end

function EtymologyLanguage:getDisplayForm() return self:getCanonicalName() end

function EtymologyLanguage:getOtherNames(onlyOtherNames) return require("language-like").getOtherNames(self, onlyOtherNames) end

function EtymologyLanguage:getAliases() return self._rawData.aliases or {} end

function EtymologyLanguage:getVarieties(flatten) return require("language-like").getVarieties(self, flatten) end

-- function EtymologyLanguage:getAllNames()
--	return self._rawData.names
-- end

function EtymologyLanguage:getCategoryName() return self:getCanonicalName() end

function EtymologyLanguage:makeCategoryLink() return "[[:Category:" .. self:getCategoryName() .. "|" .. self:getCanonicalName() .. "]]" end

function EtymologyLanguage:getType() return "etymology language" end

function EtymologyLanguage:getParentCode() return self._rawData.parent end

function EtymologyLanguage:getAncestors()
    if not self._ancestorObjects then
        self._ancestorObjects = {}

        for _, ancestor in ipairs(self._rawData.ancestors or {}) do table.insert(self._ancestorObjects, export.getByCode(ancestor) or require("languages").getByCode(ancestor)) end
    end

    return self._ancestorObjects
end

function EtymologyLanguage:getWikidataItem()
    local item = self._rawData.wikidata_item

    if type(item) == "number" then
        return "Q" .. item
    else
        return item
    end
end

function EtymologyLanguage:getWikipediaArticle() return self._rawData.wikipedia_article or (self:getWikidataItem() and mw.wikibase and mw.wikibase.sitelink(self:getWikidataItem(), "enwiki")) or self._rawData.canonicalName end

function EtymologyLanguage:makeWikipediaLink() return "[[w:" .. self:getWikipediaArticle() .. "|" .. self:getCanonicalName() .. "]]" end

function EtymologyLanguage:toJSON()
    local ret = {canonicalName = self:getCanonicalName(), categoryName = self:getCategoryName(), code = self._code, otherNames = self:getOtherNames(true), aliases = self:getAliases(), varieties = self:getVarieties(), parent = self._rawData.parent, type = self:getType()}

    return require("JSON").toJSON(ret)
end

function EtymologyLanguage:getRawData() return self._rawData end

EtymologyLanguage.__index = EtymologyLanguage

function export.makeObject(code, data) return data and setmetatable({_rawData = data, _code = code}, EtymologyLanguage) or nil end

function export.getByCode(code) return export.makeObject(code, mw.loadData("etymology languages/data")[code]) end

function export.getByCanonicalName(name)
    local code = mw.loadData("etymology languages/by name")[name]

    if not code then return nil end

    return export.makeObject(code, mw.loadData("etymology languages/data")[code])
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="113">
<source>wikt/translit/eve-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local u = mw.ustring.char

local MACRON = u(0x0304)
local DOTABOVE = u(0x0307)

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "Ê™",
    ["Ğ’"] = "W",
    ["Ğ²"] = "w",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ"] = "Jo",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "jo",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ó¢"] = "Äª",
    ["Ó£"] = "Ä«",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ó‡"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Óˆ"] = "Å‹",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ó¨"] = "Ã–",
    ["Ó©"] = "Ã¶",
    ["Óª"] = "Ã–",
    ["Ó«"] = "Ã¶",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ó®"] = "Åª",
    ["Ó¯"] = "Å«",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "H",
    ["Ñ…"] = "h",
    ["Ğ§"] = "C",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "c",
    ["Ğ«"] = "I",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "i",
    ["Ğ­"] = "Æ",
    ["Ñ"] = "É™",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "áº¸",
    ["Ñ"] = "áº¹", -- Not present in the original latinisation
    -- non-native letters
    ["Ğ–"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "z",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "S",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ©"] = "S",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "s",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "â€™",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "â€™",

    -- non-standard letters
    ["Ò”"] = "Î“",
    ["Ò•"] = "Î³",
    ["Ò¤"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Ò¥"] = "Å‹",
    ["Ò®"] = "Ãœ",
    ["Ò¯"] = "Ã¼",
    ["Òº"] = "á¸¤",
    ["Ò»"] = "á¸¥",
    ["Óƒ"] = "Q",
    ["Ó„"] = "q"
}

local iotatedTranslit = {["Ğµ"] = "je", ["Ñ"] = "ja", ["Ğ¸"] = "ji", ["Ó£"] = "jÄ«", ["Ğ•"] = "Je", ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja"}

local replacements = {
    {"Ğ", "Jo"}, {"Ñ‘", "jo"}, {"Óª", "JÃ¶"}, {"Ó«", "jÃ¶"}, {"Ğ®", "Ju"}, {"Ñ", "ju"}, -- Unfortunately the Cyrillic alphabet doesn't distinguish between Ê’e and Ê’É™
    {"Ğ”Ğµ", "Æ·e"}, {"Ğ´Ğµ", "Ê’e"}, {"ĞĞµ", "Å…e"}, {"Ğ½Ğµ", "Å†e"}, {"Ğ”Ğ¸", "Æ·i"}, {"Ğ´Ğ¸", "Ê’i"}, {"ĞĞ¸", "Å…i"}, {"Ğ½Ğ¸", "Å†i"}, {"Ğ”Ñ", "Æ·a"}, {"Ğ´Ñ", "Ê’a"}, {"ĞÑ", "Å…a"}, {"Ğ½Ñ", "Å†a"}, {"Ğ”j", "Æ·"}, {"Ğ´j", "Ê’"}, {"Ğj", "Å…"}, {"Ğ½j", "Å†"}, -- The following is non-standard but supposedly used in non-standard spelling and dialect forms
    {"Ğ”ÑŒ", "Æ·"}, {"Ğ´ÑŒ", "Ê’"}, {"ĞÑŒ", "Å…"}, {"Ğ½ÑŒ", "Å†"}, {"ĞĞ³", "ÅŠ"}, {"Ğ½Ğ³", "Å‹"}
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local ugsub, str_gsub = mw.ustring.gsub, string.gsub
    local UTF8char = "[\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*"

    for i, replacement in ipairs(replacements) do text = str_gsub(text, unpack(replacement)) end

    -- Ğµ after a vowel or at the beginning of a word becomes ye
    -- Again, the Cyrillic alphabet doesn't distinguish between je and jÉ™
    text = ugsub(text, "([ĞĞĞ£Ğ«Ğ¯Ğ•Ğ˜Ó¢ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ó£Ğ¸Ğ¾ÑƒÑ‹ÑÑĞµÑŠÑŒaeioÃ¶u][" .. MACRON .. DOTABOVE .. "]?)([ĞµÑĞ¸Ó£])", function(preceding, iotated) return preceding .. iotatedTranslit[iotated] end)

    text = ugsub(text, "^[Ğ•ĞµĞ¯Ñ]", iotatedTranslit)

    text = ugsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])([Ğ•ĞµĞ¯Ñ])", function(preceding, iotated) return preceding .. iotatedTranslit[iotated] end)

    text = str_gsub(text, UTF8char, tab)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="114">
<source>wikt/translit/evn-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local u = mw.ustring.char

local MACRON = u(0x0304)
local DOTABOVE = u(0x0307)
local DOTBELOW = u(0x0323)

local str_gsub, ugsub = string.gsub, mw.ustring.gsub
local UTF8char = "[\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*"

local export = {}

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ’"] = "W",
    ["Ğ²"] = "w",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ"] = "Jo",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "jo",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ó¢"] = "Äª",
    ["Ó£"] = "Ä«",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ó‡"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Óˆ"] = "Å‹",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ó®"] = "Åª",
    ["Ó¯"] = "Å«",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "H",
    ["Ñ…"] = "h",
    ["Ğ§"] = "Ã‡",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ã§",
    ["Ğ«"] = "I",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "i",
    ["Ğ­"] = "Æ",
    ["Ñ"] = "É™",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja",
    -- non-native letters
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "z",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "ÅŸ",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Å",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "ÅŸ", -- in literary language Ñˆ is only found in Russian words and was originally represented with s, however some dialects have Ñˆ in native words
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "â€™",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "â€™"
}

local other = {
    {"Ğ¯", "Ja"}, {"Ñ", "ja"}, {"Ğ", "Jo"}, {"Ñ‘", "jo"}, {"Ğ®", "Ju"}, {"Ñ", "ju"}, -- Unfortunately the Cyrillic alphabet doesn't distinguish between Ê’e and Ê’É™
    {"Ğ”Ğµ", "Æ·e"}, {"Ğ´Ğµ", "Ê’e"}, {"ĞĞµ", "Å…e"}, {"Ğ½Ğµ", "Å†e"}, {"Ğ”Ğ¸", "Æ·i"}, {"Ğ´Ğ¸", "Ê’i"}, {"ĞĞ¸", "Å…i"}, {"Ğ½Ğ¸", "Å†i"}, {"Ğ”Ó£", "Æ·Ä«"}, {"Ğ´Ó£", "Ê’Ä«"}, {"ĞÓ£", "Å…Ä«"}, {"Ğ½Ó£", "Å†Ä«"}, {"Ğ”j", "Æ·"}, {"Ğ´j", "Ê’"}, {"Ğj", "Å…"}, {"Ğ½j", "Å†"}
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    for i, replacement in ipairs(other) do text = str_gsub(text, unpack(replacement)) end

    -- Ğµ after a vowel or at the beginning of a word becomes ye
    -- Again, the Cyrillic alphabet doesn't distinguish between je and jÉ™
    text = ugsub(text, "([ĞĞĞ£Ğ«Ğ•Ğ˜Ó¢ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ó£Ğ¸Ğ¾ÑƒÑ‹ÑĞµÑŠÑŒaeiou][" .. MACRON .. DOTABOVE .. DOTBELOW .. "]?)Ğµ", "%1je")
    text = ugsub(text, "([ĞĞĞ£Ğ«Ğ•Ğ˜Ó¢ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ó£Ğ¸Ğ¾ÑƒÑ‹ÑĞµÑŠÑŒaeiou][" .. MACRON .. DOTABOVE .. DOTBELOW .. "]?)Ğ¸", "%1ji")
    text = ugsub(text, "([ĞĞĞ£Ğ«Ğ•Ğ˜Ó¢ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ó£Ğ¸Ğ¾ÑƒÑ‹ÑĞµÑŠÑŒaeiou][" .. MACRON .. DOTABOVE .. DOTBELOW .. "]?)Ó£", "%1jÄ«")
    text = str_gsub(text, "^Ğ•", "Je")
    text = str_gsub(text, "^Ğµ", "je")
    text = ugsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])Ğ•", "%1Je")
    text = ugsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])Ğµ", "%1je")

    return (str_gsub(text, UTF8char, tab))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="115">
<source>wikt/translit/fa-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local U = mw.ustring.char
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local export = {}

local fatHatan = U(0x64B) -- What is the Persian term for this?
local fathe = U(0x64E) -- also zabar
local kasre = U(0x650) -- also zir
local zamme = U(0x64F) -- also piÅ¡
local tashdid = U(0x651) -- also called shadda
local jazm = U(0x652)
local alif = "Ø§"
local zwnj = "â€Œ"
local he = "Ù‡"

local waw = U(0x0648)
local ye = U(0x06CC)

local group = "Ø¨Ù¾ØªØ«Ø¬Ú†Ø­Ø®Ø¯Ø°Ø±Ø²Ú˜Ø³Ø´ØµØ¶Ø·Ø¸ØºÙÙ‚Ú©Ú¯Ù„Ù…Ù†ÙˆÙ‡ÛŒ"
local ZZP = "ÙÙÙ"

local mapping = {
    ["Ø§"] = "Ã¢",
    ["Ø¨"] = "b",
    ["Ù¾"] = "p",
    ["Øª"] = "t",
    ["Ø«"] = "s",
    ["Ø¬"] = "j",
    ["Ú†"] = "Ä",
    ["Ø­"] = "h",
    ["Ø®"] = "x",
    ["Ø¯"] = "d",
    ["Ø°"] = "z",
    ["Ø±"] = "r",
    ["Ø²"] = "z",
    ["Ú˜"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ø³"] = "s",
    ["Ø´"] = "Å¡",
    ["Øµ"] = "s",
    ["Ø¶"] = "z",
    ["Ø·"] = "t",
    ["Ø¸"] = "z",
    ["Øº"] = "ÄŸ",
    ["Ù"] = "f",
    ["Ù‚"] = "q",
    ["Ú©"] = "k",
    ["Ú¯"] = "g",
    ["Ù„"] = "l",
    ["Ù…"] = "m",
    ["Ù†"] = "n",
    ["Ùˆ"] = "u",
    ["Ù‡"] = "h",
    ["ÛŒ"] = "i",
    ["Ø¢"] = "Ã¢",
    ["â€Œ"] = "-",

    ["Ù"] = "a",
    ["Ù"] = "e",
    ["Ù"] = "o",

    -- displaying on separate lines as the viewing becomes distorted on these combinations
    ["Ø¹"] = "â€™",
    ["Ø¡"] = "â€™",
    ["Ø¦"] = "â€™",
    ["Ø¤"] = "â€™",
    ["Ø£"] = "â€™",

    -- diacritics
    [fathe] = "a",
    [kasre] = "e",
    [zamme] = "o",
    [jazm] = "", -- also sokun - no vowel
    [U(0x200C)] = "-", -- ZWNJ (zero-width non-joiner)
    [fatHatan] = "n",
    ["â€Œ"] = "-",
    -- ligatures
    ["ï»»"] = "lÃ¢",
    ["ï·²"] = "llÃ¢h",
    -- kashida
    ["Ù€"] = "", -- kashida, no sound
    -- numerals
    ["Û±"] = "1",
    ["Û²"] = "2",
    ["Û³"] = "3",
    ["Û´"] = "4",
    ["Ûµ"] = "5",
    ["Û¶"] = "6",
    ["Û·"] = "7",
    ["Û¸"] = "8",
    ["Û¹"] = "9",
    ["Û°"] = "0",
    -- normal arabic variants to numerals
    ["Ù¡"] = "1",
    ["Ù¢"] = "2",
    ["Ù£"] = "3",
    ["Ù¤"] = "4",
    ["Ù¥"] = "5",
    ["Ù¦"] = "6",
    ["Ù§"] = "7",
    ["Ù¨"] = "8",
    ["Ù©"] = "9",
    ["Ù "] = "0",
    -- punctuation (leave on separate lines)
    ["ØŸ"] = "?", -- question mark
    ["ØŒ"] = ",", -- comma
    ["Ø›"] = ";", -- semicolon
    ["Â«"] = "â€œ", -- quotation mark
    ["Â»"] = "â€", -- quotation mark
    ["Ùª"] = "%", -- percent
    ["Ø‰"] = "â€°", -- per mille
    ["Ù«"] = ".", -- decimals
    ["Ù¬"] = ",", -- thousand
    ["Û€"] = "-ye" -- he ye (in ezÃ¢fe)
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([" .. group .. "]" .. tashdid .. "?)Ù‡$", "%1e")
    text = gsub(text, alif .. fathe, "a")
    text = gsub(text, he .. zwnj, "e-")

    text = gsub(text, kasre .. ye .. "([" .. group .. "])", "ey%1")
    text = gsub(text, jazm .. alif, "a")

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ù‰Ù°", "Ã¢")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ù°", "Ã¢")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ø§" .. fatHatan, "an")
    -- text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, 'Ø§Ù„Ù„Ù‡', "ï·²")
    -- text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, 'Ù„Ø§', "ï»»")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", mapping)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "aÃ¢", "Ã¢")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "Ã¢a", "a")

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "u([aÃ¢eiou])", "v%1")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "i([aÃ¢eiou])", "y%1")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([aÃ¢eiou])(" .. tashdid .. ")", "%2%1") -- swapping taÅ¡did with vowels
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.)" .. tashdid, "%1%1") -- implementing taÅ¡did
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "eh$", "e")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "eh([^aÃ¢eiouyâ€™bdfghjklmnpqrstvyxzÄÄŸÅ¡Å¾])", "e%1")

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="116">
<source>wikt/translit/families/by_name.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

for code, data in pairs(mw.loadData("families/data")) do export[data.canonicalName] = code end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

    wikidata_item = 33705
}
