<document index="159">
<source>wikt/translit/km-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local len = mw.ustring.len
local match = mw.ustring.match
local sub = mw.ustring.sub

local cons_conv = {["á€"] = {"k", "a"}, ["á"] = {"kh", "a"}, ["á‚"] = {"k", "o"}, ["áƒ"] = {"kh", "o"}, ["á„"] = {"ng", "o"}, ["á…"] = {"ch", "a"}, ["á†"] = {"chh", "a"}, ["á‡"] = {"ch", "o"}, ["áˆ"] = {"chh", "o"}, ["á‰"] = {"nh", "o"}, ["áŠ"] = {"d", "a"}, ["á‹"] = {"th", "a"}, ["áŒ"] = {"d", "o"}, ["á"] = {"th", "o"}, ["á"] = {"n", "a"}, ["á"] = {"t", "a"}, ["á"] = {"th", "a"}, ["á‘"] = {"t", "o"}, ["á’"] = {"th", "o"}, ["á“"] = {"n", "o"}, ["á”"] = {"b", "a"}, ["á•"] = {"ph", "a"}, ["á–"] = {"p", "o"}, ["á—"] = {"ph", "o"}, ["á˜"] = {"m", "o"}, ["á™"] = {"y", "o"}, ["áš"] = {"r", "o"}, ["á›"] = {"l", "o"}, ["áœ"] = {"v", "o"}, ["á"] = {"sh", "a"}, ["á"] = {"ss", "o"}, ["áŸ"] = {"s", "a"}, ["á "] = {"h", "a"}, ["á¡"] = {"l", "a"}, ["á¢"] = {"Ê¼", "a"}, [""] = {"", ""}, ["á”áŸ‰"] = {"p", "a"}}

local digraph = {["á áŸ’á‚"] = "g", ["á áŸ’á“"] = "n", ["á áŸ’á˜"] = "m", ["á áŸ’á›"] = "l", ["á áŸ’áœ"] = "f", ["á áŸ’áŸ"] = "z"}

local indep_vowel = {["á£"] = "Ê¼Ã¢", ["á¤"] = "Ê¼a", ["á¥"] = "Ê¼Ä•", ["á¦"] = "Ê¼ei", ["á§"] = "Ê¼Å", ["á¨"] = "Ê¼Åk", ["á©"] = "Ê¼Å­", ["áª"] = "Ê¼Åu", ["á«"] = "rÅ“Ì†", ["á¬"] = "rÅ“", ["á­"] = "lÅ“Ì†", ["á®"] = "lÅ“", ["á¯"] = "Ê¼Ã©", ["á°"] = "Ê¼ai", ["á±"] = "Ê¼aÃ´", ["á²"] = "Ê¼aÃ´", ["á³"] = "Ê¼Ã¢u"}

local vowel_conv = {
    [""] = {["a"] = "Ã¢", ["o"] = "Ã´"},
    ["á¶"] = {["a"] = "a", ["o"] = "Ã©a"},
    ["á·"] = {["a"] = "Ä•", ["o"] = "Ä­"},
    ["á¸"] = {["a"] = "ei", ["o"] = "i"},
    ["á¹"] = {["a"] = "Å“Ì†", ["o"] = "Å“Ì†"},
    ["áº"] = {["a"] = "Å“", ["o"] = "Å“"},
    ["á»"] = {["a"] = "Å", ["o"] = "Å­"},
    ["á¼"] = {["a"] = "o", ["o"] = "u"},
    ["á½"] = {["a"] = "uÅ", ["o"] = "uÅ"},
    ["á¾"] = {["a"] = "aeu", ["o"] = "eu"},
    ["á¿"] = {["a"] = "eua", ["o"] = "eua"},
    ["áŸ€"] = {["a"] = "iÄ•", ["o"] = "iÄ•"},
    ["áŸ"] = {["a"] = "Ã©", ["o"] = "Ã©"},
    ["áŸ‚"] = {["a"] = "Ãª", ["o"] = "Ãª"},
    ["áŸƒ"] = {["a"] = "ai", ["o"] = "ey"},
    ["áŸ„"] = {["a"] = "aÃ´", ["o"] = "oÅ­"},
    ["áŸ…"] = {["a"] = "au", ["o"] = "Åu"},
    ["á»áŸ†"] = {["a"] = "om", ["o"] = "Å­m"},
    ["áŸ†"] = {["a"] = "Ã¢m", ["o"] = "um"},
    ["á¶áŸ†"] = {["a"] = "Äƒm", ["o"] = "ÅÃ¢m"},
    ["á¶áŸ†á„"] = {["a"] = "Äƒng", ["o"] = "eÄƒng"},
    ["áŸ‡"] = {["a"] = "Äƒh", ["o"] = "eÄƒh"},
    ["á»áŸ‡"] = {["a"] = "Åh", ["o"] = "uh"},
    ["áŸáŸ‡"] = {["a"] = "Ã©h", ["o"] = "Ã©h"},
    ["áŸ„áŸ‡"] = {["a"] = "aÅh", ["o"] = "uÅh"},
    ["á¹áŸ‡"] = {["a"] = "Ä•h", ["o"] = "Ä­h"},
    ["á·áŸ‡"] = {["a"] = "Ä•h", ["o"] = "Ä­h"},
    ["áŸˆ"] = {["a"] = "aÊ¼", ["o"] = "Ã©aÊ¼"},
    ["áŸ"] = {["a"] = "<span style=\"font-color:#DCDCDC\">Ã¢</span>", ["o"] = "<span style=\"font-color:#DCDCDC\">Ã´</span>"}
}

local char_type = {
    ["á€"] = "consonant",
    ["á"] = "consonant",
    ["á‚"] = "consonant",
    ["áƒ"] = "consonant",
    ["á„"] = "consonant",
    ["á…"] = "consonant",
    ["á†"] = "consonant",
    ["á‡"] = "consonant",
    ["áˆ"] = "consonant",
    ["á‰"] = "consonant",
    ["áŠ"] = "consonant",
    ["á‹"] = "consonant",
    ["áŒ"] = "consonant",
    ["á"] = "consonant",
    ["á"] = "consonant",
    ["á"] = "consonant",
    ["á"] = "consonant",
    ["á‘"] = "consonant",
    ["á’"] = "consonant",
    ["á“"] = "consonant",
    ["á”"] = "consonant",
    ["á•"] = "consonant",
    ["á–"] = "consonant",
    ["á—"] = "consonant",
    ["á˜"] = "consonant",
    ["á™"] = "consonant",
    ["áš"] = "consonant",
    ["á›"] = "consonant",
    ["áœ"] = "consonant",
    ["á"] = "consonant",
    ["á"] = "consonant",
    ["áŸ"] = "consonant",
    ["á "] = "consonant",
    ["á¡"] = "consonant",
    ["á¢"] = "consonant",
    ["á£"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á¤"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á¥"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á¦"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á§"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á¨"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á©"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["áª"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á«"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á¬"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á­"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á®"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á¯"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á°"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á±"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á²"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á³"] = "indep_vowel",
    ["á¶"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["á·"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["á¸"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["á¹"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["áº"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["á»"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["á¼"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["á½"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["á¾"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["á¿"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["áŸ€"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["áŸ"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["áŸ‚"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["áŸƒ"] = "terminating_vowel",
    ["áŸ„"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["áŸ…"] = "vowel_sign",
    ["áŸ†"] = "terminating_vowel",
    ["áŸ‡"] = "terminating_vowel",
    ["áŸˆ"] = "terminating_vowel",
    ["áŸ‰"] = "consonant_shift",
    ["áŸŠ"] = "consonant_shift",
    ["áŸ‹"] = "terminating_sign",
    ["áŸŒ"] = "sign",
    ["áŸ"] = "sign",
    ["áŸ"] = "sign",
    ["áŸ"] = "sign",
    ["áŸ"] = "sign",
    ["áŸ‘"] = "sign",
    ["áŸ’"] = "combining_sign",
    ["áŸ“"] = "sign",
    ["áŸ”"] = "punctuation",
    ["áŸ•"] = "punctuation",
    ["áŸ–"] = "sign",
    ["áŸ—"] = "punctuation",
    ["áŸ˜"] = "punctuation",
    ["áŸ™"] = "punctuation",
    ["áŸš"] = "punctuation",
    ["áŸ›"] = "punctuation",
    ["áŸœ"] = "sign",
    ["áŸ"] = "sign",
    ["â€‹"] = "ZWS"
}

local sp_symbols = {["áŸ "] = "0", ["áŸ¡"] = "1", ["áŸ¢"] = "2", ["áŸ£"] = "3", ["áŸ¤"] = "4", ["áŸ¥"] = "5", ["áŸ¦"] = "6", ["áŸ§"] = "7", ["áŸ¨"] = "8", ["áŸ©"] = "9", ["áŸ°"] = "0", ["áŸ±"] = "1", ["áŸ²"] = "2", ["áŸ³"] = "3", ["áŸ´"] = "4", ["áŸµ"] = "5", ["áŸ¶"] = "6", ["áŸ·"] = "7", ["áŸ¸"] = "8", ["áŸ¹"] = "9"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc, debug_mode)
    text = gsub(text, "[áŸ -áŸ¹]", sp_symbols)
    text = gsub(text, "(.)áŸ’(.áŸ’.)", "%1â€‹%2")
    text = gsub(text, "([á€áá‚áƒá„á…á†á‡áˆá‰áŠá‹áŒááááá‘á’á“á”á•á–á—á˜á™ášá›áœáááŸá á¡á¢]áŸ’[á€áá‚áƒá„á…á†á‡áˆá‰áŠá‹áŒááááá‘á’á“á”á•á–á—á˜á™ášá›áœáááŸá á¡á¢])([á€áá‚áƒá„á…á†á‡áˆá‰áŠá‹áŒááááá‘á’á“á”á•á–á—á˜á™ášá›áœáááŸá á¡á¢])", "â€‹%1%2")
    text = gsub(text, "([á€áá‚áƒá„á…á†á‡áˆá‰áŠá‹áŒááááá‘á’á“á”á•á–á—á˜á™ášá›áœáááŸá á¡á¢])([á€áá‚áƒá„á…á†á‡áˆá‰áŠá‹áŒááááá‘á’á“á”á•á–á—á˜á™ášá›áœáááŸá á¡á¢]áŸ’?[á€áá‚áƒá„á…á†á‡áˆá‰áŠá‹áŒááááá‘á’á“á”á•á–á—á˜á™ášá›áœáááŸá á¡á¢])", "%1â€‹%2")
    text = gsub(text, "(.áŸ)", "â€‹%1")

    for word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[á€-áŸâ€‹]+") do
        local original_text = word
        local c, chartype, syl, curr_syl = {}, {}, {}, {}
        local progress = "none"

        for i = 1, len(word) do
            c[i] = sub(word, i, i)
            chartype[i] = char_type[c[i]]
        end

        for i = 1, #c + 1 do
            local next_types = {}
            if i == #c + 1 or chartype[i] == "ZWS" then
                progress = "none"
                table.insert(syl, table.concat(curr_syl, ""))
                curr_syl = {}
            elseif progress == "none" then
                if chartype[i] == "consonant" then
                    table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                    progress = "initial"
                else
                    table.insert(syl, c[i])
                end
            elseif progress == "initial" then
                if chartype[i] == "combining_sign" then
                    table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                    progress = "initial_combining"
                elseif chartype[i] == "sign" or chartype[i] == "consonant_shift" then
                    table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                elseif chartype[i] == "vowel_sign" then
                    table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                    progress = "vowel"
                elseif chartype[i] == "terminating_vowel" then
                    if c[i - 1] .. c[i] .. (c[i + 1] or "") == "á¶áŸ†á„" and (i == #c - 1 or (i > #c + 1 and chartype[i + 2] == "consonant")) then
                        table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                        progress = "vowel"
                    else
                        table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                        table.insert(syl, table.concat(curr_syl, ""))
                        curr_syl = {}
                        progress = "none"
                    end
                elseif chartype[i] == "consonant" then
                    vowel_found = false
                    local j, skipped = i, 0
                    while not vowel_found do
                        if not chartype[j] or chartype[j] == "punctuation" or chartype[j] == "indep_vowel" or chartype[j] == "terminating_sign" or chartype[j] == "ZWS" then
                            skipped = 1
                            break
                        elseif chartype[j] == "consonant" or chartype[j] == "combining_sign" or (chartype[j] == "sign" and c[j] ~= "áŸ") then
                            table.insert(next_types, chartype[j])
                        else
                            vowel_found = true
                        end
                        j = j + 1
                    end
                    if skipped ~= 0 or match(table.concat(next_types, " "), "consonant s?i?g?n? ?consonant") then
                        table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                        progress = "coda"
                    else
                        table.insert(syl, table.concat(curr_syl, ""))
                        curr_syl = {c[i]}
                        progress = "initial"
                    end
                else
                    table.insert(syl, c[i])
                    progress = "none"
                end
            elseif progress == "initial_combining" then
                if chartype[i] == "consonant" then
                    table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                    progress = "initial"
                else
                    table.insert(syl, c[i])
                    progress = "none"
                end
            elseif progress == "vowel" then
                if chartype[i] == "vowel_sign" then
                    table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                elseif chartype[i] == "terminating_vowel" then
                    if c[i - 1] .. c[i] .. (c[i + 1] or "") == "á¶áŸ†á„" and (i == #c - 1 or (i > #c + 1 and chartype[i + 2] == "consonant")) then
                        table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                        progress = "vowel"
                    else
                        table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                        table.insert(syl, table.concat(curr_syl, ""))
                        curr_syl = {}
                        progress = "none"
                    end
                elseif chartype[i] == "consonant" then
                    vowel_found = false
                    local j, skipped = i, 0
                    while not vowel_found do
                        if not chartype[j] or chartype[j] == "punctuation" or chartype[j] == "indep_vowel" or chartype[j] == "terminating_sign" or chartype[j] == "ZWS" then
                            skipped = 1
                            break
                        elseif chartype[j] == "consonant" or chartype[j] == "combining_sign" or (chartype[j] == "sign" and c[j] ~= "áŸ") then
                            table.insert(next_types, chartype[j])
                        else
                            vowel_found = true
                        end
                        j = j + 1
                    end
                    if skipped ~= 0 or match(table.concat(next_types, " "), "consonant s?i?g?n? ?consonant") then
                        table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                        progress = "coda"
                    else
                        table.insert(syl, table.concat(curr_syl, ""))
                        curr_syl = {c[i]}
                        progress = "initial"
                    end
                else
                    table.insert(syl, c[i])
                    progress = "none"
                end
            elseif progress == "coda" then
                if chartype[i] == "combining_sign" then
                    table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                    progress = "coda_combining"
                elseif chartype[i] == "sign" or chartype[i] == "terminating_sign" then
                    table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                else
                    table.insert(syl, table.concat(curr_syl, ""))
                    curr_syl = {}
                    if chartype[i] == "consonant" then
                        table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                        progress = "initial"
                    else
                        table.insert(syl, c[i])
                        progress = "none"
                    end
                end
            elseif progress == "coda_combining" then
                if chartype[i] == "consonant" then
                    table.insert(curr_syl, c[i])
                    progress = "coda"
                else
                    table.insert(syl, table.concat(curr_syl, ""))
                    curr_syl = {}
                    progress = "none"
                end
            end
        end

        for i = 1, #syl do
            if match(syl[i], "áŸ") then
                syl[i] = "<small><del>" .. gsub(syl[i], ".", function(consonant) if cons_conv[consonant] then return cons_conv[consonant][1] end end) .. "</del></small>"
                break
            end
            syl[i] = gsub(syl[i], "áŸ‹$", "")

            syl[i] = gsub(syl[i], "^([á€áá‚áƒá„á…á†á‡áˆá‰áŠá‹áŒááááá‘á’á“á”á•á–á—á˜á™ášá›áœáááŸá á¡á¢])áŸ’?([á€áá‚áƒá„á…á†á‡áˆá‰áŠá‹áŒááááá‘á’á“á”á•á–á—á˜á™ášá›áœáááŸá á¡á¢]?)([áŸ‰áŸŠ]?)([á·á¸á¹áºá»á¼á½á¾á¿áŸ€áŸáŸ‚áŸƒáŸ„áŸ…á¶áŸ]?[áŸ†áŸ‡áŸˆ]?)([áŸ‰áŸŠ]?)([á€áá‚áƒá„á…á†á‡áˆá‰áŠá‹áŒááááá‘á’á“á”á•á–á—á˜á™ášá›áœáááŸá á¡á¢]?áŸ‰?)áŸ’?([á€áá‚áƒá„á…á†á‡áˆá‰áŠá‹áŒááááá‘á’á“á”á•á–á—á˜á™ášá›áœáááŸá á¡á¢]?)(áŸ–?)$", function(initial_a, initial_b, cons_shifter_a, vowel, cons_shifter_b, coda_a, coda_b, optional_sign)
                if cons_shifter_a .. cons_shifter_b .. vowel .. coda_a .. coda_b == "" and initial_b ~= "" and not match(syl[i], "áŸ’") then
                    coda_a = initial_b
                    initial_b = ""
                end
                base = initial_a
                if initial_b ~= "" and not match(initial_b, "[á„á‰á“á˜á™ášá›áœ]") then base = initial_b end
                if vowel .. coda_a .. coda_b == "á¶áŸ†á„" then vowel, coda_a, coda_b = "á¶áŸ†á„", "", "" end
                optional_sign = gsub(optional_sign, "áŸ–", "Ë")

                cons_shifter = cons_shifter_a .. cons_shifter_b
                if cons_shifter == "" and cons_conv[base] then
                    vowel_class = cons_conv[base][2]
                elseif cons_shifter == "áŸ‰" then
                    vowel_class = "a"
                elseif cons_shifter == "áŸŠ" then
                    vowel_class = "o"
                else
                    return initial_a .. initial_b .. cons_shifter .. vowel .. coda_a .. coda_b .. optional_sign
                end

                if digraph[initial_a .. "áŸ’" .. initial_b] and (digraph[coda_a .. "áŸ’" .. coda_b] or (cons_conv[coda_a] and cons_conv[coda_b])) and vowel_conv[vowel] then
                    return digraph[initial_a .. "áŸ’" .. initial_b] .. vowel_conv[vowel][vowel_class] .. (digraph[coda_a .. "áŸ’" .. coda_b] or cons_conv[coda_a][1] .. cons_conv[coda_b][1]) .. optional_sign

                elseif cons_conv[initial_a] and cons_conv[initial_b] and vowel_conv[vowel] and cons_conv[coda_a] and cons_conv[coda_b] then
                    return cons_conv[initial_a][1] .. cons_conv[initial_b][1] .. vowel_conv[vowel][vowel_class] .. cons_conv[coda_a][1] .. cons_conv[coda_b][1] .. optional_sign
                end
            end)

            if syl[i] == "áŸ—" and i > 1 then syl[i] = syl[i - 1] end
        end
        word = table.concat(syl, "")
        text = gsub(text, original_text, word)
    end

    text = gsub(text, ".", indep_vowel)
    text = gsub(text, "([^ ]*) áŸ—", "%1 %1")

    if match(text, "[á€-áŸ¹]") and not debug_mode then
        return nil
    else
        return text
    end

    -- To do: other signs
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="160">
<source>wikt/translit/kmr-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {["Ğ°"] = "a", ["Ğ±"] = "b", ["Ñ‰"] = "c", ["Ñ‡"] = "Ã§", ["Ğ´"] = "d", ["Ó™"] = "e", ["Ğµ"] = "Ãª", ["Ñ"] = "Ãª", ["Ñ„"] = "f", ["Ğ³"] = "g", ["h"] = "h", ["ÑŒ"] = "i", ["Ğ¸"] = "Ã®", ["Ğ¶"] = "j", ["Ğº"] = "k", ["Ğ»"] = "l", ["Ğ¼"] = "m", ["Ğ½"] = "n", ["Ğ¾"] = "o", ["Ğ¿"] = "p", ["Ô›"] = "q", ["Ñ€"] = "r", ["Ñ"] = "s", ["Ñˆ"] = "ÅŸ", ["Ñ‚"] = "t", ["Ó§"] = "u", ["Ñƒ"] = "Ã»", ["Ğ²"] = "v", ["Ô"] = "w", ["Ñ…"] = "x", ["Ğ¹"] = "y", ["Ğ·"] = "z", ["Ğ"] = "A", ["Ğ‘"] = "B", ["Ğ©"] = "C", ["Ğ§"] = "Ã‡", ["Ğ”"] = "D", ["Ó˜"] = "E", ["Ğ•"] = "ÃŠ", ["Ğ­"] = "ÃŠ", ["Ğ¤"] = "F", ["Ğ“"] = "G", ["H"] = "H", ["Ğ¬"] = "I", ["Ğ˜"] = "Ã", ["Ğ–"] = "J", ["Ğš"] = "K", ["Ğ›"] = "L", ["Ğœ"] = "M", ["Ğ"] = "N", ["Ğ"] = "O", ["ĞŸ"] = "P", ["Ôš"] = "Q", ["Ğ "] = "R", ["Ğ¡"] = "S", ["Ğ¨"] = "Å", ["Ğ¢"] = "T", ["Ó¦"] = "U", ["Ğ£"] = "Ã›", ["Ğ’"] = "V", ["Ô"] = "W", ["Ğ¥"] = "X", ["Ğ™"] = "Y", ["Ğ—"] = "Z", ["Ğ³â€™"] = "áº", ["Ğ“â€™"] = "áºŒ", ["hâ€™"] = "á¸§", ["Hâ€™"] = "á¸¦"};

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "[Ğ“Ğ³Hh]â€™", tt)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "^([rR])â€™", "%1") -- Ñ€â€™Ğ¾Ğ¶: roj
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([rR])â€™", "%1%1") -- Ğ¿ÑŒÑ€â€™: pirr

    local consonants = "bcÃ§dfghá¸§jklmnpqrsÅŸtvwxáºzBCÃ‡DFGHá¸¦JKLMNPQRSÅTVWXáºŒZ"
    local vowels = "aeÃªiÃ®ouÃ»AEÃŠIÃOUÃ›"

    -- handle Ó™â€™
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "()([eE])â€™", function(pos, e)
        if pos == 1 then -- Ó™â€™ at beginning of string
            local after1, after2 = mw.ustring.match(text, "^(.?)(.?)", pos + 2)
            if consonants:find(after1) and (after2 == "" -- followed by single consonant: Ó™â€™Ğº â†’ 'ek
            or consonants:find(after2)) then -- followed by two consonants: Ó™â€™ÑĞºÓ™Ñ€ â†’ 'esker
                return "'" .. e
            end
        else
            local before = mw.ustring.sub(text, pos - 1, pos - 1)
            if vowels:find(before) then -- preceded by vowel: Ñ‰ÑŒĞ¼Ğ°Ó™â€™Ñ‚ â†’ cima'et
                return "'" .. e
            end
        end

        return e .. "'"
    end)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="161">
<source>wikt/translit/kn-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local consonants = {["à²•"] = "k", ["à²–"] = "kh", ["à²—"] = "g", ["à²˜"] = "gh", ["à²™"] = "á¹…", ["à²š"] = "c", ["à²›"] = "ch", ["à²œ"] = "j", ["à²"] = "jh", ["à²"] = "Ã±", ["à²Ÿ"] = "á¹­", ["à² "] = "á¹­h", ["à²¡"] = "á¸", ["à²¢"] = "á¸h", ["à²£"] = "á¹‡", ["à²¤"] = "t", ["à²¥"] = "th", ["à²¦"] = "d", ["à²§"] = "dh", ["à²¨"] = "n", ["à²ª"] = "p", ["à²«"] = "ph", ["à²¬"] = "b", ["à²­"] = "bh", ["à²®"] = "m", ["à²¯"] = "y", ["à²°"] = "r", ["à²±"] = "á¹Ÿ", ["à²²"] = "l", ["à²µ"] = "v", ["à²¶"] = "Å›", ["à²·"] = "á¹£", ["à²¸"] = "s", ["à²¹"] = "h", ["à²³"] = "á¸·", ["à³"] = "á¸»", ["à²«à²¼"] = "f", ["à²œà²¼"] = "z", ["à²³à²¼"] = "zh"}

local diacritics = {["à²¾"] = "Ä", ["à²¿"] = "i", ["à³€"] = "Ä«", ["à³"] = "u", ["à³‚"] = "Å«", ["à³ƒ"] = "á¹›", ["à³„"] = "rÌ¥Ì„", ["à³†"] = "e", ["à³‡"] = "Ä“", ["à³ˆ"] = "ai", ["à³Š"] = "o", ["à³‹"] = "Å", ["à³Œ"] = "au"}

local nonconsonants = {
    -- vowels
    ["à²…"] = "a",
    ["à²†"] = "Ä",
    ["à²‡"] = "i",
    ["à²ˆ"] = "Ä«",
    ["à²‰"] = "u",
    ["à²Š"] = "Å«",
    ["à²‹"] = "á¹›",
    ["à³ "] = "rÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à²Œ"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["à³¡"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à²"] = "e",
    ["à²"] = "Ä“",
    ["à²"] = "ai",
    ["à²’"] = "o",
    ["à²“"] = "Å",
    ["à²”"] = "au",
    ["à²…à²‚"] = "aá¹ƒ",
    ["à²…à²ƒ"] = "ah",
    -- other symbols
    ["à²‚"] = "á¹ƒ", -- anusvara
    ["à²ƒ"] = "á¸¥", -- visarga
    -- halant, supresses the inherent vowel "a"
    ["à³"] = "",
    -- digits
    ["à³¦"] = "0",
    ["à³§"] = "1",
    ["à³¨"] = "2",
    ["à³©"] = "3",
    ["à³ª"] = "4",
    ["à³«"] = "5",
    ["à³¬"] = "6",
    ["à³­"] = "7",
    ["à³®"] = "8",
    ["à³¯"] = "9"
}

-- translit any words or phrases
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([à²•à²–à²—à²˜à²™à²šà²›à²œà²à²à²Ÿà² à²¡à²¢à²£à²¤à²¥à²¦à²§à²¨à²ªà²«à²¬à²­à²®à²¯à²°à²±à²²à²µà²¶à²·à²¸à²¹à²³à³à²•à²–][à²¼]?)" .. "([à²¾à²¿à³€à³à³‚à³ƒà³†à³‡à³ˆà³Šà³‹à³Œà³]?)", function(c, d)
        -- mw.log('match', c, d)
        c = consonants[c] or c
        if d == "" then
            return c .. "a"
        else
            return c .. (diacritics[d] or d)
        end
    end)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", nonconsonants)

    -- anusvara
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¹ƒ([kgá¹…])", "á¹…%1")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¹ƒ([cjÃ±])", "Ã±%1")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¹ƒ([á¹­á¸á¹‡])", "á¹‡%1")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¹ƒ([tdn])", "n%1")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "á¹ƒ([pbm])", "m%1")

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="162">
<source>wikt/translit/ko-pron/data.lua</source>
<document_content>

export.boundary = {
    -- note: Ã˜ represents different things when used for initials and finals.
    -- For initials, Ã˜ = the next syllable is absent.
    -- For finals, Ã˜ = the absence of a jongseong jamo, but the previous syllable exists.
    -- The equivalent of initial Ã˜ is final "" (nothing).
