    ["tw"] = "á€á€½",
    ["htw"] = "á€‘á€½",
    ["dw"] = "á€’á€½",
    ["cw"] = "á€€á€»á€½",
    ["hcw"] = "á€á€»á€½",
    ["jw"] = "á€‚á€»á€½",
    ["kw"] = "á€€á€½",
    ["hkw"] = "á€á€½",
    ["gw"] = "á€‚á€½",
    ["thw"] = "á€á€½",
    ["sw"] = "á€…á€½",
    ["hsw"] = "á€†á€½",
    ["zw"] = "á€‡á€½",
    ["hyw"] = "á€›á€½á€¾",
    ["hw"] = "á€Ÿá€½",
    ["yw"] = "á€šá€½",
    ["hlw"] = "á€œá€½á€¾",
    ["lw"] = "á€œá€½",
    ["hly"] = "*á€œá€»á€¾",
    ["ly"] = "*á€œá€»",

    ["i"] = "á€®",
    ["i\\"] = "á€®á€¸",
    ["i/"] = "á€­",
    ["i?"] = "á€…á€º",
    ["i~"] = "á€„á€º",
    ["i\\~"] = "á€„á€ºá€¸",
    ["i/~"] = "á€„á€·á€º",
    ["ei"] = "á€±",
    ["ei\\"] = "á€±á€¸",
    ["ei/"] = "á€±á€·",
    ["ei?"] = "á€­á€á€º",
    ["ei~"] = "á€­á€”á€º",
    ["ei\\~"] = "á€­á€”á€ºá€¸",
    ["ei/~"] = "á€­á€”á€·á€º",
    ["e"] = "á€šá€º",
    ["e\\"] = "á€²",
    ["e/"] = "á€šá€·á€º",
    ["e?"] = "á€€á€º",
    ["ai~"] = "á€­á€¯á€„á€º",
    ["ai\\~"] = "á€­á€¯á€„á€ºá€¸",
    ["ai/~"] = "á€­á€¯á€„á€·á€º",
    ["ai?"] = "á€­á€¯á€€á€º",
    ["a"] = "á€¬",
    ["a\\"] = "á€¬á€¸",
    ["a/"] = "",
    ["a?"] = "á€á€º",
    ["a~"] = "á€”á€º",
    ["a\\~"] = "á€”á€ºá€¸",
    ["a/~"] = "á€”á€·á€º",
    ["o"] = "á€±á€¬á€º",
    ["o\\"] = "á€±á€¬",
    ["o/"] = "á€±á€¬á€·",
    ["au?"] = "á€±á€¬á€€á€º",
    ["au~"] = "á€±á€¬á€„á€º",
    ["au\\~"] = "á€±á€¬á€„á€ºá€¸",
    ["au/~"] = "á€±á€¬á€„á€·á€º",
    ["ou"] = "á€­á€¯",
    ["ou\\"] = "á€­á€¯á€¸",
    ["ou/"] = "á€­á€¯á€·",
    ["ou?"] = "á€¯á€•á€º",
    ["ou~"] = "á€¯á€”á€º",
    ["ou\\~"] = "á€¯á€”á€ºá€¸",
    ["ou/~"] = "á€¯á€”á€·á€º",
    ["u"] = "á€°",
    ["u\\"] = "á€°á€¸",
    ["u/"] = "á€¯",
    ["u?"] = "á€½á€á€º",
    ["u~"] = "á€½á€”á€º",
    ["u\\~"] = "á€½á€”á€ºá€¸",
    ["u/~"] = "á€½á€”á€·á€º",
    ["a'"] = "'"
}

local repl_string = "([á€€á€á€‚á€ƒá€„á€…á€†á€‡á€ˆá€‰á€Šá€‹á€Œá€á€á€á€á€‘á€’á€“á€”á€•á€–á€—á€˜á€™á€šá€›á€œá€á€á€Ÿá€ á€¡á€¿][á€»á€¼á€½á€¾]*[á€¶á€·á€¸á€½á€¬á€«á€«á€­á€®á€¯á€°á€±á€²]*)([á€€á€á€‚á€ƒá€„á€…á€†á€‡á€ˆá€‰á€Šá€‹á€Œá€á€á€á€á€‘á€’á€“á€”á€•á€–á€—á€˜á€™á€šá€›á€œá€á€á€Ÿá€ á€¡á€¿][á€·]?[^á€·á€ºá€¹])"

function syllabify(text)
    text = gsub(text, "('?)([%+%-%*]*)", function(a, b) if a .. b ~= "" then return a .. " " .. b end end)

    text = gsub(text, "([á€£á€¤á€¥á€¦á€§á€©á€ªááŒá][á€·á€¸á€º]?)(.?)(.?)", function(a, b, c) return (c == "á€¹" and " " .. a .. b .. " " .. c or (c == "á€º" and " " .. a .. b .. c or " " .. a .. " " .. b .. c)) end) .. " "

    text = gsub(text, "(á€ºá€¸?'?)", "%1 ")
    text = gsub(text, "([á€¸á€·])([á€€á€á€‚á€ƒá€„á€…á€†á€‡á€ˆá€‰á€Šá€‹á€Œá€á€á€á€á€‘á€’á€“á€”á€•á€–á€—á€˜á€™á€šá€›á€œá€á€á€Ÿá€ á€¡]á€º)", "%2%1")

    while match(text, repl_string) do text = gsub(text, repl_string, "%1 %2") end

    text = gsub(text, "á€¹", " , ")
    text = gsub(text, " +", " ")
    text = gsub(text, "^ ?(.*[^ ]) ?$", "%1")
    text = gsub(text, " , ", " ")
    text = gsub(text, " ([23])", "%1")
    return text
end

function initial_by_char(initial_string, system_index, ref_table)
    local initial_set = {}
    for character in mw.text.gsplit(initial_string, "") do
        local temp_initial = ref_table[character] or error("Initial data not found.")
        table.insert(initial_set, temp_initial[system_index] or temp_initial)
    end
    return table.concat(initial_set)
end

function generate_respelling(text)
    text = gsub(text, " ", " ã€€ ")
    text = gsub(text, "á€«", "á€¬")
    if match(text, "[á€€-á‚Ÿê© -ê©»]") then return text end
    text = gsub(text, "(%+?)([^%?%+'/\\~aeiouã€€]*)(/?)([%?'/\\~aeiou]+)", function(voicing_mark, latin_initial, opt_sep, latin_final) return voicing_mark .. (reverse_table[latin_initial] or initial_by_char(latin_initial, nil, reverse_table)) .. opt_sep .. reverse_table[latin_final] end)
    return text
end

function process(initial, final, tone, schwa, system, system_index)
    if match(initial .. final, "á€½á€¾?[á€á€”á€•á€™á€¶]") and system["type"] == "phonetic" then
        initial = gsub(initial, "[á€½/]", "")
        final = "á€½" .. final
    else
        initial = gsub(initial, "/", "")
    end

    initial_new = system["type"] == "phonetic" and gsub(initial, "%+.", initial_voicing) or initial

    if indep_letter_table[initial_new] then
        initial_new = match(initial_new, "[áŒá]") and "-" or ""
        final = initial .. final
    end
    if initial_new == "á€™á€¼á€½" then require("debug").track("my-pron/mrw") end

    initial_data = initial_table[initial_new] or initial_table[gsub(initial_new, "[%+%-%*]", "")] or (system["type"] == "orthographic" and initial_by_char(initial_new, system_index, initial_table) or error("Initial data not found."))

    initial_value = initial_data[system_index] or initial_data

    if match(initial, "^%+") and system_index == 5 then
        initial_value = initial_table[gsub(initial, "%+", "")][system_index]
        initial_value = gsub(initial_value, "^([^rwy]+)", "<u>%1</u>")
    end

    final_data = final_table[system["type"] .. schwa == "phonetic'" and schwa or final] or (system["type"] == "phonetic" and (final_table[final .. "á€º"] or indep_letter_table[final]) or indep_letter_table[final]) or gsub(final, "^([^á€º]*)([^á€º])(á€º?)$", function(first, second, third)
        first_data = nucleus_table[first] or final_table[first] or indep_letter_table[first] or first
        second_data = initial_table[second] or second
        first = first_data ~= first and first_data[system_index] or first
        second = second_data ~= second and second_data[system_index] .. ((system_index == 3 and third ~= "") and "Ê»" or "") or second
        return (gsub(first .. second, "([%.:])(.*)", "%2"))
    end)

    final_value = type(final_data) == "table" and final_data[system_index] or final_data
    final_value = mw.ustring.toNFD(final_value)
    if tone == "" then
        tone_value = ""
    else
        if system_index ~= 4 then final_value = gsub(final_value, "Ì€", "") end
        final_value = gsub(final_value, "[Ì:%.]", "")
        if system["type"] .. schwa == "phonetic'" then
            tone_value = ""
        else
            tone_data = tone_table[tone] or error("Tone data not found.")
            tone_value = tone_data[system_index]
        end
    end

    if system_index == 1 then
        final_value = gsub(final_value, "^([aeÉ™É›iÉªoÉ”uÊŠ])", "%1" .. tone_value)
    elseif system_index == 5 then
        final_value = gsub(final_value, "([aeiou])([^aeiou]*)$", "%1" .. tone_value .. "%2")
    else
        final_value = final_value .. tone_value
    end

    return mw.ustring.toNFC(initial_value .. final_value)
end

function remove_wide_space(text) return (gsub(text, "ã€€", "")) end

function concatenate(set, system_index)
    if system_index == 1 then return remove_wide_space(table.concat(set)) end
    result_text = remove_wide_space(table.concat(set, " "))

    for count = 1, 3 do
        result_text = gsub(result_text, "(.) (.)([^ ]?)", function(previous, next, after_next)
            if ambig_intersyl[system_index][previous .. next] or ((system_index == 2 or system_index == 4) and (match(previous .. " " .. next, "[ptkgmngy] [aeiou]") or (match(previous .. next .. after_next, "[aeiou][ptkmn][rwyg]") and not match(after_next, "[aeiou]")))) then
                return previous .. "-" .. next .. after_next
            else
                return previous .. next .. after_next
            end
        end)
    end

    return result_text
end

function export.get_romanisation(word, pronunciations, system, system_index, mode)
    local sentences = {}
    word = gsub(word, " ", "|")
    if system["type"] == "phonetic" then word = gsub(word, "á€¿", "á€á€ºá€") end
    word = syllabify(word)
    word = gsub(word, "á€«", "á€¬")
    if system["type"] == "phonetic" then word = gsub(word, "á€([á€á€”á€•á€™á€¶])", "á€á€½%1") end
    for phrase in mw.text.gsplit(word, "|", true) do
        local temp = {}
        local syllable = mw.text.split(phrase, " ", true)
        for syllable_index = 1, #syllable do
            syllable[syllable_index] = gsub(syllable[syllable_index], "([á€¸á€·])(á€º)", "%2%1")
            temp[syllable_index] = gsub(syllable[syllable_index], "^([%+%-%*]*[á€€á€á€‚á€ƒá€„á€…á€†á€‡á€ˆá€‰á€Šá€‹á€Œá€á€á€á€á€‘á€’á€“á€”á€•á€–á€—á€˜á€™á€šá€›á€œá€á€á€Ÿá€ á€¡á€£á€¤á€¥á€¦á€§á€©á€ªááŒáá€¿][á€»á€¼]?á€½?á€¾?/?)([^á€¸á€·']*)([á€¸á€·]?)('?)$", function(initial, final, tone, schwa) return process(initial, final, tone, schwa, system, system_index) end)
        end
        table.insert(sentences, concatenate(temp, system_index))
    end
    if mode == "translit_module" then return table.concat(sentences, " ") end
    table.insert(pronunciations[system_index], table.concat(sentences, " "))
    return pronunciations[system_index]
end

function respelling_format(phonetic, page_title)
    local page_title_set = mw.text.split(syllabify(page_title), " ")
    local new_respellings = {}
    for _, respelling in ipairs(phonetic) do
        local respelling_set = mw.text.split(syllabify(respelling), " ")
        if gsub(table.concat(respelling_set), "[%+%-%*']", "") == (gsub(table.concat(page_title_set), "á€«", "á€¬")) then for index, element in ipairs(respelling_set) do if element ~= page_title_set[index] then respelling_set[index] = "<span style=\"font-size:110%; color:#A32214; font-weight: bold\">" .. element .. "</span>" end end end
        table.insert(new_respellings, table.concat(respelling_set))
    end
    text = table.concat(new_respellings, ", ")
    text = remove_wide_space(text)
    text = gsub(text, "[%+%-].", initial_voicing)
    text = gsub(text, "([á€á€‚á€„á€’á€•á€]á€±?)á€¬", "%1á€«")
    return text
end

function export.generate_tests(word, respelling)
    respelling, word = generate_respelling(respelling), generate_respelling(word)
    local pronunciations = {[1] = {}, [2] = {}, [3] = {}, [4] = {}, [5] = {}}
    local p, result = {["orthographic"] = word, ["phonetic"] = respelling or word}, {}

    table.sort(system_list, function(first, second) return first[1] < second[1] end)
    for system_index, system in ipairs(system_list) do pronunciations[system_index] = export.get_romanisation(p[system["type"]], pronunciations, system, system_index) end
    for system_index = 1, 5 do table.insert(result, table.concat(pronunciations[system_index])) end
    return (gsub(gsub(table.concat(result, " | "), "<u>", "("), "</u>", ")"))
end

function export.make(frame)
    local args = frame:getParent().args
    local page_title = mw.title.getCurrentTitle().text
    local title = generate_respelling(args["word"] or page_title)

    local p, result = {["orthographic"] = {title}, ["phonetic"] = {}}, {}
    local pronunciations = {[1] = {}, [2] = {}, [3] = {}, [4] = {}, [5] = {}}

    if not args[1] then args = {title} end
    for index, item in ipairs(args) do table.insert(p["phonetic"], (item ~= "") and generate_respelling(item) or nil) end

    table.sort(system_list, function(first, second) return first[1] < second[1] end)
    for system_index, system in ipairs(system_list) do for _, word in ipairs(p[system["type"]]) do pronunciations[system_index] = export.get_romanisation(word, pronunciations, system, system_index) end end

    if title ~= table.concat(args) then table.insert(result, "* Phonetic respelling" .. (#p["phonetic"] > 1 and "s" or "") .. ": " .. tostring(mw.html.create("span"):attr("lang", "my"):attr("class", "Mymr"):wikitext(respelling_format(p["phonetic"], page_title))) .. "\n") end

    table.insert(result, "* [[Wiktionary:International Phonetic Alphabet|IPA]]" .. "<sup>([[Appendix:Burmese pronunciation|key]])</sup>: " .. (tostring(mw.html.create("span"):attr("class", "IPA"):wikitext("/" .. gsub(table.concat(pronunciations[1], "/, /"), "Ê”Ê”", "Ê”.Ê”") .. "/"))) .. "\n* [[Wiktionary:Burmese transliteration|Romanization:]] ")

    for system_index = 2, 5 do table.insert(result, (system_index ~= 2 and " â€¢ " or "") .. "''" .. system_list[system_index]["name"] .. ":'' " .. table.concat(pronunciations[system_index], "/")) end

    return table.concat(result)
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="233">
<source>wikt/translit/my-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub

local symbols = {["á€"] = "0", ["á"] = "1", ["á‚"] = "2", ["áƒ"] = "3", ["á„"] = "4", ["á…"] = "5", ["á†"] = "6", ["á‡"] = "7", ["áˆ"] = "8", ["á‰"] = "9", ["áŠ"] = "&#124;", ["á‹"] = "&#124;&#124;"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc, debug_mode)
    local m_pron = require("my-pron").get_romanisation
    text = gsub(text, ".", symbols)
    for word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[á€€-á‚Ÿê© -ê©»]+") do
        success, translit = pcall(m_pron, word, nil, {2, ["type"] = "orthographic", ["name"] = "MLCTS"}, 2, "translit_module")
        if success then
            text = gsub(text, word, translit, 1)
        else
            return nil
        end
    end
    if mw.ustring.match(text, "[á€€-á‚Ÿê© -ê©»]") and not debug_mode then return nil end
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="234">
<source>wikt/translit/myv-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tab = {["Ğ"] = "A", ["Ğ‘"] = "B", ["Ğ’"] = "V", ["Ğ“"] = "G", ["Ğ”"] = "D", ["Ğ•"] = "E", ["Ğ"] = "Jo", ["Ğ–"] = "Å½", ["Ğ—"] = "Z", ["Ğ˜"] = "I", ["Ğ™"] = "J", ["Ğš"] = "K", ["Ğ›"] = "L", ["Ğœ"] = "M", ["Ğ"] = "N", ["Ğ"] = "O", ["ĞŸ"] = "P", ["Ğ "] = "R", ["Ğ¡"] = "S", ["Ğ¢"] = "T", ["Ğ£"] = "U", ["Ğ¤"] = "F", ["Ğ¥"] = "X", ["Ğ¦"] = "C", ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ", ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ", ["Ğ©"] = "Å Ä", ["Ğª"] = "Êº", ["Ğ«"] = "Y", ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹", ["Ğ­"] = "E", ["Ğ®"] = "Ju", ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja", ["Ğ°"] = "a", ["Ğ±"] = "b", ["Ğ²"] = "v", ["Ğ³"] = "g", ["Ğ´"] = "d", ["Ğµ"] = "e", ["Ñ‘"] = "jo", ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾", ["Ğ·"] = "z", ["Ğ¸"] = "i", ["Ğ¹"] = "j", ["Ğº"] = "k", ["Ğ»"] = "l", ["Ğ¼"] = "m", ["Ğ½"] = "n", ["Ğ¾"] = "o", ["Ğ¿"] = "p", ["Ñ€"] = "r", ["Ñ"] = "s", ["Ñ‚"] = "t", ["Ñƒ"] = "u", ["Ñ„"] = "f", ["Ñ…"] = "x", ["Ñ†"] = "c", ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä", ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡", ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä", ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº", ["Ñ‹"] = "y", ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹", ["Ñ"] = "e", ["Ñ"] = "ju", ["Ñ"] = "ja"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- Ğ needs converting if is decomposed
    text = text:gsub("Ñ‘", "Ñ‘"):gsub("Ğ", "Ğ")

    -- Ğµ after a vowel or at the beginning of a word becomes je
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ĞĞĞ£Ğ«Ğ•Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜Ğ•ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ğ¾ÑƒÑ‹ÑÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ĞµÑŠÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?)Ğµ", "%1je")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "^Ğ•", "Je")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "^Ğµ", "je")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])Ğ•", "%1Je")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([^Ğ€-Ó¿])Ğµ", "%1je")

    return (mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tab))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="235">
<source>wikt/translit/ne-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- Transliteration for Nepali
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["à¤•"] = "k",
    ["à¤–"] = "kh",
    ["à¤—"] = "g",
    ["à¤˜"] = "gh",
    ["à¤™"] = "á¹…",
    ["à¤š"] = "c",
    ["à¤›"] = "ch",
    ["à¤œ"] = "j",
    ["à¤"] = "jh",
    ["à¤"] = "Ã±",
    ["à¤Ÿ"] = "á¹­",
    ["à¤ "] = "á¹­h",
    ["à¤¡"] = "á¸",
    ["à¤¢"] = "á¸h",
    ["à¤£"] = "á¹‡",
    ["à¤¤"] = "t",
    ["à¤¥"] = "th",
    ["à¤¦"] = "d",
    ["à¤§"] = "dh",
    ["à¤¨"] = "n",
    ["à¤ª"] = "p",
    ["à¤«"] = "ph",
    ["à¤¬"] = "b",
    ["à¤­"] = "bh",
    ["à¤®"] = "m",
    ["à¤¯"] = "y",
    ["à¤°"] = "r",
    ["à¤²"] = "l",
    ["à¤µ"] = "w",
    ["à¤¶"] = "Å›",
    ["à¤·"] = "á¹£",
    ["à¤¸"] = "s",
    ["à¤¹"] = "h",

    ["à¤•à¤¼"] = "q",
    ["à¤–à¤¼"] = "x",
    ["à¤—à¤¼"] = "Ä¡",
    ["à¤´"] = "á¸»",
    ["à¤³"] = "á¸·",
    ["à¤œà¤¼"] = "z",
    ["à¤¶à¤¼"] = "Å¾",
    ["à¤à¤¼"] = "Å¾",
    ["à¤¡à¤¼"] = "á¹›",
    ["à¤¢à¤¼"] = "á¹›h",
    ["à¤«à¤¼"] = "f",
    ["à¤¥à¤¼"] = "Î¸",
    ["à¤¦à¤¼"] = "Ã°",
    ["à¤©"] = "á¹‰",
    ["à¤±"] = "á¹Ÿ",
    ["à¥½"] = "'",
    ["à¤µà¤¼"] = "V",
    ["à¥¹"] = "Å¾",
    -- vowel diacritics
    ["à¤¿"] = "i",
    ["à¥"] = "u",
    ["à¥‡"] = "e",
    ["à¥‹"] = "o",
    ["à¤¾"] = "Ä",
    ["à¥€"] = "Ä«",
    ["à¥‚"] = "Å«",
    ["à¥ƒ"] = "rÌ¥",
    ["à¥„"] = "rÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¥¢"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["à¥£"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¥ˆ"] = "ai",
    ["à¥Œ"] = "au",
    ["à¥‰"] = "Å",
    ["à¥…"] = "Ä•",
    -- vowel signs
    ["à¤…"] = "a",
    ["à¤‡"] = "i",
    ["à¤‰"] = "u",
    ["à¤"] = "e",
    ["à¤“"] = "o",
    ["à¤†"] = "Ä",
    ["à¤ˆ"] = "Ä«",
    ["à¤Š"] = "Å«",
    ["à¤‹"] = "rÌ¥",
    ["à¥ "] = "rÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¤Œ"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["à¥¡"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¤"] = "ai",
    ["à¤”"] = "au",
    ["à¤‘"] = "Å",
    ["à¥²"] = "Ä•",
    ["à¤"] = "Ä•",
    -- chandrabindu
    ["à¤"] = "Ìƒ",
    -- anusvara
    ["à¤‚"] = "á¹ƒ",
    -- visarga
    ["à¤ƒ"] = "á¸¥",
    -- virama
    ["à¥"] = "",
    -- om
    ["à¥"] = "omÌ",
    -- zero width joiner
    ["â€"] = "a",
    -- numerals
    ["à¥¦"] = "0",
    ["à¥§"] = "1",
    ["à¥¨"] = "2",
    ["à¥©"] = "3",
    ["à¥ª"] = "4",
    ["à¥«"] = "5",
    ["à¥¬"] = "6",
    ["à¥­"] = "7",
    ["à¥®"] = "8",
    ["à¥¯"] = "9",
    -- punctuation
    ["à¥¤"] = ".", -- danda
    ["à¥¥"] = ".", -- double danda
    ["+"] = "", -- compound separator

    -- abbreviation sign
    ["à¥°"] = "."
}

local nasal_assim = {["à¤•"] = "à¤™", ["à¤–"] = "à¤™", ["à¤—"] = "à¤™", ["à¤˜"] = "à¤™", ["à¤š"] = "à¤", ["à¤›"] = "à¤", ["à¤œ"] = "à¤", ["à¤"] = "à¤", ["à¤Ÿ"] = "à¤£", ["à¤ "] = "à¤£", ["à¤¡"] = "à¤£", ["à¤¢"] = "à¤£", ["à¤ª"] = "à¤®", ["à¤«"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¬"] = "à¤®", ["à¤­"] = "à¤®", ["à¤®"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¤"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¥"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¦"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤§"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¨"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤·"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¶"] = "à¤™", ["à¤¸"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¯"] = "à¤®", ["à¤°"] = "à¤®", ["à¤²"] = "à¤", ["à¤µ"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¹"] = "à¤™"}
local perm_cl = {["à¤œà¥à¤¨"] = true, ["à¤œà¥à¤"] = true, ["à¤Ÿà¥à¤°"] = true, ["à¤¡à¥à¤°"] = true, ["à¤Ÿà¥à¤¸"] = true, ["à¤¡à¥à¤¸"] = true, ["à¤¸à¥à¤¡"] = true}

local all_cons, special_cons = "à¤•à¤–à¤—à¤˜à¤™à¤šà¤›à¤œà¤à¤à¤Ÿà¤ à¤¡à¤¢à¤£à¤¤à¤¥à¤¦à¤§à¤¨à¤ªà¤«à¤¬à¤­à¤®à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¸à¤¶à¤·à¤¹", "à¤•à¤–à¤—à¤˜à¤šà¤›à¤œà¤à¤Ÿà¤ à¤¡à¤¢à¤£à¤¤à¤¥à¤¦à¤§à¤¨à¤ªà¤«à¤¬à¤­à¤®à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¶à¤·à¤¸à¤¹"
local vowel, vowel_sign = "aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¥„à¥¢à¥£", "à¤…à¤‡à¤‰à¤à¤“à¤†à¤ˆà¤Šà¤‹à¥ à¥¡à¤Œà¤à¤”à¤‘à¤"
local syncope_pattern = "(à¤¼?[" .. all_cons .. "])([à¤‚à¤]?[" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "])(à¤¼?[" .. all_cons .. "])([à¤‚à¤]?[" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "])(à¤¼?[" .. all_cons .. "])a(à¤¼?[" .. all_cons .. "])([à¤‚à¤]?[" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "])(à¤¼?[" .. all_cons .. "])([à¤‚à¤]?[" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "])"

local nor_cons, sp_cons = "à¤•à¤–à¤—à¤˜à¤™à¤šà¤›à¤œà¤à¤à¤Ÿà¤ à¤¡à¤¢à¤¤à¤¥à¤¦à¤§à¤ªà¤«à¤¬à¤­à¤¶à¤·à¤¸à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤£à¤¨à¤®à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¨à¤®", "à¤•à¤²à¤®"
local vowel, vowel_sign = "aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¥„à¥¢à¥£", "à¤…à¤‡à¤‰à¤à¤“à¤†à¤ˆà¤Šà¤‹à¥ à¥¡à¤Œà¤à¤”à¤‘à¤"
local koka_sign = "à¥‹à¥€à¤¾à¥ˆà¥‡"
local koka_pattern = "([" .. koka_sign .. "])(à¤¼?[" .. sp_cons .. "])a(à¤¼?[" .. gsub(nor_cons, "à¤¯", "") .. "])([à¤‚à¤]?[" .. vowel .. vowel_sign .. "])"

local function rev_string(text)
    local result, length = {}, mw.ustring.len(text)
    for i = length, 1, -1 do table.insert(result, mw.ustring.sub(text, i, i)) end
    return table.concat(result)
end
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. all_cons .. "]à¤¼?)([" .. vowel .. "à¥]?)", function(c, d) return c .. (d == "" and "a" or d) end)
    for word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[à¤€-à¥¿a]+") do
        local orig_word = word
        word = rev_string(word)
        word = gsub(word, "^a(à¤¼?)([" .. all_cons .. "])(.)(.?)", function(opt, first, second, third) return (((match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "à¤‚") or match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "à¥") and not perm_cl[first .. second .. third]) or match(first .. second, "à¤¯[aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¤†à¤ˆà¤‰à¤Šà¤‡à¤à¤à¤“à¤”]") or match(first .. second, "à¤¹[à¤…aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¤†à¤ˆà¤‰à¤Šà¤‡à¤à¤à¤“à¤”]")) and "a" or "") .. opt .. first .. second .. third end)

        while match(word, syncope_pattern) do word = gsub(word, syncope_pattern, "%1%2%3%4%5%6%7%8%9") end
        while match(word, koka_pattern) do word = gsub(word, koka_pattern, "%1%2%3%4") end
        word = gsub(word, "(.?)à¤‚(.)", function(succ, prev) return succ .. (succ .. prev == "a" and "à¥à¤®" or (succ == "" and match(prev, "[" .. vowel .. "]") and "Ìƒ" or nasal_assim[succ] or "á¹ƒ")) .. prev end)

        local escaped_orig_word = gsub(orig_word, "%+", "")
        text = gsub(text, orig_word, rev_string(word))
        text = gsub(text, "à¤ˆà¤¨$", "Ä«na")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¤ˆà¤¨ ", "%1Ä«na ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤‡à¤¨$", "ina")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¤‡à¤¨ ", "%1ina ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¥ˆà¤¨$", "aina")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¥ˆà¥ˆà¥ˆà¥ˆà¤¨ ", "%1aina ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤‰à¤¨$", "una")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¤‰à¤¨ ", "%1una ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤¿à¤¨$", "ina")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¤¿à¤¨ ", "%1ina ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤¿à¤›$", "icha")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¤¿à¤› ", "%1icha ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤‰à¤›$", "ucha")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¤‰à¤› ", "%1ucha ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤‡à¤›$", "icha")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¤‡à¤› ", "%1icha ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤à¤›$", "echa")
        text = gsub(text, "à¥‡à¤›$", "echa")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¥‡à¤› ", "%1echa ")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¥‡à¤¨ ", "%1ena ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¥‡à¤¨$", "ena")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¤à¤¨ ", "%1ena ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤à¤°$", "era")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¤à¤° ", "%1era ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¥‡à¤°$", "era")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¥‡à¤° ", "%1era ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤à¤¨$", "ena")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤‰à¤à¤›$", "Å©cha")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¤‰à¤à¤› ", "%1ucha ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤¬à¤¾à¤Ÿ$", "bÄá¹­a")
        text = gsub(text, "(...)à¤¬à¤¾à¤Ÿ ", "%1bÄá¹­a ")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤œà¥à¤", "gy")
    end
    text = gsub(text, ".à¤¼?", conv)
    text = gsub(text, "a([iu])Ìƒ", "aÍ %1")
    text = gsub(text, "[<>]", "")
    text = gsub(text, "à¥±", "")

    text = gsub(text, "dach$", "dacha")
    text = gsub(text, "(...)dach ", "%1dacha ")
    text = gsub(text, "ain$", "aina")
    text = gsub(text, "(...)ain ", "%1aina ")
    text = gsub(text, "nach$", "nacha")
    text = gsub(text, "(...)nach ", "%1nacha ")
    text = gsub(text, "wai", "vai")
    text = gsub(text, "w$", "v")
    text = gsub(text, "(...)w ", "%1v ")
    text = gsub(text, "([raÃ¤ÄiÄ«uÅ«eo])([r])w", "%1rv")
    text = gsub(text, "w([iÄ«ewoyrÌ¥lÌ¥lÌ¥Ì„rÌ¥Ì„])", "v%1")
    text = gsub(text, "([w])a([krjtcá¹…Ã±ysÅ›dphá¹‡n])([tnrá¹‡á¹£cÅ›kghjsueoayd])", "va%2%3")
    text = gsub(text, "([w])Ä([cgjá¹‡tdmyshÅ›á¹£n])", "vÄ%2")
    text = gsub(text, "([w])Ä([r])([tdÄbuá¹‡á¹£h])", "vÄ%2%3")
    text = gsub(text, "([w])Ä([l])([m])", "vÄ%2%3")
    text = gsub(text, "([w])a([sÅ›á¹£á¹…Ã±á¹ƒypdtnc])", "va%2")
    text = gsub(text, "rhÌ¥", "hrÌ¥")
    ---text = gsub(text, 'ká¹£', 'chÌ¥')
    text = gsub(text, "ahar([uÅ«])", "har%1")
    text = gsub(text, "abÄá¹­a", "bÄá¹­a")

    text = gsub(text, "kan$", "kana")
    text = gsub(text, "(...)kan ", "%1kana ")
    text = gsub(text, "([ptkbdgá¹­á¹‡Ã±á¸má¹…nlrwyhá¹£Å›s])([ptkbdgá¹­á¸má¹‡Ã±nlrwyá¹£Å›s])har([uÅ«])", "%1%2ahar%3")
    text = gsub(text, "([ptkbdgá¹­á¹‡Ã±á¸má¹…nlrwyhá¹£Å›s])([ptkbdgá¹­á¸má¹‡Ã±nlrwyá¹£Å›s])bÄá¹­a", "%1%2abÄá¹­a")
    text = gsub(text, "([ptkbdgá¹­á¸má¹…á¹‡Ã±nlrwyhá¹£Å›s])([ptkbdgá¹­á¸mnlrá¹‡Ã±wyÅ›])([mlk])", "%1%2a%3")
    text = gsub(text, "Ã±z", "nz")
    text = gsub(text, "Ã±gy", "á¹…gy")
    text = gsub(text, "([a])(Ìƒ)l([a])", "%1ml%3") -- assim case l
    text = gsub(text, "([eÄuÅ«iÄ«o])([Ä«uiÅ«])m([m])", "%1%2á¹ƒ%3") -- assim case m
    text = gsub(text, "([a])([Ä«uiÅ«])m([m])", "%1Í %2%3") -- assim case m2
    text = gsub(text, "([eÄuÅ«iÄ«o])([Ä«uiÅ«])n([st])", "%1%2á¹ƒ%3") -- assim case s
    text = gsub(text, "([a])([Ä«uiÅ«])n([st])", "%1Í %2%3") -- assim case s2
    text = gsub(text, "([a])([uÅ«])á¹…([hk])", "%1Í %2%3") -- assim case kh
    text = gsub(text, "([eÄuÅ«iÄ«o])([Ä«uiÅ«])á¹…([kh])", "%1%2á¹ƒ%3") -- assim case kh2
    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end
return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="236">
<source>wikt/translit/new-Newa-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- Transliteration for Newar in Newa script
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["ğ‘"] = "k",
    ["ğ‘"] = "kh",
    ["ğ‘"] = "g",
    ["ğ‘‘"] = "gh",
    ["ğ‘’"] = "á¹…",
    ["ğ‘“"] = "á¹…h",
    ["ğ‘”"] = "c",
    ["ğ‘•"] = "ch",
    ["ğ‘–"] = "j",
    ["ğ‘—"] = "jh",
    ["ğ‘˜"] = "Ã±",
    ["ğ‘™"] = "Ã±h",
    ["ğ‘š"] = "á¹­",
    ["ğ‘›"] = "á¹­h",
    ["ğ‘œ"] = "á¸",
    ["ğ‘"] = "á¸h",
    ["ğ‘"] = "á¹‡",
    ["ğ‘Ÿ"] = "t",
    ["ğ‘ "] = "th",
    ["ğ‘¡"] = "d",
    ["ğ‘¢"] = "dh",
    ["ğ‘£"] = "n",
    ["ğ‘¤"] = "nh",
    ["ğ‘¥"] = "p",
    ["ğ‘¦"] = "ph",
    ["ğ‘§"] = "b",
    ["ğ‘¨"] = "bh",
    ["ğ‘©"] = "m",
    ["ğ‘ª"] = "mh",
    ["ğ‘«"] = "y",
    ["ğ‘¬"] = "r",
    ["ğ‘­"] = "rh",
    ["ğ‘®"] = "l",
    ["ğ‘¯"] = "lh",
    ["ğ‘°"] = "w",
    ["ğ‘±"] = "Å›",
    ["ğ‘²"] = "á¹£",
    ["ğ‘³"] = "s",
    ["ğ‘´"] = "h",
    -- vowel diacritics
    ["ğ‘¶"] = "i",
    ["ğ‘¸"] = "u",
    ["ğ‘¾"] = "e",
    ["ğ‘‘€"] = "o",
    ["ğ‘µ"] = "Ä",
    ["ğ‘·"] = "Ä«",
    ["ğ‘¹"] = "Å«",
    ["ğ‘º"] = "rÌ¥",
    ["ğ‘»"] = "rÌ¥Ì„",
    ["ğ‘¼"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["ğ‘½"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["ğ‘¿"] = "ai",
    ["ğ‘‘"] = "au",
    -- vowels
    ["ğ‘€"] = "a",
    ["ğ‘‚"] = "i",
    ["ğ‘„"] = "u",
    ["ğ‘Š"] = "e",
    ["ğ‘Œ"] = "o",
    ["ğ‘"] = "Ä",
    ["ğ‘ƒ"] = "Ä«",
    ["ğ‘…"] = "Å«",
    ["ğ‘†"] = "rÌ¥",
    ["ğ‘‡"] = "rÌ¥Ì„",
    ["ğ‘ˆ"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["ğ‘‰"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["ğ‘‹"] = "ai",
    ["ğ‘"] = "au",
    -- chandrabindu
    ["ğ‘‘ƒ"] = "Ìƒ",
    -- anusvara
    ["ğ‘‘„"] = "á¹ƒ",
    ["ğ‘‘ˆ"] = "á¹ƒ",
    -- visarga
    ["ğ‘‘…"] = "á¸¥",
    -- nuqta
    ["ğ‘‘†"] = "",
    -- virama
    ["ğ‘‘‚"] = "",
    -- om
    ["ğ‘‘‰"] = "om",
    -- avagraha
    ["ğ‘‘‡"] = "â€™",
    -- numerals
    ["ğ‘‘"] = "0",
    ["ğ‘‘‘"] = "1",
    ["ğ‘‘“"] = "2",
    ["ğ‘‘“"] = "3",
    ["ğ‘‘”"] = "4",
    ["ğ‘‘•"] = "5",
    ["ğ‘‘–"] = "6",
    ["ğ‘‘—"] = "7",
    ["ğ‘‘˜"] = "8",
    ["ğ‘‘™"] = "9",
    -- punctuation
    ["ğ‘‘‹"] = ".", -- danda
    ["ğ‘‘Œ"] = ".", -- double danda
    ["ğ‘‘"] = "", -- comma
    -- abbreviation sign
    ["ğ‘‘"] = "."
}

local all_cons, special_cons = "ğ‘ğ‘ğ‘ğ‘‘ğ‘’ğ‘“ğ‘”ğ‘•ğ‘–ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğ‘™ğ‘šğ‘›ğ‘œğ‘ğ‘ğ‘Ÿğ‘ ğ‘¡ğ‘¢ğ‘£ğ‘¤ğ‘¥ğ‘¦ğ‘§ğ‘¨ğ‘©ğ‘ªğ‘«ğ‘¬ğ‘­ğ‘®ğ‘¯ğ‘°ğ‘±ğ‘²ğ‘³ğ‘´", "ğ‘ğ‘ğ‘ğ‘‘ğ‘’ğ‘“ğ‘”ğ‘•ğ‘–ğ‘—ğ‘˜ğ‘™ğ‘šğ‘›ğ‘œğ‘ğ‘ğ‘ğ‘Ÿğ‘ ğ‘¡ğ‘¢ğ‘£ğ‘¤ğ‘¥ğ‘¦ğ‘§ğ‘¨ğ‘©ğ‘ªğ‘«ğ‘¬ğ‘­ğ‘®ğ‘¯ğ‘°ğ‘±ğ‘²ğ‘³ğ‘´"
local vowel, vowel_sign = "ağ‘¼ğ‘½ğ‘¾ğ‘¿ğ‘‘€ğ‘‘ğ‘»ğ‘ºğ‘¹ğ‘¸ğ‘¶ğ‘µğ‘·", "ğ‘„ğ‘ƒğ‘‚ğ‘ğ‘€ğ‘‰ğ‘ˆğ‘‡ğ‘†ğ‘…ğ‘ğ‘Œğ‘‹ğ‘Š"

local function rev_string(text)
    local result, length = {}, mw.ustring.len(text)
    for i = length, 1, -1 do table.insert(result, mw.ustring.sub(text, i, i)) end
    return table.concat(result)
end
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. all_cons .. "]ğ‘‘†?)([" .. vowel .. "ğ‘‘‚]?)", function(c, d) return c .. (d == "" and "a" or d) end)
    for word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[ğ‘‘ƒ-ğ‘§a]+") do
        local orig_word = word
        word = rev_string(word)
        word = gsub(word, "^a(ğ‘‘†?)([" .. all_cons .. "])(.)(.?)", function(opt, first, second, third) return (((match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "ğ‘‘„") or match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "ğ‘‘‚") and not perm_cl[first .. second .. third]) or match(first .. second, "ğ‘«[ğ‘„ğ‘ƒğ‘‚ğ‘ğ‘€ğ‘‰ğ‘ˆğ‘‡ğ‘†ğ‘…ğ‘ğ‘Œğ‘‹ğ‘Šağ‘¼ğ‘½ğ‘¾ğ‘¿ğ‘‘€ğ‘‘ğ‘»ğ‘ºğ‘¹ğ‘¸ğ‘¶ğ‘µğ‘·]") or match(first .. second, "ğ‘´[ğ‘„ğ‘ƒğ‘‚ğ‘ğ‘€ğ‘‰ğ‘ˆğ‘‡ğ‘†ğ‘…ğ‘ğ‘Œğ‘‹ğ‘Šağ‘¼ğ‘½ğ‘¾ğ‘¿ğ‘‘€ğ‘‘ğ‘»ğ‘ºğ‘¹ğ‘¸ğ‘¶ğ‘µğ‘·]")) and "a" or "") .. opt .. first .. second .. third end)
        word = gsub(word, "(.?)ğ‘‘„(.)", function(succ, prev) return succ .. (succ .. prev == "" and "ğ‘‘‚ğ‘©" or (succ == "" and match(prev, "[" .. vowel .. "]") and "Ìƒ" or nasal_assim[succ] or "á¹ƒ")) .. prev end)

        local escaped_orig_word = gsub(orig_word, "%+", "")
        text = gsub(text, orig_word, rev_string(word))
        text = gsub(text, "ğ‘«ğ‘‘‚", "y")
    end
    text = gsub(text, ".ğ‘‘†?", conv)
    text = gsub(text, "a([iu])Ìƒ", "aÍ %1")
    text = gsub(text, "[<>]", "")
    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end
return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="237">
<source>wikt/translit/new-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- Transliteration for Newar
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["à¤•"] = "k",
    ["à¤–"] = "kh",
    ["à¤—"] = "g",
    ["à¤˜"] = "gh",
    ["à¤™"] = "á¹…",
    ["à¤š"] = "c",
    ["à¤›"] = "ch",
    ["à¤œ"] = "j",
    ["à¤"] = "jh",
    ["à¤"] = "Ã±",
    ["à¤Ÿ"] = "á¹­",
    ["à¤ "] = "á¹­h",
    ["à¤¡"] = "á¸",
    ["à¤¢"] = "á¸h",
    ["à¤£"] = "á¹‡",
    ["à¤¤"] = "t",
    ["à¤¥"] = "th",
    ["à¤¦"] = "d",
    ["à¤§"] = "dh",
    ["à¤¨"] = "n",
    ["à¤ª"] = "p",
    ["à¤«"] = "ph",
    ["à¤¬"] = "b",
    ["à¤­"] = "bh",
    ["à¤®"] = "m",
    ["à¤¯"] = "y",
    ["à¤°"] = "r",
    ["à¤²"] = "l",
    ["à¤µ"] = "w",
    ["à¤³"] = "á¸·",
    ["à¤¶"] = "Å›",
    ["à¤·"] = "á¹£",
    ["à¤¸"] = "s",
    ["à¤¹"] = "h",
    ["à¤´"] = "á¸»",
    ["à¥½"] = "à¥½",
    -- vowel diacritics
    ["à¤¿"] = "i",
    ["à¥"] = "u",
    ["à¥‡"] = "e",
    ["à¥‹"] = "o",
    ["à¤¾"] = "Ä",
    ["à¥€"] = "Ä«",
    ["à¥‚"] = "Å«",
    ["à¥ƒ"] = "rÌ¥",
    ["à¥„"] = "rÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¥¢"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["à¥£"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¥ˆ"] = "ai",
    ["à¥Œ"] = "au",
    ["à¥‰"] = "Å",
    ["à¥…"] = "Ä•",
    -- vowel signs
    ["à¤…"] = "a",
    ["à¤‡"] = "i",
    ["à¤‰"] = "u",
    ["à¤"] = "e",
    ["à¤“"] = "o",
    ["à¤†"] = "Ä",
    ["à¤ˆ"] = "Ä«",
    ["à¤Š"] = "Å«",
    ["à¤‹"] = "rÌ¥",
    ["à¥ "] = "rÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¤Œ"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["à¥¡"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¤"] = "ai",
    ["à¤”"] = "au",
    ["à¤‘"] = "Å",
    ["à¥²"] = "Ä•",
    ["à¤"] = "Ä•",
    -- chandrabindu
    ["à¤"] = "Ìƒ",
    -- anusvara
    ["à¤‚"] = "á¹ƒ",
    -- visarga
    ["à¤ƒ"] = "á¸¥",
    -- virama
    ["à¥"] = "",
    -- om
    ["à¥"] = "oá¸¥m",
    -- avagraha
    ["à¤½"] = "â€™",
    -- numerals
    ["à¥¦"] = "0",
    ["à¥§"] = "1",
    ["à¥¨"] = "2",
    ["à¥©"] = "3",
    ["à¥ª"] = "4",
    ["à¥«"] = "5",
    ["à¥¬"] = "6",
    ["à¥­"] = "7",
    ["à¥®"] = "8",
    ["à¥¯"] = "9",
    -- punctuation
    ["à¥¤"] = ".", -- danda
    ["à¥¥"] = ".", -- double danda
    ["+"] = "", -- compound separator

    -- abbreviation sign
    ["à¥°"] = "."
}

local nasal_assim = {["à¤•"] = "à¤™", ["à¤–"] = "à¤™", ["à¤—"] = "à¤™", ["à¤˜"] = "à¤™", ["à¤š"] = "à¤", ["à¤›"] = "à¤", ["à¤œ"] = "à¤", ["à¤"] = "à¤", ["à¤Ÿ"] = "à¤£", ["à¤ "] = "à¤£", ["à¤¡"] = "à¤£", ["à¤¢"] = "à¤£", ["à¤ª"] = "à¤®", ["à¤«"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¬"] = "à¤®", ["à¤­"] = "à¤®", ["à¤®"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¤"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¥"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¦"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤§"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¨"] = "à¤", ["à¤·"] = "à¤", ["à¤¶"] = "à¤", ["à¤¸"] = "à¤", ["à¤¯"] = "à¤", ["à¤°"] = "à¤", ["à¤²"] = "à¤", ["à¤µ"] = "à¤", ["à¤¹"] = "à¤"}
local perm_cl = {["à¤œà¥à¤"] = true}

local all_cons, special_cons = "à¤•à¤–à¤—à¤˜à¤™à¤šà¤›à¤œà¤à¤à¤Ÿà¤ à¤¡à¤¢à¤£à¤¤à¤¥à¤¦à¤§à¤¨à¤ªà¤«à¤¬à¤­à¤®à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¸à¤¶à¤·à¤¹", "à¤•à¤–à¤—à¤˜à¤šà¤›à¤œà¤à¤Ÿà¤ à¤¡à¤¢à¤£à¤¤à¤¥à¤¦à¤§à¤¨à¤ªà¤«à¤¬à¤­à¤®à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¶à¤·à¤¸à¤¹"
local vowel, vowel_sign = "aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¥„à¥¢à¥£", "à¤…à¤‡à¤‰à¤à¤“à¤†à¤ˆà¤Šà¤‹à¥ à¥¡à¤Œà¤à¤”à¤‘à¤"

local function rev_string(text)
    local result, length = {}, mw.ustring.len(text)
    for i = length, 1, -1 do table.insert(result, mw.ustring.sub(text, i, i)) end
    return table.concat(result)
end
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. all_cons .. "]à¤¼?)([" .. vowel .. "à¥]?)", function(c, d) return c .. (d == "" and "a" or d) end)
    for word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[à¤€-à¥¿a]+") do
        local orig_word = word
        word = rev_string(word)
        word = gsub(word, "^a(à¤¼?)([" .. all_cons .. "])(.)(.?)", function(opt, first, second, third) return (((match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "à¤‚") or match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "à¥") and not perm_cl[first .. second .. third]) or match(first .. second, "à¤¯[aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¤†à¤ˆà¤‰à¤Šà¤‡à¤à¤à¤“à¤”]") or match(first .. second, "à¤¹[à¤…aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¤†à¤ˆà¤‰à¤Šà¤‡à¤à¤à¤“à¤”]")) and "a" or "") .. opt .. first .. second .. third end)

        word = gsub(word, "(.?)à¤‚(.)", function(succ, prev) return succ .. (succ .. prev == "" and "à¥à¤®" or (succ == "" and match(prev, "[" .. vowel .. "]") and "Ìƒ" or nasal_assim[succ] or "á¹ƒ")) .. prev end)

        local escaped_orig_word = gsub(orig_word, "%+", "")
        text = gsub(text, orig_word, rev_string(word))
        text = gsub(text, "à¤¯à¥", "y")
    end
    text = gsub(text, ".à¤¼?", conv)
    text = gsub(text, "a([iu])Ìƒ", "aÍ %1")
    text = gsub(text, "[<>]", "")
    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end
return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="238">
<source>wikt/translit/niv-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local u = mw.ustring.char

local UTF8_char = "[\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*"

local export = {}

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ"] = "Jo",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "jo",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ó¶"] = "",
    ["Ó·"] = "",
    ["Ò’"] = "êœ¦",
    ["Ò“"] = "êœ§",
    ["Óº"] = "êœ¦Ì‡",
    ["Ó»"] = "êœ§Ì‡",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Óƒ"] = "Q",
    ["Ó„"] = "q",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ó‡"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Óˆ"] = "Å‹",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ ÌŒ"] = "Å˜",
    ["Ñ€ÌŒ"] = "Å™",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "X",
    ["Ñ…"] = "x",
    ["Ó¼"] = "áºŠ",
    ["Ó½"] = "áº‹",
    ["Ó¾"] = "H",
    ["Ó¿"] = "h",
    ["Ğ§"] = "Èšâ€™",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "È›â€™",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Æ",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "É™",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja",
    ["â€™"] = "Ê¼",
    ["Ê¼"] = "Ê¼",
    -- non-native letters
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Å Ä",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "â€™",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "â€™"
}

local palatal = {{"Ğ”j", "DÌ¦"}, {"Ğ´j", "dÌ¦"}, {"Ğj", "Å…"}, {"Ğ½j", "Å†"}, {"Ğ¢j", "Èš"}, {"Ñ‚j", "È›"}}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    --[=[
	Unfortunately the Cyrillic alphabet doesn't distinguish between Å£i and ti
	or Å£e and te and so on.
	
	Represent iotation with j to allow the palatal consonant replacements.
	]=]
    text = string.gsub(text, UTF8_char, {["Ğ¯"] = "Ja", ["Ñ"] = "ja", ["Ğ"] = "Jo", ["Ñ‘"] = "jo", ["Ğ®"] = "Ju", ["Ñ"] = "ju", ["ÑŒ"] = "j"})

    for _, item in ipairs(palatal) do text = string.gsub(text, unpack(item)) end

    local vowels = {}
    for char in string.gmatch("ĞĞĞ£Ğ«Ğ•Ğ˜ĞªĞ¬Ğ°Ó£Ğ¸Ğ¾ÑƒÑ‹ÑĞµÑŠÑŒaeiou", UTF8_char) do vowels[char] = true end
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "(.?)([Ğ•Ğµ])", function(preceding, e)
        -- modifier letter apostrophe or right single quotation mark
        local capital = e == "Ğ•"
        if preceding == "Ê¼" or preceding == "â€™" then
            e = capital and "E" or "e"
        elseif preceding == "" or vowels[preceding] or mw.ustring.find(preceding, "[^Ğ€-Ó¿]") then
            e = capital and "Je" or "je"
        else
            mw.log("Module:niv-translit could not decide how to transliterate " .. e .. " after " .. preceding .. ".")
        end
        return preceding .. e
    end)

    return string.gsub(text, UTF8_char, tab)
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="239">
<source>wikt/translit/nog-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {["Ğ°"] = "a", ["Ğ±"] = "b", ["Ğ²"] = "v", ["Ğ³"] = "g", ["Ğ´"] = "d", ["Ğµ"] = "e", ["Ñ‘"] = "yo", ["Ğ¶"] = "j", ["Ğ·"] = "z", ["Ğ¸"] = "i", ["Ğ¹"] = "y", ["Ğº"] = "k", ["Ğ»"] = "l", ["Ğ¼"] = "m", ["Ğ½"] = "n", ["Ğ¾"] = "o", ["Ğ¿"] = "p", ["Ñ€"] = "r", ["Ñ"] = "s", ["Ñ‚"] = "t", ["Ñƒ"] = "u", ["Ñ„"] = "f", ["Ñ…"] = "x", ["Ñ†"] = "c", ["Ñ‡"] = "Ã§", ["Ñˆ"] = "ÅŸ", ["Ñ‰"] = "ÅŸÃ§", ["ÑŠ"] = "â€", ["Ñ‹"] = "Ä±", ["ÑŒ"] = "â€™", ["Ñ"] = "Ã©", ["Ñ"] = "yu", ["Ñ"] = "ya", ["Ğ"] = "A", ["Ğ‘"] = "B", ["Ğ’"] = "V", ["Ğ“"] = "G", ["Ğ”"] = "D", ["Ğ•"] = "E", ["Ğ"] = "Yo", ["Ğ–"] = "J", ["Ğ—"] = "Z", ["Ğ˜"] = "I", ["Ğ™"] = "Y", ["Ğš"] = "K", ["Ğ›"] = "L", ["Ğœ"] = "M", ["Ğ"] = "N", ["Ğ"] = "O", ["ĞŸ"] = "P", ["Ğ "] = "R", ["Ğ¡"] = "S", ["Ğ¢"] = "T", ["Ğ£"] = "U", ["Ğ¤"] = "F", ["Ğ¥"] = "X", ["Ğ¦"] = "C", ["Ğ§"] = "Ã‡", ["Ğ¨"] = "Å", ["Ğ©"] = "ÅÃ§", ["Ğª"] = "â€", ["Ğ«"] = "I", ["Ğ¬"] = "â€™", ["Ğ­"] = "Ã‰", ["Ğ®"] = "Yu", ["Ğ¯"] = "Ya"};

local digraphs = {["Ğ°ÑŒ"] = "Ã¤", ["ĞÑŒ"] = "Ã„", ["Ğ½ÑŠ"] = "Ã±", ["ĞÑŠ"] = "Ã‘", ["Ğ¾ÑŒ"] = "Ã¶", ["ĞÑŒ"] = "Ã–", ["ÑƒÑŒ"] = "Ã¼", ["Ğ£ÑŒ"] = "Ãœ"}

function export.tr(text)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([ĞĞĞ£Ğ«Ğ•Ğ¯ĞĞ®Ğ˜Ğ•Ğ°Ğ¾ÑƒÑ‹ÑÑÑ‘ÑĞ¸ĞµÑŒ%A][ÌÌ€]?)([Ğ•Ğµ])", function(a, e) return a .. (e == "Ğµ" and "ye" or "Ye") end):gsub("^Ğ•", "Ye"):gsub("^Ğµ", "ye");

    for digraph, translit in pairs(digraphs) do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, digraph, translit) end

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="240">
<source>wikt/translit/nsk-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local replacements = {["c"] = "ch", ["Ä«"] = "ii", ["Å"] = "oo", ["Ä"] = "aa", ["o"] = "u", ["Å¡"] = "sh", ["Ã°"] = "th", ["(.)Ë"] = "%1%1", "[á”Œá”á”á”]", {["á”Œ"] = "spwaa", ["á”"] = "stwaa", ["á”"] = "skwaa", ["á”"] = "schwaa"}}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = require("Cans-translit").tr(text, lang, sc)

    for regex, replacement in pairs(replacements) do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, regex, replacement) end

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="242">
<source>wikt/translit/omk-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local u = mw.ustring.char

local ACUTE = u(0x0301)
local MACRON = u(0x0304)
local DOTABOVE = u(0x0307)
local DIAER = u(0x0308)
local CARON = u(0x030C)

local str_gsub, ugsub = string.gsub, mw.ustring.gsub
local UTF8char = "[\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*"

local export = {}

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ’"] = "W",
    ["Ğ²"] = "w",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ•"] = "Je",
    ["Ğµ"] = "je",
    ["Ğ"] = "Jo",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "jo",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ†"] = "Ã",
    ["Ñ–"] = "Ã¯",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "Q",
    ["Ñ…"] = "q",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Åš",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å›",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Y",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "y",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "ja",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja",
    ["Ñ¢"] = "Äš",
    ["Ñ£"] = "Ä›"
}

local other = {
    {"ĞĞ°", "Ä€"}, {"Ğ°Ğ°", "Ä"}, -- long "Ğ°"
    {"Ğ•Ğµ", "JÄ“"}, {"ĞµĞµ", "jÄ“"}, -- long "Ğµ"
    {"Ğ˜Ğ¸", "Äª"}, {"Ğ¸Ğ¸", "Ä«"}, -- long "Ğ¸"
    {"ĞĞ¾", "ÅŒ"}, {"Ğ¾Ğ¾", "Å"}, -- long "Ğ¾"
    {"Ğ£Ñƒ", "Åª"}, {"ÑƒÑƒ", "Å«"}, -- long "Ñƒ"
    {"Ğ­Ñ", "Ä’"}, {"ÑÑ", "Ä“"}, -- long "Ñ"
    {"Ğª%-", "%-"}, {"ÑŠ%-", "%-"}, -- final "ÑŠ"
    {"Ğª ", " "}, {"ÑŠ ", " "}, -- final "ÑŠ"
    {"Ğª$", ""}, {"ÑŠ$", ""}, -- final "ÑŠ"
    {"([Ğ‘Ğ’Ğ“Ğ”Ğ–Ğ—Ğ™ĞšĞ›ĞœĞĞŸĞ Ğ¡Ğ¢Ğ¤Ğ¥Ğ¦Ğ§Ğ¨Ğ©Ğ±Ğ²Ğ³Ğ´Ğ¶Ğ·Ğ¹ĞºĞ»Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¿Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ñ„Ñ…Ñ†Ñ‡ÑˆÑ‰])Ğ•", "%1E"}, -- post-consonantal E
    {"([Ğ‘Ğ’Ğ“Ğ”Ğ–Ğ—Ğ™ĞšĞ›ĞœĞĞŸĞ Ğ¡Ğ¢Ğ¤Ğ¥Ğ¦Ğ§Ğ¨Ğ©Ğ±Ğ²Ğ³Ğ´Ğ¶Ğ·Ğ¹ĞºĞ»Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¿Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ñ„Ñ…Ñ†Ñ‡ÑˆÑ‰])Ğµ", "%1e"}, -- post-consonantal e
    {"([Ğ‘Ğ’Ğ“Ğ”Ğ–Ğ—Ğ™ĞšĞ›ĞœĞĞŸĞ Ğ¡Ğ¢Ğ¤Ğ¥Ğ¦Ğ§Ğ¨Ğ©Ğ±Ğ²Ğ³Ğ´Ğ¶Ğ·Ğ¹ĞºĞ»Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¿Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ñ„Ñ…Ñ†Ñ‡ÑˆÑ‰])Ğ•Ğµ", "%1Ä’"}, -- post-consonantal long E
    {"([Ğ‘Ğ’Ğ“Ğ”Ğ–Ğ—Ğ™ĞšĞ›ĞœĞĞŸĞ Ğ¡Ğ¢Ğ¤Ğ¥Ğ¦Ğ§Ğ¨Ğ©Ğ±Ğ²Ğ³Ğ´Ğ¶Ğ·Ğ¹ĞºĞ»Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¿Ñ€ÑÑ‚Ñ„Ñ…Ñ†Ñ‡ÑˆÑ‰])ĞµĞµ", "%1Ä“"} -- post-consonantal long e
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    for i, replacement in ipairs(other) do text = str_gsub(text, unpack(replacement)) end

    return (str_gsub(text, UTF8char, tab))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="243">
<source>wikt/translit/or-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local consonants = {
    -- common
    ["à¬•"] = "k",
    ["à¬–"] = "kh",
    ["à¬—"] = "g",
    ["à¬˜"] = "gh",
    ["à¬™"] = "á¹…",
    ["à¬š"] = "c",
    ["à¬›"] = "ch",
    ["à¬œ"] = "j",
    ["à¬"] = "jh",
    ["à¬"] = "Ã±",
    ["à¬Ÿ"] = "á¹­",
    ["à¬ "] = "á¹­h",
    ["à¬¡"] = "á¸",
    ["à¬¢"] = "á¸h",
    ["à¬£"] = "á¹‡",
    ["à¬¤"] = "t",
    ["à¬¥"] = "th",
    ["à¬¦"] = "d",
    ["à¬§"] = "dh",
    ["à¬¨"] = "n",
    ["à¬ª"] = "p",
    ["à¬«"] = "ph",
    ["à¬¬"] = "b",
    ["à¬­"] = "bh",
    ["à¬®"] = "m",
    ["à¬¯"] = "j",
    ["à­Ÿ"] = "y",
    ["à¬°"] = "r",
    ["à¬²"] = "l",
    ["à¬³"] = "á¸·",
    ["à¬µ"] = "v",
    ["à­±"] = "w",
    ["à¬¶"] = "Å›",
    ["à¬·"] = "á¹£",
    ["à¬¸"] = "s",
    ["à¬¹"] = "h",
    -- nuktas
    ["à¬•à¬¼"] = "q",
    ["à¬–à¬¼"] = "á¸µáº–",
    ["à¬—à¬¼"] = "Ä¡",
    ["à¬œà¬¼"] = "z",
    ["à¬à¬¼"] = "zh",
    ["à¬¡à¬¼"] = "á¹›",
    ["à¬¢à¬¼"] = "á¹›h",
    ["à¬«à¬¼"] = "f"
}

local diacritics = {["à¬¾"] = "a", ["à¬¿"] = "i", ["à­€"] = "i", ["à­"] = "u", ["à­‚"] = "u", ["à­ƒ"] = "ru", ["à­„"] = "ru", ["à­¢"] = "lu", ["à­£"] = "lu", ["à­‡"] = "e", ["à­ˆ"] = "Ã´i", ["à­–"] = "Ã´i", ["à­‹"] = "o", ["à­Œ"] = "Ã´u", ["à­—"] = "Ã´u", ["à­"] = ""}

local tt = {
    -- vowels
    ["à¬…"] = "Ã´",
    ["à¬†"] = "a",
    ["à¬‡"] = "i",
    ["à¬ˆ"] = "i",
    ["à¬‰"] = "u",
    ["à¬Š"] = "u",
    ["à¬‹"] = "ru",
    ["à­ "] = "ru",
    ["à¬Œ"] = "lu",
    ["à­¡"] = "lu",
    ["à¬"] = "e",
    ["à¬"] = "Ã´i",
    ["à¬“"] = "o",
    ["à¬”"] = "Ã´u",
    -- chandrabindu    
    ["à¬"] = "mÌ", -- until a better method is found
    -- anusvara    
    ["à¬‚"] = "á¹ƒ", -- until a better method is found
    -- visarga    
    ["à¬ƒ	"] = "á¸¥",
    -- avagraha
    ["à¬½"] = "â€™",
    -- numerals
    ["à­¦"] = "0",
    ["à­§"] = "1",
    ["à­¨"] = "2",
    ["à­©"] = "3",
    ["à­ª"] = "4",
    ["à­«"] = "5",
    ["à­¬"] = "6",
    ["à­­"] = "7",
    ["à­®"] = "8",
    ["à­¯"] = "9",
    ["à­²"] = "Â¼",
    ["à­³"] = "Â½",
    ["à­´"] = "Â¾",
    ["à­µ"] = "Â¹â„â‚â‚†",
    ["à­¶"] = "â…›",
    ["à­·"] = "Â³â„â‚â‚†",
    -- punctuation        
    ["à¥¤"] = "." -- danda
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([à¬•à¬–à¬—à¬˜à¬™à¬šà¬›à¬œà¬à¬à¬Ÿà¬ à¬¡à¬¢à¬£à¬¤à¬¥à¬¦à¬§à¬¨à¬ªà¬«à¬¬à¬µà¬­à¬®à¬¯à­Ÿà¬°à¬²à¬³à­±à¬¶à¬·à¬¸à¬¹]à¬¼?)" .. "([à¬¾à¬¿à­€à­à­‚à­ƒà­„à­‡à­ˆà­–à­‹à­Œà­—à­à­¢à­£]?)", function(c, d)
        if not consonants[c] then return c end
        if d == "" then
            return consonants[c] .. "Ã´"
        else
            return consonants[c] .. diacritics[d]
        end
    end)

    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="244">
<source>wikt/translit/os-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local mapping1 = {
    ["Ó•"] = "Ã¦",
    ["Ó”"] = "Ã†",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ"] = "Ã¨",
    ["Ğ­"] = "Ãˆ",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ…"] = "x",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "X",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "á¸±",
    ["Ğ§"] = "á¸°",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å¡Ä",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Å ÄŒ",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "y",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Y",
    ["Ñ"] = "Ã¨",
    ["Ğ­"] = "Ãˆ",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "Ã«",
    ["Ğ"] = "Ã‹",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ²"] = "v",
    ["Ğ’"] = "V",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ"] = "A"
}

local mapping2 = {["ĞºÑŠ"] = "kâ€™", ["ĞšÑŠ"] = "Kâ€™", ["Ğ¿ÑŠ"] = "pâ€™", ["ĞŸÑŠ"] = "Pâ€™", ["Ñ‚ÑŠ"] = "tâ€™", ["TÑŠ"] = "Tâ€™", ["Ñ†ÑŠ"] = "câ€™", ["Ğ¦ÑŠ"] = "Câ€™", ["Ñ‡ÑŠ"] = "á¸±â€™", ["Ğ§ÑŠ"] = "á¸°â€™", ["Ñ…ÑŠ"] = "q", ["Ğ¥ÑŠ"] = "Q", ["Ğ³ÑŠ"] = "Ç§", ["Ğ“ÑŠ"] = "Ç¦", ["Ğ´Ğ¶"] = "Çµ", ["Ğ”Ğ¶"] = "Ç´", ["Ğ´Ğ·"] = "Ê’", ["Ğ”Ğ·"] = "Æ·", ["Ğ°Ñƒ"] = "aw", ["ĞÑƒ"] = "Aw", ["Ó•Ñƒ"] = "Ã¦w", ["Ó”Ñƒ"] = "Ã†w", ["Ğ¸Ñƒ"] = "iw", ["Ğ˜Ñƒ"] = "Iw", ["Ñ‹Ñƒ"] = "yw", ["Ğ«Ñƒ"] = "Yw", ["ĞµÑƒ"] = "ew", ["Ğ•Ñƒ"] = "Ew", ["ÑƒĞ°"] = "wa", ["Ğ£Ğ°"] = "Wa", ["ÑƒÓ•"] = "wÃ¦", ["Ğ£Ó•"] = "WÃ¦", ["ÑƒĞ¸"] = "wi", ["Ğ£Ğ¸"] = "Wi", ["ÑƒÑ‹"] = "wy", ["Ğ£Ñ‹"] = "Wy", ["ÑƒĞµ"] = "we", ["Ğ£Ğµ"] = "We"}

local mapping3 = {["Ğ³ÑƒÑ‹"] = "gÂ°y", ["Ğ“ÑƒÑ‹"] = "GÂ°y", ["ĞºÑƒÑ‹"] = "kÂ°y", ["KÑƒÑ‹"] = "KÂ°y", ["Ñ…ÑƒÑ‹"] = "xÂ°y", ["Ğ¥ÑƒÑ‹"] = "XÂ°y"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- If the script is given as Geor, then forward the transliteration to that module
    if sc == "Geor" then return require("Geor-translit").tr(text, lang, sc) end
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "ĞºÑŠÑƒÑ‹", "kâ€™Â°y")
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "KÑŠÑƒÑ‹", "Kâ€™Â°y")
    for pat, repl in pairs(mapping3) do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, pat, repl) end
    for pat, repl in pairs(mapping2) do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, pat, repl) end
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", mapping1)

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="245">
<source>wikt/translit/pa-Arab-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
-- To whoever decides to work on this, sorry for this code being such a mess ~~ User:Taimoorahmed11
local u = mw.ustring.char
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub

local export = {}

local vav = u(0x0648)
local ye = u(0x06CC)
local alif = u(0x0627)
local he = "Û"

local vw_s_cfu = u(0x0650) -- zer (i)
local vw_s_ccu = u(0x0655) -- hamza below
local vw_s_cbr = u(0x064F) -- pesh (u)
local vw_s_mcu = u(0x0654) -- hamza above
local vw_s_ocu = u(0x064E) -- zabar (a)

local vw_l_cbr = u(0x0657) -- inverted zer
local vw_l_cfu = u(0x0656) -- subscript alif

local hat = u(0x065A)
local inverted_hat = u(0x065B)
local hats = hat .. inverted_hat

local short_vowels_list = vw_s_cfu .. vw_s_ccu .. vw_s_cbr .. vw_s_mcu .. vw_s_ocu

-- carrier + diacritic combos
local long_u = vav .. vw_l_cbr
local short_o = vav .. inverted_hat
local long_i = ye .. vw_l_cfu
local short_e = ye .. inverted_hat

local vocalised_carrier = long_u .. short_o .. long_i .. short_e .. "Ùˆ" .. "Ùˆ" .. "ÛŒ" .. "Û’"

local consonants_1 = "Ø¨Ø¨Ù¾ØªØ«ÛØ¬Ú†Ø­Ø®Ø¯Ø°Ø±Ø²Ú˜Ø³Ø´ØµØ¶Ø·Ø¸Ø¹ØºÙÙ‚Ú©Ú¯Ù„à£‡Ù…Ù†İ¨ÙˆÛÙ‰Ú¾Ù¹ÚˆÚ‘"
local consonants_2 = "Ø¨Ø¨Ú¾ØªÚ¾ÚˆÚ¾Ø¬Ú¾Ø¯Ú¾Ù¹Ú¾Ú©Ú¾Ú‘Ú¾"
local vowels = "Ø§ÙÛŒØ§ÙÙˆØ¢Û’"
local consonants = gsub(consonants_1, consonants_2, "")

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["Ø¨"] = "b",
    ["Ù¾"] = "p",
    ["Øª"] = "t",
    ["Ø«"] = "s",
    ["Ø¬"] = "j",
    ["Ú†"] = "c",
    ["Ø­"] = "h",
    ["Ø®"] = "x",
    ["Ø¯"] = "d",
    ["Ø°"] = "z",
    ["Ø±"] = "r",
    ["Ø²"] = "z",
    ["Ú˜"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ø³"] = "s",
    ["Ø´"] = "Å›",
    ["Øµ"] = "s",
    ["Ø¶"] = "z",
    ["Ø·"] = "t",
    ["Ø¸"] = "z",
    ["Ø¹"] = "",
    ["Øº"] = "Ä¡",
    ["Ù"] = "f",
    ["Ù‚"] = "q",
    ["Ú©"] = "k",
    ["Ú¯"] = "g",
    ["Ù„"] = "l",
    ["Ù…"] = "m",
    ["Ù†"] = "n",
    ["İ¨"] = "á¹‡",
    ["ÙˆÙ"] = "v",
    ["Û"] = "h",
    ["Ù‰"] = "y",
    ["Ú¾"] = "h",
    ["Ù¹"] = "á¹­",
    ["Úˆ"] = "á¸",
    ["Ú‘"] = "á¹›",
    ["à£‡"] = "á¸·",

    -- aspirated consonants
    ["Ø¨Ú¾"] = "bh",
    ["ØªÚ¾"] = "th",
    ["ÚˆÚ¾"] = "á¸h",
    ["Ø¬Ú¾"] = "jh",
    ["Ø¯Ú¾"] = "dh",
    ["Ù¹Ú¾"] = "á¹­h",
    ["Ú©Ú¾"] = "kh",
    ["Ú‘Ú¾"] = "á¹›h",
    ["Ú¯Ú¾"] = "gh",
    ["Ù„Ú¾"] = "lh",

    -- digits
    ["Û°"] = "0",
    ["Û±"] = "1",
    ["Û²"] = "2",
    ["Û³"] = "3",
    ["Û´"] = "4",
    ["Ûµ"] = "5",
    ["Û¶"] = "6",
    ["Û·"] = "7",
    ["Û¸"] = "8",
    ["Û¹"] = "9"
}

local nasal_assim = {["[kg]h?"] = "á¹…", ["[cj]h?"] = "Ã±", ["[á¹­á¸]h?"] = "á¹‡", ["[td]h?"] = "n", ["[pb]h?"] = "m", ["n"] = "n", ["m"] = "m", ["s"] = "n"}

local short_vowels = {
    -- independent vowels
    [u(0x00627)] = "a", -- alif Ø§
    [u(0x00623)] = "Ä", -- alif Ø£
    [u(0x00622)] = "Ä", -- alif with madda Ø¢
    [u(0x06D2)] = "Ä“", -- ye Û’
    ["Ø§Ù "] = "u", -- alif with damma
    [u(0x0624)] = "au", -- vav with hamza Ø¤	

    -- vowels
    [u(0x064E)] = "a", -- zabar Ùâ—Œ
    [u(0x0670)] = "Ä", -- khari zabar â—ŒÙ°
    [u(0x0650)] = "i", -- zer â—ŒÙ
    [u(0x064F)] = "u", -- pesh Ùâ—Œ

    -- other diacritics
    [u(0x06BA)] = "N", -- noon ghunna Úº
    [u(0x0621)] = "i", -- hamza Ø¡
    [u(0x0651)] = "Ë", -- shad â—ŒÙ‘
    [u(0x064B)] = "n", -- do zabar â—ŒÙ‹
    [u(0x064D)] = "ni" -- do zer â—ŒÙ	
}

local alif = "Ø§"
local alif2 = "Ø£"
local vav = "Ùˆ"
local ye = "ÛŒ"
local noon = u(0x06BA)
local shadda = u(0x0651)
local ghunna = u(0x06BA)
local aspirate = u(0x06BE)
local sukoon = u(0x0652)

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)

    -- special cases (added 'mai' since in Punjabi 'Ù…ÛŒÚº' is only used for 'mai')
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. alif .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "%1Ä%2")
    text = gsub(text, "Ø§Ù„Ù„Û", "AllÄh")
    text = gsub(text, "Ù…ÙÛŒÚº", "maÍ i")
    text = gsub(text, alif .. ye .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "Ä“%1")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. "Ø§Ø¦ÛŒ", "%1ÄÄ«")
    -- Can't remember why the line below was added but it's messing up some of the translations | N2: It was added for 'Waheguru'
    -- text = gsub(text, '([' .. consonants .. '])' .. alif .. '([' .. consonants .. '])' .. vw_s_cfu .. '([' .. consonants .. '])', "%1Ä%2e%3")
    text = gsub(text, "Ù†Ù˜", "á¹…")
    text = gsub(text, alif .. vav .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "Å%1")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. vav, "%1Å")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. vav .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "%1Å%2")

    text = gsub(text, "ÙˆØ§" .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "vÄ%1")

    -- full stop
    text = gsub(text, "Û”", ".")
    text = gsub(text, "ØŸ", "?")

    -- word-final alif
    text = gsub(text, alif .. ghunna, "ÄÌƒ")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. alif, "%1Ä")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. shadda .. alif, "%1%1Ä")
    -- if 'Ø§' is medial
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. "Ø§" .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "%1Ä%2")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. ye .. alif, "%1iÄ")

    -- if choti ye at end + case if not at end
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. ye .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "%1Ä“%2")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. ye, "%1i")

    -- intervocalic alif is a long a sound
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "Ùˆ " .. "])" .. alif2 .. "([" .. consonants .. "Ùˆ" .. "])", "%1Ä%2")

    -- schwa rules
    --- after do-chashme-he
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. aspirate .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "%1ha%2")
    --- after zer | removed this, as it was realistically unecessary
    -- text = gsub(text, '([' .. consonants .. '])' .. vw_s_cfu .. '([' .. consonants .. '])' .. "Ù’", "%1i%2")
    -- text = gsub(text, '([' .. consonants .. '])' .. vw_s_cfu .. '([' .. consonants .. '])', "%1i%2a")
    --- initial letter and second letter except with diacritics

    -- initial consonant + he sound = e/Ãª
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. vowels .. "])" .. he .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "%1eh%2")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. "Ø­" .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "%1ÃªhÃª%2")

    -- word-initial alif + vowelled carrier drops the alif
    text = gsub(text, "^" .. alif .. "([" .. vocalised_carrier .. "])", "%1")

    -- word-initial alif + short vowel diacritic drops the alif
    text = gsub(text, "^" .. alif .. "([" .. short_vowels_list .. "])", "%1")

    -- do-chashme-he zabar, zer, pesh
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. vw_s_ocu .. aspirate, "%1ha")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. vw_s_cfu .. aspirate, "%1hi")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. vw_s_cbr .. aspirate, "%1hu")

    -- shadda
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. shadda, "%1%1")

    -- long /u:/ and /i:/ and /e:/ and /o:/
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. vw_s_cbr .. vav, "%1Å«")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. vw_s_cfu .. ye, "%1Ä«")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. ye .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "%1Ä“")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. vav .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "Å%2")

    --- nasalised
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. vw_s_cbr .. vav .. ghunna, "%1Å«Ìƒ")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. vw_s_cfu .. ye .. ghunna, "%1Ä«Ìƒ")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. vav .. ghunna, "%1ÅÌƒ")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. ye .. ghunna, "%1Ä“Ìƒ")

    -- final he + short vowel disregards the he and transliterates the vowel
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. vowels .. "])" .. he, "%1h")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. he, "%1a")
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. he .. "([" .. consonants .. vowels .. "])", "%1h")

    -- sukoon diacritic
    text = gsub(text, "Ù’", "â€‹")
    -- vav with hat = short o
    text = gsub(text, vav .. "[" .. hats .. "]", "o")

    -- vav with short vowel
    text = gsub(text, vav .. "([" .. short_vowels_list .. "])", function(c) return "v" .. short_vowels[c] end)

    -- nun or re with hat
    -- TODO: add support for re
    text = gsub(text, "Ù†" .. "[" .. hats .. "]", "n")

    -- ye with hat = short e
    text = gsub(text, ye .. "[" .. hats .. "]", "e")

    -- long i
    text = gsub(text, ye .. vw_l_cfu, "Ä«")

    -- intervocalic ye is a long a sound
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. consonants .. "])" .. ye .. "([" .. consonants .. "])", "%1Ä“%2")

    -- regard the consonant + short vowel combinations throughout
    text = gsub(text, ".", short_vowels)

    text = gsub(text, "[Ø¨ØªØ¬Ø¯Ú©Ú¯Ù¹ÚˆÚ‘]Ú¾", conv)
    text = gsub(text, "[Ø¨Ø¨Ù¾ØªØ«Ø¬Ú†Ø­Ø®Ø¯Ø°Ø±Ø²Ú˜Ø³Ø´ØµØ¶Ø·Ø¸Ø¹ØºÙÙ‚Ú©Ú¯Ù„à£‡Ù…Ù†İ¨ÙˆÛÙ‰Ú¾Ù¹ÚˆÚ‘]", conv)

    -- normal consonants left over
    text = gsub(text, vav, "v")
    text = gsub(text, "Û", "h")
    text = gsub(text, "ÛŒ", "y")

    for key, val in pairs(nasal_assim) do text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "N(" .. key .. ")", val .. "%1") end
    text = gsub(text, "([aiueÄ“oÄÄ«Å«])N ", "%1Ìƒ ")
    text = gsub(text, "(.?)N", "%1Ìƒ")

    text = gsub(text, "Ë(.)", "%1%1")

    text = gsub(text, " ?à¥¤", ".")

    text = gsub(text, " $", "")

    text = gsub(text, "aÄ", "Ä")
    text = gsub(text, "aÃª", "Ãª")
    text = gsub(text, "ah", "Ãªh")
    text = gsub(text, "uÅ", "Å«")
    text = gsub(text, "iÅ", "Ä«")
    text = gsub(text, "Ä©", "Ä“Ìƒ")
    text = gsub(text, "nj", "Ã±j")
    text = gsub(text, "nk", "á¹…k")
    text = gsub(text, "ng", "á¹…g")
    text = gsub(text, "á¹…j", "Ã±j")

    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="246">
<source>wikt/translit/parameters.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

-- A helper function to escape magic characters in a string
-- Magic characters: ^$()%.[]*+-?
local plain = require("string").pattern_escape

-- A helper function that removes empty numeric indexes in a table,
-- so that the values are tightly packed like in a normal Lua table.
local remove_holes = require("table").compressSparseArray

function export.process(args, params, return_unknown)
    local args_new = {}

    -- Process parameters for specific properties
    local required = {}
    local patterns = {}
    local names_with_equal_sign = {}
    local list_from_index = nil

    for name, param in pairs(params) do
        if param.required then
            if param.alias_of then require("debug").track("parameters/required alias") end
            required[name] = true
        end

        if param.list then
            local key = name
            if type(name) == "string" then key = string.gsub(name, "=", "") end
            if param.default ~= nil then
                args_new[key] = {param.default, maxindex = 1}
            else
                args_new[key] = {maxindex = 0}
            end

            if type(param.list) == "string" then
                -- If the list property is a string, then it represents the name
                -- to be used as the prefix for list items. This is for use with lists
                -- where the first item is a numbered parameter and the
                -- subsequent ones are named, such as 1, pl2, pl3.
                if string.find(param.list, "=") then
                    patterns["^" .. string.gsub(plain(param.list), "=", "(%%d+)") .. "$"] = name
                else
                    patterns["^" .. plain(param.list) .. "(%d+)$"] = name
                end
            elseif type(name) == "number" then
                -- If the name is a number, then all indexed parameters from
                -- this number onwards go in the list.
                list_from_index = name
            else
                if string.find(name, "=") then
                    patterns["^" .. string.gsub(plain(name), "=", "(%%d+)") .. "$"] = string.gsub(name, "=", "")
                else
                    patterns["^" .. plain(name) .. "(%d+)$"] = name
                end
            end

            if string.find(name, "=") then
                -- DO NOT SIDE-EFFECT A TABLE WHILE ITERATING OVER IT.
                -- Some elements may be skipped or processed twice if you do.
                -- Instead, track the changes we want to make to `params`, and
                -- do them after the iteration over `params` is done.
                table.insert(names_with_equal_sign, name)
            end
        elseif param.default ~= nil then
            args_new[name] = param.default
        end
    end

    -- Process required changes to `params`
    for _, name in ipairs(names_with_equal_sign) do
        require("debug").track("parameters/name with equals")
        params[string.gsub(name, "=", "")] = params[name]
        params[name] = nil
    end

    -- Process the arguments
    local args_unknown = {}

    for name, val in pairs(args) do
        local index = nil

        if type(name) == "number" then
            if list_from_index ~= nil and name >= list_from_index then
                index = name - list_from_index + 1
                name = list_from_index
            end
        else
            -- Does this argument name match a pattern?
            for pattern, pname in pairs(patterns) do
                index = mw.ustring.match(name, pattern)

                -- It matches, so store the parameter name and the
                -- numeric index extracted from the argument name.
                if index then
                    index = tonumber(index)
                    name = pname
                    break
                end
            end
        end

        local param = params[name]

        -- If a parameter without the trailing index was found, and
        -- require_index is set on the param, set the param to nil to treat it
        -- as if it isn't recognized.
        if not index and param and param.require_index then param = nil end

        -- If no index was found, use 1 as the default index.
        -- This makes list parameters like g, g2, g3 put g at index 1.
        index = index or 1

        -- If the argument is not in the list of parameters, trigger an error.
        -- return_unknown suppresses the error, and stores it in a separate list instead.
        if not param then
            if return_unknown then
                args_unknown[name] = val
            else
                error("The parameter \"" .. name .. "\" is not used by this template.", 2)
            end
        else
            -- Remove leading and trailing whitespace unless allow_whitespace is true.
            if not param.allow_whitespace then val = mw.text.trim(val) end

            -- Empty string is equivalent to nil unless allow_empty is true.
            if val == "" and not param.allow_empty then val = nil end

            -- Convert to proper type if necessary.
            if param.type == "boolean" then
                val = not (not val or val == "" or val == "0" or val == "no" or val == "n" or val == "false")
            elseif param.type == "number" then
                val = tonumber(val)
            elseif param.type then
                require("debug").track {"parameters/unrecognized type", "parameters/unrecognized type/" .. tostring(param.type)}
            end

            -- Can't use "if val" alone, because val may be a boolean false.
            if val ~= nil then
                -- Mark it as no longer required, as it is present.
                required[param.alias_of or name] = nil

                -- Store the argument value.
                if param.list then
                    -- If the parameter is an alias of another, store it as the original,
                    -- but avoid overwriting it; the original takes precedence.
                    if not param.alias_of then
                        args_new[name][index] = val

                        -- Store the highest index we find.
                        args_new[name].maxindex = math.max(index, args_new[name].maxindex)
                    elseif args[param.alias_of] == nil then
                        if params[param.alias_of] and params[param.alias_of].list then
                            args_new[param.alias_of][index] = val

                            -- Store the highest index we find.
                            args_new[param.alias_of].maxindex = math.max(index, args_new[param.alias_of].maxindex)
                        else
                            args_new[param.alias_of] = val
                        end
                    end
                else
                    -- If the parameter is an alias of another, store it as the original,
                    -- but avoid overwriting it; the original takes precedence.
                    if not param.alias_of then
                        args_new[name] = val
                    elseif args[param.alias_of] == nil then
                        if params[param.alias_of] and params[param.alias_of].list then
                            args_new[param.alias_of][1] = val

                            -- Store the highest index we find.
                            args_new[param.alias_of].maxindex = math.max(1, args_new[param.alias_of].maxindex)
                        else
                            args_new[param.alias_of] = val
                        end
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end

    -- The required table should now be empty.
    -- If any entry remains, trigger an error, unless we're in the template namespace.
    if mw.title.getCurrentTitle().nsText ~= "Template" then
        local list = {}
        for name, param in pairs(required) do table.insert(list, name) end

        local count = #list
        if count == 1 then
            error("The parameter \"" .. list[1] .. "\" is required.", 2)
        elseif count == 2 then
            error("The parameters \"" .. table.concat(list, "\" and \"") .. "\" are required.", 2)
        elseif count > 2 then
            error("The parameters \"" .. mw.text.listToText(list, "\", \"", "\", and \"") .. "\" are required.", 2)
        end
    end

    -- Remove holes in any list parameters if needed.
    for name, val in pairs(args_new) do if type(val) == "table" and not params[name].allow_holes then args_new[name] = remove_holes(val) end end

    if return_unknown then
        return args_new, args_unknown
    else
        return args_new
    end
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="247">
<source>wikt/translit/peo-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local alphabetic_tt = {
    -- this should only contain alphabetic characters
    ["ğ "] = "a",
    ["ğ¡"] = "i",
    ["ğ¢"] = "u",
    ["ğ£"] = "k",
    ["ğ¤"] = "ku",
    ["ğ¥"] = "g",
    ["ğ¦"] = "gu",
    ["ğ§"] = "x",
    ["ğ¨"] = "c",
    ["ğ©"] = "j",
    ["ğª"] = "ji",
    ["ğ«"] = "t",
    ["ğ¬"] = "tu",
    ["ğ­"] = "d",
    ["ğ®"] = "di",
    ["ğ¯"] = "du",
    ["ğ°"] = "Î¸",
    ["ğ±"] = "p",
    ["ğ²"] = "b",
    ["ğ³"] = "f",
    ["ğ´"] = "n",
    ["ğµ"] = "nu",
    ["ğ¶"] = "m",
    ["ğ·"] = "mi",
    ["ğ¸"] = "mu",
    ["ğ¹"] = "y",
    ["ğº"] = "v",
    ["ğ»"] = "vi",
    ["ğ¼"] = "r",
    ["ğ½"] = "ru",
    ["ğ¾"] = "l",
    ["ğ¿"] = "s",
    ["ğ€"] = "z",
    ["ğ"] = "Å¡",
    ["ğ‚"] = "Ã§",
    ["ğƒ"] = "h",
    ["ğˆ"] = "AM", -- AuramazdÄ
    ["ğ‰"] = "AM", -- AuramazdÄ
    ["ğŠ"] = "AMha", -- AuramazdÄha
    ["ğ‹"] = "XÅ ", -- xÅ¡Äyathiya 
    ["ğŒ"] = "DH", -- dahyÄuÅ¡
    ["ğ"] = "DH", -- dahyÄuÅ¡
    ["ğ"] = "BG", -- baga
    ["ğ"] = "BU" -- bÅ«miÅ¡
}

local nonalphabetic_tt = {
    ["ğ"] = " : " -- word divider
}

local numbers = {["ğ‘"] = 1, ["ğ’"] = 2, ["ğ“"] = 10, ["ğ”"] = 20, ["ğ•"] = 100}

function export.convert_numbers(numeric_str)
    local total = 0
    for c in mw.ustring.gmatch(numeric_str, ".") do total = total + numbers[c] end
    return total
end

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    -- If the script is not Xpeo, do not transliterate
    if sc ~= "Xpeo" then return end

    local t = {}
    local preceding_num = false
    local need_hyphen = false
    -- Transliterate characters
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", function(c)
        if alphabetic_tt[c] then
            if need_hyphen then t[#t + 1] = "-" end
            t[#t + 1] = alphabetic_tt[c]
            need_hyphen = true
        else
            need_hyphen = false
            if numbers[c] then
                if preceding_num then
                    t[#t] = t[#t] + numbers[c]
                else
                    t[#t + 1] = numbers[c]
                end
                preceding_num = true
            else
                preceding_num = false
                t[#t + 1] = nonalphabetic_tt[c] or c
            end
        end
    end)

    return table.concat(t)
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="248">
<source>wikt/translit/pgl-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local chars = {
    ["áš€"] = " ",
    ["Â·"] = ".",

    ["áš"] = "b", -- beith
    ["áš‚"] = "l", -- luis
    ["ášƒ"] = "v", -- fearn
    ["áš„"] = "s", -- saille
    ["áš…"] = "n", -- nuin

    ["áš†"] = "h", -- uath
    ["áš‡"] = "d", -- dair
    ["ášˆ"] = "t", -- tinne
    ["áš‰"] = "c", -- coll
    ["ášŠ"] = "q", -- ceirt

    ["áš‹"] = "m", -- muin
    ["ášŒ"] = "g", -- gort
    ["áš"] = "Å‹", -- ngÃ©tal
    ["áš"] = "z", -- straif
    ["áš"] = "r", -- ruis

    ["áš"] = "a", -- ailm
    ["áš‘"] = "o", -- onn
    ["áš’"] = "u", -- Ãºr
    ["áš“"] = "e", -- edad
    ["áš”"] = "i", -- idad

    ["áš•"] = "k", -- Or "ea"
    ["áš–"] = "oi",
    ["áš—"] = "ui",
    ["áš˜"] = "p", -- Or "ia"
    ["áš™"] = "x", -- Or "ae"
    ["ášš"] = "p", -- peithboc "soft B"

    ["áš›"] = "",
    ["ášœ"] = ""
}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc) return (mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", chars)) end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="249">

local v = {
    ["Deva"] = {["a"] = "", ["Ä"] = "à¤¾", ["i"] = "à¤¿", ["Ä«"] = "à¥€", ["u"] = "à¥", ["Å«"] = "à¥‚", ["e"] = "à¥‡", ["o"] = "à¥‹", [""] = ""},

}

local s = {
    ["Deva"] = {["0"] = "à¥¦", ["1"] = "à¥§", ["2"] = "à¥¨", ["3"] = "à¥©", ["4"] = "à¥ª", ["5"] = "à¥«", ["6"] = "à¥¬", ["7"] = "à¥­", ["8"] = "à¥®", ["9"] = "à¥¯", ["."] = "à¥¥", [","] = "à¥¤", ["-"] = "-"},
