--- from Module:bo-translit
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {

    ["à½€"] = "k",
    ["à½"] = "kh",
    ["à½‚"] = "g",
    ["à½„"] = "ng",
    ["à½…"] = "c",
    ["à½†"] = "ch",
    ["à½‡"] = "j",
    ["à½‰"] = "ny",
    ["à½"] = "t",
    ["à½"] = "th",
    ["à½‘"] = "d",
    ["à½“"] = "n",
    ["à½”"] = "p",
    ["à½•"] = "ph",
    ["à½–"] = "b",
    ["à½˜"] = "m",
    ["à½™"] = "ts",
    ["à½š"] = "tsh",
    ["à½›"] = "dz",
    ["à½"] = "w",
    ["à½"] = "zh",
    ["à½Ÿ"] = "z",
    ["à½ "] = "â€˜",
    ["à½¡"] = "y",
    ["à½¢"] = "r",
    ["à½£"] = "l",
    ["à½¤"] = "sh",
    ["à½¦"] = "s",
    ["à½§"] = "h",
    ["à½¨"] = "a",
    ["à½Š"] = "á¹­",
    ["à½‹"] = "á¹­h",
    ["à½Œ"] = "á¸",
    ["à½"] = "á¹‡",
    ["à½¥"] = "á¹£",

    ["à½²"] = "i",
    ["à½´"] = "u",
    ["à½º"] = "e",
    ["à½¼"] = "o",
    ["à½±"] = "Ä",
    ["à½±à½²"] = "Ä«",
    ["à½±à½´"] = "Å«",
    ["à½»"] = "ai",
    ["à½½"] = "au",
    ["à¾²à¾€"] = "á¹›",
    ["à½·"] = "á¹",
    ["à¾³à¾€"] = "á¸·",
    ["à½¹"] = "á¸¹",
    ["à½¾"] = "á¹ƒ",
    ["à¾ƒ"] = "á¹ƒ",
    ["à½¿"] = "aá¸¥",
    ["à¼€"] = "oá¹ƒ",
    ["à¼"] = ".",
    ["à¼"] = ".",
    ["à¾ˆ"] = "x",
    ["à¾‰"] = "f",

    ["à¾"] = "k",
    ["à¾‘"] = "kh",
    ["à¾’"] = "g",
    ["à¾”"] = "ng",
    ["à¾•"] = "c",
    ["à¾–"] = "ch",
    ["à¾—"] = "j",
    ["à¾™"] = "ny",
    ["à¾Ÿ"] = "t",
    ["à¾ "] = "th",
    ["à¾¡"] = "d",
    ["à¾£"] = "n",
    ["à¾¤"] = "p",
    ["à¾¥"] = "ph",
    ["à¾¦"] = "b",
    ["à¾¨"] = "m",
    ["à¾©"] = "ts",
    ["à¾ª"] = "tsh",
    ["à¾«"] = "dz",
    ["à¾­"] = "w",
    ["à¾®"] = "zh",
    ["à¾¯"] = "z",
    ["à¾°"] = "â€˜",
    ["à¾±"] = "y",
    ["à¾²"] = "r",
    ["à¾³"] = "l",
    ["à¾´"] = "sh",
    ["à¾¶"] = "s",
    ["à¾·"] = "h",
    ["à¾¸"] = "a",
    ["à¾š"] = "á¹­",
    ["à¾›"] = "á¹­h",
    ["à¾œ"] = "á¸",
    ["à¾"] = "á¹‡",
    ["à¾µ"] = "á¹£"
}

local symbol = {["à¼ "] = "0", ["à¼¡"] = "1", ["à¼¢"] = "2", ["à¼£"] = "3", ["à¼¤"] = "4", ["à¼¥"] = "5", ["à¼¦"] = "6", ["à¼§"] = "7", ["à¼¨"] = "8", ["à¼©"] = "9", ["à¼ª"] = "0.5", ["à¼«"] = "1.5", ["à¼¬"] = "2.5", ["à¼­"] = "3.5", ["à¼®"] = "4.5", ["à¼¯"] = "5.5", ["à¼°"] = "6.5", ["à¼±"] = "7.5", ["à¼²"] = "8.5", ["à¼³"] = "9.5", ["à¼‹"] = " ", ["à¼"] = "Â·", ["â€˜"] = "'"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc, debug_mode)
    text = gsub(text, "[à¼Œà¼‹]+ ?", "à¼‹")
    text = gsub(text, "[à¼‹à¼]+$", "")
    text = gsub(text, "([^à¼‹])(à½ [à½±à½²à½ºà½¼à½²à½´à¾²à½·à¾³à½¹à½¾à½¿])", "%1à¼‹â€˜à¼‹%2")

    for Tibetan_word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[à¼‹-à¼‘à½€-à¾¼]+") do
        Tibetan_word = gsub(Tibetan_word, "à¼‹$", "")

        for syllable in mw.ustring.gmatch(Tibetan_word, "[à½€-à¾¼]+") do
            local tr = {}

            local syl = gsub(syllable, "à½¨([à½±à½²à½ºà½¼à½²à½´à¾²à½·à¾³à½¹à½¾à½¿])", "%1")
            syl = gsub(syl, "([à¾à¾‘à¾’à¾”à¾•à¾–à¾—à¾™à¾Ÿà¾ à¾¡à¾£à¾¤à¾¥à¾¦à¾¨à¾©à¾ªà¾«à¾®à¾¯à¾­à¾°à¾±à¾²à¾³à¾´à¾¶à¾·à¾¸]+)([^à½±à½²à½ºà½¼à½²à½´à¾²à½·à¾³à½¹à½¾à½¿à¾à¾‘à¾’à¾”à¾•à¾–à¾—à¾™à¾Ÿà¾ à¾¡à¾£à¾¤à¾¥à¾¦à¾¨à¾©à¾ªà¾«à¾®à¾¯à¾­à¾°à¾±à¾²à¾³à¾´à¾¶à¾·à¾¸]*)$", "%1a%2")
            letter = mw.text.split(syl, "", true)

            for i = 1, #letter do tr[i] = conv[letter[i]] or letter[i] end

            if not match(syllable, "[à¾à¾‘à¾’à¾”à¾•à¾–à¾—à¾™à¾Ÿà¾ à¾¡à¾£à¾¤à¾¥à¾¦à¾¨à¾©à¾ªà¾«à¾®à¾¯à¾­à¾°à¾±à¾²à¾³à¾´à¾¶à¾·à¾¸à½²à½ºà½¼à½´à½¨à½±à½±à½±à½²à½»à½½à½´à¾²à¾€à½·à¾³à¾€à½¹à½¾à¾ƒà½¿]") then
                if #letter < 5 then
                    if #letter > 3 then
                        if letter[2] ~= "à½ " and letter[3] ~= "à½ " then table.insert(tr, 3, "a") end

                    elseif #letter > 2 then
                        if letter[3] == "à½ " then
                            if letter[1] == "à½ " then
                                tr = {"â€˜", tr[2], "a", "â€˜"}
                            else
                                tr = {tr[1], tr[2], "a", "â€˜"}
                            end

                        elseif not match(letter[1], "[à½‚à½‘à½–à½ à½˜]") or (match(letter[1] .. letter[2] .. letter[3], "[à½‚à½‘à½–à½ à½˜][à½‚à½„à½à½–à½˜à½ à½¢à½£]à½¦")) then
                            table.insert(tr, 2, "a")
                        else
                            table.insert(tr, 3, "a")
                        end

                    elseif match(letter[1], "[à½‚à½‘à½–à½ à½˜]") and not match(letter[2] or "", "[à½‚à½„à½‘à½à½–à½˜à½ à½¢à½£à½¦à½“]") then
                        table.insert(tr, "a")
                    else
                        table.insert(tr, 2, "a")
                    end
                end
            end

            tr = table.concat(tr)

            if match(syllable, "à½‚à½¡") then tr = gsub(tr, "gy", "g.y") end

            text = gsub(text, syllable, tr, 1)
        end
    end

    text = gsub(text, ".", symbol)
    text = gsub(text, " ' ", "")
    text = gsub(text, " *Â· *Â·? *", " Â· ")
    text = gsub(text, " *%.", ".")

    if match(text, "[à½€-à¾¼]") and not debug_mode then
        return nil
    else
        return text
    end
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="333">
<source>wikt/translit/xwo-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local MACRON = mw.ustring.char(0x0304)

local tt = {["á  "] = "a", ["á¡„"] = "e", ["á¡…"] = "i", ["á¡†"] = "o", ["á¡‡"] = "u", ["á¡ˆ"] = "Ã¶", ["á¡‰"] = "Ã¼", ["á¡‹"] = "b", ["á¡Œ"] = "p", ["á¡"] = "m", ["á ¯"] = "l", ["á °"] = "s", ["á ±"] = "Å¡", ["á ¨"] = "n", ["á¡"] = "x", ["á¡"] = "É£", ["á¡"] = "t", ["á¡‘"] = "d", ["á¡”"] = "c", ["á¡’"] = "Ä", ["á¡“"] = "Ç°", ["á¡•"] = "y", ["á ·"] = "r", ["á¡–"] = "w", ["á¡™"] = "h", ["á¡˜"] = "gh", ["á¡—"] = "q", ["á¡š"] = "Å¾", ["á¡›"] = "Å„", ["á¡œ"] = "dz", ["á¡Š"] = "ng", ["á ´"] = "z", ["á¡ƒ"] = MACRON, ["á "] = "-", ["ï¸–"] = "?", ["ï¸•"] = "!", ["á ‚"] = ",", ["á ƒ"] = ".", ["â€¯"] = "-", ["á Š"] = "-"}

function export.tr(text)
    local velar_conv = {["x"] = "k", ["É£"] = "g"}
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, ".", tt)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "([xÉ£])(.?)", function(velar, vowel) return ((mw.ustring.match(vowel, "[eiÃ¶Ã¼ ]") or vowel == "") and mw.ustring.gsub(velar, "[xÉ£]", velar_conv) or velar) .. vowel end)
    text = mw.ustring.gsub(text, "zi", "ji")
    return text
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="334">
<source>wikt/translit/ybh-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["à¤•"] = "k",
    ["à¤–"] = "kh",
    ["à¤—"] = "g",
    ["à¤˜"] = "gh",
    ["à¤™"] = "á¹…",
    ["à¤š"] = "c",
    ["à¤›"] = "ch",
    ["à¤œ"] = "j",
    ["à¤"] = "jh",
    ["à¤"] = "Ã±",
    ["à¤Ÿ"] = "á¹­",
    ["à¤ "] = "á¹­h",
    ["à¤¡"] = "á¸",
    ["à¤¢"] = "á¸h",
    ["à¤£"] = "á¹‡",
    ["à¤¤"] = "t",
    ["à¤¥"] = "th",
    ["à¤¦"] = "d",
    ["à¤§"] = "dh",
    ["à¤¨"] = "n",
    ["à¤ª"] = "p",
    ["à¤«"] = "ph",
    ["à¤¬"] = "b",
    ["à¤­"] = "bh",
    ["à¤®"] = "m",
    ["à¤¯"] = "y",
    ["à¤°"] = "r",
    ["à¤²"] = "l",
    ["à¤µ"] = "w",
    ["à¤¶"] = "Å›",
    ["à¤·"] = "á¹£",
    ["à¤¸"] = "s",
    ["à¤¹"] = "h",

    ["à¤•à¤¼"] = "q",
    ["à¤–à¤¼"] = "x",
    ["à¤—à¤¼"] = "Ä¡",
    ["à¤´"] = "á¸»",
    ["à¤³"] = "á¸·",
    ["à¤œà¤¼"] = "z",
    ["à¤¶à¤¼"] = "Å¾",
    ["à¤à¤¼"] = "Å¾",
    ["à¤¡à¤¼"] = "á¹›",
    ["à¤¢à¤¼"] = "á¹›h",
    ["à¤«à¤¼"] = "f",
    ["à¤¥à¤¼"] = "Î¸",
    ["à¤¦à¤¼"] = "Ã°",
    ["à¤©"] = "á¹‰",
    ["à¤±"] = "á¹Ÿ",
    ["à¥½"] = "'",
    ["à¤µà¤¼"] = "V",
    ["à¥¹"] = "Å¾",
    -- vowel diacritics
    ["à¤¿"] = "i",
    ["à¥"] = "u",
    ["à¥‡"] = "e",
    ["à¥‹"] = "o",
    ["à¤¾"] = "Ä",
    ["à¥€"] = "Ä«",
    ["à¥‚"] = "Å«",
    ["à¥ƒ"] = "rÌ¥",
    ["à¥„"] = "rÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¥¢"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["à¥£"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¥ˆ"] = "ai",
    ["à¥Œ"] = "au",
    ["à¥‰"] = "Å",
    ["à¥…"] = "Ä•",
    -- vowel signs
    ["à¤…"] = "a",
    ["à¤‡"] = "i",
    ["à¤‰"] = "u",
    ["à¤"] = "e",
    ["à¤“"] = "o",
    ["à¤†"] = "Ä",
    ["à¤ˆ"] = "Ä«",
    ["à¤Š"] = "Å«",
    ["à¤‹"] = "rÌ¥",
    ["à¥ "] = "rÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¤Œ"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["à¥¡"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¤"] = "ai",
    ["à¤”"] = "au",
    ["à¤‘"] = "Å",
    ["à¥²"] = "Ä•",
    ["à¤"] = "Ä•",
    -- chandrabindu
    ["à¤"] = "Ìƒ",
    -- anusvara
    ["à¤‚"] = "á¹ƒ",
    -- visarga (length)
    ["à¤ƒ"] = ":",
    -- virama
    ["à¥"] = "",
    -- om
    ["à¥"] = "omÌ",
    -- zero width joiner
    ["â€"] = "",
    -- numerals
    ["à¥¦"] = "0",
    ["à¥§"] = "1",
    ["à¥¨"] = "2",
    ["à¥©"] = "3",
    ["à¥ª"] = "4",
    ["à¥«"] = "5",
    ["à¥¬"] = "6",
    ["à¥­"] = "7",
    ["à¥®"] = "8",
    ["à¥¯"] = "9",
    -- punctuation
    ["à¥¤"] = ".", -- danda
    ["à¥¥"] = ".", -- double danda
    ["+"] = "", -- compound separator

    -- abbreviation sign
    ["à¥°"] = "."
}

local nasal_assim = {["à¤•"] = "à¤™", ["à¤–"] = "à¤™", ["à¤—"] = "à¤™", ["à¤˜"] = "à¤™", ["à¤š"] = "à¤", ["à¤›"] = "à¤", ["à¤œ"] = "à¤", ["à¤"] = "à¤", ["à¤Ÿ"] = "à¤£", ["à¤ "] = "à¤£", ["à¤¡"] = "à¤£", ["à¤¢"] = "à¤£", ["à¤ª"] = "à¤®", ["à¤«"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¬"] = "à¤®", ["à¤­"] = "à¤®", ["à¤®"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¤"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¥"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¦"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤§"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¨"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤·"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¶"] = "à¤™", ["à¤¸"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¯"] = "à¤®", ["à¤°"] = "à¤®", ["à¤²"] = "à¤", ["à¤µ"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¹"] = "à¤™"}
local perm_cl = {["à¤œà¥à¤¨"] = true, ["à¤œà¥à¤"] = true, ["à¤Ÿà¥à¤°"] = true, ["à¤¡à¥à¤°"] = true, ["à¤Ÿà¥à¤¸"] = true, ["à¤¡à¥à¤¸"] = true, ["à¤¸à¥à¤¡"] = true}

local all_cons, special_cons = "à¤•à¤–à¤—à¤˜à¤™à¤šà¤›à¤œà¤à¤à¤Ÿà¤ à¤¡à¤¢à¤£à¤¤à¤¥à¤¦à¤§à¤¨à¤ªà¤«à¤¬à¤­à¤®à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¸à¤¶à¤·à¤¹", "à¤•à¤–à¤—à¤˜à¤šà¤›à¤œà¤à¤Ÿà¤ à¤¡à¤¢à¤£à¤¤à¤¥à¤¦à¤§à¤¨à¤ªà¤«à¤¬à¤­à¤®à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¶à¤·à¤¸à¤¹"
local vowel, vowel_sign = "aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¥„à¥¢à¥£", "à¤…à¤‡à¤‰à¤à¤“à¤†à¤ˆà¤Šà¤‹à¥ à¥¡à¤Œà¤à¤”à¤‘à¤"

local function rev_string(text)
    local result, length = {}, mw.ustring.len(text)
    for i = length, 1, -1 do table.insert(result, mw.ustring.sub(text, i, i)) end
    return table.concat(result)
end
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. all_cons .. "]à¤¼?)([" .. vowel .. "à¥]?)", function(c, d) return c .. (d == "" and "a" or d) end)
    for word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[à¤€-à¥¿a]+") do
        local orig_word = word
        word = rev_string(word)
        word = gsub(word, "^a(à¤¼?)([" .. all_cons .. "])(.)(.?)", function(opt, first, second, third) return (((match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "à¤‚") or match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "à¥") and not perm_cl[first .. second .. third]) or match(first .. second, "à¤¯[aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¤†à¤ˆà¤‰à¤Šà¤‡à¤à¤à¤“à¤”]") or match(first .. second, "à¤¹[à¤…aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¤†à¤ˆà¤‰à¤Šà¤‡à¤à¤à¤“à¤”]")) and "a" or "a") .. opt .. first .. second .. third end)

        word = gsub(word, "(.?)à¤‚(.)", function(succ, prev) return succ .. (succ .. prev == "a" and "à¥à¤®" or (succ == "" and match(prev, "[" .. vowel .. "]") and "Ìƒ" or nasal_assim[succ] or "á¹ƒ")) .. prev end)

        local escaped_orig_word = gsub(orig_word, "%+", "")
        text = gsub(text, orig_word, rev_string(word))
        text = gsub(text, "à¤œà¥à¤", "gy")
        text = gsub(text, "à¥‡à¤¼", "Ãª")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤à¤¼", "Ãª")
    end
    text = gsub(text, ".à¤¼?", conv)
    text = gsub(text, "a([iu])Ìƒ", "aÍ %1")
    text = gsub(text, "[<>]", "")
    text = gsub(text, "à¥±", "")
    text = gsub(text, "eà¤¼", "Ãª")

    text = gsub(text, "rhÌ¥", "hrÌ¥")
    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end
return export

</document_content>
</document>

local export = {}
local gsub = mw.ustring.gsub
local match = mw.ustring.match

local conv = {
    -- consonants
    ["à¤•"] = "k",
    ["à¤–"] = "kh",
    ["à¤—"] = "g",
    ["à¤˜"] = "gh",
    ["à¤™"] = "á¹…",
    ["à¤š"] = "c",
    ["à¤›"] = "ch",
    ["à¤œ"] = "j",
    ["à¤"] = "jh",
    ["à¤"] = "Ã±",
    ["à¤Ÿ"] = "á¹­",
    ["à¤ "] = "á¹­h",
    ["à¤¡"] = "á¸",
    ["à¤¢"] = "á¸h",
    ["à¤£"] = "á¹‡",
    ["à¤¤"] = "t",
    ["à¤¥"] = "th",
    ["à¤¦"] = "d",
    ["à¤§"] = "dh",
    ["à¤¨"] = "n",
    ["à¤ª"] = "p",
    ["à¤«"] = "ph",
    ["à¤¬"] = "b",
    ["à¤­"] = "bh",
    ["à¤®"] = "m",
    ["à¤¯"] = "y",
    ["à¤°"] = "r",
    ["à¤²"] = "l",
    ["à¤µ"] = "w",
    ["à¤¶"] = "Å›",
    ["à¤·"] = "á¹£",
    ["à¤¸"] = "s",
    ["à¤¹"] = "h",

    ["à¤•à¤¼"] = "q",
    ["à¤–à¤¼"] = "x",
    ["à¤—à¤¼"] = "Ä¡",
    ["à¤´"] = "á¸»",
    ["à¤³"] = "á¸·",
    ["à¤œà¤¼"] = "z",
    ["à¤¶à¤¼"] = "Å¾",
    ["à¤à¤¼"] = "Å¾",
    ["à¤¡à¤¼"] = "á¹›",

    ["à¤¥à¤¼"] = "Î¸",
    ["à¤¦à¤¼"] = "Ã°",
    ["à¤©"] = "á¹‰",
    ["à¤±"] = "á¹Ÿ",
    ["à¥½"] = "'",
    ["à¤µà¤¼"] = "V",
    ["à¥¹"] = "Å¾",
    -- vowel diacritics
    ["à¤¿"] = "i",
    ["à¥"] = "u",
    ["à¥‡"] = "e",
    ["à¥‹"] = "o",
    ["à¤¾"] = "Ä",

    ["à¥¢"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["à¥£"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¥ˆ"] = "ai",
    ["à¥Œ"] = "au",
    ["à¥‰"] = "Å",
    ["à¥…"] = "Ä•",
    -- vowel signs
    ["à¤…"] = "a",
    ["à¤‡"] = "i",
    ["à¤‰"] = "u",
    ["à¤"] = "e",
    ["à¤“"] = "o",
    ["à¤†"] = "Ä",
    ["à¤ˆ"] = "Ä«",
    ["à¤Š"] = "Å«",
    ["à¤‹"] = "rÌ¥",
    ["à¥ "] = "rÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¤Œ"] = "lÌ¥",
    ["à¥¡"] = "lÌ¥Ì„",
    ["à¤"] = "ai",
    ["à¤”"] = "au",
    ["à¤‘"] = "Å",
    ["à¥²"] = "Ä•",
    ["à¤"] = "Ä•",
    -- chandrabindu
    ["à¤"] = "Ìƒ",
    -- anusvara
    ["à¤‚"] = "á¹ƒ",
    -- visarga (length)
    ["à¤ƒ"] = ":",
    -- virama
    ["à¥"] = "",
    -- om
    ["à¥"] = "omÌ",
    -- zero width joiner
    ["â€"] = "",
    -- zero width non joiner
    ["â€Œ"] = "",
    -- numerals
    ["à¥¦"] = "0",
    ["à¥§"] = "1",
    ["à¥¨"] = "2",
    ["à¥©"] = "3",
    ["à¥ª"] = "4",
    ["à¥«"] = "5",
    ["à¥¬"] = "6",
    ["à¥­"] = "7",
    ["à¥®"] = "8",
    ["à¥¯"] = "9",
    -- punctuation
    ["à¥¤"] = ".", -- danda
    ["à¥¥"] = ".", -- double danda
    ["+"] = "", -- compound separator

    -- abbreviation sign
    ["à¥°"] = "."
}

local nasal_assim = {["à¤•"] = "à¤™", ["à¤–"] = "à¤™", ["à¤—"] = "à¤™", ["à¤˜"] = "à¤™", ["à¤š"] = "à¤", ["à¤›"] = "à¤", ["à¤œ"] = "à¤", ["à¤"] = "à¤", ["à¤Ÿ"] = "à¤£", ["à¤ "] = "à¤£", ["à¤¡"] = "à¤£", ["à¤¢"] = "à¤£", ["à¤ª"] = "à¤®", ["à¤«"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¬"] = "à¤®", ["à¤­"] = "à¤®", ["à¤®"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¤"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¥"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¦"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤§"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¨"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤·"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¶"] = "à¤™", ["à¤¸"] = "à¤¨", ["à¤¯"] = "à¤®", ["à¤°"] = "à¤®", ["à¤²"] = "à¤", ["à¤µ"] = "à¤®", ["à¤¹"] = "à¤™"}
local perm_cl = {["à¤œà¥à¤¨"] = true, ["à¤œà¥à¤"] = true, ["à¤Ÿà¥à¤°"] = true, ["à¤¡à¥à¤°"] = true, ["à¤Ÿà¥à¤¸"] = true, ["à¤¡à¥à¤¸"] = true, ["à¤¸à¥à¤¡"] = true}

local all_cons, special_cons = "à¤•à¤–à¤—à¤˜à¤™à¤šà¤›à¤œà¤à¤à¤Ÿà¤ à¤¡à¤¢à¤£à¤¤à¤¥à¤¦à¤§à¤¨à¤ªà¤«à¤¬à¤­à¤®à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¸à¤¶à¤·à¤¹", "à¤•à¤–à¤—à¤˜à¤šà¤›à¤œà¤à¤Ÿà¤ à¤¡à¤¢à¤£à¤¤à¤¥à¤¦à¤§à¤¨à¤ªà¤«à¤¬à¤­à¤®à¤¯à¤°à¤²à¤µà¤¶à¤·à¤¸à¤¹"
local vowel, vowel_sign = "aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¥„à¥¢à¥£", "à¤…à¤‡à¤‰à¤à¤“à¤†à¤ˆà¤Šà¤‹à¥ à¥¡à¤Œà¤à¤”à¤‘à¤"

local function rev_string(text)
    local result, length = {}, mw.ustring.len(text)
    for i = length, 1, -1 do table.insert(result, mw.ustring.sub(text, i, i)) end
    return table.concat(result)
end
function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    text = gsub(text, "([" .. all_cons .. "]à¤¼?)([" .. vowel .. "à¥]?)", function(c, d) return c .. (d == "" and "a" or d) end)
    for word in mw.ustring.gmatch(text, "[à¤€-à¥¿a]+") do
        local orig_word = word
        word = rev_string(word)
        word = gsub(word, "^a(à¤¼?)([" .. all_cons .. "])(.)(.?)", function(opt, first, second, third) return (((match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "à¤‚") or match(first, "[" .. special_cons .. "]") and match(second, "à¥") and not perm_cl[first .. second .. third]) or match(first .. second, "à¤¯[aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¤†à¤ˆà¤‰à¤Šà¤‡à¤à¤à¤“à¤”]") or match(first .. second, "à¤¹[à¤…aà¤¿à¥à¥ƒà¥‡à¥‹à¤¾à¥€à¥‚à¥ˆà¥Œà¥‰à¥…à¥†à¥Šà¤†à¤ˆà¤‰à¤Šà¤‡à¤à¤à¤“à¤”]")) and "a" or "") .. opt .. first .. second .. third end)

        word = gsub(word, "(.?)à¤‚(.)", function(succ, prev) return succ .. (succ .. prev == "a" and "à¥à¤®" or (succ == "" and match(prev, "[" .. vowel .. "]") and "Ìƒ" or nasal_assim[succ] or "á¹ƒ")) .. prev end)

        local escaped_orig_word = gsub(orig_word, "%+", "")
        text = gsub(text, orig_word, rev_string(word))
        text = gsub(text, "à¤œà¥à¤", "gy")
        text = gsub(text, "à¥‡à¤¼", "Ãª")
        text = gsub(text, "à¤à¤¼", "Ãª")
    end
    text = gsub(text, ".à¤¼?", conv)
    text = gsub(text, "a([iu])Ìƒ", "aÍ %1")
    text = gsub(text, "[<>]", "")
    text = gsub(text, "à¥±", "")
    text = gsub(text, "eà¤¼", "Ãª")

    text = gsub(text, "rhÌ¥", "hrÌ¥")
    return mw.ustring.toNFC(text)
end
return export

<document index="336">
<source>wikt/translit/yi-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local tt = {["×"] = "q", ["×Ö¸"] = "o", ["×Ö·"] = "a", ["×‘Ö¼"] = "b", ["×‘"] = "b", ["×‘Ö¿"] = "v", ["×’Ö¼"] = "g", ["×’"] = "g", ["×’Ö¿"] = "g", ["×“Ö¼"] = "d", ["×“"] = "d", ["×“Ö¿"] = "d", ["×”"] = "H", ["×•"] = "w", ["×•Ö¼"] = "u", ["×•×•"] = "v", ["×°"] = "v", ["×•×™"] = "oy", ["×±"] = "oy", ["×–"] = "z", ["×—"] = "kh", ["×˜"] = "t", ["×™"] = "y", ["×™Ö´"] = "i", ["×™Ö´"] = "i", ["×™×™"] = "ey", ["×²"] = "ey", ["×™×™Ö·"] = "ay", ["×²Ö·"] = "ay", ["×²Ö·"] = "ay", ["×›Ö¼"] = "k", ["×›"] = "kh", ["×›Ö¿"] = "kh", ["×šÖ¼"] = "k", ["×š"] = "kh", ["×šÖ¿"] = "kh", ["×œ"] = "l", ["×"] = "m", ["×"] = "m", ["× "] = "n", ["×Ÿ"] = "n", ["×¡"] = "s", ["×¢"] = "e", ["×¤Ö¼"] = "p", ["×¤"] = "F", ["×¤Ö¿"] = "f", ["×£Ö¼"] = "p", ["×£"] = "f", ["×£Ö¿"] = "f", ["×¦"] = "ts", ["×¥"] = "ts", ["×§"] = "k", ["×¨"] = "r", ["×©×"] = "sh", ["×©"] = "sh", ["×©×‚"] = "s", ["×ªÖ¼"] = "t", ["×ª"] = "s", ["×ªÖ¿"] = "s", ["Ö¾"] = "-", ["×³"] = "'", ["×´"] = "\""}

-- in precedence order
local tokens = {"×™×™Ö·", "×Ö¸", "×Ö·", "×‘Ö¼", "×‘Ö¿", "×’Ö¼", "×’Ö¿", "×“Ö¼", "×“Ö¿", "×•Ö¼", "×•×•", "×™Ö´", "×™Ö´", "×™×™", "×²Ö·", "×•×™", "×›Ö¼", "×›Ö¿", "×šÖ¼", "×šÖ¿", "×¤Ö¼", "×¤Ö¿", "×£Ö¼", "×£Ö¿", "×©×", "×©×‚", "×ªÖ¼", "×ªÖ¿", "×", "×‘", "×’", "×“", "×”", "×•", "×±", "×°", "×–", "×—", "×˜", "×™", "×²", "×²Ö·", "×›", "×š", "×œ", "×", "×", "× ", "×Ÿ", "×¡", "×¢", "×¤", "×£", "×¦", "×¥", "×§", "×¨", "×©", "×ª", "Ö¾", "×³", "×´"}

hebrew_only_tokens = {"×‘Ö¿", "×—", "×›Ö¼", "×©×‚", "×ª"}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    local hebrew_only = false
    for _, token in ipairs(hebrew_only_tokens) do
        if string.find(text, token) ~= nil then
            hebrew_only = true
            break
        end
    end

    for _, token in ipairs(tokens) do text = string.gsub(text, token, tt[token]) end

    local suffix = text ~= "-" and string.sub(text, 1, 1) == "-"
    local prefix = text ~= "-" and string.sub(text, -1, -1) == "-"

    if suffix then text = string.gsub(text, "^-", "-q") end
    if prefix then text = string.gsub(text, "-$", "q-") end
    text = string.gsub(text, "([bcdfFghHjklmnpqrstvwxz])y$", "%1i")
    text = string.gsub(text, "([bcdfFghHjklmnpqrstvwxz])y([^aeiouwy])", "%1i%2")
    text = string.gsub(text, "([bcdfFghHjklmnpqrstvwxz])y([^aeiouwy])", "%1i%2") -- repeated to handle overlapping cases
    text = string.gsub(text, "([abcdefFghHijklmnopqrstuvxyz])w", "%1u")
    hebrew_only = hebrew_only or (string.find(text, "w") ~= nil)
    text = string.gsub(text, "w", "v")
    hebrew_only = hebrew_only or (string.find(text, "F") ~= nil)
    text = string.gsub(text, "F$", "p")
    text = string.gsub(text, "F([^a-zFH])", "p%1")
    text = string.gsub(text, "F", "f")
    text = string.gsub(text, "zsh", "zh")
    if suffix then text = string.gsub(text, "^%-q", "-") end
    if prefix then text = string.gsub(text, "q%-$", "-") end
    text = string.gsub(text, "q([aeo]y)", "%1")
    text = string.gsub(text, "q([iu])", "%1")
    hebrew_only = hebrew_only or (string.find(text, "q") ~= nil)
    text = string.gsub(text, "q", "a")
    hebrew_only = hebrew_only or (string.find(text, "H[^aeiou]") ~= nil) or (string.find(text, "H$") ~= nil)
    text = string.gsub(text, "H", "h")

    local categories = ""
    if hebrew_only then
        local namespace = mw.title.getCurrentTitle().nsText
        if namespace == "" or namespace == "Appendix" then categories = "[[Category:Requests for transliteration of Yiddish terms with Hebrew-only letters]]" end
    end

    return text .. categories
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="337">
<source>wikt/translit/ykg-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local u = mw.ustring.char

local MACRON = u(0x0304)
local DOTABOVE = u(0x0307)
local DOTBELOW = u(0x0323)

local str_gsub, ugsub = string.gsub, mw.ustring.gsub
local UTF8char = "[\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*"

local export = {}

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ’"] = "W",
    ["Ğ²"] = "w",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ğ“Ì§Ì§"] = "H",
    ["Ğ³Ì§"] = "h",
    ["Ò’"] = "H",
    ["Ò“"] = "h",
    ["Ò”"] = "H",
    ["Ò•"] = "h", -- Atlasova, Wikipedia and Kurilov all differ in this
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ó‡"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Óˆ"] = "Å‹",
    ["Ò¢"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Ò£"] = "Å‹",
    ["Ò¤"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Ò¥"] = "Å‹", -- Same as h above
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ó¨"] = "Ã–",
    ["Ó©"] = "Ã¶",
    ["Ó¦"] = "Ã–",
    ["Ó§"] = "Ã¶",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ"] = "s",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "Q",
    ["Ñ…"] = "q",
    ["Ğ§"] = "Èš",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "È›",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",

    -- non-native letters
    ["Ğ•"] = "E",
    ["Ğµ"] = "e",
    ["Ğ"] = "Jo",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "jo",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "z",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "ÅŸ",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Å",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "ÅŸ",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Y",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "y",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja",
    ["Ğª"] = "",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "",
    ["ÑŒ"] = ""
}

local other = {{"Ğ”ÑŒ", "DÌ¦"}, {"Ğ´ÑŒ", "dÌ¦"}, {"ĞÑŒ", "Å…"}, {"Ğ½ÑŒ", "Å†"}, {"Ğ›ÑŒ", "Ä»"}, {"Ğ»ÑŒ", "Ä¼"}, {"Ğ“Ì§", "H"}, {"Ğ³Ì§", "h"}}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    for i, replacement in ipairs(other) do text = str_gsub(text, unpack(replacement)) end

    -- Intrestingly the orthography(ies) don't use Cyrillic palatal vowels

    return (str_gsub(text, UTF8char, tab))
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

<document index="338">
<source>wikt/translit/yux-translit.lua</source>
<document_content>
local u = mw.ustring.char

local MACRON = u(0x0304)
local DOTABOVE = u(0x0307)
local DOTBELOW = u(0x0323)

local str_gsub, ugsub = string.gsub, mw.ustring.gsub
local UTF8char = "[\1-\127\194-\244][\128-\191]*"

local export = {}

local tab = {
    ["Ğ"] = "A",
    ["Ğ°"] = "a",
    ["Ğ‘"] = "B",
    ["Ğ±"] = "b",
    ["Ğ’"] = "W",
    ["Ğ²"] = "w",
    ["Ğ“"] = "G",
    ["Ğ³"] = "g",
    ["Ò”"] = "H",
    ["Ò•"] = "h",
    ["Ğ”"] = "D",
    ["Ğ´"] = "d",
    ["Ğ–"] = "Å½",
    ["Ğ¶"] = "Å¾",
    ["Ğ˜"] = "I",
    ["Ğ¸"] = "i",
    ["Ğ™"] = "J",
    ["Ğ¹"] = "j",
    ["Ğš"] = "K",
    ["Ğº"] = "k",
    ["Ğ›"] = "L",
    ["Ğ»"] = "l",
    ["Ğœ"] = "M",
    ["Ğ¼"] = "m",
    ["Ğ"] = "N",
    ["Ğ½"] = "n",
    ["Ò¤"] = "ÅŠ",
    ["Ò¥"] = "Å‹",
    ["Ğ"] = "O",
    ["Ğ¾"] = "o",
    ["Ó¨"] = "Ã˜",
    ["Ó©"] = "Ã¸",
    ["ĞŸ"] = "P",
    ["Ğ¿"] = "p",
    ["Ğ "] = "R",
    ["Ñ€"] = "r",
    ["Ğ¢"] = "T",
    ["Ñ‚"] = "t",
    ["Ğ£"] = "U",
    ["Ñƒ"] = "u",
    ["Ğ¤"] = "F",
    ["Ñ„"] = "f",
    ["Ğ¥"] = "Q",
    ["Ñ…"] = "q",
    ["Ğ§"] = "ÄŒ",
    ["Ñ‡"] = "Ä",
    ["Ğ¨"] = "Å ",
    ["Ñˆ"] = "Å¡",
    ["Ğ­"] = "E",
    ["Ñ"] = "e",

    -- non-native letters
    ["Ğ•"] = "Je",
    ["Ğµ"] = "je",
    ["Ğ"] = "Jo",
    ["Ñ‘"] = "jo",
    ["Ğ—"] = "Z",
    ["Ğ·"] = "z",
    ["Ğ¦"] = "C",
    ["Ñ†"] = "c",
    ["Ğ©"] = "Åš",
    ["Ñ‰"] = "Å›",
    ["Ğ«"] = "Y",
    ["Ñ‹"] = "y",
    ["Ğ®"] = "Ju",
    ["Ñ"] = "ju",
    ["Ğ¯"] = "Ja",
    ["Ñ"] = "ja",
    ["Ğª"] = "Êº",
    ["ÑŠ"] = "Êº",
    ["Ğ¬"] = "Ê¹",
    ["ÑŒ"] = "Ê¹",
    ["Ğ¡"] = "S",
    ["Ñ"] = "s"
}

local other = {{"ĞĞ°", "Ä€"}, {"Ğ°Ğ°", "Ä"}, {"Ğ­Ñ", "Ä’"}, {"ÑÑ", "Ä“"}, {"Ğ˜Ğ¸", "Äª"}, {"Ğ¸Ğ¸", "Ä«"}, {"ĞĞ¾", "ÅŒ"}, {"Ğ¾Ğ¾", "Å"}, {"Ğ£Ñƒ", "Åª"}, {"ÑƒÑƒ", "Å«"}, {"Ó¨Ó©", "Ã˜Ì„"}, {"Ó©Ó©", "Ã¸Ì„"}, {"ĞÑƒ", "Ow"}, {"Ğ¾Ñƒ", "ow"}}

function export.tr(text, lang, sc)
    for i, replacement in ipairs(other) do text = str_gsub(text, unpack(replacement)) end

    return (str_gsub(text, UTF8char, tab))
end

return export

<document_content>
return {["â¿°äº»é©"] = "äºº09", ["â¿°é­šä¸¹"] = "é­š04", ["â¿¹æ°”äº‘"] = "æ°”04", ["â¿ºè¾¶â¿³ç©´â¿²æœˆâ¿±â¿²å¹ºè¨€å¹ºâ¿²é•·é¦¬é•·åˆ‚å¿ƒ"] = "è¾µ54", ["â¿ºè¾¶â¿³ç©´â¿²æœˆâ¿±â¿²å¹ºè¨€å¹ºâ¿²é•¿é©¬é•¿åˆ‚å¿ƒ"] = "è¾µ43", ["â¿¸ç–’å“¥"] = "ç–’10"}

<document index="340">
<source>wikt/translit/zh-sortkey.lua</source>
<document_content>
local export = {}

local namespace = mw.title.getCurrentTitle().nsText

local substring = mw.ustring.sub

local function log(...) if namespace == "Module" then mw.log(...) end end

--[[
	The number of characters or ideographic sequences that must follow each
	ideographic description character.
]]
local IDchars = {
    ["â¿°"] = 2,
    ["â¿±"] = 2,
    ["â¿²"] = 3,
    ["â¿³"] = 3,
    ["â¿´"] = 2,
    ["â¿µ"] = 2,
    ["â¿¶"] = 2,
    ["â¿·"] = 2,
    ["â¿¸"] = 2,
    ["â¿¹"] = 2,
    ["â¿º"] = 2,
    ["â¿»"] = 2

    --[[
	-- in future perhaps: https://www.unicode.org/L2/L2018/18012-irgn2273-four-new-idcs.pdf
	[mw.ustring.char(0x2FFC)] = 2,
	[mw.ustring.char(0x2FFD)] = 2,
	[mw.ustring.char(0x2FFE)] = 1,
	[mw.ustring.char(0x2FFF)] = 1,
	--]]
}

--[[
	Returns the index in the string where the ideographic description sequence
	(IDS) ends, or the index of the end of the string. Iterates whenever
	another ideographic description character (IDC) is found.
]]
local function findEndOfIDS(text, IDchar, i)
    if not (text and IDchar and i) then return nil end

    local j = i
    local component = 1

    -- Number of components expected after current IDC.
    local components = IDchars[IDchar]

    while component <= components do
        j = j + 1

        local char = substring(text, j, j)

        if char == "" then
            break
        elseif IDchars[char] then
            j = findEndOfIDS(text, char, j)
        end

        component = component + 1
    end

    --[[
		If the expected number of components has been found,
		return the current index in the text.
	]]
    if component - components == 1 then
        return j
    else
        return nil
    end
end

local function getFromModule(codepoint, start, returnModule)
    --[=[
		The sortkey modules handle two sets of codepoints.
		The first set runs from [[Module:zh-sortkey/data/001]]
		to [[Module:zh-sortkey/data/056]], then there is a gap
		of 90134 codepoints. The second set runs from
		[[Module:zh-sortkey/data/057]] to
		[[Module:zh-sortkey/data/177]].
	]=]
    local moduleStart = {[0x3400] = 1, [0x20000] = 57}

    local moduleName = string.format("Module:zh-sortkey/data/%03d", (codepoint - start) / 500 + moduleStart[start])
    --	log(codepoint .. ": data module: " .. moduleName)

    if returnModule then
        return moduleName
    else
        local success, data = pcall(mw.loadData, moduleName)

        if success then
            --		log("success! ... " .. codepoint .. ": " .. tostring(data[codepoint]))
            return data[codepoint]
        else
            --		log("failure: " .. codepoint .. " (" .. mw.ustring.char(codepoint) .. ")")
            return nil
        end
    end
end

function export.getData(char, returnModule)
    if type(char) == "string" then
        char = mw.ustring.codepoint(char)
    elseif type(char) ~= number then
        error("getData must operate on a single character or codepoint.")
    end

    --	log(char, mw.ustring.char(char))

    -- Between first code point of the CJK Unified Ideographs Extension A block
    -- and last assigned code point of the CJK Unified Ideographs block.
    if char >= 0x3400 and char <= 0x9FEA then
        return getFromModule(char, 0x3400, returnModule)
        -- In the Supplementary Ideographic Plane, between the first code point of
        -- the CJK Unified Ideographs Extension B block and the last assigned code
        -- point of the CJK Unified Ideographs Extension F block.
    elseif char >= 0x20000 and char <= 0x2EBE0 then
        return getFromModule(char, 0x20000, returnModule)
    else
        --		log("not in range: " .. char .. " (" .. mw.ustring.char(char) .. ")")
    end

    return nil
end

function export.makeSortKey(text, lang, sc)
    local allowed_langs = {zh = true, ja = true, ryu = true, vi = true, za = true}
    if lang and not allowed_langs[lang] then return text end

    if sc and sc ~= "Hani" then return text end

    local sort = {}

    local i = 1
    while i <= mw.ustring.len(text) do
        local character = substring(text, i, i)
        --[=[
			If we encounter an ideographic description character (IDC),
			find out if it begins a valid ideographic description sequence (IDS).
			
			If the IDS is valid and a sortkey for it is listed in
			[[Module:zh-sortkey/data/unsupported]], then return
			the sortkey, and move to the next character after the
			IDS.
			
			Otherwise, insert the IDC into the sortkey and move to the next
			character after the IDC.
			
			If the IDS is valid and no sortkey for it is found, track it.
		]=]
        if IDchars[character] then
            local j = findEndOfIDS(text, character, i)
            local IDS, data
            if j then
                IDS = substring(text, i, j)
                data = mw.loadData("zh-sortkey/data/unsupported")[IDS]
            end
            if not data then
                if IDS then
                    require("debug").track("zh-sortkey/IDS-without-sortkey")
                    mw.log("ideographic description sequence without sortkey: '" .. IDS .. "'")
                else
                    require("debug").track("zh-sortkey/invalid-IDS")
                    mw.log("invalid ideographic description sequence at the beginning of '" .. substring(text, i) .. "'")
                end
            end
            if IDS and data then
                table.insert(sort, data)
                i = j
            else
                table.insert(sort, character)
            end
        else
            table.insert(sort, export.getData(character) or character)
        end
        i = i + 1
    end

    sort = table.concat(sort)

    return sort
end

return export

</document_content>
</document>

</documents>
